GSP33brsvbh1u:8: śāśvatāya namaskurmo vedāya ca bhavāya ca //3//
GSP33brsvbh1u:17: atha yadasaṃdigdhamaprayojanaṃ ca na tatprekṣāvatpratipitsāgocaraḥ, yathā
GSP33brsvbh1u:20: FN: 1-yatra jijñāsyatvaṃ tatraiva saṃdigdhatvaṃ saprayojanatvaṃ ceti jijñāsyatvavyāpake saṃdigdhatvasaprayojanatve /
GSP33brsvbh1u:31: sa cāyam ākīṭapataṅgebhya ā ca devarṣibhyaḥ prāṇabhṛnmātrasyedaṅkārāspadebhyo dehendriyamanobuddhiviṣayebhyo
GSP33brsvbh1u:33: na hi jātu kaścidatra saṃdigdhe 'ahaṃ vā nāhaṃ vā'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:38: tadālambanatve hi 'yo 'haṃ bālye pitarāvanvabhavaṃ sa eva sthāvire praṇaptṝnanubhavāmi'iti pratisaṃdhānaṃ na bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh1u:39: na hi bālasthavirayoḥ śarīrayorasti manāgapi pratyabhijñāna
GSP33brsvbh1u:42: tasmādyeṣu vyāvartamāneṣu yadanuvartate tattebhyo bhinnaṃ yathā ca kusumebhyaḥ sūtram /
GSP33brsvbh1u:43: tathā bālādiśarīreṣu vyāvartamāneṣvapi paramahaṅkārāspadamanuvartamānaṃ tebhyo bhidyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:44: api ca svapnānte divyaśarīrabhedamāsthāya taducitānbhogānbhuñjāna eva pratibuddho manuṣyaśarīramātmānaṃ paśyan 'nāhaṃ devo manuṣya eva'iti
GSP33brsvbh1u:48: tadābhimānītyarthaḥ atredaṃ bodhyam avayavopacayāpacayātmake bālye sthāvire vā na śarīrabhedaḥ siddhyati, śarīramiti buddheranugatatvādityarucyā 'svapnānte'ityudāhṛtam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:49: svāpnabhramavādināṃ mate tadasiddhyā yogavyāghradṛṣṭāntaḥ, jāgratyapi darśayituṃ veti bodhyam
GSP33brsvbh1u:51: ata eva nendriyāṇyapyasyālambanam, indriyabhede 'pi 'yo 'hamadrākṣaṃ sa evaitarhi spṛśāmi'ityahamālambanasya pratyabhijñānāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:60: tasmādidaṅkārāspadebhyo dehendriyamanobuddhiviṣayebhyo vyāvṛttaḥ sphuṭatarāhamanubhavagamya ātmā saṃśayābhāvādajijñāsya iti siddham /
GSP33brsvbh1u:69: na ca 'aham'iti sarvajanīnasphuṭatarānubhavasamarthita ātmā dehendriyādivyatiriktaḥ śakya upaniṣadāṃ sahasrairapyanyathayitum,
GSP33brsvbh1u:72: tasmādanubhavavirodhādupacaritārthā evopaniṣada iti yuktamutpaśyāma ityāśayavānāśaṅkya pariharati-yuṣmadasmatpratyayagocarayoḥ iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:77: yathā hyahaṅkārapratiyogī tvaṅkāro naivamidaṅkāraḥ, 'ete vayam, ime
GSP33brsvbh1u:79: FN: 2-idaṃśabdasya parākpratipādakatvāviśeṣe 'pi ete vayamityādi pracuraprayogavaśānmukhyavadbhānaṃ bhavatīti tattatra nirūḍhamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:81: citsvabhāva ātmā viṣayī, jaḍasvabhāvā buddhīndriyadehaviṣayā viṣayāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:82: ete hi cidātmānaṃ visinvanti avabadhnanti;svena rūpeṇa nirūpaṇīyaṃ kurvantīti yāvat /
GSP33brsvbh1u:85: FN: 3-samudācarantyau bhedena jñāyamāne vṛttī vartane yayoste tathā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:86: adhyāso hi vivekāgraheṇa vyāptaḥ, atra vivekagrahasattvādadhyāso nopapanna
GSP33brsvbh1u:91: FN: 4-itarasyetaratra bhāva iti yojane siddhasya saṃsargādhyāsaniṣedhasya sādhanaṃ bhavettadanenāpahṛtaṃ boddhavyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:94: mā bhūddharmiṇoḥ parasparabhāvaḥ;taddharmāṇāṃ tu jāḍyacaitanyanityatvānityatvādīnāṃ itaretarādhyāso bhaviṣyati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:95: dṛśyate hi dharmiṇorvivekagrahaṇe 'pi taddharmāṇāmadhyāsaḥ, yathā kusumādbhedena gṛhyamāṇe 'pi sphaṭikamaṇāvatisvacchatayā japākusumapratibimbodgrāhiṇyaruṇaḥ sphaṭikaityāruṇyavibhrama ityata
GSP33brsvbh1u:99: tadvivekena gṛhyamāṇasyāpi cchāyāṃ gṛhṇīyāt, cidātmā tvarūpo viṣayī na viṣayacchāyāmudgrāhayitumarhati
GSP33brsvbh1u:101: tadiha pāriśeṣyādviṣayaviṣayiṇoranyonyātmasaṃbhedenaiva taddharmāṇāmapi parasparasaṃbhedena vinimayātmanā bhavitavyam, tau ceddharmiṇāvatyantavivekena gṛhyamāṇāvasaṃbhinnau, asaṃbhinnāḥ sutarāṃ tayordharmāḥ, svāśrayābhyāṃ vyavadhānena dūrāpetatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:106: etaduktaṃ bhavati- adhyāso bhedāgraheṇa vyāptaḥ, tadviruddhaścehāsti
GSP33brsvbh1u:108: mithyeti bhavituṃ yuktaṃ yadyapi tathāpīti yojanā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:113: FN: 1-upakramaḥ prārambhaḥ, parāmarśo madhye nirdeśaḥ upasaṃhāraśca sāmānyena kathitasya viśeṣe niyamanam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:115: antarā ca tejasā śuṅgena sanmūlamanviccha, annena śuṅgena sanmūlamanvicchetyādi nirdiśya 'sa ya eṣo 'ṇimaitadātmyamidaṃ sarvaṃ tatsatyaṃ sa ātmā tattvamasi śvetaketo'ityupasaṃhṛtaṃ vākyaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:120: ekamadvitīyaṃ brahmaiveha pratipipādayiṣitam, yatparaḥ śabdaḥ sa eva tadartho 'nyathātiprasaṅgāt
GSP33brsvbh1u:121: tasmāt brahmaṇo 'vatārāya yatkiñcidvyāhartavyamiti tadvyāhṛtamiti suvacamato niṣprapañcātmatattvapratipādakānyevaitānīti dik /
GSP33brsvbh1u:122: parāmarśopasaṃhāraiḥ kriyāsamabhihāreṇedṛgātmatattvamabhidadhati tatparāṇi santi śakyāni śakreṇāpyupacaritārthāni kartum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:123: abhyāse hi bhūyastvamarthasya bhavati yathāho darśanīyāho darśanīyeti na nyūnatvaṃ, prāgevopacaritatvamiti
GSP33brsvbh1u:138: na hyāgamajñānaṃ sāṃvyavahārikaṃ pratyakṣasya prāmāṇyamupahanti yena kāraṇābhāvānna bhavedapi tu tāttvikam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:142: tathā ca varṇe hrasvatvadīrghatvādayo 'nyadharmā api samāropitāḥ tattvapratipattihetavaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:143: na hi laukikāḥ 'nāgaḥ'iti vā”nagaḥ”iti vā padātkuñcaraṃ vā taruṃ vā pratipadyamānā bhavanti bhrāntāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:148: FN: 2-vidhāyake śabde, paro lakṣyaḥ śabdārtho na bhavatīti śābarabhāṣye
GSP33brsvbh1u:151: 'tattvamasi'ityādau ca jīvabrahmaṇoraikyaṃ bruvatāṃ mate bhāgalakṣaṇāṅgīkārānnaitadyuktamiti vācyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:156: jyeṣṭhatvaṃ ca anapekṣitasya bādhyatve hetuḥ na tu bādhakatve,
GSP33brsvbh1u:159: FN: 3-śuktijñānaṃ rajatajñānāpabādhātmakaṃ, ato yadi nābādhiṣyata tarhi nodapatsyatetyarthaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:165: yajeta, yadi pratihartāpacchidyeta sarvasvadakṣiṇeneti'tatrodgātṛpratihartroḥ krameṇa vicchede viruddhaprāyaścittayoḥ samuccayāsaṃbhavāt kiṃ pūrvaṃ kāryamuta paramiti
GSP33brsvbh1u:172: api ca ye 'pyahaṅkārāspadamātmānamāsthiṣata tairapyasya na tāttvikatvamabhyupetavyam, 'ahamihaivāsmi sadane jānānaḥ'iti sarvavyāpinaḥ prādeśikatvena grahāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:174: na cedaṃ dehasya prādeśikatvamanubhūyate na tvātmana iti sāṃpratam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:175: na hi tadaivaṃ bhavati 'aham' iti;gauṇatve vā na 'jānānaḥ'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:176: api ca paraśabdaḥ paratra lakṣyamāṇaguṇayogena vartata iti yatra prayoktṛpratipatroḥ saṃpratipattiḥ sa gauṇaḥ, sa ca bhedapratyayapuraḥsaraḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:178: FN: 6-'yadagnaye ca prajāpataye ca sāyaṃ juhoti'ityagnerheme
GSP33brsvbh1u:183: juhoti'(ā. 7 pā. 3 sū. 1) ityatra sādhyasādṛśyena gauṇaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:184: FN: 1-prakaraṇabhedena karmabhede siddhe 'nekatra śaktyaṅgīkāre gauravādagnihotravajjuhotīti sādhyasādṛśyena gauṇa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:187: FN: 2-niṣkṛṣya luṭhitaḥ pratibhāsito garbho 'sādhāraṇākāro yasya sa tathā
GSP33brsvbh1u:190: garbhatayā dehādibhyo bhinno 'nubhūyate, yena paraśabdaḥ śarīrādau gauṇo bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh1u:193: nirūṭhatayā gauṇe 'pi na gauṇatvābhimānaḥ sārṣapādiṣu tailaśabdavaditi veditavyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:194: tatrāpi snehāttilabhavādbhede siddha eva sārṣapādīnāṃ tailaśabdavācyatvābhimāno, na tvarthayostailasārṣapayorabhedādhyavasāyaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:195: tatsiddhaṃ gauṇatvamubhayadarśino gauṇamukhyavivekavijñānena vyāptam tadidaṃ vyāpakaṃ vivekajñānaṃ nivartamānaṃ gauṇatāmapi nivartayatīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:201: parīkṣakā api hi vyavahārasamaye na lokasāmāmyamativartante /
GSP33brsvbh1u:203: bāhyā apyāhuḥ -'śāstracintakāḥ khalvevaṃ vivecayanti na pratipattāraḥ'iti
GSP33brsvbh1u:204: tatpāriśeṣyāccidātmagocaramahaṅkāram 'ahamihāsmi sadanā'iti prayuñjāno laukikaḥ śarīrādyabhedagrahādātmanaḥ prādeśikatvamabhimanyate, nabhasa iva ghaṭamaṇikamallikādyupādhyavacchedāditi yuktamutpaśyāmaḥ na cāhaṅkāraprāmāṇyāya dehādivadātmāpi prādeśika iti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:205: tadā khalvayamaṇuparimāṇo vā syāddehaparimāṇo vā?aṇuparimāṇatve sthūlo
GSP33brsvbh1u:206: 'ham, dīrgha iti ca na syāt, dehaparimāṇatve tu sāvayavatayā
GSP33brsvbh1u:208: kiñca asminpakṣe avayavasamudāyo vā cetayet pratyekaṃ vāvayavāḥ?pratyekaṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:209: cetanatvapakṣe bahūnāṃ cetanānāṃ svatantrāṇāmekavākyatābhāvādaparyāyaṃ viruddhādikkriyatayā śarīramunmathyeta, akriyaṃ vā prasajyeta /
GSP33brsvbh1u:210: samudāyasya tu caitanyayoge vṛkṇa ekasminnavayave cidātmano 'pyavayavo
GSP33brsvbh1u:213: ya evāvayavo viśīrṇastadā tadabhāve na cetayet /
GSP33brsvbh1u:219: tadevamuktena krameṇāhaṃpratyaye pūtikūṣmāṇḍīkṛte bhagavatī śrutirapratyūhaṃ kartṛtvabhoktṛtvaduḥkhaśokādyātmatvamahamanubhavaprasañjitamātmano niṣeddhumarhatīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:224: lokavyavahāro lokānāṃ vyavahāraḥ, sa cāyamahamiti vyapadeśaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:225: itiśabdasūcitaśca śarīrādyanukūlaṃ pratikūlaṃ ca prameyajātaṃ pramāya pramāṇena tadupādānaparivarjanādiḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:231: atra ca adhyāsavyavahārakriyābhyāṃ yaḥ kartonnītaḥ sa samāna iti samānakartṛkatvenādhyasya vyavahāra ityupapannam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:235: tadevamadhyāsasvarūpaṃ phalaṃ ca vyavahāramuktvā tasya nimittamāha-itaretarāvivekena /
GSP33brsvbh1u:237: athāviveka eva kasmānna bhavati, tathā ca nādhyāsa ityata
GSP33brsvbh1u:239: paramārthato dharmiṇoratādātmyaṃ viveko dharmāṇāṃ cāsaṃkīrṇatā vivekaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:243: iha tu paramārthasataścidātmano 'tyantabhinnaṃ na dehādyasti vastusat,
GSP33brsvbh1u:244: tatkutaścidātmano bhedāgrahaḥ kutaśca tādātmyavibhramaḥ ityata āha-satyānṛte mithunīkṛtya iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:246: satyaṃ cidātmā, anṛtaṃ buddhīndriyadehādi,te dve dharmiṇī mithunīkṛtya
GSP33brsvbh1u:249: na ca saṃvṛtiparamārthasatoḥ pāramārthakaṃ mithunamastītyabhūtatadbhāvārthasya cveḥ prayogaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:253: āropyasya pratītau satyāṃ pūrvadṛṣṭasya samāropaḥ samāropanibandhanā ca pratītiriti durvāraṃ parasparāśrayatvamityata āha-naisargika iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:255: vyavahārānāditayā tatkāraṇasyādhyāsasyānāditoktā, tataśca pūrvapūrvamithyājñānopadarśitasya buddhīndriyaśarīrāderuttarottarādhyāsopayoga ityanāditvātbījāṅkuravanna parasparāśrayatvamityarthaḥ syādetat /
GSP33brsvbh1u:256: addhā pūrvapratītimātramupayujyata ārope, na tu pratīyamānasya
GSP33brsvbh1u:259: prakāśamānatvameva hi cidātmano 'pi sattvaṃ na tu tadatiriktaṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:263: asattve vā na prakāśamānāḥtatkathaṃ satyānṛtayormithunībhāvaḥ, tadabhāve vā kasya kuto bhedāgrahaḥ,tadasaṃbhave kuto 'dhyāsa
GSP33brsvbh1u:274: tasya ca dṛṣṭatvamātramupayujyate na vastusatteti dṛṣṭagrahaṇam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:275: tathāpi vartamānaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ darśanaṃ nāropopayogīti pūrvetyuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:281: asti hi svastimatyāṃ gavi pūrvadṛṣṭasya gotvasya, paratra kālākṣyāmavabhāsaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:283: FN: 1-āśrayaṃ paradharmāvabhāsa iti vivakṣāyāṃ metadudāharaṇam, pūrvaṃ tu pūrvadṛṣṭasya paratra dharmyadhyāsamabhipretyeti jñeyam
GSP33brsvbh1u:284: ca pāṭaliputre pūrvadṛṣṭasya devadattasya paratra māhiṣmatyāmavabhāsaḥ samīcīnaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:286: FN: 2-nanu avamato bhāso 'vabhāsa iti vyutpādayam kathamudāhṛtasthalādāvativyāptimāheti vadantaṃ pratyāha-avabhāsapadaṃ ceti
GSP33brsvbh1u:288: na ca pūrvadṛṣṭapadenānirvācyānṛtamuktamityuktatvānna tatrātivyāptikathanaṃ saṃgacchata iti vācyam, tādṛśārthasya smṛtirupapadenābhidhīyamānatvāditi bodhyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:289: padaṃ ca samīcīne 'pi pratyaye prasiddham, yathā nīlasyāvabhāsaḥ pītasyāvabhāsa ityata āha-smṛtirūpa iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:291: asaṃnihitaviṣayatvaṃ ca smṛtirūpatvam, saṃnihitaviṣayaṃ ca pratyabhijñānaṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:297: atrāpi hi smaryamāṇe pitrādau nidropaplavavaśādasaṃnidhānāparāmarśe, tatra tatra pūrvadṛṣṭasyaiva saṃnihitadeśakālatvasya samāropaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:300: pītatāṃ pittarahitāmanubhavan, śaṅkhaṃ ca doṣācchāditaśuklimāṃ na
GSP33brsvbh1u:302: asaṃbandhāgrahaṇasārūpyeṇapītaṃ tapanīyapiṇḍaṃpītaṃ bilvaphalamityādau pūrvadṛṣṭaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ pītatvaśaṅkhatvayorāropyāhapītaḥ śaṅkhaiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:304: evaṃ vijñātṛpuruṣābhimukheṣvādarśodakādiṣu svaccheṣu cākṣuṣaṃ tejo lagnamapi balīyasā sauryeṇa tejasā pratisrotaḥ pravartitaṃ mukhasaṃyuktaṃ mukhaṃ grāhayat, doṣavaśāttaddeśatāmanabhimukhatāṃ ca mukhasyāgrāhayat,
GSP33brsvbh1u:306: FN: 2-pūrvadṛṣṭayorabhimukhayoḥ ādarthodakayordeśa eva deśo yasya tasya bhāvastattā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:311: etaduktaṃ bhavati-na prakāśamānatāmātraṃ sattvam, yena dehendriyādeḥ prakāśamānatayā sadbhāvo bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh1u:312: na hi sarpādibhāvena rajjvādayo vā sphaṭikādayo vā raktādiguṇayogino na
GSP33brsvbh1u:313: pratibhāsante, pratibhāsamānā vā bhavanti tadātmānastaddharmāṇo vā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:318: na ca marīcirūpeṇa salilamavastusatsvarūpeṇa tu paramārthasadeva,
GSP33brsvbh1u:319: dehendriyādayastu svarūpeṇāpyasanta ityanubhavāgocaratvātkathamāropyanta iti sāṃpratamyato yadyasan nānubhavagocarāḥ kathaṃ tarhi marīcyādīnāmasatāṃ toyatayānubhavagocaratvam,na ca svarūpasattvena toyādyātmanāpi santo bhavanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:320: yadyucyeta nābhāvo nāma bhāvādanyaḥ kaścidasti, api tu bhāva eva bhāvāntarātmanā abhāvaḥ svarūpeṇa tu bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:324: tathā jalarūpeṇa marīcīnāmasattvaṃ yat tanmarīcaya eva,
GSP33brsvbh1u:330: prapañcasya punaratyantāsato nirastasamastasāmarthyasya nistattvasya kuto 'nubhavaviṣayabhāvaḥ, kuto vā cidātmanyāropaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:334: śūnyavādino hi śūnyasyāpi bhāsanamabhyupagacchanti, upapattiśca svasamānākāraparvapratyayasāmarthyena
GSP33brsvbh1u:336: naca tanmate 'satprakāśanajñānasyāpi śūnyatvātsarvatrānāśvāsaprasaṅga iti vācyam, yato jñānamapi pūrvajñānādhīnasattvamityupagamyamānatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:346: FN: 7-mā bhūdasataḥ śaktikāryatvam, ayogyatvāt, śaktijñāpyaṃ punaḥ kasmānnabhavediti cet
GSP33brsvbh1u:350: FN: 8-atha vaktavyaṃ jñānāntaramupalabhata iti tathāpi tasyāpi jñāpakatvena jñānāntarāpekṣāyāmanavasthāpāta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:352: vijñānasvarūpameva asataḥ prakāśa iti cet, kaḥ punareṣa sadasatoḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:353: saṃbandhaḥ?asadadhīnanirūpaṇatvaṃ sato jñānasyāsatā saṃbandha iti cet, aho batāyamatinirvṛttaḥ pratyayatapasvī yasyāsatyapi nirūpaṇamāyatate, na ca pratyayastatrādhatte kiñcit, asata ādhāratvāyogāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:354: asadantareṇa pratyayo na prathata iti pratyayasyaivaiṣa svabhāvo na tvasadadhīnamasya kiñciditi cet, aho batāsyāsatpakṣapāto yadayamatadutpattiratadātmā ca tadavinābhāva
GSP33brsvbh1u:355: FN: 1-avinābhāvamūlaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvo vā tatsvabhāvatvaṃ vā vaktavyam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:360: FN: 2-evaṃ sarvatra vastu sadeva bhātīti sadvādinākṣipte siddhāntyāha-atra
GSP33brsvbh1u:362: nistattvaṃ cennānubhavagocaraḥ, tatkimidānīṃ marīcayo 'pi toyātmanā satattvā yadanubhavagocarāḥ syuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:364: FN: 3-nanu sadvādinā toyātmanā marīcīnāmasattvaṃ cedaṅgīkriyeta tarhi siddhāntahāniriti cenna, marīcirūpameva toyarūpeṇāsat,
GSP33brsvbh1u:367: dvividhaṃ ca vastūnāṃ tattvaṃ sattvamasattvaṃ ca /
GSP33brsvbh1u:368: tatra pūrvaṃ svataḥ, paraṃ tu parataḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:370: vastuni jñāyate kiñcidrūpaṃ kaiścitkadā ca na //
GSP33brsvbh1u:375: marīciṣu toyanirbhāsapratyayastattvagocaraḥ, tathā ca samīcīna iti na bhrānto nāpi bādhyeta
GSP33brsvbh1u:377: atoyātmatattvā marīcaro na bhrame bhāsante, kiṃ tu bhāvāntaratoyātmanaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:379: addhā na bādhyeta yadi marīcīnatoyātmatattvānatoyātmanā gṛhṇīyāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:380: toyātmanā tu gṛhṇan kathamabhrāntaḥ, kathaṃ vābādhyaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:381: FN: 6-anirvacanīyakhyātivādī pratyāha-yatpunarāropita bhāvāntaratoyātmanā marīcayo bhāsanta ityavādīḥ, tatretthaṃ vicāryate tadvāsat, nādya
GSP33brsvbh1u:383: hantatoyābhāvātmanāṃ marīcināṃ toyabhāvātmatvaṃ tāvanna sat, teṣāṃ toyābhāvādabhedena toyabhāvātmatānupapatteḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:385: FN: 7-na satkiṃ tu asadeveti cettātkiṃ tucchaṃ vā sadbhinnaṃ veti vaktavyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:390: na kaścidanirūpaṇāt'iti vadadbhiḥ, na cāropitaṃ rūpaṃ vastvantaram,taddhi
GSP33brsvbh1u:391: marīcayo vā bhavet, gaṅgādigataṃ toyaṃ vā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:392: pūrvasminkalpe marīcayaḥ iti pratyayaḥ syāt, na toyamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:393: uttarasmiṃstu gaṅgāyāṃ toyamiti syāt, na punariheti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:401: krameṇādhyastaṃ toyaṃ paramārthatoyamiva, ata eva pūrvadṛṣṭamiva,tattvatastu na toyaṃ na ca pūrvadṛṣṭaṃ, kiṃ tvanṛtamanirvācyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:403: pūrvamithyāpratyayopadarśita iva paratra cidātmanyadhyasyata iti upapannam, adhyāsalakṣaṇayogāt
GSP33brsvbh1u:406: abādhitā svayaṃprakāśataiva asya sattā, sā ca svarūpameva cidātmanaḥ, na tu tadatiriktaṃ sattāsāmānyasamavāyor'thakriyākāritā veti sarvamavadātam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:407: sa cāyamevaṃlakṣaṇako 'dhyāso 'nirvacanīyaḥ sarveṣāmeva saṃmataḥ parīkṣakāṇāṃ, tadbhede paraṃ vipratipattirityanirvacanīyatāṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:412: sautrāntikanaye tāvadbāhyamasti vastu sat, tatra jñānākārasyāropaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:413: vijñānavādināmapi yadyapi na bāhyaṃ vastu sat,
GSP33brsvbh1u:423: ityarthaḥ, tasmānnedaṃ rajatamityatra raḍate bhāsamānā idantaiva bādhitā
GSP33brsvbh1u:425: tathā caitanmate ahaṃ rajatamiti pratyayaḥ prameti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:426: nedaṃ rajatamiti ca bādhakasyedantāmātrabādhenopapattau na rajatagocaratocitā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:427: rajatasya dharmiṇo bhādhe hi rajataṃ ca tasya ca dharma idantā bādhite bhavetām,tadvaramidantaivāsya dharmo bādhyatām na punā rajatamapi dharmi,
GSP33brsvbh1u:428: tathā ca rajataṃ bahirbādhitamarthādāntare jñāne vyavatiṣṭhata iti jñānākārasya bahiradhyāsaḥ sidhyati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:436: anubhavo 'pi rajatapratyayo vā syāt, bādhakapratyayo vā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:439: ahamiti hi tadā syāt, pratipattuḥ pratyayādavyatirekāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:440: bhrāntaṃ vijñānaṃ svākārameva bāhyatayādhyavasyati, tathā ca nāhaṅkārāspadamasya gocaraḥ, jñānākāratā punarasya bādhakapratyayapravedanīyeti cet, hanta bādakapratyayamālocayatvāyuṣmān kiṃ purovarti dravyaṃ rajatādvidhecayatyāhosmin jñānākāratāmapyasya darśayati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:441: tatra jñānākāratopadarśanavyāpāraṃ bādhakapratyayasya bruvāṇaḥ ślāghanīyaprajño devānāṃ priyaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:454: na caiṣa rajatasya niṣedhaḥ, na cedantāyāḥ, kiṃ tu vivekāgrahaprasañjitasya rajatavyavahārasya
GSP33brsvbh1u:455: na ca rajatameva śuktikāyāṃ prasañjitaṃ rajatajñānena /
GSP33brsvbh1u:471: FN: 10-idaṃ rajatamiti jñānaṃ na mithyetyāha-api ceti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:472: api cendriyādīnāṃ samīcīnajñānopajanane sāmarthyamupalabdhamiti kathamebhyo mithyājñānasaṃbhavaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:473: doṣasahitānāṃ teṣāṃ mithyāpratyaye 'pi sāmarthyamiti cenna, doṣāṇāṃ kāryopajananasāmarthyavighātamātra hetutvāt,anyathā duṣṭādapi kuṭajabījādvaṭāṅkurotpattiprasaṅgāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:476: FN: 11-sarvajñānānāṃ samīcīnatve udāhṛtasthale bhrama eva na syāditi
GSP33brsvbh1u:478: tathā ca rajatam,idam iti ca dve vijñāne smṛtyanubhavarūpe, tatredamiti
GSP33brsvbh1u:486: tathā ca rajatasamṛteḥ purovartidravyamātragrahaṇasya ca mithaḥ svarūpato viṣayataśca bhedāgrahāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:489: tajjñānasārūpyaṃ-yathedaṃ rajatamitijñānaṃ idamo rajatasya cāsaṃsargaṃ na gṛhṇāti, tayoḥ saṃsṛṣṭatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:492: rajatagocarajñānasārūpyeṇa, idaṃ rajatamiti bhinne api smaraṇagrahaṇe abhedavyavahāraṃ ca sāmānādhikaraṇyavyapadeśaṃ ca pravartayataḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:493: kvacitpunargrahaṇe eva mitho 'nugṛhītabhede, yathā pītaḥ śaṅkhaḥiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:494: atra hi bahirvinirgacchannayanaraśmivartinaḥ pittadravyasya kācasyeva svacchasya pītatvaṃ gṛhyate pittaṃ tu na gṛhyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:498: bādhakatvamapyupapadyate, tadupapattau ca prācīnasya pratyayasya bhrāntatvamapi lokasiddhaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:503: yasminśuktikādau yasya rajatāderadhyāsa iti lokaprasiddhiḥ nāsāvanyathākhyātinibandhanā, kintu gṛhītasya rajatādestatsmaraṇasya ca gṛhītatāṃśapramoṣeṇa gṛhītamātrasya ca yaḥ idamiti puro
GSP33brsvbh1u:507: atredamākūtam-asti tāvadrajatārthinorajatamidamiti pratyayātpurovartini dravye pravṛttiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyavyapadeśaśceti sarvajanīnam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:510: nanūktaṃ nāgrahaṇamātrāt, kiṃ tu grahaṇasmaraṇe eva mithaḥ svarūpato
GSP33brsvbh1u:515: gṛhyamāṇatve 'pisamīcīnajñānasārūpyamanayoridamiti rajatamiti ca jñānayoḥ'iti grahaṇam, 'athavānayoreva svarūpato viṣayataśca mitho
GSP33brsvbh1u:517: tatra na tāvatsamīcīnajñānasadṛśī iti jñānaṃ samīcīnajñānavadvyavahārapravartakam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:518: na higosadṛśo gavayaḥiti jñānaṃ gavārthinaṃ gavaye pravartayati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:519: anayoreva bhedāgrahaḥiti tu jñānaṃ parāhatam,na hi bhedāgrahe anayoriti
GSP33brsvbh1u:520: bhavati, anayoriti grahe bhedāgrahaṇamiti ca bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:522: tatra kimayamāropotpādakrameṇa vyavahāraheturāstvāho 'nutpāditāropa eva svata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:525: nanu satyaṃ cetanavyavahāro nājñānapūrvakaḥ kiṃ tvaviditavivekagrahaṇasmaraṇapūrvaka iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:529: kathaṃ cāyamidaṅkārāspade pravarteta yadi na tadicchet /
GSP33brsvbh1u:531: na cedidaṅkārāspadaṃ rajatamiti jānīyātkathaṃ rajatārthī tadicchet /
GSP33brsvbh1u:535: itīdaṅkārāspade rajatasamāropeṇopādāna eva vyavasthāpyate iti bhedāgrahaḥ samāropotpādakrameṇa cetanapravṛttihetuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:543: FN: 2-sādhyasādhanajñātasaṃbandhasya puṃso liṅgaviśiṣṭadharmyekadeśadarśanāt liṅge viśiṣṭadharmyekadeśe buddhiranumānamiti śabarasvāminaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:547: rajatādyarthinastatra niyamena pravartakatvāt, yadyadarthinaṃ yatra niyamena pravartayati
GSP33brsvbh1u:549: yaccoktamanavabhāsamānatayā na śuktirālambanamiti, tatra bhavān pṛṣṭo
GSP33brsvbh1u:550: vyācaṣṭām, kiṃ śuktikātvasyaidaṃ rajatamiti jñānaṃ pratyanālambanatvamāhosvitdravyamātrasya puraḥsthitasya sitabhāsvarasya /
GSP33brsvbh1u:560: yaccoktaṃ mithyāpratyayasya vyabhicāre sarvapramāṇeṣvanāśvāsa iti, tat bodhakatvena svataḥprāmāṇyaṃ nāvyabhicāreṇeti vyutpādayadbhirasmābhiḥ parihṛtaṃ nyāya
GSP33brsvbh1u:565: vistarastu brahmatattvasamīkṣāyāmavagantavya iti, tadidamuktam-'anye tu yatra yadadhyāsastasyaiva viparītadharmatvakalpanāmācakṣate iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:568: nanu santu nāma parīkṣakāṇāṃ vipratipattayaḥ, prakṛte tu kimāyātamityatāha-sarvathāpi tvanyasyānyadharmakalpanāṃ na vyabhicarati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:576: na kevalamiyamanṛtatā parīkṣakāṇāṃ siddhā, api tu laukikānāmapītyāha-tathā
GSP33brsvbh1u:580: anyasyānyātmatāvibhramo lokasiddhaḥ, ekasya tvabhinnasya bhedabhramo na dṛṣṭa iti kutaścidātmano 'bhinnānāṃ jīvānāṃ bhedavibhrama ityatāha-ekaścandraḥ sadvitīyavaditi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:582: ayamarthaḥ-cidātmā prakāśate na vāna cetprakāśate, kathamasminnadhyāso viṣayataddharmāṇā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:583: na khalvapratibhāsamāne purovartini dravye rajatasya vā taddharmāṇāṃ vā samāropaḥ saṃbhavatiti
GSP33brsvbh1u:584: pratibhāse vā (na) tāvadayamātmā jaḍo ghaṭādivatparādhīnaprakāśa iti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:585: na khalu sa eva kartā ca karma ca bhavati, virodhāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:586: FN: 2-dhātvarthatāvacchedakaphalaśālitvaṃ karmatvamityukte gacchatītyādau saṃyogaphalasya grāma iva caitre 'pi samavetatvāt, caitraścaivaṃ gacchatīti prayogāpattiḥ, tasmātparasamavetakriyāphalaśālitvameva karmatvamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:587: parasamavetakriyāphalaśāli hi karma, na ca jñānakriyā parasamavāyinīti kathamasyāṃ karma,na ca tadeva svaṃ ca paraṃ ca, virodhāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:591: ātmā jaḍo 'pi sarvārthajñāneṣu bhāsamāno 'pi kartaiva na karma,
GSP33brsvbh1u:593: yathā hi caitrasamavetakriyayā caitranagaraprāptāvubhayasamavetāyāmapi kriyamāṇāyāṃ nagarasyaiva karmatā, parasamavetakriyāphalaśālitvāt, na tu caitrasya kriyāphalaśālino 'pi, caitrasamavāyādgamanakriyāyā iti, tanna /
GSP33brsvbh1u:595: śrūyate hi 'satyaṃ jñānamanantaṃ brahma'iti upapadyate ca, tathā hi-yo
GSP33brsvbh1u:596: 'yamarthaprakāśaḥ phalaṃ yasminnarthaśca ātmā ca prathete sa kiṃ jaḍaḥ svayaṃprakāśo vā
GSP33brsvbh1u:597: jaḍaścetviṣayātmānāvapi jaḍāviti kasminkiṃ prakāśetāviśeṣāt, iti prāptamāndhyamaśeṣasya jagataḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:600: na ca nilīnameva vijñānamarthātmānau jñāpayati, cakṣurādivaditi vācyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:601: jñāpanaṃ hi jñānajananam, janitaṃ ca jñānaṃ jaḍaṃ sannoktadūṣaṇamativarteteti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:604: FN: 3-saṃvidaparādhīnaprakāśā bhavatu, ātmā jaḍaḥ kiṃ na syāditivādinaṃ ātmasvaprakāśavādyāha---tathāpīti
GSP33brsvbh1u:607: FN: 1-arthātmasaṃbandhinyāṃ saṃvidyajaḍāyāmapi nārthātmanoḥ prakāśamānatāsiddhiḥ paṇḍite 'pi putre piturapāṇḍityavadityāha---tatkimiti
GSP33brsvbh1u:608: tatkiṃ putraḥ paṇḍita iti pitāpi paṇḍito 'stu /
GSP33brsvbh1u:609: svabhāva eṣa saṃvidaḥ svayaṃprakāśāyā yadarthātmasaṃbandhiteti cet, hanta putrasyāpi paṇḍitasya svabhāva eṣa yatpitṛsaṃbandhiteti
GSP33brsvbh1u:610: FN: 2-yathā svabhāvasaṃbaddhā saṃvit tathā pitṛgatajanakatvasaṃbaddhaṃ putragatajanyatvamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:612: sahārthātmaprakāśena saṃvitprakāśo na tvarthātmaprakāśaṃ vineti tasyāḥ svabhāva iti cet, tatkiṃ saṃvido bhinnau saṃvidarthātmaprakāśau /
GSP33brsvbh1u:613: tathā ca na svayaṃprakāśā saṃvit, na ca saṃvidarthātmaprakāśa iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:616: prakāśo na saṃvido bhidyete', saṃvideva tau /
GSP33brsvbh1u:617: evaṃ cet yāvaduktaṃ bhavati saṃvitātmārthau saheti tāvaduktaṃ bhavati saṃvidarthātmaprakāśau
GSP33brsvbh1u:626: arthaviṣayahānādibuddhijananācca arthasaṃvidastadviṣayatvamiti cet, tatkiṃ dehasya prayatnavadātmasaṃyogo dehapravṛttinivṛttiheturarthe ityarthaprakāśo 'stu /
GSP33brsvbh1u:627: jāḍyāddehātmasaṃyogo nārthaprakāśa iti cet, nanvayaṃ svayaṃprakāśo 'pi
GSP33brsvbh1u:628: svātmanyeva khadyotavatprakāśaḥ, arthe tu jaḍa ityupapāditam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:639: na ca anirvācyārthabhedaḥ prakāśaṃ nirvācyaṃ bhettumarhati, atiprasaṅgāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:640: na ca arthānāmapi parasparaṃ bhedaḥ samīcīnajñānapaddhatimadhyāste ityupariṣṭādupapādayiṣyate
GSP33brsvbh1u:641: tadayaṃ prakāśa eva svayaṃprakāśa ekaḥ kūṭasthanityo niraṃśaḥ pratyagātmāśakyanirvacanīyebhyo dehendriyādibhya ātmānaṃ pratīpaṃ nirvacanīyamañcati jānātīti pratyaṅ sa cātmeti pratyagātmā, sa
GSP33brsvbh1u:645: kasmādayamayukta ityata āha-sarvo hi puro 'vasthite viṣaye viṣayāntaramadhyasyati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:646: etaduktaṃ bhavati-yatparādhīnaprakāśamaṃśavacca tatsāmānyāṃśagrahe kāraṇadoṣavaśācca viśeṣāgrahe 'nyathā prakāśate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:647: pratyagātmā tvaparādhīnaprakāśatayā na svajñāne kāraṇānyapekṣate, yena tadāśrayairdeṣairduṣyet
GSP33brsvbh1u:648: na cāṃśavān, yena kaścidasyāṃśo gṛhyeta, kaścinna gṛhyeta /
GSP33brsvbh1u:649: nahi tadeva tadānīmeva tenaiva gṛhītamagṛhītaṃ ca saṃbhavatīti na svayaṃprakāśapakṣe 'dhyāsaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:651: FN: 9-śukteriva ekasyaiva vastunaḥ grahaṇāgrahaṇe siddhe kimityaupādhikaṃ viṣayatvaṃ sādhyata iti cet sāṃśasya tathā syāt ātmanastu niraṃśatvānna
GSP33brsvbh1u:653: na hi śuktau apuraḥsthitāyāṃ rajatamadhyasyatīdaṃ rajatamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:654: tasmādatyantagrahe atyantāgrahe ca nādhyāsa iti siddham /
GSP33brsvbh1u:656: aviṣayatve hi cidātmano nādhyāsaḥ, viṣaya eva tu cidātmāsmatpratyayasya,
GSP33brsvbh1u:657: tatkathaṃ nādhyāsa ityata āha-yuṣmatpratyayāpetasya ca pratyagātmano 'viṣayatvaṃ bravīṣi
GSP33brsvbh1u:659: tathā ca yo viṣayī sa eva cidātmā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:661: tasmādanātmatvaprasaṅgādanavasthāparihārāya yuṣmatpratyayāpetatvamata evāviṣayatvamātmano vaktavyam, tathā ca nādhyāsa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:666: 'vacchinna iva abhinno 'pi bhinna iva, akartāpi karteva abhoktāpi bhokteva aviṣayo 'pyasmatpratyayaviṣaya iva, jīvabhāvamāpanno 'vabhāsate, nabha iva ghaṭamaṇikamallikādyavacchedabhedena bhinnamivānekavidhadharmakamiveti na hi cidekarasasyātmanaḥ cidaṃśe gṛhīte agṛhītaṃ kiñcidasti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:667: na khalvānandanityatvavibhutvādayo 'sya cidrūpādvastuto bhidyante, yena tadgrahe na gṛhyeran
GSP33brsvbh1u:668: gṛhītā eva tu kalpitena bhedena na vivecitā ityagṛhītā ivābhānti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:669: na ca ātmano buddhyādibhyo bhedastāttvikaḥ, yena cidātmani gṛhyamāṇe so
GSP33brsvbh1u:671: tasmāccidātmanaḥ svayaṃprakāśasyaiva anavacchinnasya avacchinnebhyo buddhyādibhyo bhedāgrahāt tadadhyāsena jīvabhāva iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:673: tathā hi-kartā bhoktā cidātmā ahaṃpratyaye pratyavabhāsate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:675: yasya ca buddhyādeḥ kāryakāraṇasaṃghātasya kriyābhogaśaktī na tasya caitanyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:676: tasmāccidātmaiva kāryakaraṇasaṃghātena grathito labdhakriyābhogaśaktiḥ svayaṃprakāśo 'pi buddhyādiviṣayavicchuraṇāt kathañcidasmatpratyayaviṣayo 'haṅkārāspadaṃ jīva iti ca janturiti ca kṣetrajña iti ca ākhyāyate na khalu jīvaścidātmano bhidyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:679: FN: 1-yatpūrvaṃ karmakartṛtvavirodha uktaḥ so 'pyanena parāsto veditavyaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:682: na ca adhyāse sati viṣayatvaṃ viṣayatve ca adhyāsaḥ ityanyonyāśrayatvamiti
GSP33brsvbh1u:687: jīvo hi cidātmatayā svayaṃprakāśatayāviṣayo 'pyaupādhikena rūpeṇa viṣaya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:689: na vayamaparādhīnaprakāśatayāviṣayatvenādhyāsamapākurmaḥ, kintu pratyagātmā na svato nāpi parataḥ prathata ityaviṣayaḥ iti brūmaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:690: tathā ca sarvathāprathamāne pratyagātmani kuto 'dhyāsa ityata
GSP33brsvbh1u:692: pratīca ātmanaḥ prasiddhiḥ prathā, tasyā aparokṣatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:693: yadyapi pratyagātmani nānyā prathāsti, tathāpi bhedopacāraḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:695: etaduktaṃ bhavati-avaśyaṃ cidātmāparokṣo 'bhyupetavyaḥ tadaprathāyāṃ sarvasyāprathanena jagadāndhyaprasaṅgādityuktam
GSP33brsvbh1u:696: śrutiścātra bhavati-'tameva bhāntamanu bhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:698: tadevaṃ paramārthaparihāramuktvābhyupetyāpi cidātmanaḥ parokṣatāṃ prauḍhavāditayā parihārāntaramāha-na cāyamasti niyamaḥ puro 'vasthita eva,
GSP33brsvbh1u:700: kasmādayaṃ na niyama ityata āha-apratyakṣe 'pi hyākāśe bālāstalamalinatādyadhyasanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:702: nabho hi dravyaṃ sat rūpasparśavirahānna bāhyendriyapratyakṣam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:704: atha ca tatra bālā avivekinaḥ paradarśitadarśinaḥ kadācitpārthivacchāyāṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:705: śyāmatāmāropya, kadācittaijasaṃ śuklatvamāropya, nīlotpalapalāśaśyāmamiti vā rājahaṃsamālādhavalamiti vā nirvarṇayanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:706: tatrāpi pūrvadṛṣṭasya taijasasya vā tāmasasya rūpasya paratra nabhasi smṛtirūpo 'vabhāsata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:710: nanu santi ca sahasramadhyāsāḥ, tatkimarthamayamevādhyāsa ākṣepasamādhānābhyāṃ vyutpāditaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:714: pratyagātmanyanātmādhyāsa eva sarvānarthahetuḥ na punā rajatādivibhramā iti sa evāvidyā, tatsvarūpaṃ cāvijñātaṃ na śakyamucchettumiti tadeva vyutpādyaṃ nādhyāsamātram /
GSP33brsvbh1u:718: na caivaṃ pṛthagjanā api manyante 'dhyāsam, yena na vyutpādyetetyata
GSP33brsvbh1u:721: upāyābhāvāditi yo manyate taṃ prati tannirodhopāyamāha-tadvivekena ca
GSP33brsvbh1u:727: vastusvarūpāvadhāraṇaṃ vidyā cidātmarūpaṃ svarūpe vyavatiṣṭhata ityarthaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:729: atinirūḍhanibiḍhavāsanānuvidvāvidyā vidyayāpabādhitāpi svavāsanāvaśātpunarudbhaviṣyati pravartayiṣyati ca vāsanādikāryaṃ svocitamityata āha-tatraivaṃ sati, evaṃbhūtavastutattvāvadhāraṇe
GSP33brsvbh1u:730: sati,yatra yadadhyāsastatkṛtena doṣeṇa guṇena vā aṇumātreṇāpi sa na
GSP33brsvbh1u:731: saṃbadhyate-antaḥkaraṇādidoṣeṇāśanāyādinā cidātmā, cidātmano guṇena caitanyānandādināntaḥkaraṇādi na saṃbadhyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:732: etaduktaṃ bhavati-tattvāvadhāraṇābhyāsasya hi svabhāva eva sa tādṛśaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:740: yaduktam,satyānṛte mithunākṛtya, vivekāgrahādadhyasyāhamidaṃmamedamiti lokavyavahāraiti tatra vyapadeśalakṣaṇo vyavahāraḥ kaṇṭhoktaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:744: tattvaparicchedo hi pramā vidyā,tatsādhanāni pramāṇāni kathamavidyāvadviṣayāṇi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:747: santu vā pratyakṣādīni saṃvṛtyāpi yathā tathā,śāstrāṇi tu puruṣahitānuśāsanaparāṇyavidyāpratipakṣatayā
GSP33brsvbh1u:751: ayamarthaḥ-pramātṛtvaṃ hi pramāṃ prati kartṛtvam tacca svātantryam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:757: atha mā pravartiṣata pramāṇāni kiṃ naśchinnamityata āha-na
GSP33brsvbh1u:759: vyavahriyate aneneti vyavahāraḥ phalam, pratyakṣādīnāṃ pramāṇānāṃ phalamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:764: kimiti punaḥ pramātopādatte pramāṇāni,atha svayameva kasmānna pravartata
GSP33brsvbh1u:767: na jātu karaṇānyanadhiṣṭhitāni kartrā svakārye vyāpriyante, mā bhūtkuvindarahitebhyo vemādibhyaḥ paṭotpattiriti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:768: atha deha evādhiṣṭhātā kasmānna bhavati,kṛtamatrātmādhyāsenetyata āha-na
GSP33brsvbh1u:773: evamanadhyastātmabhāvaṃ dehendriyāditi vyāpārayan bhaviṣyati tadabhijñaḥ pramātotyata āha-na
GSP33brsvbh1u:780: pramāyāṃ khalu phale svatantraḥ pramātā bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:782: kathaṃ ca jaḍasyāntaḥkaraṇasya pariṇāmaścidrūpo bhavet, yadi cidātmā tatra
GSP33brsvbh1u:784: kathaṃ caiṣa cidātmakartṛko bhavet, yadyantaḥkaraṇaṃ vyāpāravaccidātmani nādhyasyet /
GSP33brsvbh1u:785: tasmāditaretarādhyāsāccidātmakartṛsthaṃ pramāphalaṃ sidhyati, tatsiddhau ca pramātṛtvam, tāmeva ca pramāmurarīkṛtya pramāṇasya pravṛttiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:792: āgamopapattipratipannapratyagātmatattvānāṃ vyutpannānāmapi puṃsāṃ pramāṇaprameyavyavahārā dṛśyanta iti kathamavidyāvadviṣayāṇyeva pramāṇānītyata āha-paśvādibhiścāviśeṣāditi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:795: yādṛśo hi paśuśakuntādīnāmavipratipannamugdhabhāvānāṃ vyavahārastādṛśo vyutpannānāmapi puṃsāṃ dṛśyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:800: atra caśabdādibhiḥ śrotrādīnāṃ saṃbandhe satiiti pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ darśitam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:803: tathā hi-śabdādisvarūpamupalabhya tajjātīyasya pratikūlatāmanusmṛtya tajjātīyatayopalabhyamānasya pratikūlatāmanumimīta iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:808: śāstraṃ tu 'jyotiṣṭomena svargakāmo yajeta'ityādi na dehātmādhyāsena pravartitumarhati
GSP33brsvbh1u:811: FN: 1-yasmāt arthasya tallakṣaṇatvāt-śabdapramāṇatvāt, śāstraphalaṃ śāstragamyaṃ phalaṃ prayoktari pratīyate tasmāt prayoge 'nuṣṭhāne
GSP33brsvbh1u:813: phalaṃ prayoktari tallakṣaṇatvāttasmātsvayaṃ prayoge syāt'(ā. 3 pā. 7 sū.
GSP33brsvbh1u:814: na ca dehādi bhasmībhūtaṃ pāralaukikāya phalāya kalpata iti dehādyatiriktaṃ kañcidātmānamadhikāriṇamākṣipati śāstram, tadavagamaśca vidyeti kathamavidyāvadviṣayaṃ śāstramityāśaṅkyāha-śāstrīye tviti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:816: adhikāraśāstraṃ hi svargakāmasya puṃsaḥ paralokasaṃbandhaṃ vinā na nirvahatīti tāvanmātramākṣipet, na tvasyāsaṃsāritvamapi, tasyādhikāre
GSP33brsvbh1u:819: prayoktā hi karmaṇaḥ karmajanitaphalabhogabhāgī karmaṇyadhikārī svāmī bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:824: te tvavidyāvantamanuśāsanto nirmṛṣṭanikhilāvidyamanuśiṣṭaṃ svarūpe vyavasthāpayantītyetāvāneṣāṃ viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:829: tathā ca parasparāpahatārthatvena kṛtsna eva vedaḥ prāmāṇyamapajahyādityata āha-prāk ca tathābhūtātmeti
GSP33brsvbh1u:831: purastātkarmavidhayaḥ svocitaṃ vyavahāranirvartayanto nānupajātena brahmajñānena śakyā niroddhum
GSP33brsvbh1u:834: yajeta'iti śāstraṃ pravartamānaṃ na hiṃsyādityanena na virudhyate,tatkasya
GSP33brsvbh1u:836: avajitakrodhārātayaḥ puruṣā niṣedhe 'dhikriyante, krodhārātivaśīkṛtāstu śyenādiśāstra iti
GSP33brsvbh1u:837: avidyāvatpuruṣaviṣayatvaṃ nātivartata iti yaduktaṃ tadeva sphorayati-tathāhiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:842: ādigrahaṇaṃ mahāpātakopapātakasaṃkarīkaraṇāpātrīkaraṇamalinīkaraṇādyadhyāsopasaṃgrahārtham tadevamātmānātmanoḥ parasparādhyāsamākṣepasamādhānābhyāmupapādya pramāṇaprameyavyavahārapravartanena ca dṛḍhīkṛtya tasyānaharthahetutvamudāharaṇaprapañcena pratipādayitum tatsvarupamuktaṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:845: tatra ahamiti dharmitādātmyādhyāsa-mātram, mametyanutpāditadharmādhyāsaṃ nānarthaheturiti dharmādhyāsameva mamakāraṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:848: dehatādātmyamātmanyadhyasya dehadharmaṃ putrakalatrādisvāmyaṃ ca kṛśatvādivadāropya āha-ahameva vikalaḥ, sakalaḥ iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:849: svasya khalu sākalyena svābhyasākalyāt svāmīśvaraḥ sakalaḥ saṃpūrṇo bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:850: tathā svasya vaikalyena svāmyavaikalyāt, svāmīśvaro vikalo 'saṃpūrṇo
GSP33brsvbh1u:852: bāhyadharmā ye vaikalyādayaḥ svāmyapraṇālikayā saṃcaritāḥ śarīre tānātmanyadhyasyatītyarthaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:853: yadā ca paropādhyapekṣe dehadharme svāmye iyaṃ gatiḥ, tadā kaiva kathā
GSP33brsvbh1u:864: tadviparyayeṇa,antaḥkaraṇādiviparyayeṇa, antaḥkaraṇādyacetanam, tasya viparyayaḥ caitanyam, tena /
GSP33brsvbh1u:867: tadanenāntaḥkaraṇādyavacchinnaḥ pratyagātmā idamanidaṃsvarūpaścetanaḥ kartā bhoktā kāryakāraṇāvidyādvayādhāro 'haṅkārāspadaṃ saṃsārī sarvānarthasaṃbhārabhājanaṃ jīvātmā itaretarādhyāsopādānaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:878: pratipattiḥ prāptiḥ tasyai, na tu japamātrāya, nāpi karmasu pravṛttaye,
GSP33brsvbh1u:883: tadabhāve ca na brahmajñānāya vedāntāḥ paṭhyeran /
GSP33brsvbh1u:887: āropitaṃ hi rūpaṃ tattvajñānenāpodyate, na tu vāstavamatattvajñānena /
GSP33brsvbh1u:888: na hi rajjvā rajjutvaṃ sahasramapi sarpadhārāpratyayā apavadituṃ samutsahante /
GSP33brsvbh1u:893: prāṇādyupāsanā api vedānteṣu bahulamupalabhyante, tatkathaṃ sarveṣāṃ vedāntānāmātmaikatvapratipādanamartha ityata āha-yathā cāyamarthaḥ sarveṣāṃ vedāntānāṃ tathā vayamasyāṃ śārīrakamīmāṃsāyāṃ pradarśayiṣyāmaḥ śarīrameva śarīrakamtatra nivāsī śārīrako jīvātmā, tasya tvaṃpadābhidheyasya tatpadābhidheyaparamātmarūpatāmīmāṃsā yā sā tathoktā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:894: etāvānatrārthasaṃkṣepaḥ-yadyapi svādhyāyādhyayanaparavidhinā svādhyāyapadavācyasya vedarāśeḥ phalavadarthāvabodhaparatāmāpādayatā karmavidhiniṣedhānāmiva vedāntānāmapi svādhyāyaśabdavācyānāṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:896: FN: 1-nanu sarvasya vedasya kāryāvabodhaparatvāt siddhe brahmaṇi vedāntānāmaprāmāṇyaṃ syāditicettatrāha---aviśiṣṭastviti
GSP33brsvbh1u:897: lokavedayorvākyārthasyāviśeṣāt, mantrāṇāmiva devatādau vedāntānāṃ brahmaṇi prāmāṇyaṃ syādityarthaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:900: yadyapi ca vedāntebhyaścaitanyānandaghanaḥ kartṛtvabhoktṛtvarahito niṣprapañca ekaḥ pratyagātmā avagamyate, tathāpi kartṛtvabhoktṛtvaduḥkhaśokamohamayamātmānamavagāhamānenāhaṃpratyayena saṃdehabādhavirahiṇā virudhyamānā vedāntāḥ svārthātpracyutā upacaritārthā vā japamātropayogino vetyavivakṣitasvārthāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:901: tathā ca tadarthavicārātmikā caturlakṣaṇī śārīrakamīmāṃsā nārabdhavyā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:902: na ca sarvajanīnāhamanubhavasiddha ātmā saṃdigdho vā saprayojano vā, yena jijñāsyaḥ san vicāraṃ prayuñjīteḥiti pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:904: tasya tūktena prakāreṇa śrutyādibādhakatvānupapatteḥ, śrutyādibhiśca samastatīrthakaraiśca prāmāṇyānabhyupagamādadhyāsatvam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:905: evaṃ ca vedāntā nāvivakṣitārthāḥ, nāpyupacaritārthāḥ, kiṃ tūktakṣaṇāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:907: tasya ca vakṣyamāṇena krameṇa saṃdigdhatvāt prayojanavatvācca yuktā
GSP33brsvbh1u:915: kintu brahmamīmāṃsākhyatarketikartavyatānujñātaviṣayairvedāntairāhitaṃ nirvicikitsaṃ brahmajñānameva samastaduḥkhopaśamarūpamānandaikarasaṃ paramaṃ naḥ prayojanam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:918: yathā svagrīvāgatamapi graiveyakaṃ kutaścidbhramānnāstīti manyamānaḥ pareṇa pratipāditamaprāptamiva prāpnoti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:919: jijñāsā tu saṃśayasya kāryamiti svakāraṇaṃ saṃśayaṃ sūcayati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:921: tathā ca śāstre prekṣāvatpravṛttihetusaṃśayaprayojanasūcanāt yuktamasya sūtrasya śāstrāditvamityāha
GSP33brsvbh1u:925: tasyā mīmāṃsāyāḥ śāstram, sā hyanena śiṣyate śiṣyebhyo yathāvatpratipādyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:933: tadevaṃ sūtratātparyaṃ vyākhyāya tasya prathamapadaṃ atheti
GSP33brsvbh1u:935: teṣu sūtrapadeṣu madhye yo 'yaṃ athaśabdaḥ sa ānantaryārtha iti yojanā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:940: jijñāsā tāvadiha sūtre brahmaṇaśca tatprajjñānācca śabdataḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:941: FN: 1-nanu jijñāsāyāḥ śāstreṇāpratipādyamānatvāt tatpratipādanārtho mā bhūdathaśabdaḥ brahmatajjñānaprārambhārthastu syāditi cenna /
GSP33brsvbh1u:943: atra hi pratyayānāṃ prakṛtyarthānvitasvārtabodhajanakatvāt brahmajñānaviṣayiṇī icchaiva pradhānaṃ tatra ca nānvayaḥ saṃbhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:949: 'maitrāvaruṇaḥ praiṣyeti cānvāha'iti mantreṇa prāpte praiṣānuvacane na vidhyanvayitvena vivakṣā kintu aprāpte 'pradhāne 'pi daṇḍagrahaṇe /
GSP33brsvbh1u:951: ityatra apradhānamapi daṇḍaśabdārtho vivakṣyate, evamihāpi brahmatajjñāne iti yuktam;brahmamīmāṃsāśāstrapravṛttyaṅgasaṃśayaprayojanasūcanārthatvena
GSP33brsvbh1u:953: tadavivakṣāyāṃ tadasūcanena kākadantaparīkṣāyāmiva brahmamīmāṃsāyāṃ na prekṣāvantaḥ pravarteran
GSP33brsvbh1u:954: na hi tadānīṃ brahma vā tajjñānaṃ vābhidheyaprayojane bhavitumarhataḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:959: tasmātsaṃdehaprayojanasūcanī jijñāsā iha padato vākyataśca pradhānaṃ vivakṣitavyā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:965: na ca jijñāsā mīmāṃsā, yena yogānuśāsanavadadhikriyeta,nāntatvaṃ nipātya
GSP33brsvbh1u:975: na ca svārthaparatvasyopapattau satyāṃ anyārthaparatvakalpanā yuktā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:979: tathā ca maṅgalahetutvāt pratyahaṃ brahmajijñāsā kartavyeti sūtrārthaḥ saṃpadyata ityata āha-maṅgalasya ca vākyārthe samanvayābhāvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:980: padārtha eva hi vākyārthe samanvīyate, sa ca vācyo vā lakṣyo vā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:981: na ceha maṅgalamathaśabdasya vācyaṃ vā lakṣyaṃ vā, kiṃ tu mṛdaṅgaśaṅkhadhvanivadathaśabdaśravaṇamātrakāryam
GSP33brsvbh1u:982: na ca kāryajñāpyayorvākyārthe samanvayaḥ śabdavyavahāre dṛṣṭa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:983: tatkimidānīṃ maṅgalārtho 'thaśabdaḥ teṣu teṣu na prayoktavyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:986: 'iti smṛtivyākopa ityata āha-arthāntaraprayukta eva hyathaśabdaḥ śrutyā
GSP33brsvbh1u:988: arthāntareṣvānantaryādiṣu prayukto 'thaśabdaḥ śrutyā śravaṇamātreṇa veṇuvīṇādhvanivanmaṅgalaṃ kurvan, maṅgalaprayojano bhavati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:991: na cehānantaryārthasya sato na śravaṇamātreṇa maṅgalārthatetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:994: tadyathemamevāthaśabdaṃ prakṛtya vimṛśyate kimayamathaśabda ānantarye athādhikāreḥiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:997: na ca prakṛtānapekṣā, tadanapekṣasya tadviṣayatvābhāvena asamānaviṣayatayā
GSP33brsvbh1u:999: na hi jātu bhavati kiṃ nitya ātmā, atha anityā buddhiriti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1000: tasmādānantaryaṃ vinā pūrvaprakṛtāpekṣa ihāthaśabdaḥ kasmānna bhavatītyata āhapūrvaprakṛtāpekṣāyāśca phalata ānantaryāvyatirekāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1001: asyārthaḥ-na vayamānantaryārthatāṃ vyasanitayā rocayāmahe, kiṃ tu brahmajijñāsāhetubhūtapūrvaprakṛtasiddhaye, sā ca pūrvaprakṛtārthāpekṣatve
GSP33brsvbh1u:1006: na ceha kalpāntaropanyāsa iti pāriśeṣyādānantaryārthaṃ eveti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1007: bhavatvānantaryārthaḥ, kimevaṃ satītyata āha-sati cānantaryārthatva iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1008: na tāvadyasya kasyacidatrānantaryamiti vaktavyam, tasyābhidhānamantareṇāpi prāptatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1010: na cānantaryamātrasya dṛṣṭamadṛṣṭaṃ vā prayojanaṃ paśyāmaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1011: tasmāttasyātrānantaryaṃ vaktavyaṃ yadvinā brahmajijñāsā na bhavati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1015: dharmajijñāsāyā iva brahmajijñāsāyā api yogyatvāt svādhyāyā
GSP33brsvbh1u:1018: tasya cāgṛhītasya svaviṣaye vijñānājananāt, grahaṇasya ca svādhyāyo
GSP33brsvbh1u:1022: atra ca svādhyāyena viṣayeṇa tadviṣayamadhyayanaṃ lakṣayati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1023: tathā ca 'athāto dharmajijñāsā'ityanenaiva gatamiti nedaṃ sūtramārabdhavyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1029: asyārthaḥ-'vividiṣanti yajñena'iti tṛtīyāśrutyā yajñādīnāmaṅgatvena brahmajñāne viniyogāt, jñānasyaiva karmatayecchāṃ prati prādhānyāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1031: tatrāpi ca na vākyārthajñānotpattāvaṅgabhāvo yajñādīnām, vākyārthajñānasya vākyādevotpatteḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:1032: na ca vākyaṃ sahakāritayā karmāṇyapekṣata iti yuktam,akṛtakarmaṇāmapi
GSP33brsvbh1u:1035: tadbodhatastu tadarthānuṣṭhānaparivarjane parasparāśrayaḥ, tasmin sati tadarthānuṣṭhānaparivarjanaṃ tataśca tadbodha iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1036: na ca vedāntavākyānāmeva svārthapratyāyane karmāpekṣā na vākyāntarāṇāmiti
GSP33brsvbh1u:1038: nanu 'tattvamasi'iti vākyāt tvaṃpadārthasya, kartṛbhoktṛrūpasya jīvātmano nityaśuddhabuddhodāsīnasvabhāvena tatpadārthena paramātmanaikyamaśakyaṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:1041: tatkimidānīṃ pramāṇakāraṇaṃ yogyatāvadhāraṇamapramāṇātkarmaṇo vaktumadhyavasito 'si, pratyakṣādyatiriktaṃ vā karmāpi pramāṇam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1044: gṛhītvā, tanmūlayā copapattyā vyavasthāpya, tadupāsanāyāṃ bhāvanāparābhidhānāyāṃ dīrghakālanairantaryavatyāṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:1050: ata eva śrutiḥ-'tameva dhīro vijñāya prajñāṃ kurvīta brāhmaṇaḥ' / iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1052: vijñāya tarkopakaraṇena śabdena prajñāṃ bhāvanāṃ kurvītetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1055: yajñādisaṃskṛto hi puruṣaḥ ādaranairantaryadīrghakālairāsevamāno brahmabhāvanāmanādyavidyāvāsanāṃ samūlakāṣaṃ kaṣati,tato 'sya pratyagātmā suprasannaḥ kevalo viśadībhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1056: ata eva smṛtiḥ-'mahāyajñaiśca yajñaiśca brāhmīyaṃ kriyate tanuḥ' /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1059: asti hi smṛtiḥ-'ṛṇāni trīṇyapākṛtya mano mokṣe niveśayet' / iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1062: yajñena'ityādiśrutibhyastattatphalāya coditānāmapi karmaṇāṃ saṃyogapṛthaktvena brahmabhāvanāṃ pratyaṅgabhāvamācakṣate, kratvarthasyeva khādiratvasya
GSP33brsvbh1u:1063: FN: 2-'khādire paśuṃ badhnāti' 'khādiraṃ vīryakāmasya yūpaṃ kurvīta'iti
GSP33brsvbh1u:1064: ekasyaiva khādiratvasya kratvarthatvaṃ puruṣārthatvaṃ ca yathā tathā karmaṇāmapi ubhayārthatvaṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1066: atra ca pāramarṣaṃ sūtram-'sarvāpekṣā ca yajñādiśruteraśvavat' (bra. a. 3.
GSP33brsvbh1u:1069: tasmādyadi śrutyādayaḥ pramāṇaṃ yadi vā pāramarṣaṃ sūtraṃ sarvathā yajñādikarmasamuccitā brahmopāsanā
GSP33brsvbh1u:1071: trayavatī anādyavidyātadvāsanāsamucchedakrameṇa brahmasākṣātkārāya mokṣāparanāmne kalpata iti tadarthaṃ karmāṇyanuṣṭheyāni /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1076: kramaparyantānyaṅgāni teṣāṃ grāmaḥ samūhastatsahitaṃ parasparavibhinnaṃ karmasvarūpaṃ tadapekṣitādhikārīviśeṣaśca tayorjñānaṃ vinā karmāṇyanuṣṭhātuṃ na śakyānītyanvayaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1082: tasmātsādhūktam 'karmāvabodhānantaryaṃ viśeṣaḥ'iti karmāvabodhena hi karmānuṣṭhānasāhityaṃ bhavati brahmopāsanāyā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1085: idamatrākūtam-brahmopāsanayā bhāvanāparābhidhānayā karmāṇyapekṣyanta ityuktam, tatra brūmaḥ-kva punarasyāḥ karmāpekṣā,kiṃ kārye yathāgneyādīnāṃ paramāpūrve cirabhāviphalānukūle janayitavye samidādyapekṣā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1089: FN: 1-bhāvanāsādhye sākṣātkāre yadi karmāpekṣā tarhi sa brahmasvarūpo na syāt tasyotpatsyamānatvāt, brahmaṇaśca nityatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1090: sākṣātkāraḥ kāryamabhyupeyaḥ, sa cotpādyo vā syāt, yathā saṃyavanasya piṇḍaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:1091: FN: 2-'piṣṭaṃ saṃyauti'iti vihitasya saṃyavanasya piṇḍa utpādyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1096: na khalu ghaṭādisākṣātkāra iva jaḍasvabhāvebhyo ghaṭādibhyo bhinna indriyādyādheyo brahmasākṣātkāro bhāvanādheyaḥ saṃbhavati, brahmaṇo
GSP33brsvbh1u:1098: FN: 3-sākṣātkārasya brahmaṇo bhinnatve brahma jaḍaṃ syāt śabdaśca
GSP33brsvbh1u:1102: na khalvanumānāvibuddhaṃ vahniṃ bhāvayataḥ śītāturasya śiśirabharamantharatarakāyakāṇḍasya sphurajjvālājaṭilānalasākṣātkāraḥ pramāṇāntareṇa saṃvādyate, visaṃvādasya bahulamupalambhāt, tasmāt prāmāṇikasākṣātkāralakṣaṇakāryābhāvānnopāsanāyā utpādye karmāpekṣā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1104: FN: 4-kūṭasthanityatvāt, pūrvarūpāpāyarūpo vikāraḥ, abhinavaguṇodayarūpaḥ saṃskāraśca na bhavata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1109: mā bhūdbrahmasākṣātkāra utpādyādirūpa upāsanāyāḥ, saṃskāryastu anirvacanīyā
GSP33brsvbh1u:1111: vidyādvayapidhānāpanayanena bhaviṣyati, pratisīrāpihitā nartakīva pratisīrāpanayadvārā raṅga
GSP33brsvbh1u:1124: na hi sthāṇurvā puruṣo veti vā, ārohapariṇāhavat dravyamiti vā śataśo 'pi
GSP33brsvbh1u:1125: jñānamabhyasyamānaṃ puruṣa eveti niścayāya paryāptam, ṛte viśeṣadarśanāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1126: nanūktaṃ śrutamayena jñānena jīvātmanaḥ paramātmabhāvaṃ gṛhītvā yuktimayena ca vyavasthāpyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1135: FN: 8-svato 'parokṣasyāpi brahmaṇaḥ pārokṣayaṃ bhramagṛhītam, tannivṛttiḥ śabdena na bhavati, tasya parokṣapramāhetutvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1137: antaḥkaraṇaṃ ca sopādhike ātmani janayatyahaṃvṛttimiti tasya siddhamaparokṣadhīhetutvam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1140: na caiṣa sākṣātkāro mīmāṃsāsahitasyāpi śabdapramāṇasya phalam, api tu pratyakṣasya, tasyaiva tatphalatvaniyamāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1143: na cāyamanubhavo brahmasvabhāvo yena na janyeta, api tu antaḥkaraṇasyaiva
GSP33brsvbh1u:1146: na hi śābdajñānaprakāśyaṃ brahma svayaṃ prakāśaṃ na bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1147: sarvopādhirahitaṃ hi svayañjyotiriti gīyate, na tūpahitamapi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1153: evaṃ ca anupahitasya viṣayatvaṃ, upādhernivartakāntarāpekṣā ca neti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1154: ntaḥkaraṇavṛttāvapyasya sākṣātkāre sarvopādhivinirmokaḥ, tasyaiva tadupādhervinaśyadavasthasya svapararūpopādhivirodhino vidyamānatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1155: anyathā caitanyacchāyāpattiṃ vināntaḥkaraṇavṛtteḥ svayamacetanāyāḥ svaprakāśatvānupapattau sākṣātkāratvāyogāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1156: na cānumitabhāvitavahnisākṣātkāravat pratibhātvenāsyāprāmāṇyam, tatra vahnisvalakṣaṇasya parokṣatvāt
GSP33brsvbh1u:1159: FN: 10-jīvasya prāgaparokṣatve 'pi śuddhabuddhatvādeḥ pārokṣyānna tatsākṣātkāro yathārthaṃ ityāśaṅkyāha-nahīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1161: jīva eva tu tattadupādhirahitaḥ śuddhabuddhatvādisvabhāvo brahmeti gīyate
GSP33brsvbh1u:1163: tasmāt yathā gāndharvaśāstrārthajñānābhyāsāhitasaṃskārasacivaḥ śrotrendriyeṇa ṣaḍjādisvaragrāmamūrchanābhedamadhyakṣamanubhavati, evaṃ vedāntārthajñānābhyāsāhitasaṃskāro jīvaḥ svasya brahmabhāvamantaḥkaraṇeneti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1165: antaḥkaraṇavṛttau brahmasākṣātkāre janayitavye asti tadupāsanāyāḥ karmāpekṣeti cet
GSP33brsvbh1u:1168: FN: 3-kiṃ upāsanākārye sākṣātkāre karmaṇāmupayogaḥ uta, upāsanāsvarūpe /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1172: śuddhabuddhodāsīnasvabhāvaṃ akartṛtvādyupetaṃ apetabrāhmaṇatvādijātiṃ dehādyatiriktaṃ ekamātmānaṃ pratipadyamānaḥ karmasvadhikāramavaboddhumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1175: dṛśyate, yathā guḍasya mādhuryaviniścaye api pittopahatendriyāṇāṃ tiktatāvabhāsānuvṛttiḥ, āsvādya thūtkṛtya tyāgāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1178: na ca karmāvidyātmakaṃ kathamavidyāmucchinatti, karmaṇo vā taducchedakasya
GSP33brsvbh1u:1179: kuta ucchedaḥ iti vācyam, sajātīyasvaparavirodhināṃ bhāvānāṃ bahulamupalabdheḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1180: yathā payaḥ payo 'ntaraṃ jarayati, svayaṃ ca jīryati, yathā viṣaṃ viṣāntaraṃ śamayati, svayaṃ ca śāmyati, yathā vā katakarajo rajo
GSP33brsvbh1u:1181: 'ntarāvile pāthasi prakṣiptaṃ rajo 'ntarāṇi bhindat svayamapi bhidyamānamanāvilaṃ pāthaḥ karoti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1188: śraddhatte, pittopahatendriya iva guḍaṃ thūtkṛtya tyajannapi tasya
GSP33brsvbh1u:1190: tathā cāyaṃ kriyākartṛkaraṇetikartavyatāphalāprapañcamatāttvikaṃ viniścinvan kathamadhikṛto nāma,viduṣo hyadhikāraḥ, anyathā paśuśūdrādīnāmapyadhikāro durvāraḥ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1191: kriyākartrādisvarūpavibhāgaṃ ca vidvasyamāna iha vidvānabhimataḥ karmakāṇḍe /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1192: ata eva bhagavān vidvadviṣayatvaṃ śāstrasya varṇayāṃbabhūva bhāṣyakāraḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1195: na cānadhikṛtena samarthenāpi kṛtaṃ vaidika karma phalāya kalpate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1197: tena dṛṣṭārtheṣu karmasu śaktaḥ pravartamānaḥ prāpnotu phalam, dṛṣṭatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1198: adṛṣṭārtheṣu tu śāstraikasamadhigamyaṃ phalamanadhikāriṇi na yujyata iti nopāsanākārye karmāpekṣā
GSP33brsvbh1u:1201: tadabhimānarahitasyānadhikāraḥ, evaṃ niṣedhavidhayo 'pi manuṣyādhikārā iti tadabhimānarahitasteṣvapi nādhikriyeta paśvādivat /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1202: tathā cāyaṃ niṣiddhamanutiṣṭhan na pratyaveyāt, tiryagādivaditi bhinnakarmatāpātaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1204: na khalvayaṃ sarvathā manuṣyābhimānarahitaḥ kiṃ tvavidyāsaṃskārānuvṛttyāsya mātrayā tadabhimāno 'nuvartate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1205: anuvartamānaṃ ca mithyeti manyamāno na śraddhatta ityuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1210: api tu niṣidhyamānakriyonmukho nara ityeva pravartate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1211: tathā ca sāṃsārika iva śabdāvagatabrahmatattvo 'pi niṣedhamatikramya pravartamānaḥ pratyavaitīti na bhinnakarmadarśanābhyupagamaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1216: tathā ca śrutiḥ-'nakarmaṇā na prajayā dhanena tyāgenaike amṛtatvamānaśuḥ'
GSP33brsvbh1u:1220: FN: 5-iha janmāntare karma sattvaśuddhidvāreṇa jñānotpattiheturiti siddhāntamāha ārāditi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1224: vastutaḥ pradhānasyāpi vedanasya prakṛtyarthatayā śabdato guṇatvāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1225: icchāyāśca pratyayārthatayā prādhānyāt, pradhānena ca kāryasaṃpratyayāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1226: nahi rājapuruṣamānayetyukte vastutaḥ pradhānamapi rājā puruṣaviśeṣaṇatayā śabdata upasarjana ānīyate 'pi tu puruṣa eva, śabdatastasya prādhānyāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1229: kāmānaśanameva tapaḥ, hitamitamedhyāśino hi brahmaṇi vividiṣā bhavati, na tu sarvathānaśnato maraṇāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1234: upadhīyate-puṇyenopacīyate iti viditvā yaḥ karma carati sa
GSP33brsvbh1u:1235: ātmaśuddhyarthaṃ yajannātmayājī sa ca devayājitaḥ kāmyakartuḥ śreyāniti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1236: vā ātmāyājī yo veda idaṃ me 'nenāṅgaṃ saṃskriyata idaṃ me
GSP33brsvbh1u:1240: nityanaimittikānuṣṭhānaprakṣīṇakalmaṣasya ca viśuddhasattvasyāviduṣa eva utpannavividiṣasya jñānottapattiṃ darśayatyātharvaṇī
GSP33brsvbh1u:1243: kḷptenaiva ca nityānāṃ karmaṇāṃ nityehitenopāttaduritanibarhaṇadvāreṇa puruṣasaṃskāreṇa jñānotpattāvaṅgabhāvopapattau na saṃyoga
GSP33brsvbh1u:1244: FN: 2-idamatra bodhyam-saṃyogapṛthaktvenāṅgabhāve siddhe 'pi na samuccayavādyabhimataḥ sākṣādaṅgabhāvo yuktaḥ api tu paraṃparayā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1246: yathā prakṛtau kḷptopakārāṇāṃ vikṛtau tadatiriktopakārakalpane gauravaṃ tathā jñāne viniyuktayajñādīnāṃ kḷptapāpakṣayātiriktakalpane gauravāpatterna samuccayaḥ kalpanīya ityāśayaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1248: tathāhi-nityakarmaṇāmanuṣṭhānāddharmotpādaḥ, tataḥ pāpmā nivartate,sa hi anityāśuciduḥkharūpe saṃsāre nityaśucisukhakhyātilakṣaṇena viparyāsena cittasattvaṃ malinayati,tataḥ pāpanivṛttau pratyakṣopapattipravṛttidvārāpāvaraṇe sati pratyakṣopapattibhyāṃ saṃsārasya anityāśuciduḥkharūpatāmapratyūhamavabudhyate,;tato 'sya
GSP33brsvbh1u:1251: tajjijñāsate,tataḥ śravaṇādikrameṇa tajjñānātītyārādupakārakatvaṃ tattvajñānotpādaṃ prati cittasattvaśuddhyā karmaṇāṃ yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1254: evaṃ cānanuṣṭhitakarmāpi prāgbhavīyakarmavaśāt yo viśuddhasattvaḥ saṃsārāsāratādarśanena niṣpannavairāgyaḥ, kṛtaṃ tasya karmānuṣṭhānena
GSP33brsvbh1u:1255: vairāgyotpādopayoginā, prāgbhavīyakarmānuṣṭhānādeva tatsiddheḥ, imameva ca puruṣadhaureyabhedamadhikṛtya pravavṛte śrutiḥ-'yadi vetarathā brahmacaryādeva pravrajet'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1258: ata eva na brahmacāriṇa ṛṇāni santi, yena tadapākaraṇārthaṃ karmānutiṣṭhet
GSP33brsvbh1u:1259: etadanurodhācca 'jāyamāno vai brāhmaṇastribhirṛṇavā jāyate'iti gṛhasthaḥ saṃpadyamāna iti vyākhyeyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1262: jarāmaryavādo bhasmāntatāvādo 'ntyeṣṭayaśca karmajaḍānaviduṣaḥ prati, na tvātmatattvapaṇḍitān
GSP33brsvbh1u:1263: tasmāttasyānantaryamathaśabdārthaḥ, yadvinā brahmajijñāsā na bhavati yasmiṃstu sati bhavantī bhavatyeva /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1264: na cetthaṃ karmāvabodhaḥ tasmānna karmāvabodhānantaryamātrāthaśabdārtha iti sarvamavadātam
GSP33brsvbh1u:1268: tatra kramasaṃśaye dravyamantarā yāgāniṣpatteḥ, anyadravyānayane śrutavaiyarthyāt dṛṣṭaprayojane ārādupakārakatvasyānyāyyatvāt 'arthācca'yavāgūṃ paktvā juhotīti kramaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1270: yavāgūpākavadārthaḥ kramaḥ,śrautastu bhaviṣyati, 'gṛhī bhūtvā vanī bhavet
GSP33brsvbh1u:1271: vanī bhūtvā pravrajet'iti jābālaśrutirgārhasthyena hi yajñādyanuṣṭhānaṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:1274: iṣṭā ca śaktito yajñairmano mokṣe niveśayet //
GSP33brsvbh1u:1280: na tatheha krama niyamo vivakṣitaḥ, śrutyā tayaivāniyamapradarśanāt, 'yadi
GSP33brsvbh1u:1291: jyotiṣṭomavikāre sādyaskrayāge 'tideśaprāptāstrayaḥ paśavaḥ agnīṣomīyaḥ savanīyaḥ, anubandhaśca
GSP33brsvbh1u:1296: tatra ekakālatvalakṣaṇasahatvasyāsaṃbhavāt sthānātsavanīyaprāthamyaṃ niyamyata ityayaṃ sthānakramaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:1297: 'sārasvatau bhavata etadvai daivyaṃ mithunaṃ yatsarasvatī sarasvāṃśca'iti yugapatkarmadvayaṃ śrūyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1298: atra prathamaṃ sarasvatīdaivatasya yājyānuvākyāyugalaṃ paṭhyato tato sarasvaddaivatasya /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1299: tasmādetatkrameṇa karmadvayakrama iti jñāyate mantrāṇāṃ prayogaśeṣatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1300: aṅgaviśeṣanirvāpādīnāṃ kramākāṅkṣāyāṃ mukhyakrameṇaiva krama iti niyamyate soyaṃ mukhyakramaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:1302: yājyānuvākyāpravṛttikrameṇa nirvāpādīnāṃ kramasya siddhatvāditi vistarabhayāddiṅmātraṃ darśitam
GSP33brsvbh1u:1311: FN: 4-anena yugapadanuṣṭhānamityuktaṃ tacca na kramamantarā siddhyediti sarvatra kramāpekṣā prakṛte tu pṛthaktvānna kramāpekṣeti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1314: yatra tu na śeṣaśeṣibhāvaḥ nāpyekādhikārāvacchedaḥ yathā sauryāryamṇa
GSP33brsvbh1u:1315: FN: 5-'sauryaṃ caruṃ nirvapedbrahmavarcasakāmaḥ' 'āryamaṇaṃ caruṃ nirvapet svargakāmaḥ' 'prājāpatyaṃ caruṃ nirvapecchatakṛṣṇalakāmaḥ'ityādi
GSP33brsvbh1u:1320: na ceha dharmabrahmajijñāsayoḥ śeṣaśeṣibhāve śrutyādīnāmanyatamaṃ pramāṇamastīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1323: śeṣaśeṣibhāvābhāve 'pi kramaniyamo dṛṣṭaḥ, yathā godohanasya puruṣārthasya
GSP33brsvbh1u:1327: svargakāmasya hi darśapūrṇamāsādhikṛtasya paśukāmasya sato darśapūrṇamāsakratvarthāppraṇayanāśrite godohane adhikāraḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1329: na ca vyāpārāntarāviṣṭaṃ śrūyate, yatastadaṅgakramamatipatet appraṇayanāśritaṃ tu pratīyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1335: jijñāsyabrahmaṇo 'śo dharmaḥ syāt, yathā caturlakṣaṇīvyutpādyaṃ brahma
GSP33brsvbh1u:1336: kenacitkenacidaṃśenaikaikena lakṣaṇena vyutpādyate, tatra caturṇāṃ lakṣaṇānāṃ jijñāsyābhedena parasparasaṃbandhe sati kramo vivakṣitaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1340: jijñāsāyā vastuto jñānatantratvāt jñānaphalaṃ jijñāsāphalamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1341: na kevalaṃ svarūpataḥ phalabhedaḥ, tadutpādanaprakārabhedādapi tadbheda ityāha-taccānuṣṭhānāpekṣam
GSP33brsvbh1u:1347: bhavitā ca bhāvakavyāpāranirvartyatayā tattantra iti tataḥ prāgjñānakāle nāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1350: na kevalaṃ svarūpato jijñāsyayorbhedaḥ, jñāpakapramāṇapravṛttibhedādapi bheda ityāha-codanāpravṛttibhedācca
GSP33brsvbh1u:1351: codaneti vaidikaṃ śabdamāha, viśeṣeṇa sāmānyasya lakṣaṇāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1361: sādhye puruṣavyāpāre bhāvanāyāṃ, tadviṣaye ca yāgādau,sa hi
GSP33brsvbh1u:1364: bhāvanāyāstaddvāreṇa ca yāgāderapekṣitopāyatāmavagamayantī tatrecchopahāramukhena puruṣaṃ niyuñjānaiva yāgādidharmamavabodhayati nānyathā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1365: brahmacodanā tu puruṣamavabodhayatyeva kevalaṃ na tu pravartayantyavabodhayati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1367: nanu 'ātmā jñātavyaḥ'ityetadvidhiparairvedāntaiḥ tadekavākyatayāvabodhe pravartayadbhireva puruṣo brahmāvabodhyata iti samānatvaṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:1369: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ-na tāvadbrahmasākṣātkāre puruṣo niyoktavyaḥ, tasya brahmasvābhāvyena nityatvāt, akāryatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1376: api cātmajñānavidhipareṣu vedānteṣu nātmatattvaviniścayaḥ śābdaḥ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1377: na hi tadātmatattvaparāste, kintu tajjñānavidhiparāḥ, yatparāśca te ta eva teṣāmarthāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1385: yasminnasati brahmajijñāsā na bhavati sati tu bhavantī bhavatyevetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1390: atha viveko jñānamātram, na niścayaḥ,tathā sati eṣa viparyāsādanyaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:1391: saṃśayaḥ syāt,tathā ca na vairāgyaṃ bhāvayet,abhāvayankathaṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:1394: etaduktaṃ bhavati-mā bhūdidaṃ ṛtaṃ nityam, idaṃ tadanṛtamanityamiti dharmiviśeṣayorvivekaḥ,dharmimātrayornityānityayostaddharmayośca vivekaṃ niścinotyeva /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1395: nityatvaṃ satyatvaṃ tadyasyāsti tannityaṃ satyam,tathā cāsthāgocaraḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1397: tadeteṣvanubhūyamāneṣu yuṣmadasmatpratyayagocareṣu viṣayaviṣayiṣu yadṛtaṃ nityaṃ sukhaṃ vyavasthāsyate tadāsthāgocaro bhaviṣyati,yattvanityamanṛtaṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:1401: na khalu satyaṃ nāma na kiñcidastīti vācyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1402: tadabhāve tadadhiṣṭhānasyānṛtasyāpyanupapatteḥ, śūnyavādināmapi śūnyatāyā eva satyatvāt
GSP33brsvbh1u:1403: athāsya puruṣadhaureyasyānubhavopapattibhyāmevaṃ sunipuṇaṃ nirūpayataḥ ā ca satyalokāt ā cāvīceḥ jāyasva mriyasva iti viparivartamānaṃ kṣaṇamuhūrtayāmāhorātrārdhamāsamāsartvayanavatsarayugacaturyugamanvantarapralayamahāpralayamahāsargāvāntarasargasaṃsārasāgarormibh
GSP33brsvbh1u:1404: iraniśamuhyamānaṃ, tāpatrayaparītamātmānaṃ ca jīvalokaṃ cāvalokya asminsaṃsāramaṇḍale anityāśuciduḥkhātmakaṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:1415: rāgādikaṣāyamadirāmattaṃ hi manasteṣu teṣu viṣayeṣūccāvacamindriyāṇi pravartayat, vividhāśca pravṛttīḥ puṇyāpuṇyaphalā bhāvayat,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1417: prasaṃkhyānābhyāsalabdhavairāgyaparipākabhagnarāgādikaṣāyamadirāmadaṃ tu manaḥ puruṣeṇāvajīyate vaśīkriyate, so 'yamasya vairāgyahetuko manovijayaḥ śama iti vaśīkārasaṃjña iti cākhyāyate vijitaṃ ca manastattvaviṣayaviniyogayogyatāṃ nīyate,seyamasya yogyatā damaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1418: yathā dānto 'yaṃ vṛṣabhayuvā halaśakaṭādivahanayogyaḥ kṛta iti gamyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1420: ata eva śrutiḥ-'tasmācchānto dānta uparatastitikṣuḥ śraddhāvitto
GSP33brsvbh1u:1425: tasya ca nityaśuddhabuddhamuktasvabhāvabrahmajñānaṃ mokṣasya kāraṇamityupaśrutya tajjijñāsā bhavati dharmajijñāsāyāḥ prāgūrdhvaṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:1427: na kevalaṃ jijñāsāmātram, api tu jñānamapītyāha-jñātuṃ ca /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1432: FN: 2-athaśabdena jijñāsāhetupratipādanātkimataḥśabdenetyāśaṅkya nānena hetorabhidhānaṃ kiṃ tu pūrvoktahetutvarūpāsiddhiparihāra
GSP33brsvbh1u:1438: duḥkhānuṣaṅgadarśanātsukhe 'pi vairāgyamiti cet, hanta bhoḥ sukhānuṣaṅgādduḥkhe 'pyanurāgo na kasmādbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1441: tadyathā-matsyārthī saśalkānsakaṇṭakānmatsyānupādatte, sa yāvadādeyaṃ tāvadādāya vinivartate
GSP33brsvbh1u:1442: yathā vā dhānyārthī sapalālāni dhānyānyāharati, sa yāvadādeyaṃ tāvadupādāya nivartate, tasmādduḥkhabhayānnānukūlavedanīyamaihikaṃ vāmuṣmikaṃ vā sukhaṃ parityaktumucitam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1443: na hi mṛgāḥ santīti śālayo nopyante, bhikṣukāḥ santīti sthālyo
GSP33brsvbh1u:1445: api ca dṛṣṭaṃ sukhaṃ candanavanitādisaṅgajanma kṣayitālakṣaṇena duḥkhenāghrātatvādatibhīruṇā tyajyetāpi, na tvāmuṣmikaṃ svargādi,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1448: tathā ca 'akṣayyaṃ ha vai cāturmāsyayājinaḥ sukṛtaṃ bhavati' /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1463: na hi madhuviṣasaṃpṛktamannaṃ viṣaṃ parityajya samadhu śakyaṃ śilpivareṇāpi bhoktum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1464: kṣayitānumānopodbalitaṃ ca 'tadyatheha karmajitaḥ'ityādi vacanaṃ kṣayitāpratipādakam 'apāma somam'ityādikaṃ vacanaṃ mukhyāsaṃbhave jaghanyavṛttitāmāpādayati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1466: atra ca brahmapadena tatpramāṇaṃ veda upasthāpitaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1467: sa ca yogyatvāt 'tadyatheha karmacitaḥ'ityādirataḥ iti sarvanāmnā parāmṛśya, hetupañcamyā nirdiśyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1469: yathā svargādeḥ kṛtakasya sukhasya duḥkhānuṣaṅgastathā brahmaṇo 'pītyata
GSP33brsvbh1u:1471: tenāyamarthaḥ-ataḥ svargādīnāṃ kṣayitāpratipādakāt, brahmajñānasya ca paramapuruṣārthatāpratipādakāt āgamāt, yathoktasādhanasaṃpat tataśca jijñāseti siddham /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1473: ṣaṣṭhīsamāsapradarśanena prācāṃ vṛttikṛtāṃ brahmaṇe jijñāsā brahmajijñāseti caturthīsamāsaḥ parāsto veditavyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1474: 'tādarthyasamāse prakṛtivikṛtigrahaṇaṃ kartavyam'iti kātyāyanīyavacanena yūpadārvādiṣveva prakṛtivikārabhāve caturthīsamāsaniyamāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1479: brahmaṇo jijñāsetyukte tatrānekārthatvādbrahmaśabdasya saṃśayaḥ, kasya brahmaṇo jijñāseti
GSP33brsvbh1u:1481: asti ca vede, yathā-brahmojjhamitiḥasti ca paramātmani, yathā-'brahma veda brahmaiva bhavati'iti, tamimaṃ saṃśayamapākaroti-brahma ca vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇam iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1482: yato brahmajijñāsāṃ pratijñāya tajjñāpanāya paramātmalakṣaṇaṃ praṇayati tato 'vagacchāmaḥ paramātmajijñāsaiveyaṃ na vipratvajātyādijijñāsetyarthaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:1483: ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaparigrahe 'pi neyaṃ karmaṣaṣṭhī, kiṃ tu śeṣalakṣaṇā,saṃbandhamātraṃ ca śeṣa iti brahmaṇo jijñāsetyukte brahmasaṃbandhinī jijñāsetyuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1484: tathā ca brahmasvarūpapramāṇayuktisādhanaprayojanajijñāsāḥ sarvā brahmajijñāsārthā brahmajijñāsayāvaruddhā bhavanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1486: karmaṣaṣṭhyāṃ tu brahmaśabdārthaḥ karma,sa ca svarūpameveti tatpramāṇādayo
GSP33brsvbh1u:1487: nāvarudhyeran,tathā cāpratijñātārthacintā pramāṇādiṣu bhavediti ye manyante tānpratyāha-brahmaṇa iti karmaṇi iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1489: icchāyāḥ pratipattyanubandho jñānam, jñānasya ca jñeyaṃ brahma /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1490: na khalu jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ vinā nirūpyate, na ca jijñāsā jñānaṃ vineti pratipattyanubandhatvāt prathamaṃ jijñāsā karmaivāpekṣate, na tu saṃbandhimātram;tadantareṇāpi sati karmaṇi tannirūpaṇāt na hi candramasamādityaṃ vopalabhya kasyāyamiti saṃbandhyanveṣaṇā bhavati
GSP33brsvbh1u:1495: nanu satyaṃ na jijñāsyamantareṇa jijñāsā nirūpyate,jijñāsyāntaraṃ tvasyā
GSP33brsvbh1u:1496: bhaviṣyati, brahma tu śeṣatayā saṃbhantsyata ityata āha-jijñāsyāntareti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1500: nigūḍhābhiprāya eva dūṣayati-evamapi pratyakṣaṃ brahmaṇa iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1501: vācyasya karmatvasya jijñāsayā prathamamapekṣitasya prathamasaṃbandhārhasya cānvayaparityāgena paścātkathañcidapekṣitasya saṃbandhimātrasya saṃbandho, jaghanyaḥ prathamaḥ, prathamaśca jaghanya iti
GSP33brsvbh1u:1519: na kevalaṃ jñānamiṣyate kintvavagatiṃ sākṣātkāraṃ kurvadavagatiparyantaṃ sanvācyāyā icchāyāḥ karma /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1528: vigalitanikhiladuḥkhānuṣaṅgaparamānandaghanabrahmāvagatirbrahmaṇaḥ svabhāva iti saiva niḥśreyasaṃ puruṣārtha iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1539: 'parādhīnaprakāśo 'pi pratibhānapi na pratibhātīva parādhīnaprakāśa iva dehendriyādibhyo bhinno 'pyabhinna iva bhāsata iti
GSP33brsvbh1u:1540: saṃsārabījāvidyādyanarthanibarhaṇātprāgaprāpta iva tasminsati prāpta iva bhavatīti puruṣeṇārthyamānatvātpuruṣārtha iti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1548: tacca na kevalebhyo vedāntebhyo 'pi tu brahmamīmāṃso
GSP33brsvbh1u:1549: FN: 1-atredaṃ bodhyam-brahmātmatāmicchatā jñānameṣitavyaṃ tacca vicāropakaraṇebhyo vedāntebhyaḥ, tathāca sati brahmavicāraḥ kartavya ityarthaḥ syāt, tatkathaṃ jijñāsāyā anadhikāryatvādityuktaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1552: nirṇayāya bhavati, sa ca vicārasādhya iti vicārakartavyatārthādgamyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1556: pakaraṇebhya iti icchāmukhena brahmamīmāṃsāyāṃ pravartyate, na tu vedānteṣu tadarthavivakṣāyāṃ vā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1559: yadyapi ca dharmamīmāṃsāvat vedārthamīmāṃsayā brahmamīmāṃsāpyākṣeptuṃ śakya, tathāpi prācyā mīmāṃsayā na tadvyutpādyate, nāpi brahmamīmāṃsāyā adhyayanamātrānantaryamiti brahmamīmāṃsārambhāya nityānityavivekādyānantaryapradarśanāya cedaṃ sūtramārambhaṇīyamityapaunaruktyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1561: etena sūtreṇa brahmajñānaṃ pratyupāyatā mīmāṃsāyāḥ pratipādyata ityuktam
GSP33brsvbh1u:1564: yadi prasiddham, vedāntavākyasamutthena niścayajñānena viṣayīkṛtam,tato na
GSP33brsvbh1u:1567: athāprasiddhaṃ vedāntebhyastarhi na tadvedāntāḥ pratipādayantīti sarvathāprasiddhaṃ naiva śakyaṃ jijñāsitum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1568: anubhūte hi priye bhavatīcchā na tu sarvathānanubhūtāpūrve /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1582: atra ca brahmetyādināvagamyena tadviṣayamavagamaṃ lakṣayati, tadastitvasya sati vimarśe vicārātprāganiścayāt
GSP33brsvbh1u:1583: FN: 2-nityatvaṃ ca dhvaṃsāpratiyogitve sati prāgabhāvāpratiyogitvarūpaṃ bodhyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1589: muktau satyāmasyaite śuddhatvādayaḥ prathante, tatastu prāk dehā
GSP33brsvbh1u:1593: sadaiva muktaḥ sadaiva kevalo 'nādyavidyāvaśāt bhrāntyā tathāvabhāsata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1600: na kevalam 'sadeva somyedam'ityādīnāṃ vākyānāṃ paurvāparyālocanayā itthaṃbhūtabrahmāvagatiḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:1618: na na pratyetyahamasmīti, kintu pratyetyeveti yojanā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1619: nanvahamasmīti ca jñāsyati mā ca jñāsīdātmānamityata āha-yadīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1621: ahaṅkārāspadaṃ hi jīvātmānaṃ cenna pratīyāt, ahamiti na pratīyādityarthaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:1622: nanu pratyetu sarvo jana ātmānamahaṅkārāspadam, brahmaṇi tu kimāyātamityata āha-ātmā ca brahma /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1624: tasmāttatpadārthasya śuddhabuddhatvādeḥ śabdataḥ, tvaṃpadārthasya ca jīvātmanaḥ pratyakṣataḥ prasiddheḥ, padārthajñānapūrvakatvācca
GSP33brsvbh1u:1627: ākṣeptā prathamakalpāśrayaṃ doṣamāha-yadi tarhi loka iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1636: anyathā anāśrayā bhinnāśrayā vā vipratipattayo na syuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1642: tvaṃpadārthasya ca jīvātmano lokataḥ siddhiḥ sarvatantrasiddhāntaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1644: tasmātsāmānyataḥ prasiddhe dharmiṇi viśeṣato vipratipattau yuktastadviśeṣeṣu saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1646: atra dehendriyamanaḥkṣaṇikavijñānacaitanyapakṣe na tatpadārthanityatvādayaḥ tvaṃpadārthena saṃbadhyante, yogyatāvirahāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1655: tehi kriyārthatvamāmnāyasya bruvāṇā vedāntā aupacārikā vā avivakṣitasvārthā vā manyanta iti darśitaṃ prāk /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1657: tadevaṃ tvaṃpadārthavipratipattidvārā tatpadārthe vipratipattiṃ sūcayitvā sākṣāttatpadārthe vipratipattimāha-asti tadvyatirikta īśvaraḥ sarvajñaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:1664: tasyāpi jīvātmabhyo 'pi vyatirekāt, na tvaṃpadārthena sāmānādhikaraṇyamiti
GSP33brsvbh1u:1671: nanu santu vipratipattayaḥ, tannimittaśca saṃśayaḥtathāpi kimarthaṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:1676: vedāntamīmāṃsā tāvattarka eva, tadavirodhinaśca ye 'nye 'pi tarkā adhvaramīmāṃsāyāṃ nyāye ca vedapratyakṣādiprāmāṇyapariśodhanādiṣūktāsta upakaraṇaṃ yasyāḥ sā tathoktā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1684: yatra yadyapi brahmasvarūpajñānasya pradhānasya pratijñayā tadaṅgānyapi pramāṇādīni pratijñātāni, tathāpi svarūpasya prādhānyāttadevākṣipya
GSP33brsvbh1u:1687: vidhvaṃsi,na tenopalabdhena tadviruddhasya nityaśuddhabuddhamuktasvabhāvasya brahmaṇaḥ svarūpaṃ śakyaṃ lakṣayitum, na hi jātu kaścitkṛtakatvena nityaṃ lakṣayati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1688: na ca taddharmeṇa nityatvādinā tallakṣyate, tasyānupalabdhacaratvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1697: mā bhūdanubhūyamānaṃ jagattaddharmatayā tādātmyena vā brahmaṇo lakṣaṇam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1700: tadutpattyā tu bhaviṣyati deśāntaraprāptiriva saviturvrajyāyā iti tātparyārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1702: lāghavāya sūtrakṛtā janmādīti napuṃsakaprayogaḥ kṛtastadupapādanāya samāhāramāha-janmasthitibhaṅgamiti
GSP33brsvbh1u:1705: pradhānakālagrahalokapālakriyāyadṛcchāsvabhāvābhāveṣūpaplavamāneṣu satsu sarvajñaṃ sarvaśaktisvabhāvaṃ brahma jagajjanmādikāraṇamiti kutaḥ saṃbhāvanetyata āha-asya jagata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1706: atranāmarūpābhyāṃ vyākṛtasya iti cetanabhāvakartṛkatvasaṃbhāvanayā pradhānādyacetanakartṛkatvaṃ nirupākhyakartṛkatvaṃ ca vyāsedhati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1707: yatkhalu nāmnā rūpeṇa ca vyākriyate taccetanakartṛkaṃ dṛṣṭam, yathā ghaṭādi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1708: vivādādhyāsitaṃ ca jagannāmarūpābhyāṃ vyākṛtam tasmāccetanakartṛkaṃ saṃbhāvyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1709: cetano hi buddhāvālikhya nāmarūpe ghaṭa iti nāmnā, rūpeṇa ca kambugrīvādinā bāhyaṃ ghaṭaṃ niṣpādayati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1710: ata eva ghaṭasya nirvartyasyāpyantaḥ saṃkalpātmanā siddhasya karmakārakabhāvo ghaṭaṃ karotīti
GSP33brsvbh1u:1712: tathā cācetano buddhāvanālikhitaṃ karotīti na śakyaṃ saṃbhāvayitumiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1714: cetanā grahā lokapālā vā nāmarūpe buddhāvālikhya jagajjanayiṣyanti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1716: kecitkartāro bhavanti, yathā sūdartvigādayaḥ, na bhoktāraḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1717: kecittu bhoktāraḥ, yathā śrāddhavaiśvānareṣṭyādiṣu pitāputrādayaḥ, na kartāraḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1720: deśādīni ca tāni pratiniyatāni ceti vigrahaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1726: evaṃ pratiniyataphalāḥ, yathā kecitsukhinaḥ, kecidduḥkhinaḥ, evaṃ ya eva
GSP33brsvbh1u:1728: sarvametadākasmikāparanāmni yādṛcchikatve vā svābhāvikatve vā sarvajñāsarvaśaktikartṛkatve ca na ghaṭate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1731: ekasyā api hi śarīraracanāyā rūpaṃ manasā na śakyaṃ cintayituṃ kadācit,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1738: tenālpāvayavādavayavino dvitantukāderanya eva mahānpaṭo jāyata iti janmaiva vṛddhiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1747: tathā sati hi tatpratipādake 'yato vā imāni bhūtāni'iti vedavākye buddhisthīkṛte jaganmūlakāraṇaṃ brahma lakṣitaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1748: anyathā tu jāyate 'sti vardhate ityādīnāṃ grahaṇe tatpratipādakaṃ nairuktavākyaṃ buddhau bhavet,tacca na mūlakāraṇapratipādanaparam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1749: mahāsargādūrdhvaṃ sthitikāle 'pi tadvākyoditānāṃ janmādīnāṃ bhāvavikārāṇāmupapatteḥ, iti śaṅkānirākaraṇārthaṃ vedoktotpattisthitibhaṅgagrahaṇamityāha-yāskaparipaṭhitānāṃ tviti nanvevamapyutpattimātraṃ sūcyatām,tannāntarīyakatayā tu sthitibhaṅgaṃ gamyata ityata āha-yotpattirbrahmaṇaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:1758: nahyatropādānatvasūcanāyaiva taduktamapitu prakṛtivikārābhedanyāyenādvaitasiddhaye 'pi tena brahma upādānaṃ bhavatu, adhiṣṭhātā tvanyaḥ syāt, kumbhakāra iva kumbhasyotpattāviti śaṅkānirāso boddhavyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1765: lakṣaṇaṃhi siddhasya vastuno bhedamavagamayati īdṛśaṃ taditi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1770: tasya yadaikatvaṃ sidhyati tadā tatsarvajñaṃ sarvaśakti ca bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1771: ayaṃ ca saṃdehaḥ kalpanālāghavākhyatarkeṇa utkaṭaikatarakoṭikatāṃ nītaḥ saṃbhavānetyucyate prāsādādīnāmanekakartṛkatvasya dṛṣṭatvānna tatra nirṇayo bhavati ato nirṇayārthamāvaśyakamagnimādhikaraṇamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1776: itthaṃ nāma janmādi saṃbhāvanāhetuḥ, yadanye vaiśeṣikakādaya ita
GSP33brsvbh1u:1784: tathā ca kuto mananam,kutaśca tadanubhavaḥ sākṣātkāraḥityata āha-satsu tu vedāntavākyeṣviti
GSP33brsvbh1u:1786: śabdāvirodhinyā tadupajīvinyā ca yuktyā vivecanaṃ mananam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1789: yathā dharme na puruṣabuddhisāhāyyam, evaṃ brahmaṇyapi kasmānna
GSP33brsvbh1u:1795: yadyapi dharmajijñāsāyāmapi sāmagryāṃ pratyakṣādīnāṃ vyāpārastathāpi sākṣānnāsti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1800: nanu bhavatu brahmānubhavārthā jijñāsā,tadanubhava eva tvaśakyaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1804: FN: 1-vyatirekaḥ-prapañcābhāvopalakṣitaṃ svarūpaṃ, tadviṣayasākṣātkārasya vikalparūpo brahmaṇā saha viṣayaviṣayibhāva) saṃbandho 'sti na tattvata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1807: svayamapuruṣārthatvāt, tadanuṣṭhānasādhyatvātpuruṣārthasya, anuṣṭhānasya ca vināpyanubhavaṃ śābdajñānamātrādeva siddherityāha-kartavye hītyādinā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1822: evaṃ nārāsthitasparśananiṣedho brahmaghnaśca tadvāraṇavidhirityevañjātīyakā vidhipratiṣedhā arthavantaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1825: yasmādgrahaṇāgrahaṇayoruditānuditahomayośca virodhātsamuccayāsaṃbhave tulyabalatayā ca bādhyabādhakabhāvābhāve satyagatyā vikalpaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1827: kintu sāmānyaśāstrasya sparśananiṣedhasya dhāraṇavidhiviṣayeṇa viśeṣaśāstreṇa bādhaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1829: upanītaḥ, yena puruṣasya vidhiniṣedhādhīnapravṛttinivṛttyorapi svātantryaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1830: bhūte vastuni tu neyamasti vidhetyāha-na tu vastvevaṃ naivamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1834: bhūte 'pi vastuni vikalpo dṛṣṭaḥ, yathā sthāṇurvā puruṣo veti, tatkathaṃ na vastu vikalpyate, ityata āha-vikalpanāstviti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1840: na tu puruṣatattvaṃ vā sthāṇutattvaṃ vāpekṣante /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1842: tasmādayathāvastavo vikalpanā na vastu vikalpayanti vā anyathayanti vetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1843: tattvajñānaṃ tu na buddhitantram, kiṃ tu vastutantram,atastato
GSP33brsvbh1u:1844: vastuviniścayo yuktaḥ, na tu vikalpanābhya ityāha-na vastuyāthātmyeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1845: evamuktena prakāreṇa bhūtavastuviṣayāṇāṃ jñānānāṃ prāmāṇyasya vastutantratāṃ prasādhya brahmajñānasya vastutantratāmāha-tatraivaṃ satīti
GSP33brsvbh1u:1847: yat kila bhūtārthaṃ vākyaṃ tatpramāṇāntaragocarārthatayānuvādakaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1852: evaṃ ca maulikaṃ tadeva parīkṣaṇīyam, na tu vedāntavākyāni
GSP33brsvbh1u:1856: kasmāt punarnendriyaviṣayatvaṃ pratīca ityata āha-svabhāvata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1871: śrutiśca 'yato vā'iti janma darśayati, 'yena jātāni jīvanti'iti jīvanaṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:1875: etaduktaṃ bhavati-yathā rajjvajñānasahitarajjūpādānā hi dhārā rajjvāṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:1876: satyāmasti, rajjvāmeva ca līyate, evamavidyāsahitabrahmopādānaṃ jagat jāyate, brahmaṇyevāsti, tatraiva ca līyatā iti siddham //2//
GSP33brsvbh1u:1881: na kevalaṃ jagadyonitvādasya bhagavataḥ sarvajñatā, śāstrayonitvādapi boddhavyā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1883: cāturvarṇyasya cāturāśramyasya ca yathāyathaṃ niṣekādiśmaśānāntāsu brāhmamuhūrtopakramapradoṣaparisamāpanīyāsu nityanaimittikakāmyakarmapaddhatiṣu ca brahmatattve ca śiṣyāṇāṃ śāsanāt śāstramṛgvedādiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1889: purāṇādipraṇetāro hi maharṣayaḥ śiṣṭāstaistayā tayā dvārā vedānvyācakṣāṇaistadarthacādareṇānutiṣṭhadbhiḥ parigṛhīto veda iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1894: sarvajñasya hi jñānaṃ sarvaviṣayaṃ, śāstrasyāpyabhidhānaṃ sarvaviṣayamiti sādṛśyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1896: sarvajñasya guṇaḥ sarvaviṣayatātadanvitaṃ śāstram, asyāpi sarvaviṣayatvā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1899: yo yadvākyapramāṇakartā sa tadviṣayādadhikaviṣayajñaḥ yathā pāṇiniriti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1902: adyatve 'pyasmadādibhiryatsamīcīnārthaviṣayaṃ śāstraṃ viracyate tatrāsmākaṃ vaktṛṇāṃ vākyājjñānamadhikaviṣayam
GSP33brsvbh1u:1903: nahi te te 'sādhāraṇadharmā anubhūyamānā api śakyā vaktum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1905: vistarārthamapi vākyaṃ na vaktṛjñānena tulyaviṣayamiti kathayituṃ vistaragrahaṇam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1907: vedasya yasmāt mahato bhūtāt yoneḥ saṃbhavaḥ, tasya mahato bhūtasya
GSP33brsvbh1u:1908: brahmaṇo niratiśayaṃ sarvajñatvaṃ ca sarvaśaktitvaṃ ca kimu vaktavyamiti yojanā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1914: devarṣayo hi mahāpariśrameṇāpi yatrāśaktastadayamīṣatprayatnena līlayaiva karotīti niratiśayamasya sarvajñatvaṃ sarvaśaktitvaṃ coktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1916: ye 'pi tāvat varṇānāṃ nityatvamāsthiṣata tairapi padavākyādīnāmanityatvamabhyupeyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1919: vyaktidharmaścānupūrvī na varṇadharmaḥ, varṇānāṃ nityānāṃ vibhūnāṃ ca kālato deśato vā paurvāparyāyogāt
GSP33brsvbh1u:1920: vyaktiścānityeti kathaṃ tadupagṛhītānāṃ varṇānāṃ nityānāmapi padatā nityā
GSP33brsvbh1u:1923: yathā hi yādṛśaṃ gātracalanādi nartakaḥ karoti tādṛśameva śikṣyamāṇānukaroti nartakī, na tu tadeva vyanakti, evaṃ yādṛśīmānupūrvīṃ vaidikānāṃ varṇapadādīnāṃ karotyadhyāpayitā tādṛśīmevānukaroti māṇavakaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1929: vaiyāsikaṃ tu matamanuvartamānāḥ śrutismṛtītihāsādisiddhasṛṣṭipralayānusāreṇānādyavidyopadhānalabdhasarvaśaktijñānasyāpi paramātmano nityasya vedānāṃ yonerapi na teṣu svātantryam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:1931: yathā hi yāgādibrahmahatyādayor'thānarthahetavo brahmavivartā api na
GSP33brsvbh1u:1937: yathātra sarge niyatānupūrvyaṃ vedādhyayanamabhyudayaniḥśreyasahetuḥranyathā tadeva vāgvajratayānarthahetuḥ, evaṃ sargāntareṣvapīti tadanurodhāt sarvajño 'pi
GSP33brsvbh1u:1942: na hi bahūnāmapyajñānāṃ vijñānāṃ vāśayadoṣavatāṃ pratibhāne yukta āśvāsaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1953: śāstrapramāṇakatvamuktaṃ brahmaṇaḥ pratijñāmātreṇa,tadanena sūtreṇa pratipādanīyamityutsūtraṃ pūrvapakṣamāracayati bhāṣyakāraḥ-kathaṃ punariti
GSP33brsvbh1u:1957: na khalu laukikāni vākyāni pramāṇāntaraviṣayamarthamavabodhayanti svataḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:1958: pramāṇam, evaṃ vedāntā apītyanapekṣatvalakṣaṇaṃ prāmāṇyameṣāṃ vyāhanyeta /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1962: yadi tvasaṃnidhānāttatparatvaṃ na rocayante, tataḥ saṃnihitopāsanādikriyāparatvaṃ vedāntānām
GSP33brsvbh1u:1963: evaṃ hi pratyakṣādyanadhigatagocaratvenānapekṣatayā prāmāṇyaṃ ca prayojanavattvaṃ ca sidhyatīti tātparyārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1973: vedāntānāṃ cājñātaṃ brahma jñāpayatāṃ tathābhāvādityata āha-na ca pariniṣṭhita iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1979: eteṣāṃ hi parasparamavinābhāvo 'sti, yasmāt phalasaṃbandhaḥ kriyāyāḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:1980: śeṣatvamantareṇa na saṃbhavati, śeṣatvaṃ ca nānuṣṭhānamantarā, tacca nājñānata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1992: tasmāt bhāvanāviṣayo vidhirna siddhe vastuni bhavitumarhatīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:1995: evaṃ ca satyuktarūpe brahmaṇi śabdasyātātparyāt pramāṇāntareṇa yādṛśa
GSP33brsvbh1u:1997: masya rūpaṃ vyavasthāpyate na tacchabdena virudhyate,tasyopāsanāparatvāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2013: 'yato vā imāni bhūtāni'iti tu vākyaṃ pūrvamudāhṛtaṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:2015: yena hi vākyamupakramyate yena copasaṃhriyate tadeva vākyārtha iti śābdāḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:2018: FN: 1-'jāmi vā etadyajñasya kriyate yadanvañcau puroḍāśau upāṃśuyājamantarā yajati viṣṇurupāṃśu yaṣṭavyo 'jāmitvāya'ityādimantreṇa,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2019: āgneyāgnīṣomīyayoḥ puroḍāśayoḥ nirantarayoḥ karaṇe jāmi-ālasyaṃ bhavediti madhye upāṃśuyāgo vidhīyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2020: tatra kimidamapūrvayāgavidhānamāho 'viṣṇurupāṃśu yaṣṭavyaḥ'iti paṭhitayāgatrayasyānuvāda iti saṃśaye
GSP33brsvbh1u:2021: dravyadevatayoraśravaṇāt, vidhipratyayasya cābhāvādagrepaṭitayāgatrayasyāyamanuvāda iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2034: ātharvaṇe-'kasmin bhagavo vijñāte sarvamidaṃ vijñātaṃ bhavati'iti sarvātmakaṃ brahmopakramya 'brahmaivedamamṛtaṃ purastāt'iti tadevopasaṃhṛtam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2037: na ca tatparatvasya dṛṣṭasya sati saṃbhave 'nyaparatā adṛṣṭā yuktā kalpayitum, atiprasaṅgāt
GSP33brsvbh1u:2038: na kevalaṃ kartṛparatā teṣāmadṛṣṭā, anupapannā cetyāha-
GSP33brsvbh1u:2044: tatra pūrvavādyabhimatasya hetoḥ pauruṣeyatvena sopādhikatvaṃ apinā dyotyata ityāha-ayamabhisaṃdhiriti
GSP33brsvbh1u:2047: tatraivaṃ bhavān pṛṣṭo vyācaṣṭām, kiṃ puṃvākyānāṃ sāpekṣatā
GSP33brsvbh1u:2053: atha puruṣabuddhiprabhavatayā puṃvākyaṃ sāpekṣam, evaṃ tarhi tadapūrvakāṇāṃ vedāntānāṃ bhūtārthānāmapi nāprāmāṇyaṃ, pratyakṣādīnāmiva niyatendriyaliṅgādijanmanām /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2057: sidhyet,tadeva tu bhūtārthatvena na sidhyati, bhūtārthasya śabdānapekṣeṇa puruṣeṇa mānāntarataḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:2061: tasmāt pauruṣeyatvena sāpekṣatvaṃ durvāraṃ, na tu bhūtārthatvena /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2065: thatve tu kāryasyāpūrvasya mānāntarāgocaratayātyantānanubhūtapūrvasya tattvena samāropeṇa vā puruṣabuddhāvanārohāt tadarthānāṃ vedāntānāmaśakyaracanatayā pauruṣeyatvābhāvādanapekṣaṃ pramāṇatvaṃ sidhyatīti prāmāṇyāya vedāntānāṃ kāryaparatvamātiṣṭhāmahe /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2067: FN: 7-akārye mānāntarāyogyatvasyāsiddhatvāttatparatve 'pi vedāntānāṃ pauruṣeyatvaṃ saṃbhavatīti samā sādhanavyāptiḥ, tataśca vākyatvādiliṅgakānumānena pauruṣeyatvaṃ durapahnavamityāha-atra brūma iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2068: brūmaḥ-kiṃ punaridaṃ kāryamabhimatamāyuṣmataḥ yadaśakyaṃ puruṣeṇa jñātum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2069: apūrvamiti cet, hanta kutastyamasya liṅādyarthatvam, tenālaukikena saṃgatisaṃvedanavirahāt
GSP33brsvbh1u:2070: lokānusārataḥ kriyāyā eva laukikyāḥ kāryatayā liṅāderavagamāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2074: na ca kriyā kṣaṇabhaṅgurāmuṣmikāya svargāya kalpata iti pāriśeṣyādvedata evāpūrve kārye liṅādīnāṃ saṃbandhagraha iti cet, hanta caityavandanādivākyeṣvapi svargakāmādipadasaṃbandhādapūrvakāryatvaprasaṅgaḥ, tathā ca teṣāmapyaśakyaracanatvenāpauruṣeyatvāpātaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2075: spaṣṭadṛṣṭena pauruṣeyatvena vā teṣāmapūrvārthatvapratiṣedhe vākyatvādinā liṅgena vedāntānāmapi pauruṣeyatvamanumitamityapūrvārthatā na syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2077: siddhārthakeṣvapi vedānteṣu tatsamamiti kāryārthatvamanapekṣatāprayojakaṃ na bhavatītyāha-anyatastviti
GSP33brsvbh1u:2082: na cājñāte puṃsāṃ vākyaracanā saṃbhavatīti apauruṣeyo veda ityādi tatroktamavagantavyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2084: tenāpauruṣeyatve siddhe bhūtārthānāmapi vedāntānāṃ na sāpekṣatayā prāmāṇyavighātaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2087: gantṛtā nāsti yena prāmāṇyaṃ na syāt, jīvasya brahmatāyā anyato
GSP33brsvbh1u:2093: bāhyānuṣṭhānāyāsānapekṣātsākṣādeva puruṣārthapratilambhonāyaṃ sarpo rajjuriyamitijñānādiveti so 'yamasya vidhyarthajñānāt prakarṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2097: evaṃ jihāsitamapi dvividham,kiñcidahīnaṃ jīhāsati, yathā valayitacaraṇaṃ phaṇinam,kiñcitpunarhīnameva jihāsati, yathā caraṇābharaṇe nūpure
GSP33brsvbh1u:2099: tatrāprāptaprāptau cātyaktatyāge ca bāhyopāyānuṣṭhānasādhyatvāt tadupāyatattvajñānādasti parācīnānuṣṭhānāpekṣā
