GSP33brsvbh1u:2101: na hi sahasramapi rajjupratyayā vastusantaṃ phaṇinamanyathayitumīśate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2102: samāropite tu prepsitajihāsite tattvasākṣātkāramātreṇa bāhyānuṣṭhānānapekṣeṇa śakyete prāptumiva hātumiva /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2103: samāropamātrajīvite hi te,samāropitaṃ ca tattvasakṣātkāraḥ samūlaghātamupahantīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2108: sa hi kliśnāti jantūnataḥ kleśaḥ, tasya prakarṣeṇa hānāt
GSP33brsvbh1u:2113: yadi na virodhaḥ, santu tarhi vedāntā
GSP33brsvbh1u:2114: devatāpratipādanadvāreṇopāsanāvidhiparā evetyata āha-na tu tathā brahmaṇa iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2116: upāsyopāsakopāsanādibhedasiddhyadhīnopāsanā na nirastasamastabhedaprapañce vedāntavedye brahmaṇi saṃbhavatīti nopāsanāvidhiśeṣatvaṃ vedāntānāṃ tadvirodhitvāt ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2118: yadi vidhivirahe 'pi vedāntānāṃ prāmāṇyam, hanta tarhi 'so
GSP33brsvbh1u:2120: na hi hānopādānabuddhī eva prāmaṇasya phale, upekṣābuddherapi tatphalatvena prāmāṇikairabhyupetatvāditi
GSP33brsvbh1u:2124: svādhyāyavidhyadhīnagrahaṇatayā hi sarvo vedarāśiḥ puruṣārthatantra ityavagatam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2125: tatraikenāpi varṇena nāpuruṣārthena bhavituṃ yuktam,kiṃ punariyatā 'so
GSP33brsvbh1u:2127: na ca vedāntebhya iva tadarthāvagamamātrādeva kaścitpuruṣārtha upalabhyate
GSP33brsvbh1u:2129: 'barhiṣi rajataṃ na deyam'ityayamapi niṣedhavidhiḥ svaniṣedhyasya nindāmapekṣate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2131: tadyadi dūrato 'pi na nindāmavāpsyattato niṣedhavidhireva rajataniṣedhe ca nindāyāṃ ca darvihomavat sāmarthyadvayamakalpayiṣyat /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2132: tadevamuttaptayoḥ 'so 'rodīt'iti 'barhiṣi rajataṃ na deyam'iti ca padasaṃdarbhayorlakṣyamāṇanindādvāreṇa naṣṭāśvadagdharathavat parasparaṃ samanvayaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2135: nanu vidhyasaṃsparśino vedasyānyasya na prāmāṇyaṃ dṛṣṭamiti kathaṃ vedāntānāṃ tadaspṛśāṃ tadbhaviṣyatītyata āha-na cānumānagamyamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2136: abādhitānadhigatāsaṃdigdhabodhajanakatvaṃ hi pramāṇatvaṃ pramāṇānāmtacca svata ityupapāditam
GSP33brsvbh1u:2137: yadyapi caiṣāmīdṛgbodhajanakatvaṃ kāryārthāpattisamadhigamyam, tathāpi tadbodhopajanane mānāntaraṃ nāpekṣate nāpīmāmevārthāpattim, parasparā
GSP33brsvbh1u:2141: īdṛgbodhajanakatvaṃ ca kārye iva vidhīnām, vedāntānāṃ brahmaṇyastīti dṛṣṭāntānapekṣaṃ teṣāṃ brahmaṇi prāmāṇyaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2142: anyathā nendriyāntarāṇāṃ rūpaprakāśanaṃ dṛṣṭamiti cakṣurapi na rūpaṃ prakāśayediti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2149: yatra hi śabdā lokena na prayujyante tatra na teṣāṃ saṃgatigrahaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2153: tasmāt pratipitsitaṃ pratipipādayiṣannayaṃ lokaḥ pravṛttinivṛttihetubhūtamevārthaṃ pratipādayet, kāryaṃ cāvagataṃ taddheturiti tadeva bodhayet /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2158: FN: 1-ayamatrānumānaprakāraḥ-iyaṃ gavānayanaviṣayiṇī pravṛttiḥ arthajñānapūrvikā, pravṛttitvāt, madīyapravṛttivat /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2160: manumāya tasya ca śabdabhāvābhāvānuvidhānamavagamya śabdasya tadviṣayavācakatvaṃ niścetavyam
GSP33brsvbh1u:2162: kāryapratyaye tu narāntaravartini pravṛttinivṛttī sto hetū ityajñātasaṃgatitvānna brahmarūpaparā vedāntāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2170: FN: 2-nakāro 'yaṃ sāṃsārikāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ na nivṛttiriti yojanīyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2171: na ca rajjuriyaṃ na bhujaṅgaḥiti yathākathañcillakṣaṇayā vākyārthatattvaniścaye yathā bhayakampādinivṛttiḥ, evam 'tattvamasi'iti
GSP33brsvbh1u:2174: api ca yadi śrutabrahmaṇo bhavati sāṃsārikadharmanivṛttiḥ, kasmāt punaḥ śravaṇasyopari mananādayaḥ śrūyante /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2175: tasmātteṣāṃ vaiyarthyaprasaṅgādapi na brahmasvarūpaparā vedāntāḥ, kiṃ tvātmapratipattiviṣayakāryaparāḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:2176: tacca kāryaṃ svātmani niyojyaṃ niyuñjānaṃ niyoga iti ca mānāntarāpūrvatayāpūrvamiti cākhyāyate
GSP33brsvbh1u:2177: na ca viṣayānuṣṭhānaṃ vinā tatsiddhiriti svasiddhyarthaṃ tadeva kāryaṃ svaviṣayasya karaṇasyātmajñānasyānuṣṭhānamākṣipati
GSP33brsvbh1u:2178: yathā ca kāryaṃ svaviṣayādhīnanirūpaṇamiti jñānena viṣeyeṇa nirūpyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2182: cedātmanaḥ śrautatvaṃ na syādityāśaṅkya vidhyākṣiptasya śrautatve
GSP33brsvbh1u:2184: yathāhuḥ-'yattu tatsiddhyarthamupādīyate ākṣipyate tadapi vidheyamiti tantre vyavahāraḥ'iti
GSP33brsvbh1u:2187: FN: 4-nanu 'vācaṃ dhenumupāsīta'itivadāropyasya vidheyadhīviṣayatvaṃ kiṃ na syādata āha-āropiteti
GSP33brsvbh1u:2189: tathāsati āropitaikyabhāvena jñānaṃ nirūpitaṃ na syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2190: satyāṃ gatāvāropo na yukta iti hṛdayam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2191: āropitatadbhāvasya tvanyasya nirūpakatve tena tannirūpitaṃ na syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2196: 'yūpe paśuṃ badhnāti'iti bandhanāya viniyukte yūpe, tasyālaukikatvātko
GSP33brsvbh1u:2199: saṃskārāviṣṭaṃ viśiṣṭalakṣaṇasaṃsthānaṃ dāru yūpa iti gamyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2207: pravṛttinivṛttiparasya śāstratvaṃ na svarūpaparasya, kārya eva ca
GSP33brsvbh1u:2210: na ca svatantraṃ kāryaṃ niyojyamadhikāriṇamanuṣṭhātāramantareṇeti niyojyabhedamāha-sati ca vidhiparatva iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2211: 'brahma veda brahmaiva bhavati'iti siddhavadarthavādādavagatasyāpi brahmabhavanasya niyojyaviśeṣākāṅkṣāyāṃ brahma bubhūṣorniyojyaviśeṣasya rātri
GSP33brsvbh1u:2212: FN: 1-'pratitiṣṭhanti ha vā ya etā rātrīrupayanti'iti rātriśabdena somaviśeṣā vidhīyante /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2213: tatra kiṃ etadvākyābhihitapratiṣṭhā phalamuta svarga iti saṃśaye evaṅkāma ityaśravaṇāt, vidhiśaktilabhyatvāt, svargasya niyataphalatvena vākyaśeṣāvagatapratiṣṭhānabhyupagamāt, svarga eva phalamiti prāpte pratiṣṭhāphalasya sākṣānnirdeśena ānumānikasvargakalpanāyā anyāyyatvātpratiṣṭhaiva phalamiti rāddhāntaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2218: vihitaḥ piṇḍapitṛyajñaḥ kratvartho vā puruṣārtha iti saṃśaye phalakalpanāparihārāya amāvāsyāśabdasya karmārthakatvena kalpanīyatvāttadaṅgamiti prāpte siddhāntaḥ-aparāhnaśabdasāmānādhikaraṇyāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2223: yajñanyāyena tu svargakāmasya niyojyasya kalpanāyāmarthavādasyāsamavetārthatayātyantaparokṣā vṛttiḥ syāditi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2229: atra cātmadarśanaṃ na vidheyam taddhi dṛśerupalabdhivacanatvāt śrāvaṇaṃ vā syāt pratyakṣaṃ vā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2232: tatra śrāvaṇaṃ na vidheyam, svādhyāyavidhinaivāsya prāpitatvāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2237: FN: 1-yathā bhikṣārthavihitadadhyānayanādvājinamānuṣaṅgikatayā jāyate evamamūtatvāya vihitādupāsanātsākṣātkāro jāyata iti tadutpādanaṃ na
GSP33brsvbh1u:2243: arthavattyā mananādipratītyā cetyasya śeṣaḥ prapañco nigadavyākhyātaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2249: tacca sarvaṃ kāryaṃ ca vināśi ca /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2252: etaduktaṃ bhavati-tvayāpyupāsanāvidhiparatvaṃ vedāntānāmabhyupagacchatā nityaśuddhabuddhatvādirūpabrahmātmatā jīvasya svābhāvikī vedāntagamyāsthīyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2256: upāsanāsaṃskāravadupāsanāpūrvamapi cetaḥsahakārīti cetdṛṣṭaṃ ca khalu naiyogikaṃ phalamaihikamapi,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2257: FN: 1-'citrayā yajeta paśukāmaḥ'iti vihitacitrāniyogaphalaṃ iha janmāntare
GSP33brsvbh1u:2262: na,gāndharvaśāstrārthepāsanāvāsanāyā ivāpūrvānapekṣāyāḥ ṣaṭjādisākṣātkāre vedāntārthopāsanāvāsanāyā jīvabrahmabhāvasākṣātkāre 'napekṣāyā eva sāmarthyāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2266: na ca tatkāmaḥ kriyāmeva kāryamavagamiṣyati nāpūrvamiti sāṃpratam,tasyā
GSP33brsvbh1u:2269: na ca brahmabhūyādanyadamṛtatvamārthavādikaṃ kiñcidasti, yena tatkāma upāsanāyāmadhikriyeta,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2274: viśvajinnyāyena tu svargakalpanāyāṃ tasya sātiśayatvaṃ kṣayitvaṃ ceti na nityaphalatvamupāsanāyāḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:2275: tasmādbrahmabhūyasyāvidyāpidhānāpanayamātreṇāvirbhāvāt, avidyāpanayasya ca vedāntārthavijñānādavagatiparyantādeva saṃbhavāt, upāsanāyāḥ saṃskārahetubhāvasya saṃskārasya ca sākṣātkāropajanane manaḥsācivyasya ca
GSP33brsvbh1u:2277: yathopāṃśuyājavākye 'viṣṇurupāṃśu yaṣṭavyaḥ'ityādayo vidhisarūpā na vidhayaḥ-iti tātparyārthaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:2283: pare hi dvayīṃ nityatāmāhuḥ-kūṭasthanityatā pariṇāminityatāṃ ca /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2290: ekadeśapariṇāme vā sa ekadeśastato bhinno vā abhinno vā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2293: abhede vā kathaṃ na sarvātmanā pariṇāmaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2294: bhinnābhinnaṃ taditi cet,tathā hi-tadeva kāraṇātmanābhinnam, bhinnaṃ ca kāryātmanā, kaṭakādaya ivābhinnā hāṭakātmanā bhinnāśca kaṭakādyātmanā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2295: na ca bhedābhedayorvirodhānnaikatra samavāya iti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2296: FN: 2-yatpramāṇaviparyayeṇa virodhena vartate tadviruddhamiti kva saṃpratyaya iti yojanā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2298: yattu yathā pramāṇenāvagamyate tasya tathābhāva eva /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2299: kuṇḍalamidaṃ suvarṇamiti sāmānādhikaraṇyapratyaye ca vyaktaṃ bhedābhedau cakāstaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2302: ādhārādheyabhāve ekāśrayatve vā na sāmānādhikaraṇyam,na hi bhavati kuṇḍaṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:2307: tathā ca kāryāṇāṃ kāraṇātmatvāt, kāraṇasya ca sadrūpasya sarvatrānugamāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2312: atrocyate-kaḥ punarayaṃ bhedo nāma, yaḥ sahābhedenaikatra bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2313: parasparābhāva iti cet, kimayaṃ kāryakāraṇayoḥ kaṭakahāṭakayorasti na vā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2314: na cet, ekatvamevāsti, na ca bhedaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2319: api ca kaṭakasya hāṭakādabhede yathā hāṭakātmanā kaṭakamukuṭakuṇḍalādayo na bhidyante evaṃ kaṭakātmanāpi na bhidyeran, kaṭakasya hāṭakādabhedāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2320: tathā ca hāṭakameva vastusanna kaṭakādayaḥ, bhedasyāpratibhāsanāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2321: atha hāṭakatvenaivābhedo na kaṭakatvena,tena tu bheda eva kuṇḍalādeḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2322: yadi hāṭakādabhinnaḥ kaṭakaḥ kathamayaṃ kuṇḍalādiṣu nānuvartate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2324: ye hi yasminnanuvartamāne vyāvartante te tato bhinnā eva, yathā sūtrātkusumabhedāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2327: sattānuvṛttyā ca sarvavastvanugame 'idamiha nedam, idamevaṃ nedam'iti
GSP33brsvbh1u:2330: api ca dūrātkanakamityavagate na tasya kuṇḍalādayo viśeṣā jijñāsyeran,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2334: pratyuta jñānameva teṣāṃ yuktam,kāraṇābhāve hi kāryabhāva autsargikaḥ,sa
GSP33brsvbh1u:2336: asti cābhede kāraṇasatteti kanake jñāte jñātā eva kuṇḍalādaya iti tajjijñāsājñānāni cānarthakāni syuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2337: tena yasmin gṛhyamāṇe yanna gṛhyate tattato bhidyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2339: gṛhyamāṇe ca dūrato hemni na gṛhyante tasya bhedāḥ kuṇḍalādayaḥ,tasmātte
GSP33brsvbh1u:2341: kathaṃ tarhi hema kuṇḍalamiti sāmānādhikaraṇyam iti cet, na hyādhārādheyabhāve samānāśrayatve vā sāmānādhikaraṇyamityuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2342: athānuvṛttivyāvṛttivyavasthā ca hemni jñāte kuṇḍalādijijñāsā ca katham /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2344: tasmādbhedābhedayoranyatarasminnavaheye 'bhedo pādānaiva bhedakalpanā, na bhedopādānābhedakalpaneti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2345: bhidyamānatantratvādbhedasya, bhidyamānānāṃ ca pratyekamekatvāt, ekābhāve cānāśrayasya bhedasyāyogāt, ekasya ca bhedānadhīnatvāt, nāyamayaṃ iti ca
GSP33brsvbh1u:2349: tasmāt kūṭasthanityataiva pāramārthikī na pariṇāminityateti siddham /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2350: vyomavat iti ca dṛṣṭāntaḥ parasiddhaḥ, asmanmate tasyāpi kāryatvenānityatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2355: vrīhīṇāṃ khalu prokṣaṇena saṃskārākhyoṃ'śo yathā janyate, naivaṃ brahmaṇi kaścidaṃśaḥ kriyādheyo 'sti, anavayavatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2360: sukhaṃ cāpratīyamānaṃ na puruṣārthaṃ ityata āha-svayañjyotiriti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2361: tadevaṃ svamatena mokṣākhyaṃ phalaṃ nityaṃ śrutyādibhirupapādya kriyāniṣpādyasya tu mokṣasyānityatvaṃ prasañjayati-tadyadīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2363: api ca jñānajanyāpūrvajanito mokṣo naiyogika ityasyārthasya santi bhūyasyaḥ śrutayo nivārikā ityāha-api ca brahma vedeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2364: avidyādvayapratibandhāpanayamātreṇa ca vidyāyā mokṣasādhanatvam na svato
GSP33brsvbh1u:2366: na kevalamasminnarthe śrutyādayaḥ, api tvakṣapādācāryasūtramapi nyāyamūlamastītyāha-tathā cācāryapraṇītamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2373: pāṭhāpekṣayā kāraṇamuttaram, kāryaṃ ca pūrvam,kāraṇāpāye kāryāpāyaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2377: mithyājñānaṃ cāvidyā rāgādyupajananakrameṇa dṛṣṭenaiva saṃsārasya paramaṃ nidānam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2385: naikatvavijñānaṃ yathāvasthitavastuviṣayam, yena mithyājñānaṃ bhedāvabhāsaṃ nivartayanna vidhiviṣayo bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2389: tathā ca vidheḥ prāgaprāptaṃ puruṣecchayā kartavyaṃ sat vidhigocaro bhaviṣyati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2390: yathā vṛttyantaratvena manaso viśvedevasāmyādviśvāndevānmanasi saṃpādya mana ālambanamavidyamānasamaṃ kṛtvā prādhānyena saṃpādyānāṃ viśveṣāmeva
GSP33brsvbh1u:2392: evaṃ cidrūpasāmyājjīvasya brahmarūpatāṃ saṃpādya jīvamālambanamavidyamānasamaṃ kṛtvā prādhānyena brahmānucintanam, tena cāmṛtatvaphalaprāptiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2402: prāyaṇakāle hi sa eva sarvāṇīndriyāṇi saṃgṛhyotkrāmatīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2403: seyaṃ saṃvargadṛṣṭirvāyau prāṇe ca daśāśāgataṃ jagaddarśayati yathā, evaṃ jīvātmani bṛṃhaṇakriyayā brahmadṛṣṭismṛtatvāya phalāya kalpata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2407: 'ājyaiḥ stuvate praugaṃ śaṃsati iti stutaśastre samāmnāte, pragītamantrasādhyaṃ devatāguṇasaṃbandhābhidhānaṃ stotram /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2410: niyamāddevatāprakāśanasaṃskārārthatvena guṇakarmaṇi vā apūrvārthatvena pradhānakarmaṇi veti saṃdehe kratūpayogidevatāsmaraṇasya dṛṣṭatvādguṇakarmatve prāpte siddhāntaḥ-guṇābhidhānena
GSP33brsvbh1u:2416: ātmā tu dravyaṃ karmaṇi guṇa iti saṃskāro vātmano darśanaṃ vidhīyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2418: prakaraṇinā ca gṛhītamupāṃśuyāgāṅgabhūtājyadravyasaṃskāratayāvekṣaṇaṃ guṇakarma vidhīyate, evaṃ kartṛtvena kratvaṅgabhūte ātmani 'ātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ'iti darśanaṃ guṇakarma vidhīyate FN: 3-(jai. 2 /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2421: 'yaistu dravyaṃ cikīrṣyate guṇastatra pratīyeta'iti nyāyādata āha-na cedaṃ brahmātmaikatvavijñānamiti
GSP33brsvbh1u:2426: darśapūrṇamāsaprakaraṇe hi samāmnātamājyāvekṣaṇaṃ tadaṅgabhūtājyasaṃskāra iti yujyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2428: naca 'ātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ'ityādi kasyacitprakaraṇe samāmnātam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2431: juhūpadaṃ kratuṃ smārayadvākyena yathā parṇatāyāḥ kratuśeṣabhāvamāpādayati, evamātmā nāvyabhicāritakratusaṃbandhaḥ, yena taddarśanaṃ kratvaṅgaṃ sadātmānaṃ kratvarthaṃ saṃskuryāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2435: tatra kiṃ śobhanahiraṇyadhāraṇaṃ kratvaṅgamuta puruṣadharma iti saṃdehe durvarṇakāma ityaśravaṇāt svatantraphalakalpane gauravāt, kratvaṅgamiti prāpte aprakaraṇapaṭhitasya
GSP33brsvbh1u:2437: parṇamayītāvatkratvavyabhicārābhāvāt, hiraṇyasādhanakaṃ dhāraṇaṃ vākyaśeṣagataphalāya vidhīyata iti puruṣadharmaḥ, evamihāpi ātmadarśanenāmṛtatvaṃ bhāvayediti vidhānātpradhānakarmataiveti 'suvarṇaṃ bhāryam'itivat viniyogabhaṅgena pradhānakarmaivāpūrvaviṣayatvānna guṇakarmeti
GSP33brsvbh1u:2440: kiṃ ca jñānakriyāviṣayatvavidhānamasya bahuśrutiviruddhamityāha-na ca vidikriyeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2445: sarvameva hi vākyaṃ nedantayā vastubhedaṃ bodhayitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2448: tena pramāṇāntarasiddhe laukike evārthe yadā gatiridṛśī śabdasya, tadā kaiva kathā pratyagātmanyalaukike
GSP33brsvbh1u:2452: tvaṃpadārtho hi pramātā pramāṇādhīnayā pramityā prameyaṃ ghaṭādi vyāpnotītyavidyāvilasitam
GSP33brsvbh1u:2453: tadasyā viṣayībhūtodāsīnatatpadārthapratyagātmasāmānādhikaraṇyena pramātṛtvābhāvāt tannivṛttau pramāṇādayastisro vidhā nivartante /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2454: na hi pakturavastutve pākyapākapacanāni vastusanti bhavitumarhantīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2455: tathā hi-'vigalitaparāgvṛttyarthatvaṃ tvaṃpadasya tadastadā tvamiti hi padenaikārthatve tvamityapi yatpadam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2456: tadapi ca tadā gatvaikārthyaṃ viśuddhacidātmatāṃ tyajati sakalānkartṛtvādīnpadārthamalānnijān
GSP33brsvbh1u:2464: tathā ca viśuddhavijñānotpādo mokṣa iti nirvartyo mokṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2465: anyeṣāṃ tu saṃskārarūpāvasthāmapahāya yā kaivalyāvasthāvāptirātmanaḥ sa mokṣa iti vikāryo mokṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2468: 'atha yadataḥ paro divo jyotirdīpyate'iti śruterbrahmaṇo vikṛtāvikṛtadeśabhedāvagamādavikṛtadeśabrahmaprāptirūpāsanādividhikāryā bhaviṣyati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2469: tathā ca prāpyakarmatā brahmaṇa ityata āha-na cāpyatvenāpīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2471: tadyathopavelaṃ jaladhiratibahalacapalakallolamālāparasparāsphālanasamullasatphenapuñjastabakatayā vikṛtaḥ, madhye tu praśāntasakalakallolopasargaḥ svacchaḥ sthiratayāvikṛtastasya madhyamavikṛtaṃ pautikaḥ potena prāpnoti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2474: atha jīvo brahmaṇo bhinnastathāpi na tena brahmāpyate, brahmaṇo vibhutvena nityaprāptatvādityāha-svarūpavyatiriktatve 'pīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2476: dvayī hi saṃskāryatā, guṇādhānena vā, yathā bījapūrakusumasya lākṣārasāvasekaḥ,tena hi tatkusumaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ lākṣārasasavarṇaṃ phalaṃ prasūte /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2479: guṇo hi brahmaṇaḥ svabhāvo vā bhinno vā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2486: aśuddhiḥ satī darpaṇe nivartate,na tu brahmaṇi asatī nivartanīyā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2489: brahmasvabhāva eva mokṣo 'nādyavidyāmalāvṛta upāsanādikriyayātmani saṃskriyamāṇe 'bhivyajyate, na tu kriyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2495: nāvidyā brahmāśrayā, kiṃ tu jīve,sā tvanirvacanīyetyuktam,tena
GSP33brsvbh1u:2498: kriyā hi brahmasamavetā vā brahma saṃskuryāt, yathā nigharṣaṇamiṣṭakācūrṇasaṃyogavibhāgapracayo nirantara ādarśatalasamavetaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:2500: na tāvadbrahmadharmaḥ kriyā, tasyāḥ svāśrayavikārahetutvena brahmaṇo
GSP33brsvbh1u:2502: FN: 1-yadyapi caitrasamavetā bhāvanā darpaṇasyopakaroti tathāpi saṃyogavibhāgākhyadhātvarthadvārā
GSP33brsvbh1u:2505: na hi darpaṇe nighṛṣyamāṇe maṇirviśuddho dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2514: anādyanirvācyāvidyopadhānameva brahmaṇo jīva iti ca kṣetrajña iti cācakṣate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2518: tenātrāpi yadāśritā kriyā sāṃvyavahārikapramāṇaviṣayīkṛtā tasyaiva saṃskāro nānyasyeti na vyabhicāraḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2519: tattvatastu na kriyā na saṃskāra iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2520: sanidarśanaṃ tu śeṣamadhyāsabhāṣye eva kṛtavyākhyānamiti neha vyākhyātam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2534: pañcamī tu kācit vidhā bhaviṣyati, yayā mokṣasya karmatā ghaṭiṣyata ityata āha-ato 'nyaditi
GSP33brsvbh1u:2535: ebhyaḥ prakārebhyo na prakārāntaramanyadasti, yato mokṣasya kriyānupraveśo
GSP33brsvbh1u:2538: vyāptam,sā ca mokṣādvyāvartamānā vyāpakānupalabdhyā mokṣasya kriyāphalatvaṃ vyāvartayatīti
GSP33brsvbh1u:2539: tatkiṃ mokṣe kriyaiva nāsti,tathā ca tadarthāni śāstrāṇi tadarthāśca pravṛttayo 'narthakānītyata upasaṃhāravyājenāha-tasmājjñānamekamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2540: atha jñānaṃ kriyā mānasī kasmānna vidhigocaraḥ,kasmācca tasyāḥ phalaṃ nirvartyādiṣvanyatamaṃ na mokṣa iti codayati-nanu jñānamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2543: ayamarthaḥ-satyam, jñānaṃ mānasī kriyā,tviyaṃ brahmaṇi phalaṃ janayitumarhati, tasya svayaṃprakāśatayā vidikriyākarmabhāvānupapatterityuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2544: tadetasminvailakṣaṇye sthite eva vailakṣaṇyāntaramāha-kriyā hi nāma seti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2547: yathā vā yoṣiti agnivastvanapekṣāgnibuddhiḥ-yā sā kriyā hi nāmeti yojanā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2552: na hyasau svasāmagrībalalabdhajanmā san manujecchayānyathākartumakartuṃ vā
GSP33brsvbh1u:2555: tayoranvayavyatirekāvadhṛtasāmarthyayoḥ sākṣātkāre vā anādyavidyāpanaye vā vidhimantareṇa prāptatvena puruṣecchayānyathākartumakartuṃ vā aśakyatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2566: satyaṃ śrūyante liṅgādayaḥ,na tvamī vidhiviṣayāḥ, tadviṣayatve
GSP33brsvbh1u:2569: sa eva ca heya upādeyo vā, yaṃ puruṣaḥ kartumakartumanyathā vā kartuṃ śaknoti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2570: tatraiva ca samarthaḥ kartādhikṛto niyojyo bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2577: śravaṇamananopāsanadarśanānīti viṣayatadanuṣṭhātrorvidhivyāpakayorabhāvādvidherabhāva iti prayuktā api liṅādayaḥ pravartanāyāmasamarthā upala iva kṣurataikṣṇyaṃ kuṇṭhamapramāṇībhavantīti aniyojyaviṣayatvāditi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2579: asāmarthye tu na kartṛtāyato nādhikṛto 'to na niyojya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2580: yadi virodhābhānna vidhivacanāni, kimarthāni tarhi vacanānyetāni
GSP33brsvbh1u:2585: anyataḥ prāptā eva hi śravaṇādayo vidhisarūpairvākyairanūdyante /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2588: ātmaśravaṇādividhisarūpaistu vacanairmanaso viṣayasrotaḥ khilīkṛtya pratyagātmasrota udghāṭyata iti pravṛttiviśeṣakaratā anuvādānāmastīti saprayojanatayā svādhyāyavidhyadhīnagrahaṇatvamupapadyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2590: svato 'sya puruṣārthatve siddhe yadanuṣṭhānānaṅgatvaṃ tadbhūṣaṇaṃ na dūṣaṇamityāha-yadapīti
GSP33brsvbh1u:2600: 'yadi hi padānāṃ kāryābhidhāne tadanvitasvārthābhidhāne vā, niyamena vṛddhavyavahārātsāmarthvamabadhṛtaṃ bhavet, na bhavedaheyānupādeyabhūtabrahmātmatāparatvamupaniṣadām /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2602: atha tu bhūte 'pyarthe padānāṃ loke śakyaḥ saṃgatigrahastata upaniṣadāntatparatvaṃ paurvāparyaparyālocanayāvagamyamānamapahṛtya na kāryaparatvaṃ śakyaṃ kalpayitum, śrutahānyaśrutakalpanāprasaṅgāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2603: tatra tāvadevamakāryer'the na saṃgatigrahaḥ, yadi tatparaḥ prayogo na loke dṛśyeta, tatpratyayo vā vyutpannasyonnetuṃ na śakyete /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2604: na tāvattatparaḥ prayogo na dṛśyate loke /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2611: tathā hyaviditārthadeśajanabhāṣārtho draviḍo nagaragamanodyato rājamārgābhyarṇaṃ devadattamandiramadhyāsīnaḥ pratipannajanakānandanibandhanaputrajanmā vārttāhāreṇa saha nagarasthadevadattābhyāśamāgataḥ paṭavāsopāyanārpaṇapuraḥsaraṃ diṣṭyā vardhase devadatta putraste jātaiti vārttāhāravyāhāraśravaṇasamanantaramupajātaromāñcakañcukaṃ vikasitanayanotpalamatismeramukhamahotpalamavalokya
GSP33brsvbh1u:2613: na cāyamapratipādayan harṣahetumarthaṃ harṣāya kalpata ityanena harṣaheturartha ukta iti pratipadyate
GSP33brsvbh1u:2614: harṣahetvantarasya cāpratīteḥ putrajanmanaśca taddhetoravagamāttadeva vārttāhāreṇābhyadhāyīti niścinoti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2617: evaṃ ca brahmasvarūpajñānasya paramapuruṣārthahetubhāvādanupadiśatāmapi puruṣapravṛttinivṛttī vedāntānāṃ puruṣahitānuśāsanācchāstratvaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2620: yadyadviṣayapramājanakaṃ tattadviṣayaṃ, yathā rūpādiviṣayaṃ cakṣurādi,tathā caitāni,tasmāttatheti
GSP33brsvbh1u:2622: upanipūrvātsaderviśaraṇārthātkvipyupaniṣatpadaṃ vyutpāditam, upanīya advayaṃ brahma savāsanāmavidyāṃ hinastīti brahmavidyāmāha /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2626: ata eva kriyārahitatvāccaturvidhadravyavilakṣaṇaḥ ataśca caturvidhadravyavilakṣaṇopeto 'yamananyaśeṣaḥ, anyaśeṣaṃ hi bhūtaṃ dravyaṃ cikīrṣitaṃ sadutpattyādyāpyaṃ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2631: upaniṣadāmanārabhyādhītānāṃ paurvāparyaparyālocanayā puruṣapratipādanaparatvena puruṣasyaiva prādhānyenedaṃ prakaraṇam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2633: ataḥ svaprakaraṇasthaḥ so 'yaṃ tathāvidha upaniṣadbhyaḥ pratīyamāno na nāstīti śakyo vaktumityarthaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:2635: mānāntarogocaratvenāgṛhītasaṃgatitayā apadārthasya brahmaṇo vākyārthatvānupapatteḥ kathamupaniṣadarthatetyata āha-sa eṣa neti netyātmetyātmaśabdāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2636: yadyapi gavādivanmānāntaragocaratvamātmano nāsti, tathāpi prakāśātmana eva
GSP33brsvbh1u:2637: satastattadupādhiparihāṇyā śakyaṃ vākyārthatvena nirūpaṇam, hāṭakasyeva kaṭakakuṇḍalādiparihāṇyā
GSP33brsvbh1u:2638: nahi prakāśaḥ svasaṃvedano na bhāsate,nāpi tadavacchedakaḥ kāryakaraṇasaṃghātaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2639: tena 'sa eṣa neti netyātmā'iti tattadavacchedaparihāṇyā bṛhattvādāpanācca svayaṃprakāśaḥ śakyo vākyāt brahmeti cātmeti ca nirūpayitumityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2644: na hi jātu rajjvabhāve rajjvāṃ bhujaṅga iti vā dhāreti vā vibhramo dṛṣṭapūrvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2645: api cātmānaḥ prakāśasya bhāsā prapañcasya prabhā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2646: tathā ca śrutiḥ 'tameva bhāntamanubhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2647: na cātmanaḥ prakāśasya pratyākhyāne prapañcaprathā yuktā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2650: sarvajanīnāhaṃpratyayaviṣayo hyātmā kartā bhoktā ca saṃsārī, tatraiva ca laukikaparīkṣakāṇāmātmapadaprayogāt
GSP33brsvbh1u:2651: ya eva laukikāḥ śabdāsta eva vaidikāsta eva ca teṣāmarthā ityaupaniṣadamapyātmapadaṃ tatraiva pravartitumarhati, nārthāntare tadviparīte ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2657: pāramārthikamaikyam, tathāpi tasyopahitaṃ rūpaṃ jīvaḥ,śuddhaṃ tu rūpaṃ tasya sākṣitacca mānāntarānadhigatamupaniṣadgocara iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2662: tathā ca śrutiḥ 'na vā are sarvasya kāmāya sarvaṃ priyaṃ bhavati ātmanastu kāmāya sarvaṃ priyaṃ bhavati'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2663: api cātaḥ sarveṣāmātmatvādeva na heyo nāpyupādeyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2667: tasmāddheyopādeyaviṣayau vidhiniṣedhau na tadviparītamātmatattvaṃ viṣayīkuruta iti sarvasya prapañcajātasyātmaiva tattvamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2671: yaśca paramārthāsan asau prakṛtiḥ rajjutattvamiva sarpavibhramasya vikārasya /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2674: na hi sahasramapi śilpino ghaṭaṃ paṭayitumīśata ityuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2676: puruṣa eva hi sarvasya prapañcavikārajātasya tattvam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2677: na ca puruṣasyāsti vināśo yato 'nanto vināśaḥ syādityata āha-puruṣo hi vināśahetvabhāvāditi
GSP33brsvbh1u:2679: atha mā bhūtsvarūpeṇa puruṣo heya upādeyo vā,tadīyastu kaściddharmo
GSP33brsvbh1u:2682: api cātmanaḥ paramārthasato dharmo 'pi paramārthasanniti na tasyātmavadanyathātvaṃ kāraṇaiḥ śakyaṃ kartum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2692: na hi somaśarmaṇi prakṛte tadguṇābhidhānaṃ parisaṃcaṣṭe viṣṇuśarmaṇo guṇavattām /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2695: tatrārthagrahaṇaṃ yadyabhidheyavāci tato bhūtārthānāṃ dravyaguṇakarmaṇāmānarthakyamanabhidheyatvaṃ prasajyeta,nahi te kriyārthā ityata āha-api cāmnāyasyeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2696: yadyucyeta nahi kriyārthatvaṃ kriyābhidheyatvam, api tu kriyāprayojanatvam
GSP33brsvbh1u:2697: dravyaguṇaśabdānāṃ ca kriyārthatvenaiva bhūtadravyaguṇābhidhānam, na svaniṣṭhatayā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2705: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ-na tāvatkāryārthā eva svārthe padānāṃ saṃgatigraho nānyārtha ityupapāditaṃ bhūte 'pyarthe vyutpattiṃ darśayadbhiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2709: na hi pratyekaṃ svapradhānatayā guṇapradhānabhāvarahitānāmekavākyatā dṛṣṭā
GSP33brsvbh1u:2713: ekavākyatvāya ca lakṣaṇayānvitaparatvaṃ kalpyate tādṛkprayojanābhāve tu svārthamātrābhidheyatvaṃ padānāmiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2721: tathā cārthāntarasaṃsargaparatāmātreṇa vākyārthapratyayopapattau na kāryasaṃsargaparatvaniyamaḥ padānām /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2724: nanu yadbhavyārthaṃ bhūtamupadiśyate na tadbhūtam, bhavyasaṃsargiṇā rūpeṇa tasyāpi bhavyatvādityata āha-na hi bhūtamupadiśyamānamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2725: FN: 4-bhavyasaṃsargiṇā rūpeṇa bhūtamapi bhavyamityatra kiṃ bhavyaṃ kāryamuta kriyā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2727: na tādātmyalakṣaṇaḥ saṃsargaḥkiṃ tu kāryeṇa saha prayojanaprayojanilakṣaṇo
GSP33brsvbh1u:2729: tadviṣayeṇa tu bhāvārthena bhūtārthānāṃ kriyākārakalakṣaṇa iti na bhūtārthānāṃ kriyārthatvamityarthaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:2733: na hi kriyārthaṃ bhūtamupadiśyamānamabhūtaṃ bhavati, api tu kriyānivartanayogyaṃ bhūtameva tat /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2736: bhūtaviṣayā dṛśyamānā mṛtvā śīrtvā vā na kathañcitkriyāniṣṭhatāṃ gamayitumucitāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2737: FN: 6-kāryānvayo hi na śabdārthaḥ kintu upādhiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2738: tathāhi-kartavyatātadabhāvāvagamādhīne hi pravṛttinivṛttī, tadadhīnaṃ ca prayojanaṃ, tadadhīnau vivakṣāprayogau, prayogādhīne ca vākyārthapratipattī /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2740: ato virahayyāpi kāryānvayaṃ prayogabhede bhavati bhūtaṃ vastu padavācyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2743: tathā ca vartamānāpadeśā astikriyopahitā akāryārthā apyaṭavīvarṇakādayo loke bahulamupalabhyante
GSP33brsvbh1u:2744: evaṃ kriyāniṣṭhā api saṃbandhamātraparyavasāyinaḥ,yathākasyaiva puruṣaḥiti praśne uttaraṃrājñaḥiti
GSP33brsvbh1u:2746: na hi pṛcchatā puruṣasya vā tarūṇāṃ vāstitvanāstitve pratipitsite,kiṃ tu puruṣasya svāmibhedastarūṇāṃ ca prakārabhedaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2747: praṣṭurapekṣitaṃ cācakṣāṇaḥ svāmibhedameva prakārabhedameva ca prativyakti, na punarastitvam, tasya tenāpratipitsitatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2748: upapāditā ca bhūte 'pyarthe vyutpattiḥ prayojanavati padānām /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2749: codayati-yadi nāmopadiṣṭaṃ bhūtaṅkiṃ tava-upadeṣṭuḥ śroturvā prayojanaṃsyāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2751: aprayojanaṃ ca brahma, tasyodāsīnasya sarvakriyārahitatvenānupakārakatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2755: etaduktaṃ bhavati-yadyapi brahmodāsīnam, tathāpi tadviṣayaṃ śābdajñānamavagatiparyantaṃ vidyā svavirodhinīṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:2757: api ca ye 'pi kāryaparatvaṃ sarveṣāṃ padānāmāsthiṣata, tairapi 'brāhmaṇo
GSP33brsvbh1u:2758: na hantavyaḥ', 'na surā pātavyā'ityādīnāṃ na kāryaparatā śakyā āsthātum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2759: kṛtyupahitamaryādaṃ hi kāryaṃ kṛtyā vyāptaṃ tannivṛttau nivartate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2762: viṣayaścāsya sādhyasvabhāvatayā bhāvārtha eva pūrvāparībhūto 'nyotpādānukūlātmā bhavitumarhati, na dravyaguṇau /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2767: karmaśabdāḥ-kriyāvācakā yajatyādayastebhyaḥ kriyā-apūrvaṃ pratīyeta na dravyaguṇaśabdebhya iti tadarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2768: bhāvanāvācibhyo bhāvanā, bhāva ityādibhyo nāpūrvaṃ pratīyata iti karmaśabdā ityuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2775: bhāvārthamākāṅkṣati, tallābhe kriyādvārā dravyādestadviṣayatā na yuktetyāśayaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2786: tatra saṃśayaḥ-kimaindravāyavādivākye vihitānāṃ somarasānāṃ yāgānāṃ ca yathākramaṃ soma-yāgaśabdāvanuvaditārāvuta dravyayuktasya karmaṇo vidhātārāviti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2787: tatraindravāyavādivākyeṣu dravyadevatākhyayāgarūpapratīteryāgānumānāditaratra rūpāpratīteḥ samudāyānuvāda iti prāpte rāddhāntitaṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:2791: evaṃ hi yathā somenetivākye viśiṣṭavidhirevaṃ dadhisāṃtatyavākyāni yadi dravyaguṇaviśiṣṭahomāghāravidhāyīni tarhi agnihotrādhāravākye tadvihitahomānāmāghārāṇāṃ ca samudāyāvanuvadetāṃ tathāsati tadadhikaraṇabhedo na saṃgacchediti śaṅkā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2796: tatsaṃnidhau śrutasya sāṃtatyasya dadhyādivākyasya viśiṣṭavidhitve gauravaprasaṅgena, tadvihitabhāvārthānuvādena guṇavidhānārthatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2797: naitāvatā dadhyādivākye bhāvārthaviṣayaṃ kāryaṃ virudhyata ityabhyupagamaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:2801: tatra dravyaguṇayoḥ kāryaṃ prati sākṣādaviṣayatve.pi bhāvārthaṃ pratyanubandhatayā vidhīyetetyarthaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:2802: phyadyapyatrāpi bhāvārthaviṣayameva kāryaṃ, tathāpi bhāvārthānubandhatayā dravyaguṇāvaviṣayāvapi vidhīyete /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2804: bhāvārtho hi kārakavyāpāramātratayāviśiṣṭaḥ kārakaviśeṣeṇa dravyādinā viśeṣyata iti dravyādistadanubandhaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:2805: tathā ca bhāvārthe vidhīyamāne sa eva sānubandho vidhīyata iti dravyaguṇāvaviṣayāvapi tadanubandhatayā vihitau bhavataḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2807: agnihotrādivākyaṃ ca tadanuvādaḥ syāt, tatrāha-eva ceti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2808: ayamāśayaḥ-yadyapyatra viśiṣṭo vidhiḥ pratīyate tathāpi bhāvārthadvārā dravyādikamapi viṣayīkaroti
GSP33brsvbh1u:2809: tatra saṃkrānto yadi bhāvārthamanyato vihitaṃ na labheta tarhi gauravamapyuparīkṛtya viśiṣṭaṃ vidadhītātha labheta tata upapadākṛṣṭaśaktirdravyādiparo bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2812: evaṃ ca bhāvārthapraṇālikayā dravyādisaṃkrānto vidhirgauravādbibhyatsvaviṣayasya cānyataḥ prāptatayā tadanuvādena tadanubandhībhūtadravyādiparo bhavatīti sarvatra bhāvārthaviṣaya eva vidhiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2815: NOTE 5-saṃbandhasya bhāvanāvacchedakatvena vidheyatvaṃ śaṅkate-nanvityādinā, saṃbandha evāsya viṣaya ityantena saṃdarbeṇa /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2816: nanu na bhavatyartho vidheyaḥsiddhe bhavitari labdharūpasya bhavanaṃ pratyakartṛtvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2820: sa ca vyāpāro bhāvanā, kṛtiḥ, prayatna itinirviṣayaścāsāvaśakyapratipattirato viṣayāpekṣāyāmāgneyaśabdopasthāpito
GSP33brsvbh1u:2824: nanu vyāpāraviṣayaḥ puruṣaprayatnaḥ kathamavyāpārarūpaṃ saṃbandhaṃ gocarayet /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2825: na hi ghaṭaṃ kurvityatrāpi sākṣānnāmārthaṃ ghaṭaṃ puruṣaprayatno gocarayatyapi tu daṇḍādi hastādinā vyāpārayati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2826: tasmādghaṭārthāṃ kṛtiṃ vyāpāraviṣayāmeva puruṣaḥ pratipadyate, na tu rūpato ghaṭaviṣayām
GSP33brsvbh1u:2827: uddeśyatayā tvasyāmasti ghaṭo na tu viṣayatayā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2831: ityādivākyena yāgo vidhīyate tasmāt 'ya evaṃ vidvān paurṇamāsīṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:2832: yajate'ityanuvāde yajata iti śrutaṃ, anyathā saṃbandha eva śrūyetetyarthaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:2836: evāgneya ityatrāpi dravyadevatāsaṃbandhākṣipto yajireva kāryaviṣayo vidheyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2837: kimuktaṃ bhavati, āgneyo bhavatītiḥāgneyena yāgena bhāvayediti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2838: ata eva 'ya evaṃ vidvān paurṇamāsyāṃ yajate' 'ya evaṃ vidvānamāvāsyāṃ yajate'ityanuvādo bhavati 'yadāgneyaḥ'ityādivihitasya yāgaṣaṭkasya /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2841: ata eva ca vihitānūditasya tasyaiva 'darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ svargakāmo
GSP33brsvbh1u:2846: tathā ca 'na hanyāt' 'na pibet'ityādiṣu yadi kāryamabhyupeyeta,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2848: evaṃ ca prajāpativratanyāyena paryudāsavṛttyāhananāpānasaṃkalpalakṣaṇayā tadviṣayo vidhiḥ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2849: NOTE 10-evaṃ niyogakṛtidhātvarthānāṃ vyāpyavyāpakatvamuktvā vyāpakanivṛttyā vyāpyanivṛttimāha-tathāca prasajyeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2851: na ca sati saṃbhave lakṣaṇā nyāyyā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2855: ekasmiṃśca vākye upasahārasya prakramādhīnatvādākhyātayogināpi nañā pratīto niṣedho 'nanuṣṭheyatvādupekṣyate tataścānīkṣaṇasaṃkalpalakṣaṇā yuktā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2860: tasmāt 'na hanyāt', 'na pibet'ityādiṣu prasajyapratiṣedheṣu bhāvārthābhāvāttadvyāptāyāḥ kṛterabhāvaḥ,tadabhāve ca tadvyāptasya kāryasyābhāva iti na kāryaparatvaniyamaḥ sarvatra vākye ityāha-brahmaṇo na hantavya ityevamādyā iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2861: nanu kasmānnivṛttireva kāryaṃ na bhavati, tatsādhanaṃ vetyata āha-na ca sā kriyeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2868: na ca rāgataḥ pravṛttasya hananapānādāvakasmādaudāsīnyamupapadyate vinā vidhārakaprayatnamtasmātsa eva pravṛttyunmukhānāṃ manovāgdehānāṃ vidhārakaḥ prayatno niṣedhavidhigocaraḥ kriyeti nākriyāparamasti vākyaṃ kiñcidapīti āha-na ca hananakriyānivṛttyaudāsīnyavyatirekeṇa nañaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:2870: kena hetunā na śakyamityata āha-svabhāvaprāptahantyarthānurāgeṇa nañaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2871: NOTE 2-kimiha vidheyaṃ, hananādi vā nañartho vā vidhārakaprayatno veti
GSP33brsvbh1u:2873: ayamarthaḥ-hananapānaparo hi vidhipratyayaḥ pratīyamānaste eva vidhatte ityutsargaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2874: na caite śakye vidhātum, rāgataḥ prāptatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2875: na ca nañaḥ prasajyapratiṣedho vidheyaḥ, tasyāpyaudāsīnyarūpasya siddhatayā prāptatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2876: na ca vidhārakaḥ prayatnaḥ, tasyāśrutatvena lakṣyamāṇatvāt, sati saṃbhave ca lakṣaṇāyā anyāyyatvāt, vidhivibhakteśca rāgataḥ prāptapravṛttyanuvādakatvena vidhiviṣayatvāyogāt tasmādyatpibeddhanyādvetyanūdya tanneti niṣidhyate, tadabhāvo jñāpyate,na
GSP33brsvbh1u:2878: NOTE 3-nanu nañarthaścenna vidhīyate tarhi hananaṃ nāstītyādāviva siddhatayā pratīyetetyāśaṅkyāha-abhāvaśceti
GSP33brsvbh1u:2881: siddhavat, sādhye ca sādhyavadbhāsata iti sādhyaviṣayo nañarthaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:2882: sādhyavadbhāsata iti nañarthaḥ kārya iti bhramaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2884: nanu bodhayatu saṃbandhino 'bhāvaṃ nañpravṛttyunmukhānāṃ tu manovāgdehānāṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:2892: ityādivacanaśravaṇasamanantaraṃ prayojyavṛddhasya pathyāśane pravṛttiṃ bhujaṅgāṅgulidānonmukhasya ca tato nivṛttimupalabhya bālo vyutpitsuḥ prayojyavṛddhasya pravṛttinivṛttihetū icchādveṣāvanumimīte tathā hi-icchādveṣahetuke vṛddhasya pravṛttinivṛttī svatantrapravṛttinivṛttitvāt, madīyasvatantrapravṛttinivṛttivat
GSP33brsvbh1u:2900: api tu bhūyobhūyaḥ svagatamālocayata uktakāraṇapūrvāveva pratyavabhāsete /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2901: tasmādvṛddhasya svatantrapravṛttinivṛttī icchādveṣabhedau ca kartavyataikārthasamaveteṣṭāniṣṭasādhanabhāvāvagamapūrvāvityānupūrvyā siddhaḥ kāryakāraṇābhāva itīṣṭāniṣṭasādhanatāvagamātprayojyavṛddhapravṛttinivṛttī iti siddham sa cāvagamaḥ prāgabhūtaḥ śabdaśravaṇānantaramupajāyamānaḥ śabdaśravaṇahetuka iti pravartakeṣu vākyeṣu 'yajeta'ityādiṣu śabda eva kartavyamiṣṭasādhanaṃ vyāpāramavagamayaṃstasyeṣṭasādhanatāṃ kartavyatāṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:2903: yatra tu kartavyatānyata eva labhyate, yathā 'na hanyāt', 'na
GSP33brsvbh1u:2904: pibet'ityādiṣu, hananapānapravṛttyo rāgataḥ pratilambhāt, tatra tadanuvādena nañsamabhivyāhṛtā
GSP33brsvbh1u:2911: tayā khalvayaṃ cetana āpātato ramaṇīyatāṃ paśyannapyāyatimālocya pravṛttyabhāvaṃ nivṛttimavabudhya nivartate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2926: na ca kavacāpagame ca asati ca śastraprahāre, rājanyajīvanāśa iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2941: satyaṃ, na brahmajñānamātraṃ sāṃsārikadharmanivṛttikāraṇam, api tu sākṣātkāraparyantam
GSP33brsvbh1u:2947: atraiva sukhaduḥkhānutpādabhedena nidarśanadvayamāha-na hi dhanina iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2954: yatpunaraśarīratvaṃ tadasya svabhāva iti na śakyaṃ nivartayitum,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2957: na mithyājñānanimittaṃ saśarīratvam api tu dharmādharmanimittam,tacca
GSP33brsvbh1u:2959: tannivṛttau ca prāyaṇameveti na jīvato 'śarīratvamiti śaṅkate-tatkṛteti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2963: vāgbuddhiśarīrārambhajanitau hi tau nāsati śarīrasaṃbandhe bhavataḥ,tābhyāṃ tu śarīrasaṃbandhaṃ rocayamāno vyaktaṃ parasparāśrayatvaṃ doṣamāvahati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2965: yadyucyeta satyamasti parasparāśrayaḥ, na tveṣa doṣo 'nāditvāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:2969: na hi yato dharmādharmabhedādātmaśarīrasaṃbandhabhedastata eva sa dharmādharmabhedaḥ kintveṣa pūrvasmādātmaśarīrasaṃbandhātpūrvadharmādharmabhedajanmanaḥ,eṣa
GSP33brsvbh1u:2976: ye tu dehādāvātmābhimāno na mithyā, api tu gauṇaḥ, māṇavakādāviva siṃhābhimāna iti manyante, tanmatamupanyasya dūṣayati-atrāhuriti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2977: prasiddho vastubhedo yasya puruṣasya sa tathoktaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2980: sāṃśayikau puruṣaśabdapratyayau sthāṇuviṣayau,tatra hi puruṣatvamaniyatamapi samāropitameva
GSP33brsvbh1u:2983: śuklabhāsvarasya dravyasya puraḥsthitasya sati śuktikārajatasādhāraṇye yāvadatra rajataviniścayo bhavati tāvatkasmācchuktiviniścaya eva na bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:2995: jīvato viduṣo 'śarīratve ca śrutismṛtī udāharati-tathā ceti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3006: atha kasmānmananādividhireva na bhavatītyata āha-yadi hyavagatamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3007: na tāvanmanananididhyāsane pradhānakarmaṇī apūrvaviṣaye amṛtatvaphale ityuktamadhastāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3009: NOTE 1-guṇakarma hi kvacidupayokṣyamāṇaśeṣarūpaṃ, kathā havane upayokṣyamāṇavrīhīṇāṃ 'vrīhīnavahanti'ityavaghātaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:3020: itarathā tu dharmajijñāsaiveti na śāstrāntaramiti na śāstrārambhatvaṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:3022: na kevalaṃ siddharūpatvādbrahmātmaikyasya dharmādanyatvamapi tu tadvirodhādapītyupasaṃhāravyājenāha-tasmādahaṃ brahmāsmīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3025: te ca sādhyasādhanetikartavyatābhedādhiṣṭhānā dharmotpādinaśca tadadhiṣṭhānā na brahmātmaikye sati prabhavanti, virodhādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3026: na kevalaṃ dharmapramāṇasya śāstrasyeyaṃ gatiḥ, api tu sarveṣāṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:3036: yathā svaduḥkhena duḥkhī, yathā svasukhena sukhī, tathā putrādigatenāpīti so 'yaṃ guṇaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:3039: dehendriyādiṣu tvabhedānubhavānna gauṇa ātmābhimānaḥ,kiṃ tu śuktau rajatajñānavanmithyā, tadevaṃ dvividho 'yamātmābhimāno lokayātrāṃ vahati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3040: tadasattve tu na lokayātrā, nāpi brahmātmaikatvānubhavaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3052: etaduktaṃ bhavati-eṣa hi vibhāgo 'dvaitasākṣātkārakāraṇam, tato niyamena prāgbhāvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3054: na ca pramāturātmano 'nveṣṭavya ātmānya ityāha-anviṣṭaḥ syātpramātaiva pāpmadoṣādivarjitaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:3062: etaduktaṃ bhavati-pāramārthikaprapañcavādibhirapi dehādiṣvātmābhimāno mithyeti vaktavyam, pramāṇabādhitatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3066: yastu sākṣātkāro bhāvikaḥ, nāsau kāryaḥ, tasya brahmasvarūpatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3067: avidyā tu yadyavidyāmucchindyājjanayedvā, na tatra kācidanupapattiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3068: tathā ca śrutiḥ-'vidyāṃ cāvidyāṃ ca yastadvedobhayaṃ saha /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3082: atra ca vipratipatteḥ pravādināṃ viśeṣānupalambhe sati saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3092: na ca jñānakriye cidātmani staḥ, tasyāpariṇāmitvādekatvācca /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3094: yadyapi ca sāmyāvasthāyāṃ pradhāne samudācaradvṛttinī kriyājñāne na staḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3096: tathā ca pradhānameva sarvajñaṃ ca sarvaśakti ca /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3101: bhogāpargalakṣaṇapuruṣārthadvayaprayuktānādipradhānapuruṣasaṃyoganimit tastu mahadahaṅkārādikrameṇācetanasyāpi cetanānadhiṣṭhitasya pradhānasya pariṇāmaḥ sargaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3110: tatteja aikṣata ityādyupacāraprāye kṣutam tadaikṣata ityaupacārikameva vijñeyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3111: anena jīvenātmanānupraviśya nāmarūpe vyākaravāṇi iti ca pradhānasya jīvātmatvaṃ jīvārthakāritayāha
GSP33brsvbh1u:3112: yathā hi bhadraseno rājārthakārī rājñā bhadraseno mamātmetyupacaryate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3113: evaṃ tattvamasi ityādyāḥ śrutayo bhāktāḥ saṃpattyarthā vā draṣṭavyāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3114: svamapīto bhavati iti ca niruktaṃ jīvasya pradhāne svakīye 'pyayaṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:3118: vṛttīnāmanyāsāṃ pramāṇādīnāmabhāvastasya pratyayakāraṇaṃ tamastadālambamā nidrā jīvasya vṛttirityarthaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:3122: tasmādacetanaṃ pradhānaṃ jagadupādānamanuvadanti śrutaya iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:3127: sattvasaṃpattyā cedasya sarvajñatātha tamaḥsaṃpattyāsarvajñataivāsya kasmānna bhavatītyata āha-tena ca sattvadharmeṇa jñāneneti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3130: yatkhalu sātiśayaṃ tatkvacinniratiśayaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ, yathā kuvalāmalakabilveṣu,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3135: etaduktaṃ bhavati-yadyapi rajastamasī api staḥ tathāpi puruṣārtaprayuktaguṇavaiṣamyātiśayātsattvasya niratiśayotkarṣe sārvajñyaṃ kāryamutpadyata iti pradhānavasthāyāmapi tanmātraṃ vivakṣitvāvivakṣitvā ca tamaḥkāryaṃ pradhānaṃ sarvajñamupacaryata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3137: nahi kiñcidekaṃ kāryaṃ janayedapi tu bahūni /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3138: cidātmā caikaḥ, pradhānaṃ tu triguṇamiti tata eva kāryamutpattimarhati, na cidātmana ityarthaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:3139: tavāpi ca yogyatāmātreṇaiva cidātmanarḥ vajñatābhyupagamo na
GSP33brsvbh1u:3147: nāmarūpaprapañcalakṣaṇakāryadarśanādetatkāraṇamātravaditi sāmānyakalpanāyāmasti pramāṇaṃ, na tu tadacetanaṃ cetanamiti vā viśeṣakalpanāyāmastyanumānamityupariṣṭātpravedayiṣyate tasmānnāmarūpaprapañcakāraṇabhedapramāyāmāmnāya eva bhagavānupāsanīyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3149: jagadbījaṃ tadeveṣṭaṃ cetane ca sa āñjasaḥ //
GSP33brsvbh1u:3160: pārthivatve tulya iva maṇerbimbodgrāhitā na loṣṭādīnām /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3162: nanvata evāsya nekṣitṛtvaṃ, nityasya jñānasvabhāvabhūtasyekṣaṇasyākriyātvena brahmaṇastatprati
GSP33brsvbh1u:3164: akriyānimittasya ca kārakatvanivṛttau tadvyāptasya tadviśeṣasya kartṛtvasya nivṛtteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3165: satyaṃ, brahmasvabhāvaścaitanyaṃ nityatayā na kriyā, tasya tvanavacchinnasya tattadviṣayopadhānamedāvacchedena
GSP33brsvbh1u:3167: tathā caivaṃlakṣaṇa īkṣaṇe sarvaviṣaye brahmaṇaḥ svātantryalakṣaṇaṃ kartṛtvamupapannam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3168: yadyapi ca kūṭasthanityasyāpariṇāmina audāsīnyamasya vāstavaṃ tathāpyanādyanirvacanīyavidyāvacchinnasya vyāpāravattvabhavabhāsata iti kartṛtvopapattiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3169: parairapi ca cicchekteḥ kūṭasthanityāyā vṛttīḥ prati
GSP33brsvbh1u:3172: svayamevācetanāni, tadvṛttayaśca khaṃ vā paraṃ vā veditumutsahante /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3173: no khalvandhāḥ sahasramapi pānthāḥ panthānaṃ vidanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3174: cakṣuṣmatā caikena cedvedyate, sa eva tarhi mārgadarśī svatantraḥ kartā
GSP33brsvbh1u:3176: evaṃ buddhisattvasya svayamacetanasya citibimbasaṃkrāntyā cedāpannaṃ caitanyasya jñātṛtvaṃ, citireva jñātrī svatantrā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3182: sarvathā bhavanmate 'pi nedaṃ svābhāvikaṃ kvacidapi jñātṛtvaṃ, api tu sāṃvyavahārikameveti paramārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3183: nityasyātmano jñānaṃ pariṇāma iti ca bhedābhedapakṣamapākurvadbhirapāstam
GSP33brsvbh1u:3184: kūṭasthasya nityasyātmano 'vyāpāravata eva bhinnaṃ jñānaṃ dharma iti copariṣṭādapākariṣyate
GSP33brsvbh1u:3185: tasmādvastuto 'navacchinnaṃ caitanyaṃ tattvānyatvābhyāmanirvacanīyāvyākṛtavyācikīrṣitanāmarūpaviṣayāvacchinnaṃ sajjñānaṃ kāryaṃ, tasya kartā īśvaro jñātā sarvajñaḥ sarvaśaktiriti
GSP33brsvbh1u:3187: tathā ca śrutiḥ-'tapasā cīyate brahma tato 'nnamabhijāyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3188: annātprāṇo manaḥ satyaṃ lokāḥ karmasu cāmṛtam //
GSP33brsvbh1u:3195: vyācikīrṣāyāṃ copacaye sati tato nāmarūpamannamadanīyaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ saṃsāriṇāṃ vyācikīrṣitamabhijāyate
GSP33brsvbh1u:3196: tasmādavyākṛtādvyācikīrṣitādannātprāṇo hiraṇyagarbho brahmaṇo jñānakriyāśaktyadhiṣṭhānaṃ jagatsūtrātmā sādhāraṇo jāyate, yathāvyākṛtāt vyācikīrṣitātpaṭādavāntarakāryaṃ dvitantukādi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3199: tebhyaśca satyākhyebhyo 'nukrameṇa lokāḥ bhūrādayaḥ teṣu manuṣyādiprāṇino varṇāśramakrameṇa karmāṇi dharmādharmarūpāṇi jāyante /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3204: yasya bhagavato jñānamayaṃ tapo dharmo nāyāsamayam, tasmādbrahmaṇaḥ pūrvasmādetatparaṃ kāryaṃ brahma /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3205: kiñca nāmarūpamannaṃ ca vrīhiyavādi jāyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3208: mumukṣoścāyathārthopadeśānupapatteḥ, muktivirodhitvāt, tejaḥprabhṛtīnāṃ ca mukhyāsaṃbhavenopacārāśrayaṇasya yuktisiddhatvāt, saṃśaye ca tatprāyapāṭhasya niścāyakatvāt, iha tu mukhyasyautsargikatvena niścaye sati saṃśayābhāvāt, anyathā kirātaśatasaṃkīrṇadeśanivāsino brāhmaṇāyanasyāpi kirātatvāpatteḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3209: brahmaivekṣitranādyanirvācyāvidyāsacivaṃ jagadupādānaṃ, śuktiriva samāropitasya rajatasya, marīcaya iva jalasya, evaścadramā iva dvatīyasya
GSP33brsvbh1u:3213: na ca pradhānaṃ paramāṇavo vā tadatiriktasarvajñeśvarādhiṣṭhitā jagadupādānamiti sāṃprataṃ kāryatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3214: kāraṇātkāryāṇāṃ bhedābhāvāt kāraṇajñānena samastakāryaparijñānasya mṛdādinidarśanenāgamena prasādhitatvāt, bhede ca tadanupapatteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3216: samṛtyumāpnotiḥityādibhirbrahmātiriktasya prapañcasya pratiṣedhācetanopādānameva jagat, bhujaṅga ivāropito rajjūpādāna iti siddhāntaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3217: sadupādānatve hi siddhe jagatastadupādānaṃ cetanamacetanaṃ veti saṃśayya mīmāṃsyeta /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3224: yadyapyākāśādyā bhūtasṛṣṭistathāpi tejo 'bannānāmeva trivṛtkaraṇasya vivakṣitatvāttatra tejasaḥ prāthamyāttejaḥ prathamamuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3227: tadyathā-prācī pratīcī dakṣiṇodīcīti catasraḥ kalā brahmaṇaḥ prakāśavānnāma prathamaḥ pādaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:3229: tathā pṛthivyantarīkṣaṃ dyauḥ samudra ityaparaścatasraḥ kalā dvitīyaḥ pādo 'nantavānnāma
GSP33brsvbh1u:3230: tathāgniḥ sūryaścandramā vidyuditi catasraḥ kalāḥ, sa jyotiṣmānnāma tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3231: prāṇaścakṣuḥ śrotraṃ vāgiti catasraḥ kālāḥ, sa caturthaṃ āyatanavānnāma
GSP33brsvbh1u:3236: na cāvivakṣitārthasya dhātusvarūpasya cetanopādānasādhanatvasaṃbhava ityata āha-īkṣateriti dhātvarthanirdeśo 'bhimataḥ, viṣayiṇāṃ viṣayalakṣaṇāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3242: sāmudācaradvṛtti tāvanna bhavati sattvaṃ, guṇavaiṣamya prasaṅgena sāmyānupapatteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3243: na cāvyaktena rūpeṇa jñānamupayujyate, rajastamasostatpratibandhasyāpi sūkṣmeṇa rūpeṇa sadbhāvādityarthaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:3244: apica caitanyapradhānavṛttivacano jānātirna cācetane vṛttimātre dṛṣṭacaraprayoga ityāha-apica nāsākṣiketi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3245: kathaṃ tarhi yogināṃ sattvāśotkarṣahetukaṃ sarvajñatvamityata āha-yogināṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:3247: sattvāṃśotkarṣo hi yogināṃ caitanyacakṣuṣmatāmupakaroti, nāndhasya pradhānasyetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3248: yadi tu kāpilamatamapahāya hairaṇyagarbhamāsthīyeta tatrāpyāha-atha punaḥ sākṣinimittamiti
GSP33brsvbh1u:3249: teṣāmapi hi prakṛṣṭasattvopādānaṃ puruṣaviśeṣasyaiva kleśakarmavipākāśayāparāmṛṣṭasya sarvajñatvaṃ, na tu pradhānasyācetanasya
GSP33brsvbh1u:3252: cetanyasya śuddhasya nityatve 'pyupahitaṃ sadanityaṃ kāryaṃ, ākāśamiva ghaṭāvacchinnamityabhisaṃdhāya pariharati-idaṃ tāvadbhavāniti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3255: kiṃ vāstavaṃ karmābhāvamabhipretya vaiṣamyamāha bhavān uta tadvivakṣābhāvam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3256: tatra yadi tadvivakṣābhāvaṃ, tadā prakāśayatītyanena mā bhūtsāmyaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3259: atha ca prakāśasvabhāvaṃ pratyasti svātantryaṃ savituriti pariharati-na /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3265: yāsāṃ sati karmaṇyavivakṣite śrutīnāmupapattistāsāṃ sati karmaṇi vivakṣite sutarāmityarthaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:3267: yasya bhagavata īśvarasya prasādāt tasya nityasiddhasyeśvarasya nityaṃ jñānaṃ bhavatīti kimu vaktavyamiti yojanā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3278: na tasya kāryamāvaraṇādyapagamo vidyate, anāvṛttatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3284: anātmani vyomni ghaṭādyupādhikṛto bhavatvavacchedakavibhramaḥ, na tu ātmani svabhāvasiddhaprakāśe sa ghaṭata ityata āha-dṛśyate cātmana eva sata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3293: śaṅkottaratvena vā svātantryeṇa vā pradhānanirākaraṇārthaṃ sūtram /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3297: brahmaiva jñīpsitaṃ, tacca na prathamaṃ sūkṣmatayā śakyaṃ śvetaketuṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:3298: grāhayitumiti tatsaṃbaddhaṃ pradhānameva sthūlatayātmatvena grāhyate śvetaketurarundhatīmivātīva sūkṣmāṃ darśayituṃ tatsaṃnihitāṃ sthūlatārakāṃ darśayatīyamasāvarundhatīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3305: api ca jagatkāraṇaṃ prakṛtya svapitītyasya niruktaṃ karvitī śrutiścetanameva jagatkāraṇaṃ brūte /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3308: nahi mṛdātmā ghaṭa ātmīye 'pi pāthasi pralīyate 'pi tvātmabhūtāyāṃ mṛdyeva /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3315: yathā hi tārkikāṇāṃ samayabhedeṣu parasparaparāhatārthatā, naivaṃ vedānteṣu parasparaparāhṛtiḥ, api tu teṣu sarvatra jagatkāraṇacetanyāvagatiḥ samāneti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3317: yathā hi sarveṣāṃ cakṣū rūpameva grāhayati, na punā rasādikaṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:3322: 'tadaikṣata'ityatra īkṣaṇamātraṃ jagatkāraṇasya śrutaṃ na tu sarvaviṣayam
GSP33brsvbh1u:3323: jagatkāraṇasaṃbandhitayā tu tadarthātsarvaviṣayamavagataṃ, śvetāśvatarāṇāṃ tūpaniṣadi sarvajña īśvaro jagatkāraṇamiti sākṣāduktamiti viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3325: brahma jijñāsitavyamiti hi pratijñātaṃ, tacca śāstraikasamadhigamyaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3326: śastraṃ ca sarvajñe sarvaśaktau jagadutpattisthitipralayakāraṇaṃ brahmaṇyeva pramāṇaṃ na pradhānādāviti nyāyato vyutpāditam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3327: na cāsti kaścidvedāntabhāgo yastadviparītamapi bodhayediti ca
GSP33brsvbh1u:3333: yadyapi tatvato nirastasamastopādhirūpaṃ brahma tathāpi na tena rūpeṇa śakyamupadeṣṭumityupahitena rūpeṇopadeṣṭavyamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3339: tathā gatisāmānyamapi siddhavaduktaṃ, na tvadyāpi sādhitamiti
GSP33brsvbh1u:3343: kathaṃ ca phalabhedaṃ ityata āha-eka eva tviti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3346: nanu yadyeka ātmā kūṭasthanityo niratiśayaḥ sarvabhūteṣu gūḍhaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3347: kathametasmin bhūtāśraye tāratamyaśrutayā ityata āha-yadyapyeka ātmeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3348: yadyapi niratiśayamekameva rūpamātmana aiśvaryaṃ ca jñānaṃ cānandaśca,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3353: yathottamaprakāśaḥ savitā diṅmaṇḍalamekarūpeṇaiva prakāśenāpūrayannapi varṣāsu nikṛṣṭaprakāśa iva śaradi tu prakṛṣṭaprakāśa iva prathate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3365: 'ānandamaya iti hi vikāre prācurye ca mayaṭastulyaṃ mukhyārthatvamiti vikārārthānnamayādipadaprāyapāṭhādānandamayapadamapi
GSP33brsvbh1u:3367: na ca prāṇamayādiṣu vikārārthatvāyogātsvārthiko mayaḍiti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3368: prāṇādyupādhyavacchinno hyātmā bhavati prāṇādivikārāḥ, ghaṭākāśamiva ghaṭavikārāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3371: priyādibhāgī śarīro jīvo na brahma yujyate //
GSP33brsvbh1u:3372: 'na ca sarvāntaratayā brahmaivānandamayaṃ, na jīva iti sāṃpratam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3376: nahi devadatto balavānityukte sarvānsiṃhaśārdūlādīnapi prati balavānapratīyate 'pi tu samānajātīyanarāntaramapekṣya
GSP33brsvbh1u:3378: na ca niṣkalasya brahmaṇaḥ priyādyavayavayogaḥ, nāpi śarīratvaṃ yujyata
GSP33brsvbh1u:3380: tasmādupahitamevātropāsyatvena vivakṣitaṃ, na tu brahmarūpaṃ jñeyatveneti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3381: api ca yadi prācuryārtho 'pi mayaṭ, tathāpi saṃsāryevānandamayaḥ;na tu brahma /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3382: ānandaprācurya hi tadviparītaduḥkhalavasaṃbhave bhavati na tu tadatyantāsaṃbhave /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3383: na ca paramātmano manāgapi duḥkhalavasaṃbhavaḥ, ānandaikarasatvādityāha-na
GSP33brsvbh1u:3385: aśarīrasya punarapriyasaṃbandho manāgapi nāstīti prācuryārtho 'pi mayaḍ nopapadyayata ityarthaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:3387: ānandamayāvayavasya tāvadbrahmaṇaḥ pucchasyāṅgatayā na prādhānyaṃ, api tvaṅgina ānandamayasyaiva brahmaṇaḥ prādhānyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3388: tathāca tadadhikāre paṭhitamabhyasyamānamānandapadaṃ tadbuddhimādhatta iti tasyaivānandamayasyābhyāsa iti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3389: jyotiṣṭomādhikāre 'vasante vasante jyotiṣā yajeta'iti jyotiḥpadamiva jyotiṣṭomābhyāsaḥ kālaviśeṣavidhiparaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:3401: mantre hi punaḥ punaḥ 'anyo 'ntara ātmā'iti parabrahmaṇyāntaratvaśravaṇāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3405: māntravarṇikameva paraṃ brahma brāhmaṇe 'pyānandamaya iti gīyata iti
GSP33brsvbh1u:3408: syām'iti ca sṛjyamānānāṃ sraṣṭurānandamayādabhedaśravaṇāt, ānandamayaḥ para evetyāha /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3414: rasaḥ sāro hyayamānandamaya ātmā 'rasaṃ hyevāyaṃ labdhvā'nandī bhavati'iti
GSP33brsvbh1u:3415: so 'yaṃ jīvātmano labdhṛbhāvaḥ, ānandamayasya ca labhyatā, nābheda upapadyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3416: tasmādānandamayasya jīvātmano bhede parabrahmatvaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3418: yadi labdhvā na labdhavyaḥ, kathaṃ tarhi paramātmano vastuto 'bhinnena
GSP33brsvbh1u:3423: jīvo hyavidyayā parabrahmaṇo bhinno darśitaḥ, na tu jīvādapi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3424: tathā cānandamayaścejjīvaḥ, na jīvasyāvidyayāpi svato bhedo darśita iti na labdhṛlabdhavyabhāva ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3427: yathā parameśvarādbhinno jīvātmā draṣṭā na bhavatyevaṃ jīvātmano 'pi
GSP33brsvbh1u:3428: draṣṭurna bhinnaḥ parameśvara iti jīvasyānirvācyatve parameśvaro
GSP33brsvbh1u:3431: rajataṃ hi samāropitaṃ na śuktito bhidyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3432: na hi tadbhedenābhedena vā śakyaṃ nirvaktum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3439: eṣa tāvadutsargo yat-'brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭheti brahmaśabdātpratīyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3442: prayogāt, ihāpyavayavaparatvātpucchapadasya tatsamānādhikaraṇaṃ brahmapadamapi svārthatyāgena kathañcidavayavaparaṃ vyākhyāyātām /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3446: ānandapadābhyāsena ca jyotiḥ padeneva jyotiṣṭoma anandamayo lakṣyatāṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3447: utānandamayapadaṃ vikārārthamastu, brahmapadaṃ ca brāhmaṇyeva svārthe
GSP33brsvbh1u:3452: pucchapadaṃ hi vāladhau mukhyaṃ sadānandamayāvayave gauṇameveti mukhyaśabdārthalaṅghanamavayavaparatāyāmadhikaraṇaparatāyāṃ ca tulyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3457: api cānandamayapadasya brahmārthatve, 'brahma puccham'iti na samañjasam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3465: tathā ca māntravarṇikasya brahmaṇa eva brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā iti
GSP33brsvbh1u:3467: 'so 'kāmayeta'ityādyā api śrutayo brahmaviṣayā na ānandamayaviṣayā ityarthasaṃkṣepaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3473: etaduktaṃ bhavati-ānandamaya ityādivākye yat 'brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā'iti
GSP33brsvbh1u:3475: yattu brahmādhikaraṇamiti vaktavye 'brahma puccham'ityāha śrutiḥ, tatkasya
GSP33brsvbh1u:3481: avayavavacanatve tvasya mantre prādhānyaṃ, brāhmaṇe tvaprādhānyamityupāyopeyayormantrabrāhmaṇayorvipratipattiḥ syāditi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3483: atra 'itaścānandamayaḥ'iti bhāṣyasya sthāne 'itaśca brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā'iti paṭhitavyam
GSP33brsvbh1u:3485: atrāpi 'itaścānandamayaḥ'ityasya ca 'ānandamayādhikāre'ityasya ca bhāṣyasya sthāne 'brahma pucchaṃ pratiṣṭhā'iti 'brahmapucchādhikāre'iti ca paṭhitavyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3490: vikārasyānandamayasya brahma pucchamavayavaścetkathaṃ sarvasyāsya vikārajātasya sānandamayasya brahma pucchaṃ kāraṇamucyeta 'idaṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:3493: nahyānandamayavikārāvayavo brahma vikāraḥ san sarvasya kāraṇamupapadyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3494: tasmādānandamayavikārāvayavo brahmeti tadavayavayogyānandamayo vikāra iha nopāsyatvena vivakṣitaḥ, kintu svapradhānamiha brahma pucchaṃ jñeyatveneti siddham // 19//
GSP33brsvbh1u:3499: 'pāstasamastaviśeṣabrahmapratipattyarthamupāyatāmātreṇa pañca kośā upādhayaḥ sthitāḥ, natu vivakṣitāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3502: saṃprati tu brahma vivakṣitopādhimupasyatvenopakṣipyate, natu vidyākarmātiśayalabdhotkarṣo jīvātmādityapadavedanīya iti nirṇīyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3507: devakāmānāṃ ca'ityaiśvaryamaryādāśruteśca saṃsāryeva kāryakāraṇasaṃghātātmako rūpādisaṃpanna ihopāsyaḥ, natu paramātmā 'aśabdamasparśam'ityādiśrutibhiḥ apāstasamastarūpaśca, 'sve
GSP33brsvbh1u:3510: sarvapāpmavirahaścādityapuruṣe saṃbhavati, śāstrasya manuṣyādhikāratayā devatāyāḥ puṇyupāpayoranadhikārāt
GSP33brsvbh1u:3511: rūpādimattvānyathānupapattyā ca kāryakāraṇātmake jīve upāsyatvena vivakṣite yattāvadṛgādyātmakatayāsya sarvātmakatvaṃ śrūyate tatkathañcidādityapuruṣasyaiva stutiriti ādityapuruṣa evopāsyo na paramātmetyevaṃ prāptam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3512: anādhāratve ca nityatvaṃ sarvagatatvaṃ ca hetuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3513: anityaṃ hi kāryaṃ kāraṇādhāramiti nānādhāraṃ, nityamapyasarvagataṃ ca yattasmādadharabhāvenāsthitaṃ tadeva tasyottarasyādhāra iti nānādhāraṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3519: na cādityasya devatāyāḥ karmānadhikāre 'pi sarvapāpmavirahaḥ prāgbhavīyadharmādharmarūpapāpmasaṃbhave sati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3520: na caiteṣāṃ prāgbhavīyo dharma evāsti na pāpmeti sāṃpratam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3524: naca vinigamanāhetvabhāvaḥ, tatra tatra sarvapāpmavirahasya bhūyobhūyo brahmaṇyeva śravaṇāt
GSP33brsvbh1u:3530: rūpavattvaṃ cāsya parānugrahāya kāyanirmāṇena vā, tadvikāratayā vā sarvasya kāryajātasya, vikārasya ca vikāravato
GSP33brsvbh1u:3532: naca brahmanirmitaṃ māyārūpamanuvadacchāstramaśāstraṃ bhavati, apitu tāṃ kurvat iti māśāstratvaprasaṅgaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:3533: yatra tu brahma nirastasamastopādhibhedaṃ jñeyatvenopakṣipyate, tatra
GSP33brsvbh1u:3537: api cādityadehābhimāninaḥ saṃsāriṇo 'ntaryāmī bhedenoktaḥ, sa evāntarāditya ityantaḥśrutisāmyena pratyabhijñāyamāno bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3551: tatra 'ākāśa iti hovāca'iti kiṃ mukhyakāśapādānurodhena 'asya lokasya kā gatiḥ'iti, 'sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtāni'iti 'jyāyā'itica 'parāyaṇam'iti ca
GSP33brsvbh1u:3556: 'asya lokasya kā gatiḥ'iti praśnottare 'ākāśa iti hovāca'ityākāśasya
GSP33brsvbh1u:3557: gatitvena pratipādyatayā prādhānyāt, 'sarvāṇi ha vā'ityādīnāṃ tu tadviśeṣaṇatayā guṇatvāt, 'guṇe tvanyāṭyakalpanā'iti bahūnyapyapradhānāni pradhānānurodhena netavyāni /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3559: tena tadanuraktāyāṃ buddhau yadyadeva tadekavākyagatamupanipatati tattajjaghanyatayā upasaṃjātavirodhi tadānuguṇyenaiva vyavasthānamarhati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3560: naca kkacidākāśaśabdo bhaktyā brahmaṇi prayukta iti sarvatra tena tatpareṇa bhavitavyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3561: nahi gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityatra gaṅgapadamanupapattyā tīraparamiti yādāṃsi gaṅgāyāmityatrāpyanena tatpareṇa bhavitavyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3563: naca brahmaṇyapyākāśaśabdo mukhyaḥ, anaikārthatvasyānyāyyatvāt, bhaktyā ca brahmaṇi prayogadarśanopapatteḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:3564: loke cāsya nabhasi nirūḍhatvāt, tatpūrvakatvācca vaidikārthapratītervaiparītyānupapatteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3565: tadānuguṇyena ca 'sarvāṇi ha vā'ityādīni bhāṣyakṛtā svayameva nītāni /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3573: tadiha, 'asya lokasya kā gatiḥ'iti praśno dṛśyamānanāmarūpaprapañcamātragativiṣaya iti tadanurodhādya eva sarvasya
GSP33brsvbh1u:3575: naca bhūtākāśaḥ sarvasya lokasya gatiḥ, tasyāpi lokamadhyapātitvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3577: na cottare bhūtākāśaśravaṇādbhūtākāśakāryameva pṛṣṭamiti yuktaṃ, praśnasya prathamāvagatasyānupajātavirodhino lokasāmānyaviṣayasyopajātavirodhinottareṇa saṃkocānupapattestadanurodhenottaravyākhyānāt naca praśnena pūrvapakṣarūpeṇānavasthitārthenottaraṃ vyavasthitārthaṃ na śakyaṃ niyantumiti
GSP33brsvbh1u:3581: tathāhi-'sarvāṇi ha vā imāni bhūtānyakāśādeva samutpadyante'iti
GSP33brsvbh1u:3584: na khalvapāmākāśa eva kāraṇamapi tu tejo 'pi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3585: evamannasyāpi nākāśameva kāraṇamapi tu pāvakapāthasī api /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3591: tasmātsarveṣāṃ lokānāmiti praśnenopakramāt, uttare ca tattadasādhāraṇabrahmaguṇaparāmarśāt pṛṣṭāyāśca gateḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:3597: tathāca tadarthaṃ sat ākāśapadaṃ pradhānārthaṃ bhavati, nānyathā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3601: na cākāśaśabdo gauṇo 'pi vilambitapratipattiḥ, tatra tatra brahmaṇyākāśaśabdasya tatparyāyasya
GSP33brsvbh1u:3602: prayogaprācuryādatyantābhyāsenāsyāpi mukhyavatpratipatteravilambanāditi darśanārthaṃ brahmaṇi prayogaprācuryaṃ vaidikaṃ nidarśitaṃ bhāṣyakṛtā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3603: tatraiva ca prathamāvagatānuguṇyenottaraṃ nīyate, yatra tadanyathā kartuṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:3605: yatra tu na śakyaṃ tatrottarānuguṇyenaiva prathamaṃ nīyata
GSP33brsvbh1u:3609: udgīthe-'yā devatā prastāvamanvāyattā'ityupakramya śrūyate-'katamā sā devateti prāṇa iti hovāca'uṣastiścākrāyaṇaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:3611: prastāva iti sāmno bhaktiviśeṣastamanvāyattā anugatā prāṇo devatā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3612: atra prāṇaśabdasya brahmaṇi vāyuvikāre ca darśanātsaṃśayaḥ-kimayaṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:3614: tatra ata eva brahmaliṅgādeva prāṇo 'pi brahmaiva na vāyuvikāra iti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3618: 'brahmaṇo vāsarvabhūtakāraṇatvaṃ, ākāśasya vā vāyvādibhūtakāraṇatvaṃ prati nāgamādṛte mānāntaraṃ prabhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3619: tatra paurvāparyaparyālocanayā yatrārthe samañjasa āgamaḥ sa evārthastasya
GSP33brsvbh1u:3621: iha tu saṃveśanodgamane bhūtānāṃ prāṇaṃ pratyucyamāne kiṃ brahma pratyucyete āho vāyuvikāraṃ pratīti viśaye 'yadā vai puruṣaḥ svapiti
GSP33brsvbh1u:3622: prāṇaṃ tarhi vāgapyeti'ityādikāyāḥ śruteḥ sarvabhūtasārendriyasaṃveśanodgamanapratipādanadvārā sarvabhūtasaṃveśanodgamanapratipādikāyā mānāntarānugrahalabdhasāmarthyāyā balātsaṃveśanodgamane vāyuvikārasyaiva prāṇasya, na brahmaṇaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3623: api cātrodgīthapratihārayoḥ sāmabhaktyorbrahmaṇo 'nye ādityaścānnaṃ ca devate abhihite kāryakāraṇasaṃghātarūpe, tatsāhacaryātprāṇo 'pi
GSP33brsvbh1u:3629: 'no khalu svataḥsiddhapramāṇabhāvamapauruṣeyaṃ vacaḥ svaviṣayajñānotpāde vā tadvyavahāre vā mānāntaramapekṣate, tasyāpauruṣeyasya nirastasamastadoṣāśaṅkasya svata eva niścāyakatvāt, niścāyakatvāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3631: tasmādasaṃvādino vā cakṣuṣa iva rūpe tvagindriyasaṃvādino vā tasyaiva dravye nādārḍhyaṃ vā dārḍhyaṃ vā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3634: pratītau vā tatrāpi prāṇo brahmaiva bhavenna vāyuvikāraḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3635: 'yadā suptaḥ svapnaṃ na kañcana paśyatyathāsminprāṇa evaikadhā
GSP33brsvbh1u:3637: na cāsminvāyuvikāre sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ saṃveśanodgamane mānāntareṇa dṛśyete
GSP33brsvbh1u:3642: indriyasaṃveśanodgamanaṃ tvavayutyānuvādenāpi ghaṭiṣyate, ekaṃ vṛṇīte dvau
GSP33brsvbh1u:3646: tathā copāsakasya prāṇaprāptiḥ karmasamṛddhirvā phalaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3652: idamāmananti-'atha yadataḥ paro divo jyotirdīpyate niśvataḥpṛṣṭheṣu sarvataḥ pṛṣṭheṣvanuttameṣūttameṣu lokeṣvidaṃ vāva tadyadidamasminnantaḥ puruṣe jyotiḥ'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3653: yajjyotirato divo dyulokātparaṃ dīpyate prakāśate viśvataḥpṛṣṭheṣu viśveṣāmupari /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3659: śrotragrāhyeṇa ca pihitakarṇena puṃsā ghoṣeṇa liṅgenānumīyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3660: tatra śārīrasyoṣmaṇastvacā darśanaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ, ghoṣasya ca śravaṇaṃ śrutiḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3661: tayośca dṛṣṭiśrutī jyotiṣa eva, talliṅgena tadanumānāditi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3662: atra saṃśayaḥ-kiṃ jyotiḥśabdaḥ teja uta brahmeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3669: kokṣeyajyotiḥsārūpyaṃ ca cakṣuṣyo rūpavān śruto viśruto bhavatītyalpaphalatvaṃ ca svavākye śrūyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3670: na jātu jvalanāparanāmā dīptirvinā tejo brahmaṇi saṃbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3675: audarye tu tejasyadhyasya bāhyaṃ teja upāsanametat phalānurūpaṃ yujyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3677: etadupodbalanāya ca nirastamapi maryādādhārabahutvamupanyastaṃ, iha tannirāsakāraṇābhāvāt
GSP33brsvbh1u:3678: naca maryādāvattvaṃ tejorāśerna saṃbhavati, tasya sauryādeḥ sāvayavatvena
GSP33brsvbh1u:3681: naca 'pādo 'sya sarvā bhūtāni tripādasyāmṛtaṃ divi'iti brahmapratipādakaṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:3682: vākyāntaraṃ, 'yadataḥ paro divo jyotiḥ'śabdaṃ brahmaṇi vyavasthāpayatīti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3683: nahi saṃnidhānamātradvākyāntareṇa vākyāntaragatā śrutiḥ śakyā mukhyārthāntryāvayitum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3684: naca vākyāntare 'dhikaraṇatvena dyauḥ śrutā diva iti maryādāśrutau śakyā
GSP33brsvbh1u:3686: apica vākyāntarasyāpi brahmārthatvaṃ prasādhyameva nādyāpi sidhyati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3687: tatkathaṃ tena niyantuṃ brahmaparatayā 'yadataḥ paraḥ'iti vākyaṃ śakyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3689: tejaḥkathanaprastāve tamaḥkathanaṃ pratipakṣopanyāsena pratipakṣāntare dṛḍhā pratītirbhavatītyetadartham
GSP33brsvbh1u:3700: 'ekaikāṃ trivṛtaṃ trivṛtaṃ karavāṇi'iti tejaḥprabhṛtyupāsanāmātraviṣayā śrutirna saṃkocayituṃ yuktetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3701: evamekadeśini dūṣite paramasamādhātā pūrvapakṣī brūte-astu tarhi trivṛtkṛtameveti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3703: yadyapyādhārabahutvaśrutirbrahmaṇyapi kalpitopādhinibandhanā kathañcidupapadyate, tathāpi yathā kārye jyotiṣyatiśayenopapadyate na tathātretyata uktam-upapadyetatarāmiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3708: brahmaṇyeva pradhānaṃ hi brahmacchando na tatra tu //
GSP33brsvbh1u:3711: yatra punastatprasiddhamanyato na kathañcidāpyate, tatra vacanāni tvapūrvatvāditi sarvanāmnaḥ prasiddhārthatvaṃ balādapanīyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3713: tadiha 'yadataḥ paro divo jyotiḥ'iti yacchabdasāmarthyāt dyumaryādenāpi jyotiṣā prasiddhena bhavitavyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3715: pūrvavākye ca dyusaṃbandhitayā tripādbrahma prasiddhamiti prasiddhyapekṣāyāṃ tadeva saṃbadhyate
GSP33brsvbh1u:3716: naca pradhānasya prātipadikārthasya tattvena pratyabhijñāne tadviśeṣaṇasya vibhaktyarthasyānyatāmātreṇānyatā yuktā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3717: evaṃ ca tadvākyasthāni tejoliṅgānyasamañjasānīti brahmaṇyeva gamayitavyāni, gamitāni ca bhāṣyakṛtā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3719: athavā prakāśamātravacano jyotiḥśabdaḥ prakāśaśca brahmeti brahmaṇi mukhya iti jyotirbahmeti siddham /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3721: prasiddhyapekṣāyāṃ pūrvavākyagataṃ prakṛtaṃ saṃnihitaṃ, aprasiddhaṃ tu kalpyaṃ na prakṛtam
GSP33brsvbh1u:3725: kaukṣeyaṃ hi jyotirjīvabhāvenānupraviṣṭasya paramātmano vikāraḥ, jīvābhāve dehasya śaityāt, jīvataścauṣṇyājjñāyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3729: chando 'bhidhānān neti cen na tathā ceto'rpaṇanigadāt tathā hi darśanam |
GSP33brsvbh1u:3730: pūrvavākyasya hi brahmārthatve siddhe syādetadevaṃ, natu tadbrahmārthaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3732: 'gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarvaṃ bhūtaṃ yadidaṃ kiñca'iti gāyatrīṃ prakṛtyedaṃ śrūyate-'tripādasyāmṛtaṃ divi'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3736: evaṃ 'gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarvam'ityakṣarasaṃniveśamātrasya gāyatryā na sarvatvamupapadyate
GSP33brsvbh1u:3739: tasmādgāyatrīdvārā brahmaṇa evopāsanā na gāyatryā iti pūrveṇaiva gatārthatvādanārambhaṇīyametat
GSP33brsvbh1u:3742: tathāhi-gāyatrīdvārā brahmopāsaneti kor'thaḥ, gāyatrīvikāropādhino brahmaṇa upāsaneti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3745: tasmādasya sarvātmatvādikaṃ stutyarthaṃ, tadvaraṃ gāyatryā evāstu stutiḥ kayācitpraṇāḍyā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3746: 'vāgvai gāyatrī vāgvā idaṃ sarvaṃ bhūtaṃ gāyati ca trāyate ca'ityādiśrutibhyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3747: tathāca 'gāyatrī vā idaṃ sarvam'ityupakramya gāyatryā eva hṛdayādibhirvyākhyāya ca 'saiṣā catuṣpadā ṣaḍvidhā gāyatrī'ityupasaṃhāro
GSP33brsvbh1u:3755: gāyatryākhyacchandodvāreṇa gāyatrīrūpavikārānugate brahmaṇi cetorpaṇaṃ cittasamādhānamanena brāhmaṇavākyena nigadyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3757: na gāyatrī brahmaṇo 'vacchedikā, utpalasyeva nīlatvaṃ, yena tadavacchinnatvamanyatra na syādavacchedakavirahāt
GSP33brsvbh1u:3758: kintu yadetadbrahma sarvātmakaṃ sarvakāraṇaṃ tatsvarūpeṇāśakyopadeśamiti tadvikāragāyatrīdvāreṇopalakṣyate
GSP33brsvbh1u:3759: gāyatryāḥ sarvacchandovyāptyā ca savanatrayavyāptyā ca dvijātidvitīyajanmajananīyatayā ca śrutervikāreṣu madhye prādhānyena dvāratvopapatteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3764: tadevaṃ gāyatrīśabdasya mukhyārthatve gāyatryā brahmopalakṣyata ityuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3765: saṃprati tu gāyatriśabdaḥ saṃkhyāsāmānyādgauṇyā vṛttyā brahmaṇyeva vartata iti darśayati-apara āheti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3766: tathāhi-ṣaḍakṣaraiḥ pādairyathā gāyatrī catuṣpadā, evaṃ brahmāpi catuṣpāt
GSP33brsvbh1u:3772: tathāhi śrutiḥ-'idaṃ vāva tadyo 'yaṃ bahirdhā puruṣādākāśaḥ'taddhi tasya jagaritasthānam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3774: tathā-'ayaṃ vāva sa yo 'yamantaḥ puruṣa ākāśaḥ' /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3787: bhūtapṛthivīśarīrahṛdayavākprāṇā iti ṣaṭ prakārā gāyatryākhyasya brahmaṇaḥ śrūyante /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3788: pañca brahmapuruṣā iti ca, hṛdayasuṣiṣu brahmapuruṣaśrutirbrahmasaṃbandhitāyāṃ vivakṣitāyāṃ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3789: asyārthaḥ-hṛdayasyāsya khalu pañca suṣayaḥ pañca chidrāṇi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3790: tāni ca devaiḥ prāṇādibhī rakṣyamāṇāni svargaprāptidvārāṇīti devasuṣayaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3791: tathāhi-hṛdayasya yatprāṅmukhaṃ chidraṃ tatstho yo vāyuḥ sa prāṇaḥ, tena hi prayāṇakāle saṃcarate svargalokaṃ, sa eva cakṣuḥ, sa evāditya ityarthaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:3793: atha yo 'sya dakṣiṇaḥ suṣistatstho vāyuviśeṣo vyānaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3796: atha yo 'sya pratyaṅmukhaḥ suṣistatatstho vāyuviśeṣo 'pānaḥ sa ca vāksaṃbandhādvāk, 'vāgvā agniḥ'iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3797: atha yo 'syodaṅmukhaḥ suṣistatstho vāyuviśeṣaḥ sa samānaḥ tatsaṃbaddhaṃ manaḥ tatparjanyo devatā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3798: atha yo 'syordhvaḥ suṣistatstho vāyuviśeṣaḥ sa udānaḥ pādatalādārabhyordhvaṃ nayanāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3801: tatsaṃbaddhāḥ pañca hārdasya brahmaṇaḥ puruṣā na gāyatryāmakṣarasaṃniveśamātre saṃbhavanti, kintu brahmaṇyeveti //26//
GSP33brsvbh1u:3803: upadeśabhedān neti cen nobhayasminn apy avirodhāt |
GSP33brsvbh1u:3806: yo hi śyeno vṛkṣāgre vastuto 'sti sa ca tataḥ paro 'pyastyeva /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3809: yadā tu maryādaiva mukhyatayā prādhānyena vivakṣitā tadā lakṣaṇayādhāratvaṃ vyākhyeyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3815: na vaktur ātmopadeśād iti ced adhyātmasaṃbandhabhūmā hy asmin |
GSP33brsvbh1u:3821: tatkatamadatra liṅgaṃ, liṅgābhāsaṃ ca katamadityatra vicāryate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3824: hitatamapuruṣārthasiddhiśca nikhilabhrūṇahatyādipāpāparāmarśaśca prajñātmatvaṃ cānandādiśca na mukhye prāṇe saṃbhavanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3827: vaktṛtvaṃ ca vākkaraṇavyāpāravattvaṃ yadyapi paramātmani svarūpeṇa na saṃbhavati tathāpyananyathāsiddhabahubrahmaliṅgavirodhaparihārāya jīvadvāreṇa brahmaṇyeva kathañcidvyākhyeyaṃ jīvasya brahmaṇo 'bhedāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3829: tadeva brahma tvaṃ viddhi'iti vāgvadanasya brahma kāraṇamityāha-śarīrādhāraṇamapi yadyapi mukhyaprāṇasyaiva tathāpi
GSP33brsvbh1u:3843: adhyātmasaṃbandhabhūmnaśca parācīndre 'nupapatteḥ, indrasya devatāyā ātmani pratibuddhasya caramadehasya vāmadevasyeva prarabdhavipākakarmāśayamātraṃ bhogena kṣapayato brahmaṇa eva
GSP33brsvbh1u:3844: sarvametatkalpata iti vigrahavadindrajīvaprāṇavāyuparityāgena brahmaivātra prāṇaśabdaṃ pratīyata iti pūrvapakṣābhāvādanārabhyametaditi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3845: atrocyate-'yo vai prāṇaḥ sā prajñā yā vā prajñā sa prāṇaḥ saha hyetavasmin śarīre vasataḥ sahotkrāmataḥ'iti yasyaiva prāṇasya prajñātmana
GSP33brsvbh1u:3847: naca brahmaṇyabhede dvivacanaṃ, na sahabhāvaḥ na cotkramaṇam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3858: siddhāntastu-satyaṃ padārthāvagamopāyo vākyārthāvagamaḥ, natu padārthāvagamaparāṇyeva padāni, api tvekavākyārthāvagamaparāṇi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3859: tameva tvekaṃ vākyārthaṃ padārthāvagamamantareṇa na śaknuvanti kartumityantarā tadarthameva tamapyavagamayanti, tena padāni viśiṣṭaikārthāvabodhanasvarasānyeva balavadbādhakopanipātānnānārthabodhaparatāṃ nīyante /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3861: tena yathopāṃśuyājavākye jāmitādoṣopakrame tatpratisamādhānopasaṃhāre caikavākyatvāya 'prajāpatirupāṃśu yaṣṭavyaḥ'ityādayo na pṛthagvidhayaḥ kintvarthavādā iti nirṇītaṃ, tathehāpi 'māmeva vijānīhi'ityupakramya
GSP33brsvbh1u:3872: jīvamukhyaprāṇaliṅgān neti cen nopāsātraividhyādāśritatvād iha tadyogāt |
GSP33brsvbh1u:3874: naiṣa saṃdarbho brahmavākyameva bhavitumarhatīti, kintu tathāyogaṃ kiñcidatra jīvavākyaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3877: prāṇāntarāṇīndriyāṇi, tāni hi mukhye prāṇe pratiṣṭhitāni /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3884: pañca śabdādayaḥ, pañca pṛthivyādaya iti daśa bhūtamātrāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3885: pañca buddhīndriyāṇi pañca buddhasya iti daśa prajñāmātrāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3886: tadevaṃ svamatena vyākhyāya prācāṃ vṛttikṛtāṃ matena vyācaṣṭe-athaveti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3887: pūrvaṃ prāṇasyaikamupāsanamaparaṃ jīvasyāparaṃ brahmaṇa ityupāsanātraividhyena vākyabhedaprasaṅgo dūṣaṇamuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3888: iha tu brahmaṇa ekasyaivopāsātrayaviśiṣṭasya vidhānānna vākyabheda ityabhimānaḥ prācāṃ vṛttikṛtām
GSP33brsvbh1u:3892: iha tu siddharūpaṃ brahma na vidhiviṣayo bhavitumarhati, abhāvārthatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3894: vākyāntarebhyaśca brahmavagateḥ prāptatvāttadanūdyāprāptopāsanā bhāvārtho vidheyastasya ca bhedādvidhyāvṛttilakṣaṇo vākyabhedo 'tisphuṭa iti bhāṣyakṛtā noddhāṭitaḥ, svavyākhyānenaivoktaprayatvāditi sarvaṃvadātam //31//
GSP33brsvbh1u:3895: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite bhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ prathamasyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:3899: atha dvitīyaṃ pādamāripsuḥ pūrvoktamarthaṃ smārayati vakṣyamāṇopayogitayā-prathame pāda iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3901: na caite sākṣātpūrvamupapāditā iti kathaṃ hetubhāvena na śakyā upadeṣṭumityata uktam-samastajagatkāraṇasyeti
GSP33brsvbh1u:3902: yadyapyete na pūrvaṃ kaṇṭhata uktāstathāpi brahmaṇo jagajjanmādikāraṇatvopapadānenādhikaraṇasiddhāntanyāyenopakṣiptā ityupapannasteṣāmuttaratra hetubhāvenopanyāsa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3906: tatra kaiva kathā manomayādīnāmarthāntare prasiddhānāṃ padānāṃ brahmagocaratvanirṇayaṃ pratītyabhiprāyaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:3913: yatastasmādbrahmaṇo jāyata iti tajjaṃ, tasmiṃśca līyata iti tallaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3914: tasmiṃścāniti sthitikāle ceṣṭata iti tadanaṃ jagat tasmātsarvaṃ khalvidaṃ jagadbrahma /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3915: ataḥ kaḥ kasminrajyate kaśca kaṃ dveṣṭīti rāgadveṣarahitaḥ śāntaḥ sannupāsīta /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3916: atha khalu kratumayaḥ puruṣo yathākraturasmiṃlloke puruṣo bhavati tathetaḥ pretya bhavati sa kratuṃ kurvīta manomayaḥ prāṇaśarīra ityādi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3917: tatra saṃśayaḥ-kimiha manomayatvādibhirdharmaiḥ śārīra ātmopāsyatvenopadiśyate āhosvidbrahmeti
GSP33brsvbh1u:3923: tathā ca 'sarvaṃ khalvidaṃ brahma'iti vākyaṃ prathamapaṭhitamapyarthālocanayā parameva, tadarthopajīvitvāt
GSP33brsvbh1u:3924: evaṃ ca saṃkalpavidhiḥ prathamo nirviṣayaḥ sannaparyavasyanviṣayāpekṣaḥ svayamanirvṛtto na vidhyantareṇopajīvituṃ śakyaḥ, anupapadākatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3927: manomayatvādi ca kāryakāraṇasaṃghātātmano jīvātmana eva nirūḍhamiti jīvātmanopāsyenoparaktopāsanā na paścāt brahmaṇā saṃbaddhumarhati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3932: na cānyaparādapi brahmāpekṣitatayā svīkriyata iti yuktaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:3939: evaṃ karmakartṛvyapadeśaḥ saptamīpraṇamāntatā cābhede 'pi jīvātmani kathañcidbhedopacāreṇa rāhoḥ śira itivaddraṣṭavyā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3943: tasmājjīva evopāsyatvenātra vivakṣitaḥ, na paramātmeti prāptam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3950: tathā hi prāṇaḥ śarīramasyeti sarvanāmārtho bahuvrīhiḥ saṃnihitaṃ ca sarvanāmārthaṃ saṃprāpya tadabhidhānaṃ paryavasyet /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3952: tadeva tu manovikāro vā manaḥpracuraṃ vā kimarthamityadyāpi na vijñāyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3953: tadyatraiṣa śabdaḥ samavetārtho bhavati sa samāsārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3954: na caiṣa jīva eva samavetārtho na brahmaṇīti, tasya 'aprāṇo
GSP33brsvbh1u:3956: sarvavikārakāraṇatayā, vikārāṇāṃ ca svakāraṇādabhedātteṣāṃ ca manomayatayā brahmaṇastatkāraṇasya manomayatvopapatteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3959: tatra prathamaṃ dvārasya buddhisthatvāttadevopāsyamastu, na punarjaghanyaṃ brahma /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3961: tadetadatra saṃpradhāryam-kiṃ brahmaliṅgairjīvānāṃ tadabhinnānāmastu tadvattā, tathāca jīvasya manomayatvādibhiḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:3962: prathamamavagamāttasyaivopāsyatvaṃ, uta na jīvasya brahmaliṅgavattā tadabhinnasyāpi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3963: jīvaliṅgaistu brahma tadvata, tathāca brahmaliṅgānāṃ darśanāt, teṣāṃ ca jīve 'nupapatterbrahmaivopāsyamiti
GSP33brsvbh1u:3964: vayaṃ tu paśyāmaḥ-'samāropyasya rūpeṇa viṣayo rūpavānbhavet /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3965: viṣayasya tu rūpeṇa samāropyaṃ na rūpavat //
GSP33brsvbh1u:3966: 'samāropitasya hi rūpeṇa bhujaṅgasya bhīṣaṇatvādinā rajjū rūpavatī, natu rajjūrūpeṇābhigamyatvādinā bhujaṅgo rūpavān /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3968: bhujaṅgadaśāyāṃ tu na nāsti vāstavī rajjuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3971: tasmādbrahmaliṅgadarśanājjīve ca tadasaṃbhavādbrahmaivopāsyaṃ na jīva iti siddham /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3985: yatparaṃ vedavākyaṃ tattenopāttaṃ vivakṣitam, atatpareṇa cānupāttamavivakṣitamityarthaḥ //2//
GSP33brsvbh1u:3990: yathā satyasaṃkalpatvādayo brahmaṇyupapadyante, evaṃ śārīre 'pyupapatsyante, śārīrasya brahmaṇo 'bhedāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:3991: śārīraguṇā iva manomayatvādayo brahmaṇītyata āha sūtrakāraḥ-anupapattestu
GSP33brsvbh1u:3995: arbhakaustvāt tadvyapadeśāc ca neti cen na nicāyyatvād evaṃ vyomavac ca |
GSP33brsvbh1u:3996: yattadavocāma samāropyadharmāḥ samāropaviṣaye saṃbhavanti, natu viṣayadharmāḥ samāropya iti
GSP33brsvbh1u:3999: na tāvadbhedapratiṣedhādbhedavyapadeśācca bhedābhedāvekatra tāttvikau bhavitumarhato virodhādityuktam
GSP33brsvbh1u:4006: tādṛśāṃ ca jīvānāmavidyā, natu nirūpādhino brahmaṇaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4007: na cāvidyāyāṃ satyāṃ jīvātmavibhāgaḥ, sati ca jīvātmavibhāge
GSP33brsvbh1u:4010: naca sarvajñasya sarvaśakteśca svataḥ kuto 'kasmātsaṃsāritā, yo hi paratantraḥ so 'nyena bandhanāgāre praveśyeta, natu svatantra iti vācyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4013: na caitāvatā īśvarasyānīśatā na hyupakaraṇādyapekṣitā kartuḥ svātantryaṃ vihanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4025: kaṭhavallīṣu paṭhyate-yasya brahma ca kṣatraṃ cobhe bhavata odanaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4026: mṛtyuryasyopasecanaṃ ka itthā veda yatra sa iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4028: attṛtvaṃ ca bhoktṛtā vā saharntṛtā vā syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4032: tadyadi bhoktṛtvamattṛtvaṃ tato muktasaṃśayaṃ jīvātmaiva pratipattavyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4033: brahmakṣatrādi cāsya kāryakāraṇasaṃghāto bhogāyatanatayā vā sākṣādvā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4035: atha tu saṃhartṛtā bhoktṛtā, tatastrayāṇāmagnijīvaparamātmanāṃ praśnopanyāsopalabdheḥ saṃhartṛtvasyāviśeṣādbhavati
GSP33brsvbh1u:4037: tatraudanasya bhogyatvena loke prasiddherbhoktṛtvameva prathamaṃ buddhau
GSP33brsvbh1u:4048: tatra yadi jīvasya bhogāyatanatayā tatsādhanatayā ca kāryakāraṇasaṃghātaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:4050: nahyodano bhogāyatanaṃ, nāpi bhogasādhanaṃ, api tu bhogyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4051: naca bhogāyatanasya bhogasādhanasya vā bhogyatvaṃ mukhyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4054: kasyacitkrūrasattvasya vyāghrādeḥ kaścidbhavet na tu sarvathā sarvajīvasya
GSP33brsvbh1u:4055: tena brahmakṣatraviṣayamapi sarvajīvasyāttṛtvaṃ na vyāpnoti, kimaṅga punarmṛtyūpasecanavyāptaṃ carācaram /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4058: naca lākṣaṇikabhogyatvānurodhena 'mṛtyuryasyopasecanam'iti, 'brahma ca kṣatraṃ ca'iti ca śrutī saṃkocamarhataḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4059: naca brahmakṣatre evātra vivakṣite, mṛtyūpasecanena prāṇabhṛnmātropasthāpanāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4065: tathāca 'na jāyate mriyate vā vipaścit'iti brahmaṇaḥ prakṛtasya na hānaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4066: 'ka itthā veda yatra saḥ'iti ca durjñānatopapatsyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4075: autsargikasya mukhyatābalātpūrvasiddhāntapakṣāsaṃbhavena pakṣāntaraṃ kalpayiṣyata iti manvānaḥ saṃśayamākṣipati-atrāhākṣepteti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4080: tadiha buddheracaitanyena paramātmanaśca bhoktṛtvaniṣedhena jīvātmaivaikaḥ pāda pariśiṣyata
GSP33brsvbh1u:4083: astu vā mukhya eva, tathāpi na doṣa ityāha-yadveti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4084: svātantryalakṣaṇaṃ hi kartṛtvaṃ tacca pāturiva pāyayiturapyastīti so 'pi
GSP33brsvbh1u:4086: ata eva cāhuḥ-'yaḥ kārayati sa karotyeva'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4087: evaṃ karaṇasyāpi svātantryavivakṣayā kathañcitkartṛtvaṃ, yathā kāṣṭhāni pacantīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4092: 'naca pibantāvitivatpraviṣṭapadamapi lākṣaṇikaṃ yuktaṃ, sati mukhyārthatve lākṣaṇikārthatvāyogāt, buddhijīvayośca guhāpraveśopapatteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4095: jīvo hi bhoktṛtayā buddhiśca bhogasādhanatayā dharmasya gocare sthitau, na tu brahma, tasya tadāyattatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4097: naca jīvaḥ paramātmano 'bhinnastamaḥ prakāśarūpatvāt buddhistu jaḍatayā
GSP33brsvbh1u:4099: tasmādbuddhijīvāvatra kathyete iti tatrāpi prete vicikitsāpanuttaye buddherbhedena paralokī jīvo darśanīya iti buddhirucyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4102: brahmaṇaiva sarūpeṇa na tu buddhyā virūpayā //1//
GSP33brsvbh1u:4105: gauḥ sadvitīyetyukte sajātīyenaiva gavāntareṇāvagamyate, na tu vijātīyenāśvādinā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4106: tadiha cetano jīvaḥ sarūpeṇa cetanāntareṇaiva brahmaṇā sadvitīyaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:4110: bahulaṃ hi guhāśrayatvaṃ brahmaṇaḥ śrutaya āhuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4113: evañca prathamāvagatabrahmānurodhena sukṛtalokavartitvamapi tasya lakṣaṇayā chatrinyāyena gamayitavyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4114: chāyātapatvamapi jīvasyāvidyāśrayatayā brahmaṇaśca śuddhaprakāśasvabhāvasya tadanāśrayatayā mantavyam //11//
GSP33brsvbh1u:4119: atrāpi kiṃ buddhijīvau uta jīvaparamātmānāviti saṃśayya karaṇarūpāyā api buddheredhāṃsi pacantītivatkartṛtvopacārādbuddhijīvāviha pūrvapakṣayitvā siddhāntayitavyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4121: taddarśanāditi ca 'samāne vṛkṣe puruṣo nimagnaḥ'ityatra mantre /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4122: na khalu mukhye kartṛtve saṃbhavati karaṇe kartṛtvopacāro yukta iti
GSP33brsvbh1u:4132: astu tarhyasyādhikaraṇasya pūrvapakṣe eva brāhmaṇārthaḥ, vacanavirodhe nyāyasyābhāsatvādityata āha-nāpyasyādhikaraṇasya pūrvapakṣaṃ bhajata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4133: evaṃ hi pūrvapakṣamasya bhajeta, yadi hi kṣetrajñe saṃsāriṇi paryavasyeta /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4134: tasya tu brahmarūpatāyāṃ paryavasyanna pūrvapakṣamapi svīkarotītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4136: tāvetau sattvakṣetrajñau na ha vā evaṃvidi kiñcana raja ādhvaṃsata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4142: anaśnan jīvo brahmābhicākaśītītyukte śaṅketa, yadi jīvo brahmātmanā
GSP33brsvbh1u:4143: nāśnāti, kathaṃ tarhyasminbhoktṛtvāvagamaḥ, caitanyasamānādhikaraṇaṃ hi bhoktṛtvamavabhāsata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4145: etaduktaṃ bhavati-nedaṃ bhoktṛtvaṃ jīvasya tattvataḥ, apitu buddhisattvaṃ mukhādirupapariṇataṃ citicchāyāpattyopapannacaitanyamiva bhuṅkte natu tattvato jīvaḥ paramātmā bhuṅkte /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4157: parokṣaṃ brahma na tathā pratibimbe tu yujyate //1//
GSP33brsvbh1u:4160: 'ṛtaṃ pibantau ityatra hi jīvaparamātmānau prathamamavagatāviti tadanurodhena guhāpraveśādayaḥ paścādavagatā vyākhyātāḥ, tadvadihāpi 'ya
GSP33brsvbh1u:4161: eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyate'iti pratyakṣābhidhānātprathamamavagate chāyāpuruṣe tadanurodhenāmṛtatvābhayatvādayaḥ stutyā kathañcidvyākhyeyāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4166: kaṃ ca khaṃ cetyādi tu vākyamagnīnāṃ nācāryavākyaṃ niyantumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4167: 'ācāryastu te gatiṃ vaktā'iti ca gatyantarābhiprāyaṃ, na tūktapariśiṣṭābhiprāyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4169: saṃbhavamātreṇa tu jīvadevate upanyaste, bādhakāntaropadarśanāya caiṣa dṛśyata ityasyātrābhāvāt
GSP33brsvbh1u:4174: 'saṃnihitāśca puruṣātmādiśabdāste ca na yāvatsvārthamabhidadhati tāvatsarvanāmabhyāṃ nārthatuṣo 'pyabhidhīyata iti kutastadarthasyāparokṣatā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4175: puruṣātmaśabdau ca sarvanāmanirapekṣau svarasato jīve vā paramātmani vā vartete iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4176: naca tayoṣcakṣuṣi pratyakṣadarśanamiti nirapekṣapuruṣapadapratyāyitārthānurodhena ya eṣa iti dṛśyata iti ca yathāsaṃbhavaṃ vyākhyeyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4178: viduṣaḥ śāstrata upalabdireva dṛḍhatayā pratyakṣavaduparyate praśaṃsārthamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4179: api ca tadeva caramaṃ prathamānuguṇatayā nīyate yannetuṃ śakyam, alpaṃ ca /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4182: tathā sati kiṃ nāma nāmṛtaṃ syāditi vyarthamamṛtapadam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4188: nanu sarvagatasyeśvarasya kasmādviśiṣeṇa cakṣureva sthānamupadiśyata iti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4198: sa eva puṇyaphalāni vāmāni nayati lokamiti vāmanīḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4201: taduktaṃ śrutyā-'tameva bhāntamanubhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti'iti //13//
GSP33brsvbh1u:4207: sthānino hi sthānaṃ mahadvṛṣṭaṃ, yathā yādasāmabdhiḥ /
