GSP33brsvbh1u:4208: tatkathamatyalpaṃ cakṣuradhiṣṭhānaṃ paramātmanaḥ paramamahata iti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4210: sthānānyādayo yeṣāṃ te sthānādayo nāmarūpaprakarāsteṣāṃ vyapadeśātsarvagatasyaikasthānaniyamo nāvakalpate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4212: viśeṣatastu brahmaṇastāni tānyupāsanāsthānānīti tairasya yukto vyapadeśaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:4215: apica prakṛtānusārādapi brahmaivātra pratyetavyaṃ, natu pratibimbajīvadevatā ityāha sūtrakāraḥ-sukhaviśiṣṭābhidhānādeva ca /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4216: evaṃ khalūpākhyāyate-upakosalo ha vai kāmalāyanaḥ satyakāme jābāle brahmacaryamuvāsa /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4223: brahmavidyāmūcire-'prāṇo brahma kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahma'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4224: athopakosala uvāca, vijānāmyahaṃ prāṇo brahmeti, sa hi sūtrātmā
GSP33brsvbh1u:4226: kintu kaṃ ca khaṃ ca brahmetyetanna vijānāmi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4227: nahi viṣayendriyasaṃparkajaṃ sukhamanityaṃ lokasiddhaṃ khaṃ ca bhūtākāśamacetanaṃ brahma bhavitumarhati
GSP33brsvbh1u:4228: athainamagnayaḥ pratyūcuḥ-'yadvāva kaṃ tadeva khaṃ yadeva khaṃ tadeva
GSP33brsvbh1u:4231: punasta enaṃ saṃbhūyocuḥ, eṣā somya te 'smadvidyā pratyekamuktā svaviṣayā vidyā, ātmavidyā cāsmābhiḥ saṃbhūya pūrvamuktā prāṇo brahma kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahmeti, ācāryastu te gatiṃ vaktā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4232: brahmavidyeyamuktāsmābhirgatimātraṃ tvavaśiṣṭaṃ noktaṃ, tattu vidyāphalaprāptaye jābālastavācāryo vakṣyatītyuktvāgnaya uparemire /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4233: evaṃ vyavasthite 'yadvāva kaṃ tadeva khaṃ yadeva khaṃ tadeva
GSP33brsvbh1u:4240: laukikasya sukhasya sādhanapāratantryaṃ kṣayiṣṇutā cāmayastena saha vartata iti sāmayaṃ sukham
GSP33brsvbh1u:4243: sukhaśabdasamānādhikaraṇo hi khaṃśabdo bhūtākāśamarthaṃ parityajya brahmaṇi guṇayogena vartate
GSP33brsvbh1u:4244: tādṛśā ca khena sukhaṃ viśiṣyamāṇaṃ sāmayādvyāvṛttaṃ nirāmayaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4247: brahmapadaṃ kaṃpadasyopari prayujyamānaṃ śiraḥ, evaṃ khaṃpadasyāpi brahmapadaṃ śiro yayoḥ kaṅkhaṃpadayoste brahmaśirasī, tayorbhāvo brahmaśirastvam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4248: astu prastute kimāyātamityata āha-tadevaṃ vākyopakrama iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4250: tadevānuvartanīyamiti tu kuta ityāha-ācāryastu te gatiṃ vakteti ca gatimātrābhidhānamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4251: yadyapyete bhinnavaktṛṇī vākye tathāpi pūrveṇa vaktrā ekavākyatāṃ gamite,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4254: gatirnoktā, tāṃ ca kiñcidadhikamādhyeyaṃ pūrayitvācāryo vakṣyatīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4257: vīkṣyopakosalamuvāca, brahmavida iva te somya mukhaṃ prasannaṃ bhāti, ko
GSP33brsvbh1u:4259: upakosalastu hrīṇo bhītaśca ko nu māmanuśiṣyāt bhagavan proṣite tvayītyāpātato 'pajñāya nirbadhyamāno yathāvadagnīnāmanuśāsanamavocat /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4260: tadupaśrutya cācāryaḥ suciraṃ kliṣṭa upakosale samupajātadayārdrahṛdayaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:4261: pratyuvāca, somya kila tubhyamagnaye na brahma sākalyenāvocan, tadahaṃ tubhyaṃ sākalyena vakṣyāmi, tadanubhavamāhātmyāt 'yathā puṣpakarapalāśa āpo na śliṣyanta evamevaṃvidi pāpaṃ karma na śliṣyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4262: ityevamuktavatyācārya āhopakosalaḥ, bravītu me bhagavāniti, tasmai hovācācāryo 'rcirādikāṃ gatiṃ vaktumanāḥ, yaduktamagnibhiḥ prāṇo brahma
GSP33brsvbh1u:4263: kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahmeti tatparipūraṇāya 'eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyate'ityādi
GSP33brsvbh1u:4264: etaduktaṃ bhavati-ācāryeṇa ye sukhaṃ brahmākṣisthānaṃ saṃyadvāmaṃ vāmanībhāmanītyevaṅguṇakaṃ prāṇasahitamupāsate te sarve 'pahatapāpmāno
GSP33brsvbh1u:4265: 'nyatkarma kurvantu mā vākārṣuḥ, arciṣamarcirabhimāninīṃ devatāmabhisaṃbhavanti pratipadyante, arciṣo 'harahardevatāṃ, ahna āpūryamāṇapakṣaṃ śuklapakṣadevatāṃ, tataḥ ṣaṇmāsān, yeṣu māseṣūttarāṃ diśameti savitā te ṣaṇmāsā uttarāyaṇaṃ taddevatāṃ pratipadyante, tebhyo māsebhyaḥ saṃvatsaradevatāṃ, tata ādityaṃ, ādityāccandramasaṃ, candramaso
GSP33brsvbh1u:4269: sa tādṛśaḥ puruṣa etānsatyalokasthaṃ kāryaṃ brahma gamayati, sa eṣa devapatho devairarcirādibhirnetṛbhirupalakṣita iti devapathaḥ, sa eva ca
GSP33brsvbh1u:4270: brahmaṇā gantavyenopalakṣita iti brahmapathaḥ, etena pathā pratipadyamānāḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:4271: satyalokasthaṃ brahma imaṃ mānavaṃ manoḥ sargaṃ kiṃbhūtamāvartaṃ janmajarāmaraṇapaunaḥ punyamāvṛttistatkartāvarto mānavo lokastaṃ nāvartante /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4272: tathāca smṛtiḥ-'brahmaṇā saha te sarve saṃprāpte pratisaṃcare /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4283: vijñānātmano hi na pradeśe upāsanānyatra dṛṣṭacarī, brahmaṇastu tatra śrutapūrvetyarthaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:4292: pravṛttiniyamalakṣaṇaṃ hi kāryaṃ cetanasya śarīriṇaḥ svaśarīrendriyādau vā śarīreṇa vā vāsyādau dṛṣṭaṃ nāśarīrasya brahmaṇo bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4295: tasmātparamātmanaḥ śarīrendriyādirahahitasyāntaryāmitvābhāvāt, pradhānasya vā pṛthivyādyabhimānavatyā devatāyā vāṇimādyaiśvaryayogino yogino vā jīvātmano vāntaryāmitā syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4298: śrutānāmabhāvāt, anātmatvācca 'eṣa ta ātmā'iti śruteranupapatterna pradhānasyāntaryāmitā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4299: yadyapi pṛthivyādyabhimānino devasyātmatvamasti, adṛṣṭatvādayaśca saha dṛṣṭṛtvādibhirupapadyante, śarīrendriyādiyogācca, 'pṛthivyeva
GSP33brsvbh1u:4300: yasyāyatanamagnirloko mano jyotiḥ'ityādiśruteḥ, tathāpi tasya pratiniyataniyamanāt 'yaḥ sarvaṃllokānantaro yamayati yaḥ sarvāṇi bhūtānyantaro yamayati'iti śrutivirodhādanupapatteḥ, yogī tu yadyapi
GSP33brsvbh1u:4301: lokabhūtavaśitayā sarvāṃllokānsarvāṇi ca bhūtāni niyantumarhati tatra tatrānekavidhadehendriyādinirmāṇena 'sa ekadhā bhavati tridhā
GSP33brsvbh1u:4305: tasmātpāriśeṣyājjīva eva cetano dehendriyādimān dṛṣṭṛtvādisaṃpannaḥ svayamadṛśyādiḥ svātmani vṛttivirodhāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4308: 'ya ātmani tiṣṭhan'iti cābhede 'pi kathañcidbhedopacārāt 'sa bhagavaḥ kasminpratiṣṭhitaḥ sve mahimni'itivat /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4311: yadi punarātmano 'pi niyantūranyo niyantā bhavet veditā vā tatastasyāpyanya ityanavasthā syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4313: tadupārjitau hi dharmādharmau niyacchata ityanayā dvārā jīvo niyacchati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4323: tathāca sarvaṃ vikārajātaṃ tadavidyāśaktipariṇāmastasya śarīrendriyasthāne vartata iti yathāyathaṃ pṛthivyādidevatādikāryakaraṇaistāneva pṛthivyādidevatādīñchaknoti niyantum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4325: nahi niyantrantaraṃ tena niyamyate, kintu yo jīvo niyantā lokasiddhaḥ sa
GSP33brsvbh1u:4332: bhavati, 'yaḥ sarvāṃllokān' 'yaḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni'ityatra ya ityekavacanamupapadyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4334: 'ya ātmani tiṣṭhan'ityādau cābhede 'pi bhedopacārakleśo na bhaviṣyati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4371: na jātu rajjvāṃ kuñjara iti viparyasyanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4374: tasmātpradhānameva jaḍaṃ jaḍasya jagato yoniriti yujyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4380: ato yaḥ pradhānātparaḥ paramātmā sa sarvavit /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4382: atha tasyāprāmāṇikatvānna tatra parituṣyati, astu tarhi nāmarūpabījaśaktibhūtamavyākṛtaṃ bhūtasūkṣmaṃ, pradhīyate hi tena
GSP33brsvbh1u:4390: sati bādhake 'syānāśrayaṇaṃ, iha tu bādhakaṃ nāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4392: iha tvavidyāśaktereva jagadyonitvasaṃbhave na dvārādvāribhāvo yayukta iti pradhānamevātra vākye jagadyonirucyata iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4393: atha yoniśabdo nimittakāraṇaparastathāpi brahmaiva nimittaṃ na tu jīvātmeti vinigamanāyāṃ na heturastīti saṃśayena pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4396: yaḥ sarvajña iti śrutyā sarvajñasya sa ucyate //1//
GSP33brsvbh1u:4402: yattu sārūpyābhāvānna cidātmanaḥ pariṇāmaḥ prapañca iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4406: na khalu bāhyasārūpyanibandhana eva sarvo vibhrama iti niyamanimittamasti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4410: tasmāt paramātmavivartatayā prapañcastadyoniḥ, bhujaṅga iva rajjuvivartatayā tadyoniḥ, na tu tatpariṇāmatayā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4412: brahmaivopadiśyate jñeyatvena, natu pradhānaṃ jīvātmā vopāsyatveneti siddham /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4413: na kevalaṃ liṅgādapi tu 'parā vidyā'iti samākhyānādapyetadeva
GSP33brsvbh1u:4417: avacchinno hi jīvātmā bhogyebhyo viṣayebhyo vyatirikta iti tajjñānena na sarvaṃ jñātaṃ bhavati
GSP33brsvbh1u:4423: rūpyante 'neneti rūpaṃ, yajño rūpamupādhiryeṣāṃ te yajñarūpāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4425: ṛtuyajanenopādhinā ṛtvikśabdaḥ pravṛtta iti yajñopādhaya ṛtvijaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4428: ta ete 'ṣṭādaśa yajñarūpāḥ, yeṣvṛtvigādiṣūktaṃ karma yajñaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4440: kimāgamikaṃ sāṃkhyābhimataṃ pradhānaṃ, tathāca bahusamañjasaṃ syādityata
GSP33brsvbh1u:4450: saṃnidheśca prakaraṇaṃ balīya iti jāyamānaparityāgena viśvayonereva prakaraṇino rūpābhidhānamiti cet na, prakaraṇinaḥ śarīrendriyādirahitasya vigrahavattvavirodhāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4451: na caitāvatā mūrdhādiśrutayaḥ prakaraṇavirodhātsvārthatyāgena sarvātmatāmātraparā iti yuktam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4453: siddhe ca prakaraṇināsaṃbandhe jāyamānamadhyapātitvaṃ jāyamānagrahaṇe kāraṇamupanyastaṃ bhāṣyakṛtā
GSP33brsvbh1u:4454: tasmāddhiraṇyagarbha eva bhagavān prāṇātmanā sarvabhūtāntaraḥ kāryo nirdiśyata iti sāṃpratam
GSP33brsvbh1u:4460: śabdādibhyo 'ntaḥpratiṣṭhānāc ca neti cen na tathā dṛṣṭyupadeśād
GSP33brsvbh1u:4463: prācīna śālasatyayajñendradyumnajanabuḍilāḥ sametya mīmāṃsāṃ cakruḥ-ko na ātmā kiṃ brahmeti
GSP33brsvbh1u:4464: ātmetyukte jīvātmani pratyayo mā bhūdata uktaṃ kiṃ brahmeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4465: te ca mīmāṃsamānā niścayamanadhigacchantaḥ kaikeyarājaṃ vaiśvānaravidyāvidamupaseduḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4470: prāṇo vāyuḥ pṛthagvartmātmā pṛthak vartma yasya vāyoḥ sa pṛthagvartmā sa evātmā svabhāvo yasya sa pṛthagvartmātmā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4471: saṃdeho dehasya madhyabhāgaḥ sa ākāśo bahulaḥ sarvagatatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4472: bastireva rayiḥ āpaḥ, yato 'dbhyo 'nnamannācca rayirdhanaṃ tasmādāpo rayiruktāstāsāṃ ca mūtrībhūtānāṃ bastiḥ sthānamiti bastireva rayirityuktam
GSP33brsvbh1u:4474: tadevaṃ vaiśvānarāvayaveṣu dyusūryānilākāśajalāvaniṣu mūrdhacakṣuḥprāṇasaṃdehabastipādeṣvekaikasmina vaiśvānarabuddhyā viparītatayopāsakānāṃ prācīnaśālādīnāṃ mūrdhapātāndhatvaprāṇotkramaṇadehaśīrṇatābastibhedapādaślathībhāvadūṣḥaṇairupāsanānāṃ nindayā mūrdhādisamastabhāvamupadiśyāmnāyate-'yastvetamevaṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:4476: sa sarveṣu lokeṣu dyupabhṛtiṣu, sarveṣu bhūteṣu sthāvarajaṅgameṣu,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4486: nanu 'ko na ātmā kiṃ brahma'ityupakrame ātmabrahmaśabdayoḥ paramātmani rūḍhatvena taduparaktāyāṃ buddhau vaiśvānarāgnyādayaḥ śabdāstadanurodhena paramātmanyeva kathañcinnetuṃ yujyante natu prathamāvagatau brahmātmaśabdau caramāvagatavaiśvānarādipadānurodhenānyathayituṃ yujyete yadyapi ca vājasaneyināṃ vaiśvānaravidyopakrame 'vaiśvānaraṃ ha vai bhagavān saṃprati veda taṃ no brūhi'ityatra nātmabrahmaśabdau staḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4487: tathāpi tatsamānārthaṃ chāndogyavākyaṃ tadupakramamiti tena niścitārthena tadavirodhena vājasaneyivākyārtho niścīyata /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4492: naca sarvapāpmapradāha iti pāriśeṣyātparamātmaiva vaiśvānara iti niścite kutaḥ punariyamāśaṅkā-śabdādibhyo 'ntaḥ pratiṣṭhānānneti cediti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4495: api cāntaḥpratiṣṭhatatvaṃ ca prādeśamātratvaṃ ca na sarvavyāpino
GSP33brsvbh1u:4502: athavā agniśarīrāyā devatāyā aiśvaryayogāt dyumūrdhatvādaya upapadyanta iti śaṅkiturabhisaṃdhiḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:4506: na tvatra caramasyānanyathāsiddhiḥ, pratīkopadeśena vā mano brahmetivat,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4507: tadupādhyupadeśena vā manomayaḥ prāṇaśarīro bārūpa itivadupapatteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4509: tathāca brahmāśrayasya pratyayasyāśrayāntare jāṭharavaiśvānarāhvaye kṣepeṇa vā jāṭharavaiśvānaropādhini vā brahmaṇyupāsye vaiśvānaradharmāṇāṃ brahmadharmāṇāṃ ca samāveśa upapadyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4510: asaṃbhavāditi sūtrāvayavaṃ vyācaṣṭe-yadi ceha parameśvaro na vivakṣyeteti
GSP33brsvbh1u:4511: puruṣamapi cainamadhīyata iti sūtrāvayavaṃ vyācaṣṭe-yadi ca kevala eveti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4514: ata eva yatpuruṣa iti puruṣamanūdya na vaiśvānaro vidhīyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4516: evaṃ ca parameśvaradṛṣṭirhi jāṭhare vaiśvānara ihopadiśyata iti bhāṣyaṃ virudhyeta /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4518: 'sa yo haitamevamagniṃ vaiśvānaraṃ puruṣaṃ puruṣavidhaṃ puruṣe
GSP33brsvbh1u:4521: tasmāt 'sa eṣo 'gnirvaiśvānaro yat'iti yadaḥ pūrveṇa saṃbandhaḥ, puruṣa iti tu tatra puruṣadṛṣṭerupadeśa iti yuktam //24// // 25 // // 26 //
GSP33brsvbh1u:4523: ata eva na devatā bhūtaṃ ca |
GSP33brsvbh1u:4524: ata eva na devatā bhūtaṃ ca /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4526: 'yo bhānunā pṛthivīṃ dyāmutemām'iti mantravarṇo 'pi na kevalauṣṇyaprakāśavibhavamātrasya bhūtāgnerimamīdṛśaṃ mahimānamāha, api tu brahmavikāratayā tādrūpyeṇeti bhāvaḥ //27//
GSP33brsvbh1u:4530: yadetatprakṛtaṃ mūrdhādiṣu cubukānteṣu puruṣāvayaveṣu dyuprabhṛtīnpṛthivīparyantāṃstrailokyātmano vaiśvānarasyāvayavān saṃpādya puruṣavidhatvaṃ kalpitaṃ tadabhiprāyeṇedamucyate 'puruṣavidhaṃ puruṣe
GSP33brsvbh1u:4553: saṃpatter iti jaiminis tathā hi darśayati |
GSP33brsvbh1u:4566: iti śrīvācaspatimiśraviracite śārīrakamīmaṃsābhāṣyavibhāge bhāmatyāṃ prathamasyaḥādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //2//
GSP33brsvbh1u:4576: 'pārāvāramathyapātī hi setuḥ tābhyāmavacchidyamāno jalavidhārako loke dṛṣṭaḥ, natu bandhanahetumātram
GSP33brsvbh1u:4586: tathāca pāravatyamṛtavyatirikte setāvanuśriyamāṇe pradhānaṃ vā sāṃkhyaparikalpitaṃ bhavet
GSP33brsvbh1u:4587: tat khalu svakāryopahitamaryādatayā puruṣaṃ yāvadagacchadbhavatīti pāravat, bhavati ca dyubhvādyāyatanaṃ, tatprakṛtitvāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4590: bhavati cāsya jñānamapavargopayogi, tadabhāve pradhānādvivekena puruṣasyānavadhāraṇādapavanupargāpatteḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:4591: yadi tvasminpramāṇābhāvena na parituṣyasi, astu tarhi nāmarūpabījaśaktibhūtamavyākṛtaṃ bhūtasūkṣmaṃ dyubhvādyāyatanaṃ, tasmin prāmāṇike sarvasyoktasyopapatteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4593: atha tu sākṣācchutyuktaṃ dyubhvādyāyatanamādriyase, tato vāyurevāstu /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4594: 'vāyunā vai gautama sūtreṇāya ca lokaḥ paraśca lokaḥ sarvāṇi ca bhūtāni saṃdṛbdhāni bhavanti'iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4595: yadi tvātmaśabdābhidheyatvaṃ na vidyata iti na parituṣyasi, bhavatu tarhi śārīraḥ, tasya bhokturbhogyān dyuprabhṛtīnpratyāyatanatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4596: yadi punarasya dyubhvādyāyatanasya sārvajñyaśruteratrāpi na parituṣya,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4597: bhavatu tato hiraṇyagarbha eva bhagavān sarvajñaḥ sūtrātmā dyubhvādyāyatanam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4598: tasya hi kāryatvena pāravattvaṃ cāmṛtātparabrahmaṇo bhedaścetyādi sarvamupapadyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4599: ayamapi 'vāyunā vai gautama sūtreṇa'iti śrutimupanyasyatā sūcitaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4605: 'nahi mṛddārumayo mūrtaḥ pārāvāramadhyavartī pāthasāṃ vidhārako lokasiddhaḥ setuḥ pradhānaṃ vāvyākṛtaṃ vā vāyurvā jīvo vā sūtrātmā
GSP33brsvbh1u:4608: so 'smākaṃ pāravattāvarjaṃ vidharaṇatvamātreṇa yogamātrādrūḍhiṃ parityajya pravartsyati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4614: tathā cāmṛtasyeti ca seturiti ca brahmaṇi dyubhvādyāyatane upapatsyete /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4615: atra ca svaśabdāditi tantroccaritatamātmaśabdāditi ca sadāyatanā iti sacchabdāditi ca brahmaśabdāditi ca sūcayati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4618: āyatanāyatanavadbhāvaḥ sarvaṃ brahmeti ca sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ hiraṇyagarbhepyupapadyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4628: nātra dyubhvādyāyatanasya setutocyate yena pāravattā syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4632: naca prādhānyādeṣa iti sarvanāmnā dyubhvādyāyatanamātmaiva parāmṛśyate, na tu tajjñānavāgvimocane iti sāṃpratam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4635: vidheyasya vyāpārasyaiva vyāpāravato 'mṛtatvasādhanatvāt na cedamaikāntikaṃ yatpradhānameva sarvanāmnā parāmṛśyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4642: brahmaṇaśca muktopasṛpyatvaṃ 'yadā sarve pramucyante'ityādau śrutyantare prasiddham /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4668: kasmātpṛthagyogakaraṇaṃ, yāvatā 'na prāṇabhṛdanumāne'ityeka eva yogaḥ kasmānna kṛta ityata āha-pṛthagiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4676: na khalu hiraṇyagarbhādiṣu jñāteṣu sarvaṃ jñātaṃ bhavati kintu brahmaṇyeveti //6//
GSP33brsvbh1u:4680: yadi jīvo hiraṇyagarbho vā dyubhvādyāyatanaṃ bhavet, tatastatprakṛtyā
GSP33brsvbh1u:4683: naca jīvātmaiva dyubhvādyāyatanaṃ, tathā sati sa evātra kathyate,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4684: tatkathanāya ca brahmāpi kathyate, anyathā siddhānte 'pi
GSP33brsvbh1u:4691: tathā cetthaṃbhūtaṃ jīvaṃ kathayatānena mantravarṇena dyubhvādyāyatanaṃ brahmaiva kathitaṃ bhavati, upādhyavacchinnaśca jīvaḥ pratiṣiddho
GSP33brsvbh1u:4699: nāradaḥ khalu devarṣiḥ karmavidanātmavittayā śocyamātmānaṃ manyamāno bhagavantamātmajñamājānasiddhaṃ mahāyoginaṃ sanatkumāramupasasāda /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4701: tadupaśrutya sanatkumāreṇa 'nāma brahmetyupāḥsva'ityukte nāradena pṛṣṭaṃ kiṃnāmno 'sti bhūya iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4705: kartavyākartavyavivekaḥ saṃkalpaḥ, tasya kāraṇaṃ pūrvāparaviṣayanimittaprayojananirūpaṇaṃ cittam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4707: prāṇasya ca samastakriyākārakaphalabhedena pitrādyātmatvena ca rathāranābhidṛṣṭāntena sarvapratiṣṭhatvena ca prāṇabhūyastvadarśino
GSP33brsvbh1u:4708: 'tivāditvena ca nāmādiprapañcādāśāntādbhūyastvamuktvāpṛṣṭa eva nāradena sanatkumāra ekagranthena 'eṣa tu vā ativadati yaḥ satyenātivadati'iti
GSP33brsvbh1u:4710: tadupaśrutya nāradena 'sukhaṃ tveva bhagavo vijijñāse'ityukte sanatkumāraḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:4714: tatra saṃśayaḥ-kiṃ prāṇo bhūmā syādāho paramātmeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4721: apica bhūmeti bhāvo na bhavitāramantareṇa śakyo nirūpayitumiti bhavitāramapekṣamāṇaḥ prāṇasyānantaryeṇa buddhisaṃnidhānāttameva bhavitāraṃ prāpya nirvṛṇoti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4724: na cātmanaḥ prakaraṇādātmaiva buddhistha iti tasyaiva bhūmā syāditi yuktam
GSP33brsvbh1u:4729: tadetatsaṃśayabījaṃ darśayatā bhāṣyakāreṇa sūcitaṃ pūrvapakṣasādhanamiti na punaruktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4730: naca bhūyobhūyaḥ praśnātparamātmaiva nāradena jijñāsita iti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4732: tadevaṃ prāṇa eva bhūmeti sthite yadyattadvirodhitayā vacaḥ pratibhāti tattadanuguṇatayā neyam
GSP33brsvbh1u:4735: 'eṣa tu vā ativadati'iti tuśabdena prāṇadarśino 'tivādino vyavacchidya satyenātivāditvaṃ vadan kathaṃ prāṇasya bhūmānamabhidadhītetyata
GSP33brsvbh1u:4739: etaduktaṃ bhavati-nāyaṃ tuśabdaḥ prāṇātivāditvādvayavacchinatti, apitu tadativāditvamaparityajya pratyuta tadanukṛṣya tasyaiva prāṇasya satyasya śravaṇamananaśraddhāniṣṭhākṛtibhirvijñānāya niścayāya satyenātivadatīti prāṇavratamevātivāditvamucyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4743: athāgamāvirodhinyāyaniveśanaṃ mananaṃ, matvā ca guruśiṣyasabrahmacāribhiranusūyubhiḥ saha saṃvādya tattvaṃ śraddhatte /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4744: śraddhānantaraṃ ca viṣayāntaradarśī viraktastato vyāvṛttastattvajñānābhyāsaṃ karoti, seyamasya kṛtiḥ prayatnaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4745: atha tattvajñānābhyāsaniṣṭhā bhavati, yadanantarameva tattvavijñānamanubhavaḥ prādurbhavati
GSP33brsvbh1u:4748: bhāvanāprakarṣasya paryanto niṣṭhā tasmājjāyate tattvānubhava iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4749: tasmātprāṇa eva bhūmeti prāpte 'bhidhīyate-'eṣa tu vā ativadati yaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:4751: tatra satyaśabdaḥ paramārthe nirūḍhavṛttiḥ śrutyā paramārthamāha /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4754: tathāca 'eṣa tu vā ativadati yaḥ satyenātivadati'iti brahmaṇo 'tivāditvaṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:4755: śrutyānyanirapekṣayā liṅgādibhyo balīyasyāvagamitaṃ kathamiva saṃnidhānamātrāt śrutyādyapekṣādatidurbalātkathaṃ citprāṇaviṣayatvena śakyaṃ vyākhyātum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4756: evaṃ ca prāṇādūrdhvaṃ brahmaṇi bhūmāvagamyamāno na prāṇaviṣayo
GSP33brsvbh1u:4758: evaṃ cānātmavida ātmānaṃ vividiṣornāradasya praśne paramātmānamevāsmai vyākhyāsyāmītyabhisaṃdhimānsanatkumāraḥ sopānārohaṇanyāyena sthūlādārabhya tattadbhūmavyutpādanakrameṇa bhūmānamatidurjñānatayā paramasūkṣmaṃ vyutpādayāmāsa /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4759: naca praśnapūrvatāpravāhapatitenottareṇa sarveṇa praśnapūrveṇaiva bhavitavyamiti niyamo 'stītyādisugamena bhāṣyeṇa vyutpāditam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4760: vijñānādisādhanaparamparā mananaśraddhādiḥ, prāṇānte cānuśāsane tāvanmātreṇaiva prakaraṇasamāpterna prāṇasyānyāyattatocyeta /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4761: tadabhidhāne hi sāpekṣatvena na prakaraṇaṃ samāpyeta /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4762: tasmānnedaṃ prāṇasya prakaraṇamapi tu yadāyattaḥ prāṇastasya, sa cātmetyātmana eva prakaraṇam
GSP33brsvbh1u:4767: saṃdaṃśanyāyena hi bhūmna etatprakaraṇaṃ, sa cedbhūmā prāṇaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4771: na kevalaṃ śruterbhūmātmatā paramātmanaḥ, liṅgādapītyāha sūtrakāraḥ-
GSP33brsvbh1u:4773: yadapi pūrvapakṣiṇā kathañcinnītaṃ tadanubhāṣya bhāṣyakāro dūṣayati-yo
GSP33brsvbh1u:4788: sarvaṃ hi rūpadheyaṃ nāmadheyasaṃbhinnamanubhūyate, gaurayaṃ vṛkṣo 'yamiti
GSP33brsvbh1u:4797: 'tadyathā śaṅkunā sarvāṇi parṇāni saṃtṛṇṇānyevamoṅkāreṇa sarvā vāk'iti
GSP33brsvbh1u:4799: ata oṅkārātmakāḥ pṛthivyādayo 'mbarāntā iti varṇā evākṣaraṃ na paramātmeti prāptam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4800: evaṃ prāpte 'bhidhīyate-akṣaraṃ paramātmaiva, na tu varṇāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4803: na khalvambarāntāni pṛthivyādīni varṇā dhārayitumarhanti, kintu paramātmaiva /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4805: naca nāmadheyātmakaṃ rūpadheyamiti yuktaṃ, svarūpabhedāt, upāyabhedāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4808: rūpadheyāni tu ghaṭapaṭādīni ghaṭatvapaṭatvādisāmānyātmakāni cakṣurādīndriyāgrāhyāṇi madhudhāraṇaprāvaraṇādyarthakriyāṇi ca bhedenānubhūyante iti kuto nāmasaṃbhedaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4810: na khalu śabdātmako 'yaṃ piṇḍa ityanubhavaḥ, kintu yo nānādeśakālasaṃplutaḥ piṇḍaḥ so 'yaṃ saṃnihitadeśakāla ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4813: piṇḍa eva hi dṛṣṭaḥ sansaṃjñāṃ smārayituṃ kṣamaḥ //1//
GSP33brsvbh1u:4814: saṃjñā hi smaryamāṇāpi pratyakṣatvaṃ na bādhate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4815: saṃjñinaḥ sā taṭasthā hi na rūpācchādanakṣamā //2// iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4821: ye tu pradhānaṃ pūrvapakṣayitvānena sūtreṇa paramātmaivākṣaramiti siddhāntayanti tairambarāntaradhṛterityanena kathaṃ pradhānaṃ nirākriyata iti vācyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4822: atha nādhikaraṇatvamātraṃ dhṛtiḥ api tu praśāsanādhikaraṇatā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4823: tathā ca śrutiḥ-'etasya vākṣarasya praśāsane gārgi sūryācandramasau vidhṛtau tiṣṭhataḥ'iti
GSP33brsvbh1u:4829: nahyavaśyaṃ prāptipūrvakā eva pratiṣedhā bhavanti, aprāpteṣvapi nityānuvādānāṃ darśanāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4835: praśāsanamājñā cetanadharmo nācetane pradhāne vāvyākṛte vā saṃbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4840: ambarāntavidharaṇasyākṣarasyeśvarāgadyadanyadvarṇā vā pradhānaṃ vāvyākṛtaṃ vā teṣāmanyeṣāṃ bhāvo 'nyabhāvastamatyantaṃ vyāvartayati śrutiḥ-'tadvā
GSP33brsvbh1u:4846: akṣarasya cakṣurādyupādhiṃ vārayantī śrutiraupādhikasya jīvasyākṣaratāṃ niṣedhatītyarthaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:4854: ' 'brahma veda brahmaiva bhavati'iti śruteḥ sarvagataparabrahmavedane tadbhāvāpattau 'sa sāmabhirunnīyate brahmalokam iti na deśaviśeṣaprāptirupapadyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4856: na cekṣaṇasya loke tattvaviṣayatvena prasiddheḥ parasyaiva
GSP33brsvbh1u:4861: naca tattvaviṣayameva sarvaṃ darśanaṃ, anṛtaviṣayasyāpi tasya darśanāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4862: naca mananaṃ darśanaṃ, tacca tattvaviṣayameveti sāṃpratam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4877: tadanurodhena ca parātpara ityatra parāditi jīvaghanaviṣayaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4878: tasmāttu paraḥ puruṣo dhyātavyaśca draṣṭavyaśca bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4879: tadidamuktam-na cātra jīvaghanaśabdena prakṛto 'bhidhyātavyaḥ paraḥ puruṣaḥ parāmṛśyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4880: kintu jīvaghanāt parāt paro yo dhyātavyo draṣṭavyaśca tameva kathayituṃ jīvaghano jīvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4883: sa hi samastakaraṇātmanaḥ sūtrātmano hiraṇyagarbhasya bhagavato nivāsabhūmitayā karaṇaparivṛtānāṃ jīvānāṃ saṃghāta iti bhavati jīvaghanaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:4885: ata eva cāsya deśaviśeṣādhigatiḥ phalamupādhimattvāt, krameṇa ca samyagdarśanotpattau muktiḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:4886: 'brahma veda brahmaiva bhavati'iti tu nirupādhibrahmavedanaviṣayā śrutiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4891: 'atha yadidamasmin brahmapure daharam'sūkṣmaṃ guhāprāyaṃ puṇḍarīkasaṃniveśaṃ veśma 'daharo
GSP33brsvbh1u:4893: śravaṇaṃ ca, tadavirodhinā tarkeṇa mananaṃ ca, tadanveṣaṇam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4898: tatra prathamaṃ tāvadevaṃ saṃśayaḥ-kiṃ daharākāśādanyadeva kiñcidanveṣṭavyaṃ vijijñāsitavyaṃ ca uta daharākāśa iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4899: yadāpi daharākāśo 'nveṣṭavyastadāpi kiṃ bhūtākāśa āho śārīra ātmā kiṃ vā paramātmeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4902: tatra prathamaṃ tāvadbhūtākāśa eva dahara iti
GSP33brsvbh1u:4904: eṣa tu bahutarottarasaṃdarbhavirodhāttucchaḥ pūrvapakṣa ityaparitoṣeṇa pakṣāntaramālambate pūrvapakṣī-athavā jīvo dahara iti prāptam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4911: tadiha śarīraṃ brahmavikāro 'pi na brahmaṇā vyapadeṣṭavyam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4914: apica brahmapura iti saptamyadhikaraṇe smaryate, tenādheyenānena saṃbaddhavyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4915: naca brahmaṇaḥ sve mahimni vyavasthitasyānādheyasyādhārasaṃbandhaḥ kalpate
GSP33brsvbh1u:4917: tasmādbrahmaśabdo rūḍhiṃ parityajya dehādibṛṃhaṇatayā jīve yaugike vā bhākto vā vyākhyeyaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:4922: jīvasya puraṃ bhavatu śarīraṃ, puṇḍarīkadaharagocaratā tvanyasya bhaviṣyati, vatsarājasya pura ivojjayinyāṃ maitrasya sajñmetyata āha-tatra
GSP33brsvbh1u:4924: ayamarthaḥveśma khalvadhikaraṇamanirdiṣṭhādheyamādheyaviśeṣāpekṣāyāṃ purasvāminaḥ prakṛtatvāttenaivādheyena saṃbaddhaṃ sadanapekṣaṃ nādheyāntareṇa saṃbandhaṃ kalpayati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4925: nanu tathāpi śarīramevāsya bhogāyatanamiti ko hṛdayapuṇḍarīkasya viśeṣo yattadevāsya sajñmetyata āha-manaupādhikaśca jīva iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4926: nanu mano 'pi calatayā sakaladehavṛtti paryāyeṇetyata āha-manaśca
GSP33brsvbh1u:4934: agatyā bhedamāropya gatau satyāṃ na yujyate //
GSP33brsvbh1u:4939: śrutivirodhaḥ syāt, api tu bhūtākāśopamānena puṇḍarīkopādhiprāptaṃ daharatvaṃ nivartyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4940: apica sarva evottare hetavo daharākāśasya bhūtākāśatvaṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:4945: 'dehe hi brahmopalabhyata ityasādhāraṇatayā deho brahmapuramiti vyapadiśyate, na tu brahmavikāratayā
GSP33brsvbh1u:4947: astu vā brahmapuraṃ jīvapuraṃ, tathāpi yathā vatsarājasya pure ujjayinyāṃ maitrasya sajñma bhavati, evaṃ jīvasya pure hṛtpuṇḍarīkaṃ brahmasadanaṃ bhaviṣyati, uttarebhyo brahmaliṅgebhyo brahmaṇo 'vadhāraṇāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4948: brahmaṇo hi bādhake pramāṇe balīyasi jīvasya ca sādhake pramāṇe sati brahmaliṅgāni kathañcidabhedavivakṣayā jīve vyākhyāyante /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4949: na ceha brahmaṇo bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ, sādhakaṃ vāsti jīvasya /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4952: tasmāt sati saṃbhave brahmaṇi, talliṅgānāṃ nābrahmaṇi vyākhyānamucitamiti
GSP33brsvbh1u:4954: śravaṇamananamanuvidya brahmānubhūya caraṇaṃ cārasteṣāṃ kāmeṣu caraṇaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4956: daharākāśasyānveṣyatve siddhe tatra vicāro yujyate, natu tadanveṣṭavyam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:4978: no khalvabhyupagamā eva doṣatvena codyanta ityata āha-tatra vākyaśeṣa iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4979: vākyaśeṣo hi daharākāśātmavedanasya phalavattvaṃ brūte, yacca phalavat tatkartavyatayā codyate, yacca kartavyaṃ tadicchitīti 'tadanveṣṭavyaṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:4989: nanu satyakāmajñānasyaitatphalaṃ, tadanantaraṃ nirdeśāt, na tu daharākāśavedanasyetyata āha-samuccayārthena caśabdeneti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4990: 'asminkāmāḥ'iti ca 'eṣaḥ'iti caikavacanāntaṃ na dve dyāvāpṛthivyau parāmnaṣṭumarhatīti daharākāśa eva parāmraṣṭavya iti samudāyārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4995: gatiśabdābhyāṃ tathā hi dṛṣṭaṃ liṅgaṃ ca |
GSP33brsvbh1u:4997: uttarebhya ityasya prapañcaḥ etameva daharākāśaṃ prakramya batāho kaṣṭamidaṃ vartate jantūnāṃ tattvāvabodhavikalānāṃ, yadebhiḥ svādhīnamapi brahma na prāpyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4998: tadyathā cirantananirūḍhanibiḍamalapihitānāṃ kaladhautaśakalānāṃ pathi patitānāmuparyapari saṃcaradbhirapi pānthairdhanāyadbhirgrāvakhṇḍanivahavibhrameṇaitāni nopādiyanta ityabhisaṃdhimatī sādbhutamiva sakhedamiva śrutaḥ pravartate-'imāḥ sarvāḥ prajā aharahargacchantya etaṃ brahmalokaṃ na vindanti'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:4999: svāpakāle hi sarva evāyaṃ vidvānavidvāṃśca jīvaloko hṛtpuṇḍarīkāśrayaṃ daharākāśākhyaṃ brahmalokaṃ prāpto 'pyanādyavidyātamaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:5001: so 'yaṃ brahmalokaśabdastadgatiśca pratyahaṃ jīvalokasya daharākāśasyaiva brahmarūpalokatāmāhatuḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:5002: tadetadāha bhāṣyakāraḥ-itaśca parameśvara eva daharo yasmāddaharavākyaśeṣa iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5006: yadyapi suṣuptasya brahmabhāve laukikaṃ na pramāṇāntaramasti, tathāpi vaidikīmeva prasiddhiṃ sthāpayitumucyate, īdṛśī nāmeyaṃ vaidikī
GSP33brsvbh1u:5008: yathā śrutyantare yathā ca loke tatheha brahmalokaśabdo 'pīti yojanā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5016: vyāvartayaddaharākāśaprāptāvevāvatiṣṭhate, naca daharākāśo brahmaṇo lokaḥ kintu tadbrahmeti brahma ca tallokaśceti karmadhārayaḥ siddho bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5019: yatkhalu puṇḍarīkasthamantaḥkaraṇaṃ tasminviśuddhe pratyāhṛtetarakaraṇānāṃ yogināṃ nirmala ivodake candramaso bimbamatisvacchaṃ caitanyaṃ jyotiḥsvarūpaṃ brahmāvalokyata iti //15//
GSP33brsvbh1u:5025: kutaḥ, asya dhāraṇalakṣaṇasya mahimno 'sminneveśvara eva śrutyantareṣūpalabdheḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5031: sāṃpratikī, yathā rathāṅganāmā cakravāka iti lakṣaṇā,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5033: ye tvākāśaśabdo brahmaṇyapi mukhya eva nabhovadityācakṣate, taiḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:5037: naca brahmaṇyeva mukhyo nabhasi tu tenaiva guṇayogena vartsyatīti vācyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5041: nahi bhavati gaṅgāyāḥ kūlamiti vivakṣite gaṅgāyā gaṅgeti prayogaḥ tatkimidānīṃ 'paurṇamāsyāṃ paurṇamāsyā yajeta'
GSP33brsvbh1u:5044: yaccoktaṃyatra śabdārthapratītistatra lakṣaṇā'yatra punaranyārthe niścite śabdāprayogastatra vācakatvameveti, tadayuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5048: naca 'ya evaṃ vidvān paurṇamāsīṃ yajate ya evaṃ vidvānamāvāsyām'ityatra
GSP33brsvbh1u:5054: samyak prasīdatyasmin jīvo viṣayendriyasaṃyogajanitaṃ kāluṣyaṃ jahātīti suṣuptiḥ saṃprasādo jīvasyāvasthābhedaḥ na brahmaṇaḥ tathā śarīrātsamutthānamapi śarīrāśrayasya jīvasya, natvanāśrayasya brahmaṇaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5056: evaṃ vākyaśeṣagatābhyāmeva saṃprasādasamutthānābhyāṃ daharākāśo jīvaḥ kasmānnāvagamyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5059: saṃprasādasamutthanābhyāṃ hi jīvaparāmarśo na jīvaparaḥ, kintu tadīyatāttvikarūpabrahmabhāvaparaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:5060: tathā caiṣa parāmarśo brahmaṇa eveti na saṃprasādasamutthāne jīvaliṅgam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5061: api tu brahmaṇa eva tādarthyādityagre vakṣyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5066: daharākāśameva prakṛtyopākhyāyate-yamātmānamanviṣya sarvāṃśca lokānāpnoti sarvāṃśca kāmān, tamātmānaṃ vividiṣantau surāsurarājavindravirocanau
GSP33brsvbh1u:5068: āgatya ca dvātriṃśataṃ varṣāṇi tatparicaraṇaparau brahmacaryamūṣatuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5070: tāvūcatuḥ, ya ātmāpahatapāpmā tamāvāṃ vividiṣāva iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5071: tataḥ prajāpatiruvāca, ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyate eṣa
GSP33brsvbh1u:5075: prajāpatiṃ ca papracchatuḥ, atha yo 'yaṃ bhagavo 'psu dṛśyate, yaścādarśe,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5076: yaśca svaṅgādau katama eteṣvasau atavaika eva sarveṣviti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5078: asmābhirakṣisthāna ātmopadiṣṭaḥ, etau ca chāyāpuruṣaṃ pratipannau, tadyadi vayaṃ bhrāntau stha iti brūmastataḥ svātmani samāropitapāṇḍityabahumānau vimānitau santau daurmanasyena yathāvadupadeśaṃ na gṛhṇīyātām,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5086: punaretayośchāyātmavibhramamapaninīṣuryathaiva hi chāyāpuruṣa upajanāpāyadharmābhedenāvagamyamāna ātmalakṣaṇavirahānnātmaivevamevedaṃ śarīraṃ nātmā, kintu tato bhinnamityanvayavyatirekābhyāmetau
GSP33brsvbh1u:5089: tau ca sādhvalaṅkṛtau suvasanau chinnanakhalomānau bhūtvā tathaiva cakratuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5091: tadupaśrutya prajāpatiraho batādyāpi na praśānta enayorvibhramaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5095: tayorvirocano dehānupātitvācchāyāyā deha evātmatattvamiti matvā nijasadanamāgatya tathaivāsurānupadideśa
GSP33brsvbh1u:5096: devendrastvaprāptanijasadano 'dhvanyeva kiñcidvaralakalmaṣatayā chāyātmani śarīraguṇadoṣānuvidhāyini taṃ taṃ doṣaṃ paribhāvayan nāhamatra
GSP33brsvbh1u:5097: chāyātmadarśane bhogyaṃ paśyāmīti prajāpatisamīpaṃ samitpāṇiḥ punarevevāyaṃ āgataśca prajāpatināgamanakāraṇaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ pathi paribhāvitaṃ jagāda /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5099: tatpunarapi tatprakṣayāyā carāparāṇi dvātriṃśataṃ varṣāṇi brahmacaryaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5101: sa ca tathā caritabrahmacaryaḥ surendraḥ prajāpatimupasasāda /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5103: darśitaḥ so 'yaṃ ya eṣa svapne mahīyamāno vanitādibhiranekadhā svapnopabhogān bhuñjāno virahatīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5105: yadyapyayaṃ chāyāpuruṣavanna śarīradharmānanupatati, tathāpi śokabhayādivividhabādhānubhavānna tatrāpyasti svastiprāptirityuktavati madhavati punaraparāṇi cara dvātriṃśataṃ varṣāṇi svacchaṃ brahmacaryamidānīmapyakṣīṇakalmaṣo 'sītyūce prajāpatiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5106: athāsminnevaṅkāramupasanne madhavati prajāpatiruvāca, ya eṣa ātmāpahatapāpmādiguṇo darśito 'kṣiṇi ca svapne ca sa eṣa yo
GSP33brsvbh1u:5109: yathā hi jāgradvā svapnagato vāyamahamasmīti imāni bhūtāmani ceti vijānāti naivaṃ suṣuptaḥ kiñcidapi vedayate, tadā khalvayamacetayamāno 'bhāvaṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:5112: eva muktavati madhavati batādyāpi na te kalmaṣakṣayo 'bhūt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5115: caturthe ca paryāye pañca varṣāṇītyekottaraṃ śataṃ varṣāṇi brahmacaryaṃ carataḥ sahasrākṣasya saṃpedire /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5116: athāsmai brahmacaryasaṃpadunmṛditakalmaṣāya madhavate ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi yaśca svapne yaśca suṣupte anusyūta eṣa ātmāpahatapāpmādiguṇako darśitaḥ, tameva
GSP33brsvbh1u:5117: 'madhavan martyaṃ vai śarīram'ityādinā vispaṣṭaṃ vyācaṣṭe prajāpatiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5122: viviktamanubhavati, athāsya śarīravato 'pyaśarīrasya na dehādidharmasukhaduḥkhaprasaṅgo 'stīti nānutapyate, kevalamayaṃ nice caitanyānandaghane rūpe vyavasthitaḥ samastalokakāmān prāpto bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5123: etasyaiva hi paramānandasya mātrāḥ sarve kāmāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5127: 'evaṃ vyavasthita uttarādvākyasaṃdarbhātprājāpatyāt akṣiṇi ca svapne suṣupte ca caturtho ca paryāye 'eṣa saṃprasādo 'smāccharīrātsamutthāya'iti
GSP33brsvbh1u:5133: jīvasya caitat sarvamiti sa evāpahatapāpmādiguṇaḥ śrutyokta iti nāpahatapāpmādibhiḥ paraṃ brahma gamyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5140: pāpmādiḥ śarīrādyabhāve na bhavati dhūma iva dhūmadhvajābhāva iti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5142: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ-paurvāparyālocanayā tāvadupaniṣadāṃ śuddhabuddhamuktamekamaprapañcaṃ brahma tadatiriktaṃ ca sarvaṃ tadvivarto rajjoriva bhujaṅga ityatra tātparyamavagamyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5143: tathāca jīvo 'pyavidyākalpitadehendriyādyupahitaṃ rūpaṃ brahmaṇo na tu svābhāvikaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5145: āvirbhūtabrahmarūpe tu nirupādhau saṃbhavanto brahmaṇa eva na jīvasya /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5146: evaṃ ca brahmaivāpahatāpāpmādiguṇaṃ śrutyuktamiti tadeva daharākāśo na jīva iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5148: svarūpāvirbhāve cedbrahmaiva na jīvaḥ, tarhi vipratiṣiddhamidamabhidhīyate jīva āvirbhūtasvarūpa iti, ata āha-bhūtapūrvagatyeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5154: dravyāntarasaṃsṛṣṭaṃ hi tenābhibhūtaṃ tasmādvivicyamānaṃ vyajyate hematārakādi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5157: dṛṣṭyādayo hyasya svarūpaṃ, te ca saṃsārāvasthāyāṃ bhāsanta iti kathaṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:5165: yadyapi sphaṭikādayo japākusumādisaṃnihitāḥ, saṃnidhānaṃ ca saṃyuktasaṃyogātmakaṃ, tathā ca saṃyuktāḥ, tathāpi na sākṣājjapādikusumasaṃyogina ityetāvatā dṛṣṭāntitā iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5170: tadanena śravaṇamananadhyānābhyāsādvivekavijñānamuktvā tasya vivekavijñānasya phalaṃ kevalātmarūpasākṣātkāraḥ svarūpeṇābhiniṣpattiḥ, sa ca sākṣātkāro vṛttirūpaḥ prapañcamātraṃ pravilāpayan svayamapi prapañcarūpatvātkatakaphalavatpravilīyate tathāca nirmṛṣṭanikhilaprapañcajālamanupasargamaparādhīnaprakāśamātmajyotiḥ siddhaṃ bhavati
GSP33brsvbh1u:5172: atra copasaṃpattāvuttarakālāyāmapi ktvāprayogo mukhaṃ vyādāya svapitītīvanmantavyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5173: yadā ca vivekasākṣātkāraḥ śarīrātsamutthānaṃ, na tu śarīrāpādānakaṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:5176: na kevalaṃ 'sa yoha vai tatparamaṃ brahma veda brahmaiva
GSP33brsvbh1u:5181: praticchāyātmavajjīvaṃ paramātmano vastuto bhinnamapyamṛtābhayātmatvena grāhayitvā paścātparamātmānamṛtābhayādimantaṃ prajāpatirgrāhyati, na tvayaṃ jīvasya paramātmabhāvamācaṣṭe chāyātmana ivetyata āha-nāpi
GSP33brsvbh1u:5185: kiñca dvitīyādiṣvapi paryāyeṣu 'etaṃ tveva te bhūyo
GSP33brsvbh1u:5186: 'nuvyākhyāyasyāmi'ityupakramātprathamaparyāyanirdiṣṭo na chāyāpuruṣaḥ, api tu tato 'nyo dṛṣṭātmeti darśayati, anyathā prajāpateḥ pratārakatvaprasaṅgādityata āha-tathā dvitīye 'pīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5187: atha chāyāpuruṣa eva jīvaḥ kasmānna bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5188: tathāca chāyāpuruṣa evaitamiti parāmṛśyata ityata āha-kiñcāhamadya svapne hastinamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5189: kiñceti samuccayābhidhānaṃ pūrvopapattisāhityaṃ brūte, tacca śaṅkānirākaraṇadvāreṇa /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5196: kena prakāreṇa na jānātītyata āha-ayamahamasmīmāni bhūtāni ceti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5199: siddhavaddhetukurvatā suptotthitasyātmapratyabhijñānamuktam, ya evāhaṃ jāgaritvā suptaḥ sa evaitarhi jāgarmīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5201: yadi hyetamityanenānantaroktaṃ cakṣuradhiṣṭhānaṃ puruṣaṃ parāmṛśya tasyātmatvamucyeta tato na bhavecchāyāpuruṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5209: kartā bhoktā ca vastuto bhavet, tatastadāśrayāḥ karmavidhaya uparudhyeran
GSP33brsvbh1u:5212: na cābhede brahmaṇo jīvānāṃ brahmaguṇānāmasaṃbhavo jīveṣviti teṣāmabhiprāyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5216: naca vastusato brahmaṇo guṇāḥ samāropiteṣu jīveṣu saṃbhavanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5217: no khalu vastusatyā rajjvā dharmāḥ sevyatvādayaḥ samāropite bhujaṅge saṃbhavinaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5220: avidyākalpitaṃ ca kartṛtvabhoktṛtvaṃ yathālokasiddhamupāśritya karmavidhayaḥ pravṛttāḥ, śyenādividhaya iva niṣiddhe 'pi 'na hiṃsyātsarvā
GSP33brsvbh1u:5226: nanu brahmacedatra vaktavyaṃ kṛtaṃ jīvaparāmarśenetyuktamityata āha-
GSP33brsvbh1u:5229: jīvasyopādhikalpitasya brahmabhāva upadeṣṭavyaḥ, na cāsau jīvamaparāmṛśya
GSP33brsvbh1u:5241: 'balīyasā hi saureṇa tejasā mandaṃ tejaścandratārakādyabhibhūyamānaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ, na tu tejaso 'nyena /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5242: ye 'pi pidhāyakāḥ pradīpasya gṛhaghaṭādayo na te svabhāsā pradīpaṃ bhāsayitumīśate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5246: nahi gāvo varāhamanudhāvantīti kṛṣṇavihaṅgānudhāvanamupapadyate gavām, api tu tādṛśasūkarānudhāvanam
GSP33brsvbh1u:5247: tasmādyadyapi 'yasmin dyauḥ pṛthivī cāntarikṣamotam'iti brahma prakṛtaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5250: tatra taṃ tasyeti ca sarvanāmapadāni pradarśanīyamevāvamrakṣyanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5253: tasmātpramāṇāntarāpratītamapi tejo 'ntaramalaukikaṃ śabdādupāsyatvena gamyata iti prāpte ucyate-'brahmaṇyeva hi talliṅgaṃ na tu tejasyalaukike /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5254: tasmānna tadupāsyatve brahma jñeyaṃ tu gamyate //
GSP33brsvbh1u:5257: śrutyantaraprasiddhena brahmaṇo bhānena sūryādīnāṃ bhānamupapādyatāmiti viśaye na śrutasaṃbhave 'śrutasya kalpanā yujyata ityaprasiddhaṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:5258: nālaukikamupāsyaṃ tejo yujyate, api tu śrutiprasiddhaṃ brahmaiva jñeyamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5263: tathā tadeva cākṣuṣaṃ tejo bāhyasauryāditejaḥāpyāyitaṃ rūpādi prakāśayati
GSP33brsvbh1u:5266: nahi tejontarasya tejo 'ntarāpekṣāṃ vyāsedhāmaḥ, kintu tadbhānamanubhānam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5274: vanhyayaḥ piṇḍayostu yadyapi dahanakriyā na bhidyate tathāpi dravyabhedena kriyābhedaṃ kalpayitvā kriyāsādṛśyaṃ vyākhyeyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5275: tadevamanukṛteriti vibhajya tasya ceti sūtrāvayavaṃ vibhajate-tasya ceti caturthamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5280: brahmaṇi tu niḥśeṣajagadavabhāsake na sarvaśabdasya vṛttiḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:5287: tena bhavatu nāma prakaraṇālliṅgaṃ balīyaḥ, śrutistu liṅgādbalīyasīti śrautamiha brahmaiva gamyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5289: dṛṣṭārthatvādityāha-anantaraṃ ca hiraṇmaye pare kośa iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5290: asminvākye jyotiṣāṃ jyotirityuktaṃ, tatra kathaṃ tat jyotiṣāṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:5294: ayamabhiprāyaḥ-'na tatra sūryo bhāti'iti neyaṃ satisaptamī, yataḥ sūryādīnāṃ tasmin satyabhibhavaḥ pratīyeta /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5296: tena na tatra brahmaṇi prakāśayitavye sūryādayaḥ prakāśakatayā bhānti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5297: kintu brahmaiva sūryādiṣu prakāśayitavyeṣu prakāśakatvena bhāti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5298: tacca svayaṃprakāśam,agṛhyo nahi gṛhyata ityādiśrutibhya iti //22//
GSP33brsvbh1u:5316: taddhi tasyopalabdhisthānaṃ, śālagrāma iva kamalanābhasya bhagavataḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5319: ātmaśabdo hyayaṃ svabhāvavacano vā jīvavacano vā brahmavacano vā syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5320: tatra svabhāvasya svabhavitradhīnanirūpaṇatayā svasya ca bhavituranirdeśānna jñāyate kasya madhya iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5321: naca jīvaparayorasti madhyamañjaseti naiṣa sthānanirdeśo vispaṣṭaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5325: antaḥkaraṇaṃ ca prāyeṇa hṛtkamalakośasthānaṃ, hṛtkamalakośaśca manuṣyāṇāmaṅguṣṭhamātra iti tadavacchinno jīvātmāpyaṅguṣṭhamātraḥ, nabha iva vaṃśaparvāvacchinnamaratrimātram /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5328: nahi sarveśasya brahmaṇo yamena balānniṣkarṣaḥ kalpate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5329: yamo hi jagau-'hariguruvaśago 'smi na svatantraḥ prabhavati saṃyamane mamāpi viṣṇuḥ'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5330: tenāṅguṣṭhamātratvasya jīve niśchayādāpekṣikaṃ kiñcidbhūtabhavyaṃ prati jīvasyeśānatvaṃ vyākhyeyam
GSP33brsvbh1u:5339: tathā cāṅguṣṭhamātratayā yadyapi jīve 'vagamyate tathāpi na tatparametadvākyaṃ, kintvaṅguṣṭhamātrasya jīvasya brahmarūpatāpratipādanaparam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5342: tena yathā 'tattvamasi'iti vijñānātmanastvaṃpadārthasya taditi paramātmanaikatvaṃ pratipādyate, tathehāpyaṅguṣṭhaparimitasya vijñānātmana īśānaśrutyā brahmabhāvaḥ pratipādya iti yuktam START BsVBh_1,3.7.25
GSP33brsvbh1u:5346: na cānyaḥ paramātmāna iha grahaṇamarhatīti na jīvaparametadvākyamityarthaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:5350: antaḥsaṃjñānāṃ mokṣamāṇānāṃ ca kāmyeṣu karmasvadhikāraṃ niṣedhati-śaktatvāditi tiryagdevarṣīṇāmaśaktānāmadhikāraṃ nivartayati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5357: jīvasya hi tattvaṃ paramātmabhāvaḥ, tadvaktavyam, naca tajjīvamanabhidhāya śakyaṃ vaktumiti jīva ucyata ityarthaḥ //25//
GSP33brsvbh1u:5364: devādīnāṃ vividhavicitrānandabhogabhogināṃ vairāgyābhāvānnārthitvaṃ brahmavidyāyāmityata āha-tatrārthitvaṃ tāvanmokṣaviṣayamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5366: nanu devādīnāṃ vigrahādyabhāvendriyārthasaṃnikarṣajāyāḥ pramāṇādivṛtteranupapatteravidvattayā sāmarthyābhāvena nādhikāra ityata
GSP33brsvbh1u:5371: na khalu vidhivat gurumukhādgṛhyamāṇo vedaḥ phalavatkarmabrahmāvabodhahetuḥ, api tvadhyayanottarakālaṃ nigamaniruktavyākaraṇādividitapadatarthasaṃgateradhigataśābdanyāyatattvasya puṃsaḥ smaryamāṇaḥ sa ca manuṣyāṇāmiha janmanīva devadīnāṃ prāci bhave vidhivadhīta āmnāya iha janmani smaryamāṇaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:5372: ata eva svayaṃ pratibhāto vedaḥ saṃbhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5385: tathāca vigrahādyabhāvācchabdopahitārthor'thopahito vā śabdo devatetyacetanatvānna tasyāḥ kvacidapyadhikāra iti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5389: saiva kuta ityata āha-darśanātśrutiṣu smṛtiṣu ca /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5392: nahi laukikena pramāṇenādṛṣṭatvādāgamena dṛṣṭamadṛṣṭaṃ bhavati, mā bhūdyāgādīnāmapi svargādisādhanatvamadṛṣṭamiti manuṣyaśarīrasya mātāpitṛsaṃyogajatvaniyamādasati pitroḥ saṃyoge kutaḥ saṃbhavaḥ, saṃbhave vānagnito 'pi dhūmaḥ syāditi bādhadarśanamiti cet /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5393: hanta kiṃ śarīratvena hetunā devādiśarīramapi mātāpitṛsaṃyogajaṃ siṣādhayiṣasi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5397: bhūtavaśināṃ hi devādīnāṃ nānākāyacikīrṣāvaśādbhūtakriyotpattau bhūtānāṃ parasparasaṃyogena nānākāyamasutpādāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5398: dṛṣṭā ca vaśina icchāvaśādvaśye kriyā, yathā viṣavidyāvida icchāmātreṇa
GSP33brsvbh1u:5405: antardhānaṃ cāñjanādinā manujānāmiva teṣāṃ prabhavatāmupapadyate, tena saṃnihitānāmapi na kratudeśe darśanaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5407: vaiśvadevaśastrasya hi nividi 'kati devāḥ'ityupakramya nividaivottaraṃ dattaṃ śākalyāya yājñavalkyena-trayaśca trī ca śatā trayaśca trī ca
GSP33brsvbh1u:5410: etaduktaṃ bhavati-vaiśvadevasya nividi kati devāḥ śasyamānāḥ prasaṃkhyātā iti śākalyena pṛṣṭe yājñavalkyasyottaraṃ-'trayaśca trī ca śatā'ityādi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5411: yāvatsaṃkhyākā vaiśvadevanividi saṃkhyātā devāsta etāvanta iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5412: punaśca śākalyena 'katame te'iti saṃkhyeyeṣu pṛṣṭeṣu yājñavalkyasyottaram-mahimāna evaiṣāmete trayastriṃśattveva devā iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5413: aṣṭau vasava ekādaśa rudrā dvādaśādityā indraśca prajāpatiśceti trayastriṃśaddevāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5414: tatrāgniśca pṛthivī ca vāyuścāntarikṣaṃ cādityaśca dyauśca candramāśca nakṣatrāṇi ceti vasavaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:5415: ete hi prāṇināṃ karmaphalāśrayeṇa kāryakāraṇasaṃghātarūpeṇa pariṇamanto jagadidaṃ sarvaṃ vāsayanti, tasmādvasavaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5416: katame rudrā iti daśeme puruṣe prāṇāḥ buddhikarmendriyāṇi daśa, ekādaśaṃ ca mana iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5418: te hi prāyaṇakāla utkrāmantaḥ puruṣaṃ rodayantīti rudrāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5419: katama ādityā iti dvādaśamāsāḥ saṃvatsarasyāvayavāḥ punaḥ punaḥ paruvartamānāḥ prāṇabhṛtāmāyūṃṣi ca karmaphalopabhogaṃ cādāpayantītyādityāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5420: aśanirindraḥ, sā hi balaṃ, sā hīndrasya paramā īśatā, tayā hi sarvānprāṇinaḥ pramāpayati, tena stanayitnuraśanirindraḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5421: yajñaḥ prajāpitiriti, yajñasādhanaṃ ca yajñarūpaṃ ca paśavaḥ prajāpatiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5422: eta eva trayastriṃśaddevāḥ ṣaṇṇāmagnipṛthivīvāyvantarikṣādityādivāṃ mahimāno na tato bhidyante
GSP33brsvbh1u:5424: te tu ṣaḍagniṃ pṛthivīṃ caikīkṛtyāntarikṣaṃ vāyuṃ caikīkṛtya divaṃ cādityaṃ caikīkṛtya trayo lokāstraya eva devā bhavanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5425: eta eva ca trayo 'nnaprāṇayorantarbhavanto 'nnaprāṇau dvau devau bhavataḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:5430: katama eka iti, sa evādhyardhaḥ prāṇa eko brahma /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5431: sarvadevātmatvena bṛhattvādbrahma tadeva syādityācakṣate parokṣābhidhāyakena śabdena /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5434: api ca pṛthagjanānāmapyupāyānuṣṭhānavaśātprāptāṇimadyaiśvaryāṇāṃ yugapannānākāyanirmāṇaṃ śrūyate, tatra kaiva kathā devānāṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:5436: aṇimā laghimā mahimā prāptiḥ prākāmyamīśitvaṃ vaśitvaṃ yatrakāmāvasāyitetyaiśvaryāṇi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5439: tadeva parisphuṭaṃ darśayituṃ vyatirekaṃ tāvadāha-kvacideka iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5440: na khalu bahuṣu śrāddheṣveko brāhmaṇo yugapadaṅgabhāvaṃ gantumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5442: yathaikaṃ brāhmaṇamuddiśya yugapannamaskāraḥ kriyate bahubhistathā svasthānasthitāmekāṃ devatāmuddiśya bahubhiryajamānairnānādeśāvasthitairyugapaddhavistyajyate, tasyāśca tatrāsaṃnihitāyā apyaṅgabhāvo bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5445: śabda iti cen nātaḥ prabhavāt pratyakṣānumānābhyām |
GSP33brsvbh1u:5447: gotvādivatpūrvāvamarśābhāvādupādherapyekasyāpratīteḥ pācakādivadākāśadiśabdavadvyaktivacanā eva vasvādiśabdāḥ tasyāśca nityatvāttayā saha saṃbandho nityo bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5448: vigrahādiyoge tu sāvayavatvena vasvādīnāmanityatvāttataḥ pūrvaṃ vasvādiśabdo na svārthena saṃbaddha āsīt, svārthasyaivābhāvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5449: tataścotpanne vasvādau vasvādiśabdasaṃbandhaḥ prādurbhavandevadattādiśabdasaṃbandhavatpuruṣabuddhiprabhava iti tatpūrvako vākyārthapratyayo 'pi puruṣabuddhyadhīnaḥ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5450: puruṣabuddhiśca mānāntarādhīnajanmeti mānāntarāpekṣayā prāmāṇyaṃ vedasya vyāhanyeteti śaṅkārthaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:5453: vasutvādijātivācakācchabdāttajjātīyāṃ vyaktiṃ cikīrṣitāṃ buddhivāsikhya tasyāḥ prabhavanam
GSP33brsvbh1u:5455: etaduktaṃ bhavati-yadyapi na śabda upādānakāraṇaṃ vasvādīnāṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:5457: na caitāvatā śabdārthasaṃbandhasyānityatvaṃ, vasvādijātervā tadupādhervā yayā kayācidākṛtyāvacchinnasya nityatvāditi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5464: etaduktaṃ bhavati-svayaṃbhuvo vedakartṛtve 'pi na kālidāsādivatsvatantratvamapi tu pūrvasṛṣṭyanusāreṇa
GSP33brsvbh1u:5471: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ-vācakaśabdaprabhavatvaṃ hi devānāmabhyupetavyaṃ, avācakena teṣāṃ buddhāvanālekhanāt
GSP33brsvbh1u:5472: tatra na tāvadvasvādīnāṃ vakārādayo varṇā vācakāḥ, teṣāṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:5475: api caite pratyekaṃ vā vākyārthamabhidadhīran militā vā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5478: nāpa militāḥ, teṣāmekavaktṛprayujyamānānāṃ rūpato vyaktito vā pratikṣaṇamapavargiṇāṃ mithaḥ sāhityasaṃbhavābhāvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5480: naca svarūpasāhityābhāve 'pi varṇānāmāgneyādīnāmiva saṃskāradvārakamasti sāhityamiti sāṃprataṃ, vikalpāsahatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5481: ko nu khalvayaṃ saṃskāro 'bhimataḥ, kimapūrvamāgneyādijanyamiva, kiṃvā bhāvanāparanāmā smṛtiprasavabījam
GSP33brsvbh1u:5494: nahi yaiva vahnerdahanaśaktiḥ saiva tasya prakāśanaśaktiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5495: nāpi dahanaśakteḥ prakāśanaśaktiḥ apica vyutkrameṇoccaritebhyo varṇebhyaḥ saivāsti smṛtibījaṃ vāsanetyarthapratyayaḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5506: na sphoṭa iti tu na mṛṣyāmaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5511: na cāyamasati bādhake ekapadavākyānubhavaḥ śakyo mithyetivaktum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5513: upādhiḥ khalvekadhīgrāhyatā vā syāt, ekārthadhīhetutā vā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5515: tathā sati dhavakhadirapalāśā iti na jātu syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5520: tasmādayamabādhito 'nupādhiśca padavākyagocara ekanirbhāsānubhavo varṇātiriktaṃ vācakamekamavalambate sa sphoṭa iti taṃ ca dhvanayaḥ pratyekaṃ vyañjayanto 'pi na drāgitveva viśadayanti, yena drāgārthadhīḥ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5521: api tu ratnatattvajñānavadyathāsvaṃ dvitricatuṣpañcaṣaḍdarśanajanitasaṃskāraparipākasacivacetopalabdhajanmani carame cetasi cakāsti viśadaṃ padavākyatattvamiti prāganutpannāyāstadanantaramarthadhiya udaya iti nottareṣāmānarthakyaṃ dhvanīnām /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5524: naca padapratyayavat, pratyekamavyaktāmarthadhiyamādhāsyanti prāñco varṇāḥ, caramastu tatsacivaḥ sphuṭatarāmiti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5527: arthadhiyastvapratyakṣāyā mānāntarajanmano vyakta evopajano na vā syānna punarasphuṭa iti na samaḥ samādhiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5528: tasmānnityaḥ sphoṭa eva vācako na varṇā iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5531: evaṃ hi varṇātiriktaḥ sphoṭo 'byupeyeta, yadi varṇānāṃ vācakatvaṃ na
GSP33brsvbh1u:5533: dvidhā ca vācakatvaṃ varṇānāṃ, kṣaṇikatvenāśakyasaṃgatigrahatvādvā vyastasamastaprakāradvayābhāvādvā
GSP33brsvbh1u:5547: na cedaṃ pratyabhijñānaṃ gatvādijātiviṣayaṃ na gādivyaktiviṣayaṃ, tāsāṃ pratinaraṃ bhedopalambhādata eva śabdabhedopalambhādvaktṛbheda unnīyate
GSP33brsvbh1u:5550: yathā kālākṣīṃ ca svastimatīṃ cekṣamāṇasya vyaktibhedaprathāyāṃ satyāmeva tadanugatamekaṃ sāmānyaṃ prathate, tathā kiṃ gakārādiṣu bhedena prathamāneṣveva gatvamekaṃ tadanugataṃ cakāsti, kiṃvā yathā gotvamājānata
GSP33brsvbh1u:5551: ekaṃ bhinnadeśaparimāṇasaṃsthānavyaktyupadhānabhedādbhinnadeśamivālpamiva mahadiva dīrghamiva vāmanamiva tathāgavyaktirājānata ekāpi vyañjakabhedāttadharmānupātinīva prathata iti bhavanta eva vidāṅkurvantu /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5552: tatra gavyaktibhedamaṅgīkṛtyāpi yo gatvasyaikasya paropadhānabhedakalpanāprayāsaḥ sa varaṃ gavyaktāvevāstu kimantargaḍunā gatvenābhyupetena /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5556: tathā sati daśa gakārānudacārayaccaitra iti hi pratyayaḥ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5558: na caiṣa jātyabhiprāyo 'bhyāso yathā śatakṛtvastittirīnupāyuṅkta devadatta iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5560: atra hi sorastāḍaṃ krandato 'pi gakārādivyaktau lokasyoccāraṇābhyāsapratyayasya vinirvṛttiḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:5565: na codāttādayo vyañjakadharmāḥ, na varṇadharmā iti sāṃpratam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5569: nahi guṇagocaramindriyaṃ guṇinamapi gocarayati, mā bhūvan ghrāṇarasanaśrotrāṇāṃ gandharasaśabdagocarāṇāṃ tadvantaḥ pṛthivyudakākāśā gocarāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5570: evaṃ ca mā nāma bhūdvāyugocaraṃ śrotram, tadguṇāṃstūdāttādīn gocarayiṣyati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5572: naca śabdasya pratyabhijñānāvadhṛtaikatvasya svarūpata udāttādayo dharmāḥ parasparavirodhino 'paryāyeṇa saṃbhavanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5575: viruddhanānādharmasaṃsargavibhramaḥ, na tu bhāviko nānādharmasaṃsarga iti sthite 'bhyupetya parihāramāha bhāṣyakāraḥ-athavā dhvanikṛta iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5580: na cāyamanirdhāritaviśeṣavarṇatvasāmānyamātrapratyayo na tu varṇātiriktadabhivyañjakadhvanipratyaya iti sāṃpratam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5583: tasmādavarṇātmako vaiṣa śabdaḥ, śabdātirikto vā dhvaniḥ, śabdavyañjakaḥ śrāvaṇo 'bhyupeyaḥ ubhayathāpi cākṣu vyañjaneṣu ca tattaddhvanibhedopadhānenānunāsikatvādayo 'vagamyamānāstaddharmā eva śabde pratīyante na tu svataḥ śabdasya dharmāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5584: tathā ca yeṣāmanunāsikatvādayo dharmāḥ parasparaviruddhā bhāsante bhavatu teṣāṃ dhvanīnāmanityatā
GSP33brsvbh1u:5586: yeṣu tu varṇeṣu pratyabhijñānaṃ na teṣāmanunāsikatvādayo dharmā iti nānityāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5588: yadyeṣa parasyāgraho dharmiṇyagṛhyamāṇe taddharmā na śakyā grahītumiti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5591: tadanena prabandhena kṣaṇikatvena varṇānāmaśakyasaṃgatigrahatayā yadavācakatvamāpāditaṃ varṇānāṃ tadapākṛtam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5600: yadi gakārādivilakṣaṇamavabhāsayet, gakārādirūṣitaḥ pratyayo na syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5602: padatattvamekaṃ pratyekamabhivyañjayanto dhvanayaḥ prayatnabhedabhinnāstulyasthānakaraṇaniṣpādyatayānyonyavisadṛśatattatpadḥavyañjakadhvanisādṛśyena svavyañjanīyasyaikasya padatattvasya mitho visadṛśānekapadasādṛśyānyāpādayantaḥ sādṛśyopadhānabhedādekamapyabhāgamapi nāneva bhāgavadiva bhāsayanti, mukhyamivaikaṃ niyatavarṇaparimāṇasthānasaṃsthānabhedamapi maṇikṛpāṇadarpaṇādayo
GSP33brsvbh1u:5604: evaṃ ca kalpitā evāsya bhāgā varṇā iti cet, tatkimidānīṃ varṇabhedānasatyapi bādhake mithyeti vaktumadhyavasito 'si /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5605: ekadhīreva nānātvasya badhiketi cet, hantāsyāṃ nānā varṇāḥ prathanta iti nānātvāvabhāsa ekaikatvaṃ kasmānna bādhate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5607: no khalu senāvanabuddhī gajapadātituragādīnāṃ campakāśokakiṃśukādīnāṃ ca bhedamapabādhamāne udīyete, api tu bhinnānāmeva satāṃ kenacidekenopādhināvacchinnānāmekatvāmāpādayataḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5610: tasmātpratyekavarṇānubhavajanitabhāvanānicayalabdhajanmani nikhilavarṇāvagāhini smṛtijñāna ekasminbhāsamānānāṃ varṇānāṃ tadekavijñānaviṣayatayā vaikārthadhīhetutayā vaikatvamaupacārikamavagantavyam na caikārthadhīhetutvenaikatvamekatvena caikārthadhīhetubhāva iti parasparāśrayam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5612: na ca tatprathanānantaraṃ vṛddhasyārthadhīrnonnīyate, tadupannayanācca teṣāmekārthadhiyaṃ prati kārakatvamekamavagamyaikapadatvādhyavasānamiti nānyonyāśrayam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5613: na caikasmṛtisamārohiṇāṃ kramākramaviparītakramaprayuktānāmabhedo varṇānāmiti yathākathañcitprayuktebhya etebhyor'thapratyayaprasaṅga iti vācyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5614: uktaṃ hi-'yāvanto yādṛśā ye ca padārthapratipādane /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5617: nanu paṅktibuddhāvekasyāmakramāyāmapi vāstavī śālādīnāmasti paṅgiriti tathaiva prathā yuktā, naca tatheha varṇānāṃ nityānāṃ vibhūnāṃ cāsti
GSP33brsvbh1u:5618: vāstavaḥ kramaḥ, pratyayopādhistu bhavet, sacaika iti, kutastyaḥ krama eṣāmiti cet, /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5620: tathāhi-jārārājeti padayoḥ prathayantyoḥ smṛtidhiyostattve 'pi varṇānāṃ kramabhedātpadabhedaḥ sphuṭataraṃ cakāsti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5633: nanu prācyāmeva mīmāṃsāyāṃ vedasya nityatvaṃ siddhaṃ tatkiṃ punaḥ sādhyata ityata āha-svatantrasya karturasmaraṇādeva hi sthite vedasya nityatva iti
GSP33brsvbh1u:5635: tasmānnityo vedaḥ jagadutpattihetutvāt, īśvaravaditi siddhameva nityatvamanena dṛḍhīkṛtam
GSP33brsvbh1u:5647: antaḥkaraṇādyupādhikalpitā hi te tadvicchede na sthātumarhanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5648: naca brahmaṇastadvāsanā, tasya vidyātmanaḥ śuddhasvabhāvasya tadayogāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5649: brahmaṇaśca sṛṣṭyādāvantaḥkaraṇāni tadavacchinnāścha jīvāḥ prādurbhavanto napūrvakarmāvidyāvāsanāvanto bhavitumarhanti, apūrvatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5654: yadyapi mahāpralayasamaye nāntaḥkaraṇādayaḥ samudācaradvṛttayaḥ santi tathāpi svakāraṇe 'nirvācyāyāmavidyāyāṃ līnāḥ sūkṣmeṇa śaktirūpeṇa
GSP33brsvbh1u:5659: te cāvadhiṃ prāpya parameśvarecchāpracoditā yathā kūrmadehe nilīnānyaṅgāni tato niḥsaranti, yathā vā varṣāpāye prāptamṛdbhāvāni maṇḍūkaśarīrāṇi tadvāsanāvāsitatayā ghanaghanāghanāsārāvasekasuhitāni punarmaṇḍūkadehabhāvamanubhavanti, tathā pūrvavāsanāvaśātpūrvasamānanāmarūpāṇyutpadyante etaduktaṃ bhavati-yadyapīśvarātprabhavaḥ saṃsāramaṇḍalasya, tathāpīśvaraḥ prāṇabhṛtkarmāvidyāsahakārī tadanurūpameva sṛjati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5660: naca sargapralayapravāhasyānāditāmantareṇaitadupapadyata iti sargapralayābhyayupagame 'pi saṃsārānāditā na virudhyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5664: bhavatvanāditā saṃsārasya, tathāpi mahāpralayāntarite kutaḥ smaraṇaṃ vedānāmityata āha-anādau ca saṃsāre yathā svāpaprabodhayoriti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5666: tathāpi karmavikṣepasaṃskārasahitalayalakṣaṇā vidyāvaśeṣatāsāmyena svāpapralayāvasthayorabheda iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5667: nanu nāparyāyeṇa sarveṣāṃ suṣuptāvasthā, keṣāñcittadā prabodhāt, tebhyaśca suptotthitānāṃ grahaṇasaṃbhavāt, prāyaṇakālaviprakarṣayośca vāsanocchedakāraṇayorabhāvena satyāṃ vāsanāyāṃ smaraṇopapatteḥ śabdārthasaṃbandhavedavyahārānucchedo yujyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5668: mahāpralayastvaparyāyeṇa prāṇabhṛnmātravartī, prāyaṇakālaviprakarṣau ca tatra saṃskāramātrocchedahetū sta iti kutaḥ suṣuptavatpūrvaprabodhavyavahāravaduttaraprabodhavyavahāra iti codayati-syādetat svāpa iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5677: yathāvā ā ca manuṣyebhya ā ca kṛmibhyo jñānādīnāmanubhūyate nikarṣaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5678: evamā manuṣyebhya eva ā ca bhagavato hiraṇyagarbhajjñānādīnāṃ prakarṣe 'pi
GSP33brsvbh1u:5685: asyāṃ tu sṛṣṭāvanya eva vedāḥ, anya eva caiṣāmarthāḥ, anya eva varṇāśramāḥ, dharmāccānarthor'thaścādharmāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5688: tathāca pūrvavyavahārocchedācchabdārthasaṃbandhaśca vedaścānityau prasajyeyātāmityata āha-prāṇināṃ ca sukhaprāptaya iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5689: yathāvastusvabhāvasāmarthyaṃ hi sargaḥ pravartate, natu svabhāvasāmarthyamanyathayitumarhati
GSP33brsvbh1u:5690: nahi jātu sukhaṃ tattvena jihāsyate, duḥkhaṃ copāditsyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5693: tathā sati vastusāmarthyaniyamābhāvātsarvaṃ sarvasmādbhavediti pipāsurapi dahanamāhṛtya pipāsāmupaśamayet, śītārto vā toyamāhṛtya śītārtimiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5695: evaṃ ya eva vedā asminkalpe ta eva kalpāntare, ta eva caiṣāmarthā ta eva ca varṇāśramāḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:5706: brahmavidyāsvadhikāraṃ devarṣīṇāṃ brūvāṇaḥ praṣṭavyo jāyate, kiṃ sarvāsu brahmavidyā svaviśeṣeṇa sarveṣāṃ kiṃvā kāsucideva keṣāñcit /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5709: asau vā ādityo devamadhvityatra hi manuṣyā ādityaṃ madhvadhyāsenopāsīran /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5710: upāsyopāsakabhāvo hi bhedādhiṣṭhāno na svātmanyādityasya devatāyāḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5714: ayamarthaḥ-'asau vā ādityo devamadhu'iti devānāṃ modahetutvānmadhviva madhu /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5718: yāni ca somājyapayaḥprabhṛtīnyagnau hūyate tānyādityaraśmibhiragnisaṃvalitairūtpannapākānyamṛtībhāvamāpannānyadityamaṇḍalamṛṅmantramadhupairnīyante yathā hi bhramarāḥ puṣpebhya āhṛtya makarandaṃ svasthānamānayantyevamṛṅmantrabhramarāḥ prayogasamavetārthasmaraṇādibhirṛgvedavihitebhyaḥ karmakusumebhya āhṛtya tanniṣpannaṃ makarandamādityamaṇḍalaṃ lohitābhirasya prācībhī raśmināḍībhirānayanti, tadamṛtaṃ vasava upajīvanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5719: athāsyādityamadhuno dakṣiṇābhī raśmināḍībhiḥ śuklābhiryajurvedavihitakarmakusumebhya āhṛtyāgnau hutaṃ somādi pūrvavadamṛtabhāvamāpannaṃ yajurvedamantrabhramarā ādityamaṇḍalamānayanti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5721: athāsyādityamadhunaḥ pratīcībhī raśmināḍībhiḥ kṛṣṇābhiḥ sāmavedavihitakarmakusumebhya āhṛtyāgnau hutaṃ somādi pūrvavadamṛtabhāvamāpannaṃ sāmamantrastotrabhramarā ādityamaṇḍalamānayanti, tadamṛtamādityā upajīvanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5722: athāsyādityamadhuna udīcibhiratikṛṣṇābhī raśmināḍībhirathavedavihitebhyaḥ karmakusumebhya āhṛtyāgnau hutaṃ somādi
GSP33brsvbh1u:5725: aśvamedhe vācaḥstome ca pāriplavaṃ śaṃsanti iti śravaṇāditihāsapurāṇamantrāṇāmapyasti prayogaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:5727: athāsya yā ādityamadhuna ūrdhvā raśmināḍyo gopyāstābhirupāsanabhramarāḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:5729: tā etā ādityavyapāśrayāḥ pañca rohitādayo raśmināḍya ṛgādisaṃbaddhāḥ krameṇopadiśyeti yojanā
GSP33brsvbh1u:5730: etadevāmṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvopalabhya yathāsvaṃ samastaiḥ karaṇairyaśastejaindriyasākalyavīryānnādyānyamṛtaṃ tadupalabhyāditye tṛpyati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5731: tena khalvamṛtena devānāṃ vasvādīnāṃ modanaṃ vidadhadādityo madhu /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5732: etaduktaṃ bhavati-na kevalamupāsyopāsakabhāva ekasminvirudhyate, api tu jñātṛjñeyabhāvaśca prāpyaprāpakabhāvaśceti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5735: ākāśasya hi sarvagatatvaṃ rūpādihīnatve ca brahmaṇā sārūpyaṃ, tasya caitasyākāśasya brahmaṇaścatvāraḥ pādā agnyādayaḥ 'agniḥ pādaḥ'ityādinā
GSP33brsvbh1u:5737: yathā hi goḥ pādā na gavā viyujyanta, evamagnyādayo 'pi nākāśena sarvagatenetyākāśasya pādāḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:5738: tadevamākāśasya catuṣpado brahmadṛṣṭiṃ vidhāya svarūpeṇa vāyuṃ saṃvargaguṇakamupāsyaṃ vidhātuṃ mahīkaroti-vāyurvāva saṃvargaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5743: yadyucyeta nāviśeṣaṇa sarveṣāṃ devarṣīṇāṃ sarvāsu brahmavidyāsvadhikāraḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5756: indro vṛtrāṇi jighnate'iti vigrahavattvaṃ devatāyā mantrārthavādā
GSP33brsvbh1u:5760: tatheśanam-'indro diva indra īśe pṛthivyā indro apāmindra itparvatānām /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5761: indro vṛdhāmindra inmedhirāṇāmindraḥ kṣeme yoge havya indraḥ'iti, tathā
GSP33brsvbh1u:5763: tathā varivasitāraṃ prati devatāyāḥ prasādaṃ prasannāyāśca phaladānāṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:5764: darśayati-'āhutibhireva devān hutādaḥ prīṇāti tasmai prītā iṣamūrjaṃ ca
GSP33brsvbh1u:5768: laukikā api devatāvigrahādipañcakaṃ smaranti coparacaranti ca /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5769: tathāhi-yamaṃ daṇḍahastamālikhanti, ruṇaṃ pāśahastam, indraṃ vajrahastam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5772: tathāsyāḥ prasādaṃ ca prasannāyāśca phaladānamāhuḥ-prasanno 'sya paśupatiḥ putro 'sya jātaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:5776: na khalupratyakṣādivyatirikto loko nāma pramāṇāntaramasti, kintu pratyakṣādimūlā lokaprasiddhiḥ satyatāmaśrute, tadabhāve tvandhaparamparāvanmūlābhāvādvipalvate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5778: na cetihāsādi mūlaṃ bhavitumarhati, tasyāpi pauriṣeyatvena pratyakṣādyapekṣaṇāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5782: vidhyuddeśenaikavākyatāmāpadyamānā arthavādā vidhiviṣayaprāśastyalakṣaṇāparā na svārthe pramāṇaṃ bhavitumarhanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5784: pramāṇāntareṇa tu yatra svārthe 'pi samarthyate, yathā vāyoḥ kṣepiṣṭatvam,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5786: yatra tu na pramāṇāntaramasti, yathā vigrahādipañcake, sor'thaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:5790: na caikaṃ vākyamubhayaparaṃ bhavatīti vākyaṃ bhidyeta /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5793: mantrāśca vrīhyādivacchutyādibhistatra tatra viniyujyamānāḥ pramāṇabhāvānanupraveśinaḥ kathamupayujyantāṃ teṣa teṣu karmasvityapekṣāyāṃ dṛṣṭe prakāre saṃbhavati nādṛṣṭakalpanocitā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5794: dṛṣṭaśca prakāraḥ prayogasamavetārthasmāraṇaṃ, smṛtyā cānutiṣṭhanti khalvanuṣṭhātāraḥ padārthān
GSP33brsvbh1u:5795: autsargikī cārthaparatā padānāmityapekṣitaprayogasamavetārthasmaraṇatātparyāṇāṃ mantrāṇāṃ nānadhigate vigrahādāvapi tātparyaṃ yujyata iti na tebhyo 'pi tatsiddhiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5810: nahi śvitrinirṇejanaparaṃ śveto dhāvatīti vākyamitaḥ sārameyagamanaṃ gamayitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5814: nahyudakāharaṇārthinā ghaṭadarśanāyonmīlitaṃ cakṣurghaṭapaṭau vā paṭaṃ vā kevalaṃ nopalabhate
GSP33brsvbh1u:5817: ayamabhisaṃdhiḥ-loke viśiṣṭārthapratyāyanāya padāni prayuktāni tadantareṇa na svārthamātrasmāraṇe paryavasyanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5818: nahi svārthasmāraṇamātrāya loke padānāṃ prayogo dṛṣṭapūrvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5820: na caitānyasmāritasvārthāni sākṣādvākyārthaṃ pratyāyayitumīśate iti svārthasmāraṇaṃ vākyārthamitaye 'vāntaravyāpāraḥ kalpitaḥ padānām /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5821: naca yadarthaṃ yattattena vinā paryavasyatīti na svārthamātrabhidhāne paryavasānaṃ padānām
GSP33brsvbh1u:5830: yatra tu vākyasyaikasya vākyāntareṇa saṃbandhastatra lokānusārato bhūtārthavyutpattau ca siddhāyamekaikasya vākyasya tattadviśiṣṭārthapratyāyanena paryavasitavṛttinaḥ paścātkutaściddhetoḥ prayojanāntarāpekṣāyāmanvayaḥ kalpyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5831: yathā 'vāyurvai kṣepiṣṭhā devatā vāyumeva svena bhāgadheyenopadhāvati sa
GSP33brsvbh1u:5833: iha hi yadi na svādhyāyādhyāyanavidhiḥ svādhyāyaśabdavācyaṃ vedarāśiṃ puruṣārthatāmaneṣyattato bhūtārthamātraparyavasitā nārthavādā vidhyuddeśenaikavākyatāmāgamiṣyan /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5834: tasmāt svādhyāyavidhivaśātkaimarthyākāṅkṣāyāṃ vṛttāntādigocarāḥ santastatpratyāyanadvāreṇa vidheyaprāśastyaṃ lakṣayanti, na punaravivakṣitasvārthā eva tallakṣaṇe prabhavanti, tathā sati lakṣaṇaiva
GSP33brsvbh1u:5837: ata eva gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityatra gaṅgāśabdaḥ svārthasaṃbaddhabheva tīraṃ lakṣayati na tu samudratīraṃ, tatkasya hetoḥ, svārthapratyāsattyābhāvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5839: ata eva yatra pramāṇāntaraviruddhārtā arthavādā dṛśyante, yathāḥ-'ādityo
GSP33brsvbh1u:5840: vai yūpaḥ' 'yajamānaḥ prastaraḥ'ityevamādayaḥ, tatra yathā pramāṇāntarāvirodhaḥ, yathā ca stutyarthatā, tadubhayasiddhyarthaṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:5842: tasmādyatra sor'thorthavādānāṃ pramāṇāntaraviruddhastatra guṇavādena prāśastyalakṣaṇeti lakṣitalakṣaṇā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5847: pramātā hyavyutpannaḥ prathamaṃ yathā pratyakṣādibhyor'thamavagacchati na
GSP33brsvbh1u:5850: nanvevaṃ mānāntaravirodhe 'pi kasmādguṇavādo bhavati, yāvatā śabdavirodhe mānāntarameva kasmānna bādhyate, vedāntairivādvaitaviṣayaiḥ pratyakṣādayaḥ prapañcagocarāḥ, kasmādvār'thavādavadvedāntā api guṇavādena na nīyante /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5851: atrocyate-lokānusārato dvividho hi viṣayaḥ śabdānām, dvārataśca tātparyataśca /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5852: yathaikasminvākye padānāṃ padārthā dvārato vākyārthaśca tātparyato viṣayaḥ evaṃ vākyadvayaikavākyatāyāmapi
GSP33brsvbh1u:5853: yatheyaṃ devadattīyā gauḥ kretavyetyekaṃ vākyam, eṣā bahukṣīretyaparaṃ tadasya bahukṣīratvapratipādanaṃ dvāram /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5856: yathā viṣaṃ bhakṣayeti vākyaṃ mā asya gṛhe bhuṅkṣveti vākyāntarārthaparaṃ sat /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5857: yatra tu tātparyaṃ tatra mānāntaravirodhe pauruṣeyapramāṇameva bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5858: vedāntāstu paurvāparyaparyālocanayā nirastasamastabhedaprapañcabrahmapratipādanaparā apauruṣeyatā svataḥsiddhatāttvikapramāṇabhāvāḥ santasttāttvikapramāṇabhāvādpratyakṣādīni pracyāvya sāṃvyavahārike tasminvyavasthāpayante /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5859: na ca 'ādityo vai yūpaḥ'iti vākyamādityasya yūpatvapratipādanaparamapi tu
GSP33brsvbh1u:5862: yatra tu pramāṇāntaraṃ virodhakaṃ nāsti, yathā devatāvigrahādau, tatra dvārato 'pi viṣayaḥ pratīyamāno na śakyastyaktum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5863: naca guṇavādena netuṃ, ko hi mukhye saṃbhavati gauṇamāśrayedatiprasaṅgāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5864: tathā satyanadhigataṃ vigrahādi pratipādayat vākyaṃ bhidyeteti cet addhā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5869: naca yasya yatra na tātparyaṃ tasya tatrāprāmāṇyaṃ, tathā, sati viśiṣṭaparaṃ vākyaṃ viśeṣaṇeṣvapramāṇamiti viśiṣṭaparamapi na syāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:5878: naca bhūtārthamapyapauruṣeyaṃ vaco mānāntarāpekṣaṃ svārthe, yena mānāntarāsaṃbhave bhavedapramāṇamityuktam
GSP33brsvbh1u:5880: tātparyaikye 'pi yadi vākyabhedaḥ, kathaṃ tarhyarthaikatvādekaṃ vākyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5883: sa tu padārthāntaraviśiṣṭaḥ padārtha ekaḥ kvacid dvārabhūtaḥ kvacid dvārītyetāvān viśeṣaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:5884: nanvevaṃ sati odanaṃ bhuktvā grāmaṃ gacchatītyatrāpi vākyabhedaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5885: anyo hi saṃsargaḥ odanaṃ bhuktveti, anyastu grāmaṃ gacchatīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5888: bhuktveti hi samānakartṛkatā pūrvakālatā ca pratīyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5890: tasmādyāvati padasamūhe padāhitāḥ padārthasmṛtayaḥ paryavasanti tāvadekaṃ vākyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5891: arthavādavākye caitāḥ paryavasyanti vinaiva vidhivākyaṃ viśiṣṭārthapratīteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5892: na ca dvābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ padābhyāṃ viśiṣṭārthapratyayaparyavasānāt pañcaṣaṭpadavati vākye ekasminnānātvaprasaṅgaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:5893: nānātve 'pi viśeṣāṇānāṃ viśeṣyasyaikatvāt, tasya ca sakṛcchutasya
GSP33brsvbh1u:5896: tasmādvidhivākyādarthavādavākyamanyaditi vākyayoreva svasvavākyārthapratyayāvasitavyāpārayoḥ paścātkutaścidapekṣāyāṃ parasparānvaya iti siddham /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5898: devatāmuddiśya haviravamṛśya ca tadviṣayasvatvatyāga iti yāgaśarīram /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5900: naca rūparahitā cetasi śakyata ālekhitumiti yāgavidhinaiva tadrūpāpekṣiṇā yādṛśamanyaparebhyo 'pi mantrārthavādebhyastadrūpamavagataṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:5903: yathā hi 'vrātyo vrātyastomena yajate'iti vrātyasvarūpāpekṣāyāṃ yasya pitā
GSP33brsvbh1u:5904: pitāmaho vā somaṃ na pibet sa vrātya iti vrātyasvarūpamavagataṃ vrātyastomavidhyapekṣitaṃ sadvidhipramāṇakaṃ bhavati, yathā vā svargasya
GSP33brsvbh1u:5906: iti vidhināpekṣitaṃ sadarthavādato 'vagamyamānaṃ vidhipramāṇakam, tathā devatārūpamapi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5907: nanūddeśo rūpajñānamapekṣate na punā rūpasattāmapi, devatāyāḥ samāropeṇāpi ca rūpajñānamupapadyata iti samāropitameva rūpaṃ devatāyā
GSP33brsvbh1u:5911: tasya tu rūpasyāsati bādhake 'nubhavārūḍhaṃ tathābhāvaṃ parityajyānyathātvamananubhūyamānamasāṃprataṃ kalpayitum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5914: vidhyapekṣāyāmanyaparādapi vākyādavagator'thaḥ svīkriyate, tadapekṣaiva tu nāsti, śabdarūpasya devatābhāvāt, tasya ca mānāntaravedyatvādityata
GSP33brsvbh1u:5916: na kevalaṃmantrārthavādato vigrahādisiddhiḥ, api tu itihāsapurāṇalokasmaraṇebhyo mantrārthavādamūlebhyo vā pratyakṣādamūlebhyo
GSP33brsvbh1u:5920: tadevaṃ mantrārthavādādisiddhe devatāvigrahādau gurvādipūjāvaddevatāpūjātmako yāgo devatāprasādādidvāreṇa
GSP33brsvbh1u:5923: na caivaṃ yajñakarmaṇo devatāṃ prati guṇabhāvāddevatātaḥ phalotpāde yāgabhāvanāyāḥ śrutaṃ phalavattvaṃ yāgasya ca tāṃ prati tatphalāṃśaṃ vā prati śrutaṃ karaṇatvaṃ hātavyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5929: phalavattvāt pradhānatvamubhayasminnapi pakṣe samānaṃ, natu devatāyā vigrahādimatyāḥ prādhānyamiti na dharmamīmāṃsāyāḥ sūtram-'api vā śabdapūrvatvādyajñakarma pradhānaṃ guṇatve devatāśrutiḥ'iti virudhyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5936: nirmṛṣṭanikhiladuḥkhānuṣaṅge śāśvatika ānande kasya nāma cetanasyārthitā
GSP33brsvbh1u:5939: dvividhaṃ hi sāmarthyaṃ nijaṃ cāgantukaṃ ca /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5945: yato yuktaṃ 'yadāhavanīye juhoti'ityāhavanīyasya homādhikaraṇatayā vidhānāttadrūpasyālaukikatānārabhyādhītavākyavihitādādhānādanyato 'nadhigamādādhānasya ca dvijātisaṃbandhitayā vidhānāttatsādhyo
GSP33brsvbh1u:5946: 'gniralaukiko na śūdrasyāstīti nāhavanīyādisādhye karmaṇi śūdrasyādhikāra iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5947: naca tathā brahmavidyāyāmalaukikamasti sādhanaṃ yacchūdrasya na syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5951: tadadhyayanaṃ puruṣārthe vā niyamyet, yathā dhanārjane pratigrahādi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5954: nahi 'svādhyāyo 'dhyetavyaḥ'iti kañcit kratuṃ prakṛtya paṭhyate, yathā darśapūrṇamāsaṃ prakṛtya iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5958: nahi yathā juhvādi avyabhicāritakratusaṃbaddhamevaṃ svādhyāya iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5961: puruṣecchādhīnapravṛttirhi puruṣārtho bhavati, yathā phalaṃ tadupāyo vā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5962: tadupāye 'pi hi vidhitaḥ prāk sāmānyarūpā pravṛttiḥ puruṣecchānibandhanaiva /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5966: kraturiti hi vidhiviṣayeṇa vidhiṃ parāmṛśati viṣayiṇam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5968: na cādhyayanaṃ vā svādhyāyo vā tadarthajñānaṃ vā prāgvidheḥ puruṣecchādhīnapravṛttiḥ, yena puruṣārthaḥ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5972: tathā cādhyayanavidheraniyāmakatvācchūdrasyādhyayanena vā pustakādipāṭhena vā sāmarthyamastīti so 'pi brahmavidyāyāmadhikriyeta /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5973: mā bhūdvādhyayanābhāvātsarvatra brahmavidyāyāmadhikāraḥ, saṃvargavidyāyāṃ tu bhaviṣyati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5974: 'aha hāretvā śūdra'iti śūdraṃ saṃbodhya tasyāḥ pravṛtteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5977: tasmādyathānadhīyānasyeṣṭau niṣādasthapateradhikāro vacanasāmarthyādevaṃ saṃvargavidyāyāṃ śūdrasyādhikāro bhaviṣyatīti prāptam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5982: piṇḍapitṛyajñavat svargaṃ vā, suvarṇaṃ bhāryamitivadārthavādikaṃ vā phalaṃ kalpayitvā viniyogabhaṅgena svādhyāyenādhīyītetyevamarthaḥ kalpatāṃ, kiṃvā paramparayāpyanyato 'pekṣitamadhigamya nirvṛṇotviti viṣaye, na dṛṣṭadvāreṇa paramparayāpyanyato 'pekṣitapratilambhe ca yathāśrutiviniyogopapattau ca saṃbhavantyāṃ śrutiviniyogabhaṅgenādhyayanādevāśrutādṛṣṭaphalakalpanocitā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5984: tena hi puruṣeṇa sa prāpyate, prāptaśca
GSP33brsvbh1u:5986: natu suvarṇadhāraṇādau dṛṣṭadvāreṇa kiñcit paramparayāpyastyapekṣitaṃ puruṣasya, tasmādviparivṛtya sākṣāddhāraṇādeva viniyogabhaṅgena phalaṃ kalpyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:5987: yadā cādhyanasaṃskṛtena svādhyāyena phalavatkarmabrahmāvabodhe bhāvyamāno 'byudayaniḥśreyasaprayojana iti sthāpitaṃ tadā yasyādhyayanaṃ tasyaiva karmabrahmāvabodho 'bhyudayaniḥśreyasaprayojano nānyasya, yasya
GSP33brsvbh1u:5989: pustakādipaṭhitasvādhyāyajanyor'thāvabodhaḥ śūdrāṇāṃ na phalāya kalpata iti śāstrīyasāmarthyābhāvānna śūdro brahmavidyāyāmadhikriyata iti siddham
GSP33brsvbh1u:6002: asmākaṃ tu anyaparādapi vākyādasati bādhake pramāṇāntareṇārthāvagamyamāno vidhinā cāpekṣitaḥ svīkriyata eva /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6005: vidhyuddeśagatatve tvayaṃ nyāyo 'podyate vacanabalānniṣādasthapativanna tveṣa vidhyuddeśagata ityuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6007: apica kimarthavādabalādvidyāmātre 'dhikāraḥ śūdrasya kalpate saṃvargavidyāyāṃ vā na tāvadvidyāmātra ityāha-kāmaṃ cāyamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6010: astu tarhi saṃvargavidyāyāmeva śūdrasyādhikāra ityata āha-arthavādasthatvāditi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6011: tatkimetacchūdrapadaṃ pramattagītaṃ, na caityadyuktaṃ, tulyaṃ hi sāṃpradāyikamityata āha-śakyate cāyaṃ śūdraśabda iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6014: sa ca teṣu teṣu grāmanagaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu vividhānāmannapānānāṃ pūrṇānatithibhya āvasathān kārayāmāsa
GSP33brsvbh1u:6016: athāsya rājño dānaśauṇḍasya guṇagarimasaṃtoṣitāḥ santo devarṣayo haṃsarūpamāsthāya tadanugrahāya tasya nidādhasamaye doṣā harmyatalasthasyopari mālāmābadhyājagmuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6017: teṣāmagresaraṃ haṃsaṃ saṃbodhya pṛṣṭhataḥ patannekatamo haṃsaḥ sādbhutamabhyuvāda /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6018: bho bho bhallākṣa bhallākṣa, jānaśruterasya pautrāyaṇasya dyuniśaṃ dyuloka āyataṃ jyotistanmā prasāṅkṣīrmaitattvā dhākṣīditi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6024: yasmādayaṃ varākastasmātkamenaṃ kiṃbhūtametaṃ santaṃ prāṇimātraṃ raikvamiva sayugvānamāttha
GSP33brsvbh1u:6025: yugvā gantrī śakaṭī tayā saha vartatā iti sa yugvā raikvastamiva kamenaṃ prāṇimātraṃ jānaśrutimāttha
GSP33brsvbh1u:6027: tasya hi bhagavataḥ puṇyajñānasaṃbhārasaṃbhṛtasya raikvasya brahmavido dharme trailokyodaravartiprāṇabhṛnmātradharmo 'ntarbhavati na punā raikvadharmakakṣāṃ kasyaciddharmo 'vagāhata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6028: athaiṣa haṃsavacanādātmano 'tyantanikarṣamutkarṣakāṣṭhāṃ ca raikvasyopaśrutya viṣaṇṇamānaso jānaśrutiḥ kitava ivākṣaparājitaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:6030: tato niśāvasānapiśunamanibhṛtavandāruvṛndaprārabdhastutisahasrasaṃvalitaṃ maṅgalatūryanirghoṣamākarṇya talpatalastha eva rājā ekapade yantāramāhūyādideśa, vayasya, raikvāhvayaṃ brahmavidamekaratiṃ sayugvānamativivikteṣu teṣu teṣu
GSP33brsvbh1u:6032: sa ca tatra tatrānviṣyan kvacidativivekte deśe śakaṭasyādhastāt pāmānaṃ kaṇḍūyamānaṃ brāhmaṇāyanamadrākṣīt
GSP33brsvbh1u:6033: taṃ ca dṛṣṭvā raikvo 'yaṃ bhaviteti pratibhāvānupaviśya savinayamaprākṣīt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6034: tvamasi he bhagavan, sayugvā raikva iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6035: tasya ca raikvabhāvānumatiṃ ca taistairiṅgitairgārhasthyecchāṃ dhanāyāṃ connīya yantā rājñe nivedayāmāsa /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6036: rājā tu taṃ niśamya gavāṃ ṣaṭśatāni niṣkaṃ ca hāraṃ cāśvatarīrathaṃ cādāya satvaraṃ raikvaṃ praticakrame /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6038: hai raikva, gavāṃ ṣaṭśatānīmāni niṣkaśca hāra ścāyamaśvatarīrathaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6040: tamevamuktavantaṃ prati sāṭopaṃ ca saspṛhaṃ covāca raikvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6041: aha hāretvā śūdra, tavaiva saha gobhirastviti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6043: hāreṇa yuktā itvā gantrī ratho hāretvā sa gobhiḥ saha tavaivāstu,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6044: kimetanmātreṇa mama dhanenākalpavartino gārhasthyasya nirvāhānupayogineti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6045: āharetveti tu pāṭhonarthakatayā ca gobhiḥ sahetyatra pratisaṃbandhyanupādānena cācāryairdūṣitaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:6046: tadasyāmākhyāyikāyāṃ śakyaḥ śūdraśabdena jānaśrutī rājanyo 'pyavayavavyutpattyā vaktum
GSP33brsvbh1u:6047: sa hi raikvaḥ parokṣajñatāṃ cikhyāpayiṣurātmano jānaśruteḥ śūdreti śucaṃ sūcayāmāsa /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6048: kathaṃ punaḥ śūdraśabdena śugutpannā sūcyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6055: tasmāttadādravaṇāditi tacchabdena śugvā jānaśrutirvā raikvo vā parāmṛśyata ityuktam //34//
GSP33brsvbh1u:6059: itaśca na jātiśūdro jānaśrutiḥ yatkāraṇaṃprakaraṇanirūpaṇe kriyamāṇe kṣatriyatvamasya jānaśruteravagamyate caitrarathena liṅgāditi vyācakṣāṇaḥ prakaraṇaṃ nirūpayati-uttaratra hi saṃvargavidyāvākyaśeṣe caitrarathenābhipratāriṇā niścitakṣatriyatvena samānāyāṃ saṃvargavidyāyāṃ samabhivyāhārālliṅgātsaṃdigdhakṣatriyabhāvo jānaśrutiḥ kṣatriyo niścīyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6060: 'atha ha śaunakaṃ ca kāpeyamabhipratāriṇaṃ ca kākṣaseniṃ sūdena pariviṣyamāṇau brahmacārī bibhikṣe'iti prasiddhayājakatvena kāpeyenābhipratāriṇo yogaḥ pratīyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6067: etena vai citrarathaṃ kāpeyā ayājayannitichandogānāṃ dvirātre śrūyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6069: eṣa cābhipratāri citrarathādanyaḥ sanneva kāpeyānāṃ yājyo bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6070: yadi caitrarathiḥ syāt samānānvayānāṃ hi prāyeṇa samānānvayā yājakā bhavanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6074: kṣattṛpreṣaṇe cārthasaṃbhave ca tādṛśasya vadānyapraṣṭhasyaiśvaryaṃ prāyeṇa kṣatriyasya dṛṣṭaṃ yudhiṣṭhirādivaditi //35//
GSP33brsvbh1u:6078: na kevalamupanītādhyayanavidhiparāmarśena na śūdrasyādhikāraḥ kintu teṣu teṣu vidyopadeśeṣūpanayanasaṃskāraparāmarśāt śūdrasya tadabhāvābhidhānādbrahmavidyāyāmanadhikāra iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6083: tacca dvijātīnāmiti dvijātaya eva niṣiddhopanayanā adhikriyante na śūdra iti //36//
GSP33brsvbh1u:6087: satyakāmo ha vai jābālaḥ pramītapitṛkaḥ svāṃ mātaraṃ jabālāṃ papraccha,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6088: ahamācāryakule brahmacaryaṃ cariṣyāmī, tadbravītu bhavatī kiṅgotro 'hamiti
GSP33brsvbh1u:6093: sa hovāca, nāvijñātagotra upanīyata iti kiṅgotro 'sīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6094: athovāca satyakāmo nāhaṃ veda svaṃ gotraṃ, svāṃ mātaraṃ jabālāmapṛcchaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6097: tenāsminna śūdratvasaṃbhāvanāstīti tvāṃ dvijātijanmānamupaneṣya ityupanetamanuśāsituṃ ca jābālaṃ gautamaḥ pravṛttaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6109: prāṇavajraśrutibalādvākyaṃ prakaraṇaṃ ca bhaṅktvā vāyuḥ pañcavṛttirādhyātmiko bāhyaścātra pratipādyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6112: vāyureva hi bāhyo dhūmajyotiḥsalilasaṃvalitaḥ parjanyabhāvena pariṇato vidyutstanayitnuvṛṣṭyaśanibhāvena vivartate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6113: yadyapi ca sarvaṃ jagaditi savāyukaṃ pratīyate tathāpi sarvaśabda āpekṣiko
GSP33brsvbh1u:6117: amṛtaśabdo 'pi maraṇābhāvavacano na sārvakālikaṃ tadabhāvaṃ brūte,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6122: savāyukasya jagataḥ kampanāt, paramātmaiva śabdātpramita iti
GSP33brsvbh1u:6124: brahmaṇohi bibhyadetajjagatkṛtsnaṃ svavyāpāre niyamena pravartate na tu maryādāmativartate
GSP33brsvbh1u:6125: etaduktaṃ bhavati-na śrutisaṃkocamātraṃ śrutyarthaparityāge hetuḥ, api tu pūrvāparavākyaikavākyatāprakaraṇābhyāṃ saṃvalitaḥ śrutisaṃkocaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6131: yatkhalu pṛṣṭaṃ tadeva pradhānaṃ prativaktavyamiti tasya prakaraṇam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6134: 'apapunarmṛtyuṃ jayati'iti śrutyā hyapamṛtyorvijaya ukto natu paramamṛtyuvijaya ityāpekṣikatvaṃ, tacca tatraiva prakaraṇāntarakaraṇena
GSP33brsvbh1u:6142: atra hi jyotiḥśabdasya tejasi mukhyatvāt, brahmaṇi jaghanyatvāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6148: ādityaścārcirādyapekṣayā paraṃ jyotirbhavatīti tadupasaṃpadya tasya samīpe bhūtvā svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyate, kāryabrahmalokaprāptau krameṇa mucyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6149: brahmajyotiḥpakṣe tu brahma bhūtvā kā parā svarūpaniṣpattiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6151: sā hi brahmabhūyātprācīnā na tu parācīnā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6153: tasmāttisṛbhiḥ śrutibhiḥ prakaraṇabādhanātteja evātra jyotiriti prāptam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6160: tadantaḥpātinastu sarve tadanuguṇatayā netavyāḥ, natu śrutyanurodhamātreṇa prakaraṇādapakraṣṭavyā iti hi lokasthitiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6161: anyathopāṃśuyājavākye jāmitādoṣopakrame tatpratisamādhānopasaṃhāre ca tadantaḥ pātino 'viṣṇurupāṃśu yaṣṭavyaḥ'ityādayo vidhiśrutyanurodhena pṛthagvidhayaḥ prasajyeran /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6163: prakaraṇānurodhātsāmudāyaprasiddhibalalabdhamahargaṇābhidhānaṃ parityajyāhīnaśabdaḥ kathamapyavayavavyutpattyā sānnaṃ jyotiṣṭomamabhidhāya tatraiva dvādaśopasattāṃ vidhattām /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6164: sa hi kṛtsnavidhānānna kutaścidapi hīyate kratorityahīnaḥ śakyo vaktum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6166: avayavaprasiddheḥ samudāyaprasiddhirbalīyasīti śrutyā prakaraṇabādhanānna dvādaśopasattāmahīnaguṇayukte jyotiṣṭome śaknoti vidhātum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6170: tenānapakṛṣṭenaiva dvādaśāhīnasyetivākyena sāhnasya tisra usapadaḥ kāryā iti vidhiṃ stotuṃ dvādaśāhavihitā dvādaśopasattā tatprakṛtitvena ca sarvāhīneṣu prāptā nivītādivadanūdyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6177: naca dvadaśāhīnasyetivadyathoktātmadhyānasādhanānuṣṭhānaṃ stotumeṣa saṃprasāda iti vacanamarcirādimārgamanuvadatīti yuktam, stutilakṣaṇāyāṃ svābhidheyasaṃsargatātparyaparityāgaprasaṅgāt dvādaśāhīnasyeti tu vākye svārthasaṃsargatātparye prakaraṇavicchedasya prāptānuvadamātrasyā
GSP33brsvbh1u:6184: iha tu svārthasaṃsargatātparye noktadoṣaprasaṅga iti paurvāparyālocanayā prakaraṇānurodhādrūḍhimapi pūrvakālatāmapi parityajya prakaraṇānuguṇyena jyotiḥ paraṃ brahma pratīyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6187: naca kramamuktyabhiprāyaṃ svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyata iti vacanam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6189: tathā ca śrutiḥ-'na tasmāt prāṇā utkrāmanti atraiva samanīyante'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6191: arcirādimārgasya hi kāryabrahmalokaprāpakatvaṃ na tu brahmabhūyahetubhāvaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:6194: tasmānna jyotirādityamupasaṃpadya saṃprasādasya jīvasya svena rūpeṇa pāramārthikena brahmaṇābhiniṣpattirāñjasīti śruteratrāpi kleśaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6195: apica paraṃ jyotiḥ sa uttamapuruṣa itihaivopariṣṭādviśeṣaṇāttejaso vyāvartya puruṣaviṣayatvenāvasthāpanājjyotiḥpadasya, parameva brahma jyotiḥ na tu teja iti siddham //40//
GSP33brsvbh1u:6199: yadyapi 'ākāśastalliṅgāt'ityatra brahmaliṅgadarśanādākāśaḥ paramātmeti vyutpāditaṃ, tathāpi tadvadatra paramātmaliṅgadarśanābhāvānnāmarūpanirvahaṇasya bhūtākāśe 'pyavakāśadānenopapatterakasmācca rūḍhiparityāgasyāyogāt, nāmarūpe antarā brahmeti ca nākāśasya nāmarūpayornirvahiturantarālatvamāha, api tu brahmaṇaḥ, tena bhūtākāśo nāmarūpayornirvahitā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6201: na tu nirvoḍaiva brahma, antarālaṃ vā nirvāḍhṛ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6205: bhūtākāśaṃ ca vikāratvena nāmarūpāntaḥpāti sat kathamātmānamudvahet /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6206: nahi suśikṣito 'pi vijñānī svena skandhenātmānaṃ voḍhumutsahate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6207: naca nāmarūpaśrutiraviśeṣataḥ pravṛttā bhūtākāśavarjaṃ nāmarūpāntare saṃkocayituṃ sati saṃbhave yujyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6208: naca nirvāhakatvaṃ niraṅkuśamavagataṃ brahmaliṅgaṃ kathañcitkleśena paratantre netumucitam 'anena jīvenātmanānupraviśya nāmarūpe vyākaravāṇi'iti ca sraṣṭṛtvamatisphuṭaṃ brahmaliṅgamatra pratīyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6209: brahmarūpatayā ca jīvasya vyākartṛtve brahmaṇa eva vyākartṛtvamuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6211: tathā ca te nāmarūpe yadantaretyayamarthāntaravyapadeśa upapanno bhavatyākāśasya /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6222: evaṃ ca saṃsāryātmaiva kiñcidapekṣya mahān, saṃsārasya cānāditvenānāditvādaja ucyate, na tu tadatiriktaḥ kaścidatra nityaśuddhabuddhamuktasvabhāvaḥ pratipādyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6223: yattu suṣuptyutkrāntyoḥ prājñenātmanā saṃpariṣvakta iti bhedaṃ manyase,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6224: nāsau bhedaḥ kintvayamātmaśabdaḥ svabhāvavacanaḥ, tena suṣuptyutkrāntyavasthāyāṃ viśeṣaviṣayābhāvātsaṃpiṇḍitaprajñena
GSP33brsvbh1u:6228: pratyādayaśca śabdāḥ saṃsāriṇyeva kāryakaraṇasaṃghātātmakasya jagato jīvakarmārjitatayā tadbhogyatayā ca yojanīyāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6229: tasmātsaṃsāryevānūdyate na tu paramātmā pratipādyata iti prāptam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6239: naca prājñasya paramātmano jīvādbhedena saṃkīrtanaṃ sati saṃbhave rāhoḥ śira itivadaupacārikaṃ yuktam /
