GSP33brsvbh1u:6240: naca prājñaśabdaḥ prajñāprakarṣaśālini nirūḍhavṛttiḥ kathañcidajñaviṣayo vyākhyātumucitaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:6248: anadhigatārthāvabodhanaparaṃ hi śābdaṃ pramāṇaṃ, na tvanuvādamātraniṣṭhaṃ bhavitumarhati
GSP33brsvbh1u:6250: evaṃ ca mahattvaṃ cājatvaṃ ca sarvagatasya nityasyātmanaḥ saṃbhavānnāpekṣikaṃ kalpayiṣyate
GSP33brsvbh1u:6253: api tvavasthānāmupajanāpāyadharmakatvena tadatiriktamavasthārahitaṃ paramātmānaṃ vivakṣati, uparitanavākyasaṃdarbhālocanāditi //42//
GSP33brsvbh1u:6258: vaśaḥ sāmarthyaṃ sarvasya jagataḥ prabhavatyayam, vyūhāvasthānasamartha iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6259: ata eva sarvasyeśānaḥ, sāmarthyena hyayamuktena sarvasyeṣṭe,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6263: kiñca sa evaṃbhūto hṛdyantarjyotiḥ puruṣo vijñānamayo na sādhunā karmaṇā bhūyānutkṛṣṭo bhavatītyevamādyāḥ śrutayo 'saṃsāriṇaṃ paramātmānameva pratipādayanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6270: ānumānikam apy ekeṣām iti cen na śarīra-rūpaka-vinyasta-gṛhīter darśayati ca |
GSP33brsvbh1u:6274: taccedaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ na pradhānādau gataṃ, yena vyabhicārādalakṣaṇaṃ syāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6276: gatisāmānyaṃ ca vedāntavākyānāṃ brahmakāraṇavādaṃ prati vidyate, na pradhānakāraṇavādaṃ pratīti prapañcitamadhastatena sūtrasaṃdarbheṇa /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6279: nahyete pradhānakāraṇatvaṃ jagata āhuḥ, apitu pradhānasadbhāvamātram /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6281: tasmādanarthaka uttaraḥ saṃdarbha ityata āha-brahmajijñāsāṃ pratijñāyeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6287: evaṃ ca lakṣaṇavyabhicārādavyabhicārāya yukta uttarasaṃdarbhārambha iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6302: laukikī hi prasiddhī rūḍhirvedārthanirṇaye nimittaṃ, tadupāyatvāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6303: yathāhuḥ-'ya eva laukikāḥ śabdāsta eva vaidikāsta eva caiṣāmarthāḥ'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6304: natu parīkṣakāṇāṃ pāribhāṣikī, pauruṣeyī hi sā na
GSP33brsvbh1u:6316: pradhānasyākāṅkṣāvato vacanaṃ prakaraṇamiti gantavyaṃ viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ pradhānamiti tadākāṅkṣāmavatārayati-taiścendriyādibhirasaṃyatairiti
GSP33brsvbh1u:6319: nanvāntaratvena yadi śreṣṭhatvaṃ tadendriyāṇāmeva bāhyebhyo gandhāhibhyaḥ śreṣṭhatvaṃ syādityata āha-arthā ye śabdādaya iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6320: nāntaratvena śreṣṭhatvamapi tu pradhānatayā, tacca vivakṣādhīnaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6321: grahebhyaścendriyebhyo 'tigrahatayārthānāṃ prādhānyaṃ śrutyā vivakṣitamitīndriyebhyor'thānāṃ prādhānyātparatvaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6322: ghrāṇajihvāvākcakṣuḥ śrotramanohastatvaco hi indriyāṇi śrutyāṣṭau grahā uktāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6324: na caitani svarūpavato vaśīkartumīśate, yāvadasmai puruṣapaśave gandharasanāmarūpaśabdakāmakarmasparśānnopaharanti
GSP33brsvbh1u:6325: ata eva gandhādayo 'ṣṭāvatigrahāḥ, tadupahāreṇa grahāṇāṃ grahatvopapatteḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:6337: tadevaṃ sarvāsāṃ buddhīnāṃ prathamajahiraṇyagarbhabuddhyekanīḍatayā hiraṇyagarbhabuddhermahattvaṃ cāpanādā(copādānā?)tmatvaṃ ca /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6339: nanvetasminpakṣe hiraṇyagarbhabuddherātmatvānna rathina ātmano bhokturatropādānamiti na rathamātraṃ pariśiṣyate 'pi tu rathavānapītyata āha-etasmiṃstu pakṣa iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6340: yathā hi samāropitaṃ pratibimbaṃ bimbānna vastuto bhidyate tathā na paramātmano vijñānātmā vastuto bhidyata iti paramātmaiva rathavānihopāttastena rathamātraṃ pariśiṣṭamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6341: atha rathādirūpakakalpanāyāḥ śarīrādiṣu kiṃ prayojanamityata āha-śarīrendriyamanobuddhiviṣayavadenāsaṃyuktasya hīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6344: naca jīvasya brahmatvaṃ mānāntarasiddhaṃ, yenātra nāgamo 'pekṣyetyāha-tathāceti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6355: nanvevaṃ sati pradhānamevābhyupetaṃ bhavati, sukhaduḥkhamohātmakaṃ hi jagadevaṃbhūtādeva kāraṇādbhavitumarhati, kāraṇātmakatvātkāryasya /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6364: pradhānaṃ hi sāṃkhyānāṃ seśvarāṇāmanīśvarāṇāṃ veśvarāt kṣetrajñebhyo vā vastuto bhinnaṃ śakyaṃ nirvaktum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6365: brahmaṇastviyamavidyā śaktirmāyādiśabdavācyā na śakyā tattvenānyatvena vā nirvaktum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6372: yadi brahmaṇo 'vidyāśaktyā saṃsāraḥ pratīyate hanta muktānāmapi
GSP33brsvbh1u:6374: tadvināśe vā samastasaṃsārocchedaḥ tanmūlavidyāśakteḥ samucchedādityata āha-muktānāṃ ca punaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6380: tena yasyaiva jīvasya vidyotpannā tasyaivāvidyāpanīyate na jīvāntarasya,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6383: pradhānasyaikatvena taducchede sarvocchedo 'nucchede vā na kasyacidityanirmokṣaprasaṅgaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:6385: bandhamokṣau, tarhi kṛtaṃ pradhānena, avidyāsadasadbhāvābhyāmeva tadupapatteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6386: na cāvidyopādhibhedādhīno jīvabhedo jīvabhedādhīnaścāvidyopādhibheda iti parasparāśrayādubhayāsiddhiriti sāṃpratam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6390: nahyacetanaṃ cetanānadhiṣṭhitaṃ kāryāya paryāptamiti svakāryaṃ kartuṃ parameśvaraṃ nimittatayopādānatayā vāśraye, prapañcavibhramasya hīśvarādhiṣṭhānatvamahivibhramasyeva rajjvadhiṣṭhānatvam, tena yathāhivibhramo rajjūpādāna evaṃ prapañcavibhrama īśvaropādānaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6392: itīśvarāśrayetyucyate, na tvādhāratayā, vidyāsvabhāve brahmaṇi tadanupapatteriti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6393: ata evāha-yasyāṃ svarūpapratibodharahitāḥ śerate saṃsāriṇo jīvā iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6395: jīvānāṃ svarūpaṃ vāstavaṃ brahma, tadbodharahitāḥ śerata iti laya uktaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6398: yadyapi jīvāvyaktayoranāditvenāniyataṃ paurvāparyaṃ tathāpyavyaktasya pūrvatvaṃ vivakṣitvaitaduktam
GSP33brsvbh1u:6409: na cākāṅkṣāṃ vinaikavākyatvam, ubhayaṃ ca prakṛtamityubhayaṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:6417: kintu duḥśodhatvātsūkṣmasyaiva śarīrasya, natu ṣāṭkauśikasya sthūlasya /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6418: etaddhi dṛṣṭabībhatsatayā sukaraṃ vairāgyaviṣayatvena śodhayitumityata āha-na caivaṃ mantavyamiti
GSP33brsvbh1u:6419: viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padamavagamayituṃ paraṃ paramatra pratipādyatvena prastutaṃ na tu vairāgyāya śodhanamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6420: alaṃ vā vivādena, bhavatu sūkṣmameva śarīraṃ pariśodhyaṃ, tathāpi na sāṃkhyābhimatamatra pradhānaṃ paramityabhyupetyāha-sarvathāpi tviti //3//
GSP33brsvbh1u:6425: sāṃkhyaiḥ khalu pradhānādvivekena puruṣaṃ niḥśreyasāya jñātuṃ vā vibhūtyai vā pradhānaṃ jñeyatvenopakṣipyate
GSP33brsvbh1u:6426: na ceha jānīyāditi copāsīteti vā vidhivibhaktiśrutirasti, api tvavyaktapadamātram /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6430: vadatīti cen na prājño hi prakaraṇāt |
GSP33brsvbh1u:6434: trayāṇām eva caivam upanyāsaḥ praśnaś ca |
GSP33brsvbh1u:6436: varapradānopakramā hi mṛtyunaciketaḥ saṃvādavākyapravṛttirāsamāpteḥ kaṭhavallīnāṃ lakṣyate
GSP33brsvbh1u:6437: mṛtyuḥ kila na ciketase kupitena pitrā prahitāya tuṣṭastrīnvarān pradadau
GSP33brsvbh1u:6438: naciketāstu pathamena vareṇa pituḥ saumanasyaṃ vavre, dvitīyenāgnividyām,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6441: nanu tatra varapradāne pradhānagocare staḥ praśnaprativacane /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6443: 'hantaḥ ta idaṃ pravakṣyāmi guhyaṃ brahma sanātanam'ityanena vyavahitaṃ jīvaviṣayaṃ 'yathā tu maraṇaṃ prāpyātmā bhavati
GSP33brsvbh1u:6445: atrāha codakaḥ-kiṃ jīvaparamātmanoreka eva praśnaḥ, kiṃ vānyo jīvasya
GSP33brsvbh1u:6452: varapradānānantarbhāve praśnasya tadvat pradhānākhyānamapyanantarbhūtaṃ varapradāne 'stu 'mahataḥ paramavyakta'mityākṣepaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6457: vāstavaśca jīvaparamātmanorabhedastatra tatra śrutyupanyāsena bhagavatā bhāṣyakāreṇa darśitaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:6459: 'yeyaṃ prete'iti hi naciketasaḥ praśnamupaśrutya tattatkāmaviṣayamalobhaṃ cāsya pratītya mṛtyuḥ 'vidyābhīpsinaṃ naciketasaṃ manye'ityādinā
GSP33brsvbh1u:6460: naciketasaṃ praśasya praśnamapi tadīyaṃ praśaṃsannasminpraśne brahmaivottaramuvāca-taṃ durdarśamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6461: yadi punarjīvātprājño bhidyeta, jīvagocaraḥ praśnaḥ, prājñagocaraṃ cottaramiti kiṃ kena saṃgaccheta
GSP33brsvbh1u:6462: apica yadviṣayaṃ praśnamupaśrutya mṛtyunaiṣa praśaṃsito naciketāḥ yadi tameva bhūyaḥ pṛcchettaduttare cāvadadhyāt tataḥ praśaṃsā dṛṣṭārthā syāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6470: sāṃkhyānāṃ mahattattvaṃ sattāmātraṃ, puruṣārthakriyākṣamaṃ sattasya bhāvaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:6472: yā yā puruṣārthakriyā śabdādyupabhogalakṣaṇā ca sattvapuruṣānyatākhyātilakṣaṇā ca sā sarvā mahati buddhau samāpyata iti mahattattvaṃ sattāmātramucyata iti //7//
GSP33brsvbh1u:6476: ajāśabdo yadyapi chāgāyāṃ rūḍhastathāpyadhyātmavidyādhikārānna tatra kartitumarhati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6478: tatra kiṃ svatantraṃ pradhānamanena mantravarṇenānūdyatāmuta pārameśvarī māyāśaktistejo 'bannavyākriyākāraṇamucyatām kiṃ tāvatprāptaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6482: sā hi pradhānalakṣaṇā prakṛtirna jāyata ityajā ca ekā ca lohitaśuklakṛṣṇā ca /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6483: yadyapi lohitatvādayo varṇā na rajaḥprabhṛtiṣu santi, tathāpi lohitaṃ kusumbhādi rañjayati, rajo 'pi rañjayatīti lohitam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6484: evaṃ prasannaṃ pāthaḥ śuklaṃ, sattvamapi prasannamiti śuklam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6487: pareṇāpi nāvyākṛtasya svarūpeṇa lohitatvādiyoga āstheyaḥ, kintu tatkāryasya tejo 'bannasya rohitvādikāraṇa upacaraṇīyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6488: kāryasārūpyeṇa vā kāraṇe kalpanīyaṃ, tadasmākamapi tulyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6490: tvātmabhedaśravaṇāt sāṃkhyasmṛterevātra mantravarṇe pratyabhijñānaṃ na tvavyākṛtaprakriyāyāḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:6494: avayavāḥ pradhānasyaikasya sattvarajastamāṃsi teṣāṃ dharmā lohitatvādayastairiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6497: tathāhi-maitradāreṣu narmadāyāṃ maitrasya sukhaṃ, tat kasya hetoḥ, taṃ prati sattvasya samudbhavāt
GSP33brsvbh1u:6498: tathāca tatsapatnīnāṃ duḥkhaṃ, tat kasya hetoḥ, tāḥ prati rajaḥsamudbhavāt, tathā caitrasya tāmavindato moho viṣādaḥ, sa kasya hetoḥ, taṃ prati tamaḥsamudbhavāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6502: viṣayā hi śabdādayaḥ prakṛtivikārastraiguṇyena sukhaduḥkhamohātmāna indriyamano 'haṅkārapraṇālikayā buddhisattvamupasaṃkrāmanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6503: tena tadbuddhisattvaṃ pradhānavikāraḥ sukhaduḥkhamohātmakaṃ śabdādirūpeṇa pariṇamate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6504: citiśaktistvapariṇāminyapratisaṃkramāpi buddhisattvādātmano vivekamabudhyamānā buddhivṛttyaiva viparyāsenāvidyayā buddhisthānsukhādīnātmanyabhimanyamānā sukhādimatīva bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6513: evaṃ prāpte 'bhidhīyate-na tāvat 'ajo hyeko juṣamāṇo 'nuśete jahātyenāṃ bhuktabhogāmajo 'nyaḥ'ityetadātmabhedapratipādanaparamapi tu siddhamātmabhedamanūdya bandhamokṣau pratipādayatīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6514: sa cānūdito bhedaḥ 'eko devaḥ sarvabhūteṣu gūḍhaḥ sarvavyāpī
GSP33brsvbh1u:6517: tathāca na sāṃkhyaprakriyāpratyabhijñānamityajāvākyaṃ camasavākyavatpariplavamānaṃ na svatantrapradhānaniścayāya paryāptam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6522: jyotirupakramā tu tathā hy adhīyata eke |
GSP33brsvbh1u:6529: tasyā aprāmāṇikatayā śrutahānyaśrutakalpanāprasaṅgāt, rañjanādinā ca rohitādyupacārasya sati mukhyārthasaṃbhave 'yogāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6531: ajāpadasya ca samudāyaprasiddhiparityāgena na jāyata ityavayavaprasiddhyāśrayaṇe doṣaprasaṅgāt
GSP33brsvbh1u:6533: api cāyamapi śrutikalāpo 'smaddarśanānuguṇo na sāṃkhyasmṛtyanuguṇa ityāha-tathehāpīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6540: te brahmavido dhyānayogenātmānaṃ gatāḥ prāptā apaśyanniti yojanā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6542: avidyā śaktiryoniḥ, sā ca pratijīvaṃ nānetyuktamato vīpsopapannā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6552: nanu kiṃ chāgā lohitaśuklakṛṣṇaivānyādṛśīnāmapi chāgānāmupalambhādityata āha-yadṛcchayeti
GSP33brsvbh1u:6556: na saṃkhyopasaṃgrahād api nānābhāvād atirekāc ca |
GSP33brsvbh1u:6559: pañcajanā iti hi samāsārthaḥ pañcasaṃkhyayā saṃbadhyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6563: evaṃ cātmani pañcamanujānāmākāśasya ca pratiṣṭhānamiti nistātparyaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6567: tatrāpi kiṃ pañca prāṇādayo vākyaśeṣagatā vivakṣyante uta tadatiriktā anya eva vā kecit /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6573: tasmātkānicideva tattvānīha pañca pratyekaṃ pañcasaṃkhyāyogīni pañcaviṃśatitattvāni bhavanti
GSP33brsvbh1u:6575: pañcaviṃśatitattvāni smaryanta iti tānyevānena mantreṇocyanta iti nāśabdaṃ pradhānādi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6576: na cādhāratvenātmano vyavasthānātsvātmani cādhārādheyabhāvasya virodhāt ākāśasya ca vyatirecanāt, trayoviṃśatirjanā iti syānna pañca pañcajanā iti
GSP33brsvbh1u:6579: tathāca satyātmākāśābhyāṃ saptaviṃśatisaṃkhyāyāṃ pañcaviṃśatitattvānīti svasiddhāntavyākopa iti cet, na mūlaprakṛtitvamātreṇaikīkṛtya sattvarajastamāṃsi pañcaviṃśatitattvopapatteḥ hirugbhāvena tu teṣāṃ saptaviṃśatitvāvirodhaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6585: evamahaṅkāratattvaṃ mahato vikṛtiḥ, prakṛtiśca tadeva tāmasaṃ sat pañcatanmātrāṇām /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6592: yadyapi pṛthivyādayo goghaṭādīnāṃ prakṛtistathāpi na te pṛthivyādibhyastattvāntaramiti na prakṛtiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6595: evaṃ prāpte 'bhidhīyate -na saṃkhyopasaṃgrahādapi pradhānādīnāṃ śrutimattvāśaṅkā kartavyā
GSP33brsvbh1u:6599: na khalu sattvarajastamomahadahaṅkārāṇāmekaḥ kriyā vā guṇo vā dravyaṃ vā jātirvā dharmaḥ pañcatanmātrādibhyo vyāvṛttaḥ sattvādiṣu cānugataḥ kaścidasti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6602: nāpi pāṇipādapāyūpasthamanasāṃ, yenaikenāsādhāraṇenopagṛhītāḥ pañca pañcakā bhavitumarhanti
GSP33brsvbh1u:6604: yadyapi parasyāṃ saṃkhyāyāmavāntarasaṃkhyā dvitvādikā nāsti tathāpi tatpūrvaṃ tasyāḥ saṃbhavāt paurvāparyalakṣaṇayā pratyāsattyā parasaṃkhyopalakṣaṇārthaṃ pūrvasaṃkhyopanyasyata iti
GSP33brsvbh1u:6609: api ca vīpsāyāṃ pañcakadvayagrahaṇe daśaiva tattvānīti na
GSP33brsvbh1u:6611: na caikā pañcasaṃkhyā pañcasaṃkhyāntareṇa śakyā viśeṣṭum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6616: atra tāvadrūḍhau satyāṃ na yogaḥ saṃbhavatīti vakṣyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6619: pañcapūlītyatra yadyapi pṛthaktvaikārthasaṃvāyinī pañcasaṃkhyāvacchedikāsti tathāpīha samudāyino 'vacchinatti na samudāyaṃ samāsapadagamyamatastasmin kati te samudāyā ityapekṣāyāṃ padāntarābhihitā
GSP33brsvbh1u:6621: pañcajanā ityatra tu pañcasaṃkhyayotpattiśiṣṭayā janānāmavacchinnatvātsamudāyasya ca pañcapūlīvadatrāpratīterna padāntarābhihitā saṃkhyā saṃbadhyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6627: nahyupasarjanaṃ viśeṣaṇena yujyate pañcaśabda eva tāvatsaṃkhyeyopasarjanasaṃkhyāmāha viśeṣatastu pañcajanā ityatra samāse /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6628: viśeṣaṇāpekṣāyāṃ tu na samāsaḥ syāt, asāmarthyāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6629: nahi bhavati ṛddhasya rājapuruṣa iti samāso 'pi tu (pada) vṛttireva ṛddhasya rājñaḥ puruṣa iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6633: yadi sattvarajastamāṃsi pradhānenaikīkṛtyātmākāśau tattvebhyo vyatiricyete tadā siddhāntavyākopaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:6634: atha tu sattvarajastamāṃsi mitho bhedena vivakṣyante tathāpi vastutattvavyavasthāpane ādhāratvenātmā niṣkṛṣyatām /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6638: naca rūḍhau satyāmavayavaprasiddhergrahaṇaṃ, sāpekṣatvāt, nirapekṣatvācca rūḍheḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6639: tadyadi rūḍhau mukhyor'thaḥ prāpyate tataḥ sa eva grahītavyo 'tha tvasau na vākye saṃbandhārhaḥ pūrvāparavākyavirodhī vā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6641: yathā 'śyenenābhicaran yajeta'iti śyenaśabdaḥ śakuniviśeṣe nirūḍhavṛttistadaparityāgenaiva nipatyādānasādṛśyenārthavādikena kratuviśeṣe vartate, tathā pañcajanaśabdo 'vayavārthayogānapekṣa
GSP33brsvbh1u:6643: yathā saptarṣiśabdo vasiṣṭha ekasmin saptasu ca vartate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6646: rūḍhau satyāṃ pcaviṃśatereva saṃkhyāyā abhāvātkathaṃ tattveṣu vartate
GSP33brsvbh1u:6648: evaṃ ca ke te pañcajanā ityapekṣāyāṃ kiṃ vākyaśeṣagatāḥ prāṇādayo gṛhyantāmuta pañcaviṃśatistattvānīti viśaye tattvānāmaprāmāṇikatvāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6649: prāṇādīnāṃ ca vākyaśeṣe śravaṇāttatparityāge śrutahānyaśrutakalpanāprasaṅgātprāṇādaya eva pañcajanāḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6650: naca kāṇḍavamādhyandinayorvirodhānna prāṇādīnāṃ vākyaśeṣagatānāmapi grahaṇamiti sāṃpratam, virodhe 'pi tulyabalavatayā ṣoḍaśigrahaṇavadvikalpopapatteḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6656: tasya kathaṃ prāṇādiṣvajaneṣu prayoga iti vyākhyeyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6657: anyathā tu pratyastamitāvayavārthe samudāyaśabdārthe janaśabdārtho nāstītyaparyanuyoga eva
GSP33brsvbh1u:6660: nanu satyāmavayavaprasiddhau samupāyaśaktikalpanamanupapannaṃ, saṃbhavati ca pañcaviṃśatyāṃ tattveṣvavayavaprasiddhirityata āha-samāsabalācceti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6662: samāsabalāccedrūḍhirāsthīyate hanta na dṛṣṭastarhi tasya prayogo
GSP33brsvbh1u:6665: janeṣu tāvatpañcajanaśabdaśca prathamaḥ prayogo lokeṣu dṛṣṭa ityasati prathamaprayoga ityasiddhamiti sthavīyastayānabhidhāyābhyupetya prathamaprayogābhāvaṃ samādhatte-śakyodbhidādivaditi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6674: atha samanvayalakṣaṇe keyamakāṇḍe virodhāvirodhacintā, bhavitā hi tasyāḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:6676: ayamarthaḥ nānekaśākhāgatatattadvākyālocanayā vākyārthāvagame paryavasite sati pramāṇāntaravirodhena vākyārthāgateraprāmāṇyamāśaṅkyāvirodhavyutpādanena prāmāṇyavyavasthāpanamavirodhalakṣaṇārthaḥ prāsaṅgikaṃ tu tatra sṛṣṭiviṣayāṇāṃ vākyānāṃ parasparamavirodhapratipādanaṃ na tu lakṣaṇārthaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:6678: iha tu-vākyānāṃ sṛṣṭipratipādakānāṃ parasparavirodhe brahmaṇi jagadyonau na samanvayaḥ seddhumarhati
GSP33brsvbh1u:6679: tathāca na jagatkāraṇatvaṃ brahmaṇo lakṣaṇaṃ, naca tatra gatisāmānyaṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6680: naca tatsiddhaye pradhānasyāśabdatvapratipādanaṃ, tasmādvākyānāṃ virodhāvirodhābhyāmuktārthākṣepasamādhānābhyāṃ samanvayaḥ evopapādyata iti samanvayalakṣaṇe saṃgatamidamadhikaraṇam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6688: sṛṣṭyā ca kāryeṇa tatkāraṇatayā brahma lakṣitam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6689: sṛṣṭivipratipattau tatkāraṇatāyāṃ brahmalakṣaṇe vipratipattau satyāṃ bhavati tallakṣye brahmaṇyapi vipratipattiḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6691: vedāntāstu kartrādipratipādanena karmavidhiparatayopacaritārthā avivakṣitārthā vā japopayogina iti prāptam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6694: evaṃ prāpta ucyate-'sargakramavivāde 'pi na sa sṛṣṭari vidyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6700: piṇḍopakaraṇastu paṭati ghṛtapūrṇaṃ, tadasya devadattasya sarvatraitāsmin
GSP33brsvbh1u:6701: kartṛtvācchakyaṃ vaktuṃ devadattāccakrādi saṃbhūtaṃ tasmāccakrādeḥ kumbhādīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6703: nahyastyasaṃbhavaḥ sarvatrāsmin kāryajāte kramavatyapi devadattasya sākṣātkarturanusyūtatvāt
GSP33brsvbh1u:6704: tathehāpi yadyapyākāśādikrameṇaiva sṛṣṭistathāpyākāśānalānilādau tatra tatra sākṣāt parameśvarasya kartṛtvācchakyaṃ vaktuṃ parameśvarādākāśaḥ saṃbhūta iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6705: śakyaṃ ca vaktuṃ parameśvarādanalaḥ saṃbhūta ityādi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6706: yadi tvākāśādvāyurvāyosteja ityuktvā tejaso vāyurvāyorākāśa iti brūyādbhavedvirodhaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6710: eṣā hi svavyāpāramabhidhānakrameṇa kurvatī nābhidheyānāṃ kramaṃ niruṇaddhi
GSP33brsvbh1u:6711: te tu yathākramāvasthitā evākrameṇocyante-yathā kramavanti jñānāni jānātīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6716: naca sṛṣṭivigānaṃ sraṣṭari tadadhīnanirūpaṇe vigānamāvahatīti vācyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6723: tena 'phalavatsaṃnidhāvaphalaṃ tadaṅgam'iti sṛṣṭivijñānaṃ sraṣṭṛbrahmavijñānāṅgaṃ tadanuguṇaṃ sadbrahmajñānāvatāropāyatayā vyākhyeyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6729: yacca kāraṇe vigānam'asadvā idamatra asīt'iti, tadapi 'tadapyeṣa śloko
GSP33brsvbh1u:6737: ākāśādiṣu sṛjyamāneṣu kramavigāne 'pi na sraṣṭari vigānam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6739: yathaikasyāṃ śrutau vyapadiṣṭaḥ parameśvaraḥ sarvasya kartā tathaiva
GSP33brsvbh1u:6740: śrutyantareṣūkteḥ, kena rūpeṇa, kāraṇatvena, aparaḥ kalpo yathā
GSP33brsvbh1u:6741: vyapadiṣṭaḥ krama ākāśādiṣu, 'ātmana ākāśaḥ saṃbhūta ākāśādvāyurvāyoragniragnerāpo 'dbhyaḥ pṛthivī'iti, tasyaiva kramasyānapabādhanena 'tattejo 'sṛjata'ityādikāyā api sṛṣṭerukterna sṛṣṭāvapi vigānam //14//
GSP33brsvbh1u:6750: vyākriyata iti ca karmakartari karmaṇi vā rūpaṃ, na cetanamatiriktaṃ kartāraṃ pratikṣipati kintūpasthāpayati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6751: nahi lūyate kedāraḥ svayameveti vā lūyate kedāra iti vā lavitāraṃ devadattādiṃ pratikṣipati
GSP33brsvbh1u:6757: nanu 'brahma te bravāṇi'iti brahmābhidhānaprakaraṇāt, upasaṃhāre ca 'sarvān pāpmano 'pahatya sarveṣāṃ ca bhūtānāṃ śraiṣṭhyaṃ svārājyaṃ paryeti
GSP33brsvbh1u:6763: ucyate-brahma te bravāṇīti bālākinā gārgyeṇa brahmābhidhānaṃ pratijñāya
GSP33brsvbh1u:6766: 'yo vai bālāke eteṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ kartā yasya vaitatkarma'iti vākyaṃ na tena
GSP33brsvbh1u:6772: kārye tu kriyata iti vyutpattyā vartate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6776: śravaṇātparispandalakṣaṇasya ca karmaṇo yatropapattiḥ sa eva veditavyatayopadiśyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6780: upakramānurodhena copasaṃhāre sarvaśabdaḥ sarvān pāpmana iti ca sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāmiti cāpekṣikavṛttirbahūn pāpmano bahūnāṃ bhūtānāmityevaṃparo draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6782: yadi tu dṛptabālākimabrahmaṇi brahmābhidhāyinamapodyājātaśatrorvacanaṃ brahmaviṣayamevānyathā tu taduktādviśeṣaṃ vivakṣorabrahmābhidhānamasaṃbaddhaṃ syāditi manyate, tathāpi naitadbrahmābhidhānaṃ bhavitumarhati, apitu jīvābhidhānameva, yatkāraṇaṃ veditavyatayopanyastasya puruṣāṇāṃ karturvedanāyopetaṃ bālakiṃ prati
GSP33brsvbh1u:6783: bubodhayiṣurajātaśatruḥ suptaṃ puruṣamāmantryāmāntraṇaśabdāśravaṇāt prāṇādīnāmabhoktṛtvamasvāmitvaṃ pratibodhya yaṣṭighātotthānāt prāṇādivyatiriktaṃ jīvaṃ bhoktāraṃ svāminaṃ pratibodhayati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6784: parastādapi 'tadyathā śreṣṭhī svairbhuṅkte yathā vā svāḥ śreṣṭhinaṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:6785: bhuñjantyevamevaiṣa prajñātmaitairātmabhirbhuṅkte evamevaita ātmāna enamātmānaṃ bhuñjanti'iti śravaṇāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6786: yathā śreṣṭhī pradhānaḥ puruṣaḥ svairbhṛtyaiḥ karaṇabhūtairviṣayān
GSP33brsvbh1u:6787: bhuṅkte, yathā vā svā bhṛtyāḥ śreṣṭhinaṃ bhuñjanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6790: te hyādityādaya ālokavṛṣṭyādinā sācivyamācaranto jīvātmānaṃ bhojayanti,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6799: ye ca praśnaprativacane-'kvaiṣa etad bālāke puruṣo 'śayiṣṭa yadā suptaḥ svapnaṃ na kañcana paśyati'iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6802: tasmājjīvaprāṇayoranyatara iha grāhyo na raparameśvara iti prāptam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6805: 'yathā hi kenacinmaṇilakṣaṇajñamāninā kāce maṇireva veditavya ityukte
GSP33brsvbh1u:6806: parasya kāco 'yaṃ maṇirna tallakṣaṇāyogādityabhidhāya ātmano viśeṣaṃ jijñāpayiṣostattvābhidhānamasaṃbaddham
GSP33brsvbh1u:6807: amaṇau maṇyabhidhānaṃ na pūrvavādino viśeṣamāpādayati svayamapi mṛṣābhidhānāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6809: evamajātaśatruṇā dṛptabālākerabrahmavādino viśeṣamātmano darśayatā jīvaprāṇābhidhāne asaṃbaddhamuktaṃ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6814: tasmāt 'brahma te bravāṇi'iti brahmaṇopakramāt, sarvān pāpmano 'pahatya
GSP33brsvbh1u:6815: sarveṣāṃ ca bhūtānāṃ śraiṣṭhyaṃ svarājyaṃ paryeti ya evaṃ veda'iti ca sati saṃbhave sarvaśruterasaṃkocānniratiśayena
GSP33brsvbh1u:6816: brahmavedanādanyataśca tadanupapatteḥ, ādityādipuruṣakartṛtvasya ca svātantryalakṣaṇasya mukhyasya brahmaṇyeva saṃbhavādanyeṣāṃ hiraṇyagarbhādīnāṃ tatpāratantryāt, 'kvauṣa
GSP33brsvbh1u:6817: etadbālāke'ityāderjīvādhikaraṇabhavanāpādanapraśnasya 'yadā suptaḥ svapnaṃ na kañcana paśyatyathāsmin prāṇa evaikadhā bhavati'ityāderuttarasya ca brahmaṇyevopapatterbrahmaviṣayatvaṃ niścīyate atha kasmānna bhavato hiraṇyagarbhagocare eva praśnottare, tathā ca naitābhyāṃ brahmaviṣayatvasiddhirityetannirācikīrṣuḥ paṭhati-etasmādātmanaḥ prāṇā yathā yathāyatanaṃ pratiṣṭhanta iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6819: yadyapi ca jīvo nātmano bhidyate tathāpyupādhyavacchinnasya paramātmano jīvatvenopādhibhedādbhedamāropyādhārādheyabhāvo draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6820: evaṃ ca jīvabhavanādhāratvamapādānatvaṃ ca paramātmana upapannam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6821: tadevaṃ bālākyajātaśatrusaṃvādavākyasaṃdarbhasya brahmaparatve sthite yasya vaitatkarmaiti vyāpārābhidhāne na saṃgacchata iti karmaśabdaḥ kāryābhidhāyī bhavati, etaditisarvanāmaparāmṛṣṭaṃ ca tatkāryaṃ, sarvanāma cedaṃ saṃnihitaparāmarśi, naca kiñcidiha śabdoktamasti saṃnihitam na cādityādipuruṣāḥ saṃnihitā api parāmarśārhāḥ bahutvāt puṃliṅgatvācca /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6827: kintu kṛtsnameva jagadyasya kāryamiti vāśabdena sūcyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6838: nirdiśyantāṃ puruṣāḥ kāryāstadviṣayā tu kṛtiranirdiṣṭā tatphalaṃ vā kāryasyotpattisti yasyedaṃ karmeti nirdekṣyete, tataḥ kutaḥ paunaruktyamityata āha-nāpi puruṣaviṣayasyeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6842: nanu yadīdamā jagatparāmṛṣṭaṃ tatastadantarbhūtāḥ puruṣā apīti ya eteṣāṃ puruṣāṇāmiti punaruktamityata āha-etaduktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6847: anyārthaṃ tu jaiminiḥ praśnavyākhyānābhyām api caivam eke |
GSP33brsvbh1u:6848: nanu 'prāṇa evaikadhā bhavati'ityādikādapi vākyājjīvātiriktaḥ kutaḥ pratīyata ityato vākyāntaraṃ paṭhati-etasmādātmanaḥ prāṇā iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6850: vedāntaprakriyāyāmevopapattimupasaṃhāravyājenāha-tasmādyatrāsyaātmano yato niḥsaṃbodho 'taḥ svacchatārūpamiva rūpamasyeti svacchatārūpo na tu svacchataiva /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6854: ghaṭapaṭādivijñānaṃ tadrahitaṃ svarūpamātmanaḥ yadi vijñānamityevocyeta tatastadaviśiṣṭamanavacchinnaṃ sadbrahmaiva syāttacca nityamiti nopādhijanitaṃ nāpi tadrihitaṃ svarūpaṃ brahmasvabhāvasyāprahāṇāt ata uktam-viśeṣeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6855: yadā tu layalakṣaṇāvidyopabṛṃhito vikṣepasaṃskāraḥ samudācarati tadā viśeṣavijñānotpādātsvapnajāgarāvasthātaḥ paramātmano rūpādbhraṃśarūpamāgamanamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6858: nanvatrākāśaṃ śayanasthānaṃ tatkutaḥ paramātmapratyaya ityata āha-ākāśaśabdaśceti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6863: tatra mandadhiyāṃ nedaṃ prāṇanirākaraṇāyeti buddhirmā bhūdityāśayavānāha-prāṇanirākaraṇasyāpīti
GSP33brsvbh1u:6874: nanu maitreyībrāhmaṇopakrame yājñavalkyena gārhasthyāśramāduttamāśramaṃ yiyāsatā maitraiyyā bhāryāyāḥ kātyāyanyā sahārthasaṃvibhāgakaraṇa ukte maitreyī yājñavalkyaṃ patimamṛtatvārthinī papraccha, yannu ma iyaṃ bhagoḥ sarvā pṛthvī vittena pūrṇā syātkimahaṃ tanāmṛtā syāmuta neti tatra neti hovāca yājñavalkyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6875: yathaivopakaraṇavatāṃ jīvitaṃ tathaiva te jīvitaṃ syādamṛtatvasya tu nāśāsti vittena /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6876: evaṃ vittenāmṛtatvāśā bhavedyadi vittasādhyāni karmāṇyamṛtatve upayujyeran
GSP33brsvbh1u:6877: tadeva tu nāsti, jñānasādhyatvādamṛtatvasya karmaṇāṃ ca jñānavirodhināṃ tatsahabhāvitvānupapatteriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6878: sā hovāca maitreyī yenāhaṃ nāmṛtā syāṃ kimahaṃ tenaṃ kuryāṃ yadeva bhagavān veda tadeva me brūhi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6880: tatrāmṛtatvasādhanajñānopanyāsāya vairāgyapūrvakatvāttasya rāgaviṣayeṣu teṣu teṣu patijāyādiṣu vairāgyamutpādayituṃ yājñavalkyo 'na vā are patyuḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:6882: ātmaupādhikaṃ hi priyatvameṣāṃ na tu sākṣāt priyāṇyetāni /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6883: tasmādetebhyaḥ patijāyādibhyo virabhya yatra sākṣātprema sa evaātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ śrotavyo mantavyo nididhyāsitavyaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6886: etatsādhanāni ca śravaṇādīni vihitāni śrotavya ityādinā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6888: ātmano vā are darśanena śravaṇādisādhanenedaṃ jagatsarvaṃviditaṃ bhavatīti vākyaśeṣaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6889: yato nāmarūpātmakasya jagatastattvaṃ pāramārthikaṃ rūpamātmaiva bhujaṅgasyeva samāropitasya tattvaṃ rajjuḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6890: tasmādātmani vidite sarvamidaṃ jagattattvaṃ viditaṃ bhavati, rajjvāmiva viditāyāṃ samāropitasya bhujaṅgasya tattvaṃ viditaṃ bhavati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6891: yatastasmādātmaiva draṣṭavyo na tu tadatiriktaṃ jagat svarūpeṇa draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6897: ātmaiva jagatastattvaṃ na tu tadatiriktaṃ kiñcittaditi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6899: yat khalu yadgrahaṃ vinā na śakyate grahītuṃ tattato na vyatiricyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6900: yathā rajataṃ śuktikāyāḥ, bhujaṅgo vā rajjoḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6902: na gṛhyante ca cidrūpagrahaṇaṃ vinā sthitikāle nāmarūpāṇi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6906: na kevalaṃ sthitikāle nāmarūpaprapañcaścidātmātirekeṇāgraheṇāccidātmano na vyatiricyate 'pi tu nāmarūpotpatteḥ prāgapi cidrūpāvasthānāt tadupādānatvācca nāmarūpaprapañcasya tadanatirekaḥ, rajjūpādānasyeva bhujaṅgasya rajjoranatireka ityetaddṛṣṭāntena sādhayati bhagavatī
GSP33brsvbh1u:6908: are 'sya mahato bhūtasya niḥśvasitametadyadṛgvedaḥ'ityādinā caturvidho mantra uktaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6915: yadā ca nāmadheyasyeyaṃ gatistadā tatpūrvakasya rūpadheyasya kaiva katheti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6916: na kevalaṃ tadupādānatvāttato na vyatiricyate nāmarūpaprapañcaḥ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6918: yathā sāmudramevāmbhaḥ pṛthivītejaḥ saṃparkāt kāṭhinyamupagataṃ saindhavaṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:6919: khilyaḥ, sa hi svākāre samudre kṣipto 'mbha eva bhavati, evaṃ cidambhodhau līnaṃ jagacchideva bhavati na tu tato 'tiricyata iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6921: dṛṣṭāntaprabandhamuktvā dārṣṭāntike yojayati-evaṃ vā are idaṃ mahaditi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6929: etebhyaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvena vyavasthitebhyo bhūtebhyaḥ samutthāya sāmyenotthāya /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6930: kāryakāraṇasaṃghātasya hyavacchedādduḥkhitvaśokitvādayastadavacchinne cidātmani tadviparīte 'pi pratīyante, yathodakapratibimbite candramasi toyagatāḥ kampādayaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6933: brahmasvarūpasākṣātkāra upāvartate tadā nirmṛṣṭanikhilasavāsanāvidyāmalasya kāryakāraṇasaṃghātabhūtasya vināśe tānyeva bhūtāni naśyantyanu tadupādhiścidātmanaḥ khilyabhāvo vinaśyati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6935: na pretya saṃjñāstīti saṃjñāmātraniṣedhādātmā nāstīti manyamānā sā maitreyī hovāca, atraiva mā bhagavānamūmuhanmohitavān na pretya saṃjñāstīti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6936: sa hovāca yājñavalkyaḥ svābhiprāyaṃ, dvaite hi rūpādiviśeṣasaṃjñānibandhano duḥkhitvādyabhimānaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:6937: ānandajñānaikarasabrahmādvayānubhave tu tat kena kaṃ paśyet, brahma vā kena vijānīyāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6939: etaduktaṃ bhavati-na saṃjñāmātraṃ mayā vyāsedhi, kintu viśeṣasaṃjñeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6941: pratijñāya tadupapādanāt, upasaṃhāre ca mahadbhūtamanantamityādinā ca
GSP33brsvbh1u:6942: brahmarūpābhidhānāt, dvaitanindayā cādvaitaguṇakīrtanādbrahmaiva maitreyībrāhmaṇe pratipādyaṃ na jīvātmeti nāsti pūrvapakṣa
GSP33brsvbh1u:6946: nāpijñānakartṛtvamakartuḥ sākṣācca mahato bhūtasya vijñānātmabhāvena samuttānābhidhānaṃ vijñānātmana eva draṣṭavyatvamāha /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6947: anyathā brahmaṇo draṣṭavyatvapare 'smin brāhmaṇe tasya vijñānātmatvena
GSP33brsvbh1u:6948: samutthānābhidhānamanupayuktaṃ syāttasya tu draṣṭavyamupayujyata ityupakramamātraṃ pūrvapakṣaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6952: tadevaṃ paurvāparyālocanayā maitreyībrāhmaṇasya brahmadarśanaparatve sthite bhoktrā jīvātmanopakramamācāryadeśīyamatena tāvatsamādhatte sūtrakāraḥ-
GSP33brsvbh1u:6955: yathā hi vahnervikārā vyuccaranto visphuliṅgā na vahneratyantaṃ bhidyante,
GSP33brsvbh1u:6957: parasparavyāvṛttyabhāvaprasaṅgāt, tathā jīvātmano 'pi brahmavikāra na brahmaṇo 'tyantaṃ bhidyante, cidrūpatvābhāvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6958: nāpyatyantaṃ na bhidyante, parasparaṃ vyāvṛttyabhāvaprasaṅgāt, sarvajñaṃ pratyupadeśavaiyarthyācca
GSP33brsvbh1u:6960: tatra tadvijñānena sarvavijñānapratijñāsiddhaye vijñānātmaparamātmanorabhedamupādāya paramātmani darśayitavye vijñānātmanopakrama ityāśmaradhya ācāryo mene //20//
GSP33brsvbh1u:6965: jīvo hi paramātmano 'tyantaṃ bhinna eva san
GSP33brsvbh1u:6968: yathāhuḥ pāñcarātrikāḥ-'āmukterbheda eva syājjīvasya ca parasya ca /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6973: saṃprati svābhāvikameva jīvasya nāmarūpaprapañcāśrayatvalakṣaṇaṃ kāluṣyaṃ pārthivānāmaṇūnāmiva śyāmatvaṃ kevalaṃ pākeneva /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6984: ākāśa iva ghaṭamaṇikādikalpitāvacchedo ghaṭākāśo maṇikākāśo na tu paramākāśādanyastadvikāro vā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6988: atha vikāraḥ paramātmano jīvaḥ kasmānna bhavatyākāśādivadityāha-naca
GSP33brsvbh1u:6990: nahi yathā tejaḥprabhṛtīnāmātmavikāratvaṃ śrūyate evaṃ jīvasyeti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6994: matatrayamuktvā kāśakṛtsnīyamataṃ sādhutvena nirdhārayati-tatra teṣu madhye /
GSP33brsvbh1u:6997: bhedastattvamasīti jīvātmano brahmabhāvatattvopadeśaśravaṇamanananididhyāsanaprakarṣaparyantajanmḥanā sākṣātkāreṇa vidyayā śakyaḥ samūlakāṣaṃ kaṣituṃ, rajjvāmahivibhrama iva rajjutattvasākṣātkāreṇa, rājaputrasyeva ca mlecchakule vardhamānasyātmani samāropito mlecchabhāvo rājaputro 'sīti āptopadeśena na tu mṛdvikāraḥ śarāvādiḥ śataśo 'pi mṛnmṛditi cintyamānastajjanmanā mṛdbhāvasākṣātkāreṇa śakyo nivartayituṃ, tatkasya hetoḥ, tasyāpi mṛdo bhinnābhinnasya tāttvikatvāt, vastutastu jñānenocchettumaśakyatvāt, so
GSP33brsvbh1u:6999: api ca jīvasyātmavikāratve tasya jñānadhyānādisādhanānuṣṭhānāt svaprakṛtāvapyaye sati nāmṛtatvasyāśāstītyapuruṣārthatvamamṛtatvaprāptiśrutivirodhaśca
GSP33brsvbh1u:7001: nanu yadi jīvo na vikāraḥ kintu brahmaiva kathaṃ tarhi
GSP33brsvbh1u:7010: aikāntike hyādvaite ātmano 'nyakarmakaraṇe 'kena kaṃ paśyet'iti ātmanaśca karmatvaṃ 'vijñātāramare kena vijānīyāt'iti śakyaṃ niṣeddhum /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7012: na kevalaṃ kāśakṛtsnīyadarśanāśrayaṇena bhūtapūrvagatyā vijñātṛtvamapi tu
GSP33brsvbh1u:7014: kasmāt punaḥ kāśakṛtsnasya matamāsthīyate netareṣāmācāryāṇāmityata āha-darśitaṃ tu purastāditi
GSP33brsvbh1u:7015: kāśakṛtsnīyasya matasya śrutiprabandhopanyāsena punaḥ śrutimattvaṃ smṛtimattvaṃ copasaṃhāropakramamāha-ataśceti
GSP33brsvbh1u:7023: apica yadi jīvaparamātmanorbhedābhedāvāsthīyeyātāṃ tatastayormitho virodhātsamuccayābhāvādekasya balīyastve nātmani nirapavādaṃ vijñānaṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:7025: atha tvagṛhyamāṇaviśeṣatayā na balābalāvadhāraṇaṃ, tataḥ saṃśaye sati na suniścitārthamātmani jñānaṃ bhavet /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7030: nanu yadi kṣetrajñaparamātmanorabhedo bhāvikaḥ, kathaṃ tarhi vyapadeśabuddhibhedau kṣetrajñaḥ paramātmeti kathañca nityaśuddhabuddhamuktasvabhāvasya bhagavataḥ saṃsāritā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7035: tadatra saṃsāritvāsaṃsāritvavidyāvidyāvattvarūpaviruddhadharmasaṃsargādbuddhivyapḥadeśabhedāccāsti jīveśvarayorbhedo 'pi bhāvika ityata āha-sthite ca paramātmakṣetrajñātmaikatveti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7036: na tāvadbhedābhedāvekātra bhāvikau bhavitumarhata iti viprapañcitaṃ prathame pāde /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7037: dvaitadarśananindayā caikāntikādvaitapratipādanaparāḥ paurvāparyālocanayā sarve vedāntaḥ pratīyante
GSP33brsvbh1u:7039: nīlamaṇikṛpāṇakācādyupadhānabhedātkālpaniko jīvānāṃ bhedo buddhivyapadeśabhedau vartayati, idaṃ bimbamavadātamimāni ca pratibimbāni nīlotpalapalāśaśyāmalāni vṛttadīrghādibhedabhāñji bahūnīti, evaṃ paramātmanaḥ śuddhasvabhāvājjīvānamabheda aikāntike
GSP33brsvbh1u:7040: 'pyanirvacanīyānādyavidyopadhānabhedātkālpaniko jīvānāṃ bhedo buddhivyapadeśabhedāvayaṃ ca paramātmā śuddhavijñānānandasvabhāva ime ca
GSP33brsvbh1u:7042: avidyopadhānaṃ ca yadyapi vidyāsvabhāve paramātmani na sākṣādasti tathāpi tatpratibimbakalpajīvadvāreṇa parasminnucyate /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7043: na caivamanyonyāśrayo jīvavibhāgāśrayāvidyā, avidyāśrayaśca jīvavibhāga iti, bījāṅkuravadanāditvāt
GSP33brsvbh1u:7044: ata eva kānuddiśyaiṣa īśvaro māyāmāracayatyanārthikāṃ, uddeśyānāṃ sargādau jīvānāmabhāvāt, kathaṃ cātmānaṃ saṃsāriṇaṃ vividhavedanābhājaṃ kuryādityādyanuyogo niravakāśaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7048: yadi na jīvāt brahma bhidyate, hanta jīvaḥ sphuṭa iti brahmāpi tathā syāt,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7049: tathā ca 'nihitaṃ guhāyām'iti nopapadyata ityata āha-nahi satyamiti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7050: yathāhi bimbasya maṇikṛpāṇādayo guhā evaṃ brahmaṇo 'pi pratijīvaṃ bhinnā avidyā guhā iti
GSP33brsvbh1u:7051: yathā pratibimbeṣu bhāsamāneṣu bimbaṃ tadabhinnamapi guhyamevaṃ jīveṣu bhāsamāneṣu tadabhinnamapi brahma guhyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7052: astu tarhi brahmaṇo 'nyadguhyamityata āha-naca brahmaṇo 'nya iti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7054: brahmaṇaḥ sarvātmanā bhāgaśo vā pariṇāmābhyupagame tasya kāryatvādanityatvācca tadāśrito mokṣo 'pi tathā syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7056: evaṃ ye nadīsamudranidarśanenāmukterbhedaṃ muktasya cābhedaṃ jīvasyāsthiṣata teṣāmapi nyāyenāsaṃgatiḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:7060: kiṃ pāthaḥ paramāṇava utaiṣāṃ saṃsthānabheda āhosvittadārabdho 'vayavī /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7061: tatra saṃsthānabhedasya vāvayavino vā samudraniveśe vināśāt kasya samudreṇaikatā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7062: nadīpāthaḥ paramāṇūnāṃ tu samudrapāthaḥ paramāṇubhyaḥ pūrvavasthitebhyo bheda eva nābhedaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:7064: ye tu kāśakṛtsnīyameva matamāsthāya jīvaṃ paramātmanoṃ'śamācakhyusteṣāṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:7066: niṣkalamiti sāvayavatvaṃ vyāsedhi na tu sāṃśatvam, aṃśaśca jīvaḥ paramātmano nabhasa iva karṇanemimaṇḍalāvacchinnaṃ nabhaḥ śabdaśravaṇayogyaṃ, vāyoriva ca śarīrāvacchinnaḥ pañcavṛttiḥ prāṇa iti cet
GSP33brsvbh1u:7068: karṇanemimaṇḍalāvacchinnamaṃśa iti cet, hanta tarhi prāptāprāptavivekena
GSP33brsvbh1u:7070: naca karṇanemimaṇḍalaṃ tasyāṃśaḥ, tasya tato bhedāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7074: nabhodharmatve hi tadanavayavaṃ sarvatrābhinnamiti tatsaṃyogaḥ sarvatrā pratheta /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7078: vyāpyaivāsti kevalaṃ pratisaṃbadhyadhīnanirūpaṇatayā na sarvatra nirūpyata iti cet, na nāma nirūpyatām /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7079: tatsaṃyuktaṃ tu nabhaḥ śravaṇayogyaṃ sarvatrāstīti sarvatra śravaṇaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7080: naca bhedābhedayoranyatareṇāṃśaḥ śakyo nirvaktum na cobhābhyāṃ,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7082: tasmādanirvacanīyānādyavidyāparikalpita evāṃśo nabhaso na bhāvika iti yuktam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7083: naca kālpaniko jñānamātrāyattajīvitaḥ kathamavijñāyamāno 'sti, asaṃścāṃśaḥ kathaṃ śabdaśravaṇalakṣaṇāya kāryāya kalpate, na jātu rajjvāmajñāyamāna
GSP33brsvbh1u:7091: api ca bhāvikāṃśavādināṃ mate bhāvikāṃśasya jñānenocchettumaśakyatvānna jñānadhyānasādhano mokṣaḥ syāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7093: evaṃ jīvo brahmaṇoṃ'śa iti kāśakṛtsnīyaṃ matamiti siddham //22//
GSP33brsvbh1u:7098: vedāntānāṃ brahmaṇi samanvaye darśite samāptaṃ samanvayalakṣaṇamiti kimaparamavaśiṣyate yadarthamidamārabhyata iti śaṅkāṃ nirākartuṃ saṃgatiṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:7100: atra ca lakṣaṇasya saṃgatimuktvā lakṣaṇenāsyādhikaraṇasya saṃgatiruktā /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7101: etaduktaṃ bhavati-satyaṃ jagatkāraṇe brahmaṇi vedāntānāmuktaḥ samanvayaḥ /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7102: tatra kāraṇabhāvasyobhayathā darśanājjagatkāraṇatvaṃ brahmaṇaḥ kiṃ nimittatvenaiva, utopādānatvenāpi
GSP33brsvbh1u:7103: tatra yadi prathamaḥ pakṣastata upādānakāraṇānusāraṇe sāṃkhyasmṛtisiddhaṃ pradhānamabhyupeyam
GSP33brsvbh1u:7104: tathā ca 'janmādyasya yataḥ'iti brahmalakṣaṇamasādhu, ativyāpteḥ pradhāne 'pi gatatvāt
GSP33brsvbh1u:7106: yadi tūttaraḥ pakṣastato nātivyāptirnāpyavyāptiriti sādhu lakṣaṇam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7111: āgamasya kāraṇamātre paryavasānādanumānasya tadviśeṣaniyamamāgamo na pratikṣipatyapi tvanumanyata evetyāha-pāriśeṣyādbrahmaṇo 'nyaditi /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7115: somyaikena mṛtpiṇḍena'iti ca dṛṣṭāntaḥ, paramātmanaḥ prādhānyaṃ sūcayataḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:7116: yathā somaśarmaṇaikena jñātena sarve kaṭhā jñātā bhavanti /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7118: na kevalaṃ brahma nimittakāraṇaṃ, kutaḥ, pratijñādṛṣṭāntayoranuparodhāt /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7127: nimittakāraṇaṃ tu kāryādatyantabhinnamiti na tajjñāne kāryajñānaṃ bhavati
GSP33brsvbh1u:7131: nahi tadānīṃ brahmaṇi jñāte sarvaṃ vijñātaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7134: yata iti ca pañcamī na kāraṇamātre smaryate api tu prakṛtau, 'janikartuḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:7141: etayā khalu svātantryalakṣaṇena kartṛtvena nimittatvaṃ darśitam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7148: śrutirbrahmaṇo jagadupādānatvamavadhārayantī upādānāntarābhāvaṃ sākṣādeva darśayatītisākṣāditisūtrāvayavena darśitamiti yojanā //25//
GSP33brsvbh1u:7161: tyacca parokṣamata evānirvācyamidantayā vāyvākāśalakṣaṇaṃ, kathaṃ ca tadbrahmaṇo rūpaṃ yadi tasya brahmopādānaṃ, tasmātpariṇāmādbrahma bhūtānāṃ prakṛtiriti //26//
GSP33brsvbh1u:7165: etaduktaṃ bhavati-īśvaro jagato nimittakāraṇameva īkṣāpūrvakajagatkartṛtvāt, kumbhakartukulālavat
GSP33brsvbh1u:7168: āgamāttatsiddhiriti cet, hanta tarhi yādṛśamīśvaramāgamo gamayati tādṛśo 'bhyupagantavyaḥ sa ca nimittakāraṇaṃ copādānakāraṇaṃ ceśvaramavagamayati /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7170: iyaṃ copādānapariṇāmādibhāṣā na vikārābhiprāyeṇāpi tu tathā sarpasyopādānaṃ rajjurevaṃ brahma jagadupādānaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brsvbh1u:7171: na khalu nityasya niṣkalasya brahmaṇaḥ sarvātmanaikadeśena vā pariṇāmaḥ saṃbhavati, nityatvādanekadeśatvādityuktam
GSP33brsvbh1u:7172: naca mṛdaḥ śaravādayo bhidyante, na cābhinnāḥ, na vā bhinnābhinnāḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:7175: tasmādadvaitopakramādupasaṃhārācca sarva eva vedāntā aikāntikādvaitaparāḥ santaḥ sākṣādeva kvacidadvaitamāhuḥ, kvaciddvaitaniṣedhena,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7177: etāvatāpi tāvadbhedo niṣiddho bhavati, na tūpādānatvābhidhānamātreṇa vikāragraha āstheyaḥ
GSP33brsvbh1u:7182: mā bhūtpradhānaṃ jagadupādānaṃ tathāpi na brahmopādānatvaṃ sidhyati,
GSP33brsvbh1u:7183: paramāṇvādīnāmapi tadupādānānāmupaplavamānatvāt, teṣāmapi hi kiñcidupodbalakamasti vaidikaṃ
GSP33brsvbh1u:7186: 'pratijñālakṣaṇaṃ lakṣyamāṇe padasamanvayaḥ vaidikaḥ sa ca tatraiva
